1: Title: Fantastic from start to finish

Review: Front start to finish a great experience. Friendly, knowledgeable and professional staff. The best Mac and Cheese I have ever tasted and the steak was cooked to perfection. There were no down sides. Thankyou I will return
2: Title: Ottima carne, davvero di alta qualità

Review: Ottima cena. Una delle migliori carni che abbia mai mangiato in vita mia. Abbiamo ordinato carni scozzesi, morbide, saporite e ben cotte (medium rare). Buone anche le patate (morbide dentro e croccanti fuori). Ambiente amichevole e informale (non ci andrei per una cena romantica e sdolcinata), il locale con pochi tavoli e il personale molto gentile, simpatico ed efficiente.
3: Review: So we go here very often and a majority of the time it is very good and the staff are pleasant. I reconvened you meet Frederick as she is very helpful and fun
4: Title: Good food. Music too loud.
Review: The restaurant is very beautiful. The food is very good, especially the specialty meats. Unfortunately, the music too loud is unbearable.
5: Review: Per gli amanti della carne, quella vera, quella cotta alla perfezione, che si scioglie in bocca ed ha un sapore indescrivibile. Questo ristorante, che appare all’ingresso una macelleria, offre prodotti di altissima qualità sapientemente preparati. La carne era squisita, abbiamo assaggiato diverse opzioni.Contorni vari di patatine fritte, insalata, olive tutto ottimo.. ma una nota particolare alla sweet potato, eccezionale.Per non parlare dei dolci: tiramisù top. Particolare il piatto di ananas e altrettanto buone le zeppoline con crema e cioccolato fuso. Offerta di vini molto ampia.Prezzi leggermente sopra la media ma perfettamente in linea con il posto, con il servizio e con quanto offerto. Un ringraziamento particolare a Nicolò che ci ha accompagnati per tutta la durata della cena.
6: Review: It is 18:08 on July 15, 22. I just left the restaurant... least to say worst customer service ever. I went with my daughter for a nice dinner with high expectations of a cosy nice place. Unfortunately we went and stood for at least 3 mins with the manager and staff doing nothing and when my daughter asked if we can sit outside on one of the empty tables. The manager said that he will be with us shortly ( at this time I sat on the side on a sofa, as I am disabled, I can't stand for long time) . The manger showed up rolling his eyes and speaking in a hostile style claiming that he has reservations ( there were no signs of reservations) we only have one hour to finish our dinner ( sarcastic style) . The upleasent experience details can go on and on. In short and as a freshly graduated lawyer who is attentive to details, and After more than 30 years on this country, this is so far the worst discrimination unprofessional experience I ever had!!! It is a shame it is just down the road from where we live.
7: Review: Was really looking forward to this but was a bit disappointed in the end. A couple of things. The starter one of us ordered was Tartare but it didn’t say that on the menu, did say it for other dishes but not this one. Wouldn’t have been ordered if we had known. Fuller and better description would have been good.Rib Eye steak (Scottish) and I’ve consumed many was overdone and in places tough. Have to say the Fassano Sirloin was lovely as was the asparagus and the Beet and Fennel salad so most of the food was great, but when you lead on steak and then it’s poor then that’s a shame.The waiter did listen to the feedback and comped us dessert which was nice. The bill came to £228 for two of us which after the experience didn’t seem worth it I’m afraid. One other thing. Female toilet out of service and the male toilet was hanging, obviously no attention paid to it during the evening and expected better from this place.
8: Review: Not really sure where it started to go wrong with this meal. Perhaps it was how many times we had to ask for bread with our starters (which weren’t very nice). The bread eventually arrived half way through our mains. The waiter was nice but service was slow and seemed to go from ‘attentive’….literally the front of house guy constantly trying to put the napkins on our lap to ‘indifferent’ because we’d dared to chase up our food. The whole atmosphere felt wrong. I literally started to feel like we were being ignored. Tables around us were given limoncello after their meals…not us! Barely an acknowledgment as we left and we paid £170 for the privilege, that’s without deserts and only 1 glass of wine.My main of fillet steak was ok but the ridiculous amount of salt on everything ruined the taste. My husbands steak seemed small, overcooked and was certainly no better than why we could cook at home. Apparently for some customers they bring the cuts to the table for you to see? Not us. If any of the management or staff at this restaurant ever happen to read this, please remember good customer service should be at the heart of what you do. Treat everyone the same and with respect. Otherwise you’re in the wrong industry.
9: Review: Il ristorante è curato nei dettagli. Siamo stati accolti con gentilezza e attenzione. La carne è superlativa come tutto il resto d’altronde. Consigliatissimo! Grazie al nostro cameriere
10: Title: The meat you are looking for is HERE!

Review: Good choice of cuts and variety of meat. The entrance is dominated by the fridge where the meat is exposed. We choose a fassona t-bone steak, 7 to 9 weeks aged, rare cooked. Great result! We’ll be back soon.
11: Review: when you have the first bite of their meat, it makes you think of a special place ... it made me feel like family ... and the meat is as good as you feel like coming back every time
12: Review: Se Borghese li ha premiati un motivo ci sarà, abbiamo ordinato una fiorentina, una sola parola “fantastica”, difficile trovare meglio
13: Review: Se avete voglia di carne, di OTTIMO cibo italiano, di un servizio vincente, allora DOVETE ASSOLUTAMENTE andare da loro! Sono il massimo! La carne, sia la tartare o battuta come si dice in italiano, che la costata sono stati DELIZIOSI! Il servizio, che conta un buon 80% della buona impressione del ristorante, ECCEZIONALE! Tutti i ragazzi/e di un’educazione unica, disponibili, sorridenti, rilassati… merito loro e del padrone di casa! Voto 10!! Bravissimi tutti! Alla prossima!
14: Title: Best italian steak restaurant in London
Review: Had a fantastic meal and the service was best.  We even recieved complimentary desert and limoncello shots from the assistant manager roberto.  Would definetly comeback.
15: Review: Booked this as a family celebration. Firstly told the wine I wanted wasn’t available and had to order one £12 more!! Terrible service, long wait for food. Food wasn’t up to much. VERY expensive meal that was nothing but a huge disappointment.
16: Review: Cibo ottimo, ambiente familiare, personale super… Qui si assapora la vera carne italiana in un ambiente familiare ed accogliente… LUCA il metre di sala il MIGLIORE !!!
17: Title: Es bueno, pero excesivamente caro

Review: Tenía muchísimas ganar de ir al RC Macellaio porque las imágenes que veía de este restaurante era espectaculares. El restaurante es muy bonito y elegante. El servicio estuvo atento, educado y cordial en todo momento. En cuanto a la comida ... me quedé algo frío. De sabor estaba muy buena, pero de cantidad ... ahí me falló. El T-bone tiene un peso mínimo (850g), y para 2 personas ... se queda algo corto (y ya cuesta 81.6 libras = 98.54€).
18: Review: Superbe. Je recommande vivement!Bonne viande, bon service, belle décoration, tout était au top!De bonnes bouteilles et une grappa fort appréciable.
19: Review: What a great experience. First time steak tartare, best of meats and pasta. Lovely wines. Brilliant team especially Sara our waitress and savour as I forgot my PIN number. A beautiful evening of great food, creative talent and uniquely prepared menu - we loved it and will be back with the whole family. Best night in London for a good while. Enjoy!
20: Review: The only reason I scored 1 is because I couldn’t score zero. Overpriced, profiteering on underwhelming fare. Served the wrong courses at the wrong time- forgot a starter and I saw the male waiter whisper to the younger waitress to come and ask what we were waiting for - he took the order for goodness sake.Don’t be as foolish as me - book elsewhere - they don’t deserve your support- total waste of money.,We had a meal which was more expensive last night and gave the waiter liberty to order for us - it was excellent. This was awful.
21: Title: my usual meat restaurant in London

Review: This is my usual meat restaurant in London. Not only because I live close, but because it is trustworthy, I have never had a negative experience. Not only the different cuts of meat are all extremely good and professionally cooked, but also the starters are amazing because you can find the best burrata, crostino con lardo and the best prosciutto San Daniele in London. Also, the wines are super good value for money. I do not give 5 stars as I did with Macellaio in Soho because here the environment is more cozy and less refined and the service is more relaxed. BUT PLEASE TRUST ME IF YOU ARE LOOKING FOR AMAZING MEAT FOR NOT PROHIBITIVE PRICES GO TO MACELLAIO!
22: Review: Yum.  Great bar guy! Delicious food and good wine. Medium rare steak was very rare, that would be my only complaint. But vibe was too.
23: Review: Me and girlfriend had dinner yesterday evening for her birthday. Amazing experience, our waiter Luca was top notch, and the food was special as well as the wine (ABC merlot from Italy).We ordered a Misto Imperiale and a Bistecca alla Fiorentina (1kg). Needless to say that the starter was beautiful as well as the meat (just a note for the chef: the meat was perfectly cooked medium rare as we ordered, but the plate was cold so the dish got cold too in a couple of minutes and we actually asked to warm up 4/5 pieces to enjoy the flavour more).We ended the night with a couple of Espresso, a whiskey Oban 14yo and an Amaretto Disaronno.We will come back 100%
24: Title: awful service and never order take out from here
Review: Usually good food but awful service, extremely slow And never order take out because you will certainly be waiting for hours.
25: Review: Lovely and down-to-earth Italian steakhouse with fantastic food, decent prices, and great service. Even the house wine was great!!
26:
Review: We felt so welcome that it almost felt like being in your home town, the food was outstanding and we  had the best service from Deborah. 

I have been coming to Macellaio and it never let me down.
27: Review: Probably the best service I have ever had in a London restaurant, staff were super polite and attentive, they really create an intimate experience and take care of their client. Food was beyond expectations! Meat just was in another level! Gelato Fritto and Panna Cotta with basil infusion was out of this world! Special thanks to Debora e Stefania, they were funny, friendly and great walking us through the menu. A.M & G.F
28: Title: Ottima carne e vini di eccellenza

Review: Se volete gustare dell’ottima carne abbinata a vini di qualità, questo è il posto giusto per voi. Lo staff è molto gentile e disponibile. L’atmosfera caratteristica. L’ambiente giusto per veri carnivori intenditori.
29: Review: We had dinner at this branch and it was excellent. The steaks are amazing and very well cooked. The sides are also excellent. The service was extremely friendly and efficient. The prices are on bit on the high side.
30: Title: Amazing food and great service

Review: The only thing I am sorry about visiting this restaurant is not asking for names of the two wonderful waiters that were serving us so I could include them into this review.This was by far the best meal we had in London. Fantastic cold cuts, the best Fiorentina we have ever had, great wine recommendation, great desserts and (finally!) a really good espresso to end it all with. Absolutely worth every penny. Thank you guys!
31: Review: I went at macellaio with my friends, the meat and all the food was amazing. We had such a good night and I would like to saying thank you to Deborah and Federica for the amazing service and also to chef Gianni and Federico for the wonderful food.Bianco al basilico is the best dessert you can ever never try
32: Title: It’s all about the host - Federico!
Review: Federico is the Host of this restaurant! The food is great and the atmosphere fantastic. On top of this, Federico makes the difference. His hosting abilities makes the experience perfect.
33:
Review: Outstanding!
Professional, outstanding beef
Carpaccio and the florentina are amazing!
Superb wine selection 
Service impeccable
34: Review: Locale caratteristico intimo staff molto cortese carne ottima con una scelta molto ampia e varia consigliato
35: Review: Ottimo ristorante a gestione italiana con una carne di prim' ordine ed un ottimo servizio, rapido ed efficiente.Gustosissima la tagliata cotta a piacere e accompagnata da una montagna di patate arrosto.Prezzo 45 pounds a persona
36: Review: What an experience. I took my wife and two friends there last night. Would thoroughly recommend. We had both the Rib Eye cut and the Florentine superb.
37: Title: Good meat, OK service, rather fithy toilets

Review: If you are into dry aged meat (i.e. the very meaty taste) you are in.the right spot, provided also you are willing to fork our well over £50 for a (admitted, big) T-bone steak. Service is very pro, but not friendly or personable. Toilets however are a disgrace, not by pub standards but by £50+ steak standards, hence the 3 'star' review.
38: Review: Stupendous! I ordered one of the simplest things, a burger with chips, but it didn’t disappoint. In fact, the burger was one of the tastiest I’ve had in a while. The condiments really complemented it as well. Cosy atmosphere and very good (efficient) service too. Really great spot if meat is your thing.
39: Review: we had a dinner on sunday evening. the quality of the food was fantastic but what amazed us was the service. the manager Ferderico was alone and we were surprised by the knowledge, the organization and the enthusiasm. always ready to satisfy our request. one of the best restaurant in London
40: Review: My wife and I went to this restaurant based on the reviews which we read and also because we happened to be in the area. We were seated at the bar counter. I had the Carpaccio and it was a small portion. The Costata del Maccellaio was nice but the rubbish smell coming from the bar put us off. The Battuta Albese did not have a good taste. The place did not look clean at all and the butcher was filthy. There are much better Italian restaurants in London than this place
41:
Review: Very good dinner, la Fiorentina was cooked perfectly and the staff very friendly. Special Thanks to Roberto the chef who looked after us very well!
AG
42: Review: We went there to try Florentine Steak which we read about in the internet. In summary, this restaurant is charging like a very posh restaurant without any of its features! The reasons that I gave it three stars instead of one were: very nice waiter who was very kind and helpful and I want to thank him for his kindness and also the food itself was good. However, in this restaurant we paid about £120 of which over £60 was only for the sides, drinks (we did not order any wine, just lemonade and water) and service. The restaurant is not a very well decorated, posh, elegant one. There was not any live music or anything of kind. So, I do not know why this restaurant should charge so much for simple sides and drinks? Also, it was very hot there and they said they cannot increase the AC speed!!! The lemonade was warm (they brought glass with ice but I expected the lemonade to be cold itself). It seems that the owner has some issues with electricity bills!!! I paid even more in the past for posh restaurant with top service and decoration/music but in this restaurant the service is similar to the likes of Nando's but you are paying over £4 just for a bottle of water and should expect a huge bill for very simple items.I will not come back and would not recommend it.
43: Review: We went for my boyfriend’s birthday, it was the best choice I have ever made! The dinner was so delicious and Federico welcomed us warmly and he served us with competence and extreme kindness. Definitely my favourite Italian restaurant in London so far!
44: Review: A small nice restaurant in central London. The staff is kind, nice. They served a starter plate as complimentarily. The food is really delicious, we will look forward to going again.
45: Review: Amazing family dinner! The staff was very welcoming and the food is simply WOW! If you are a meat lover this is the perfect place to go! Also a great selection of desserts! Thank you Federico and your team! We will be back very soon!
46: Review: The best restaurant in London ! Thanks to Federico for his kindness and professionality! Is always a pleasure to have linch or dinner in here ❤Michela Alessio and Baby FG
47: Review: I've been here for a dinner few days ago and as usual I've found high food quality! The service was amazing as well: I've been served by Federico that is always very nice, kind, professional and well prepared! It's always a pleasure coming back!!
48: Review: So glad to write this review for Macellaio in SK and its very professional staff. We decided to go out for dinner at Macellaio last Thursday 3rd of June, it was me and two other friends. Space is not massively big so I suggest booking a table if you want to be sure to find a seat and enjoy your evening. We had booked an inside table and as soon as we arrived we were nicely welcomed by the staff. The atmosphere is very chilling, the scent in the dining room is tasty and the choice and quality of food are relevant. The staff of Macellaio immediately proved to be very courteous and kind. We were served by Federica, who explained the history and concept of the restaurant. Very interesting. We decided to go for a shared plate but I love rare meat and my mate well-done meat. Federica, kindly, advised us of the dishes to order. We had the opportunity to try different types of meat and during the choice of the main dish, we were introduced to Luca who showed us the part of beef that he had selected for us, he has been friendly and prepared regarding his job. The quality of food is amazing, tasty and I will go back there for sure. I would like to say thank you to Federica, Luca and all the staff for their dedication. I was satisfied with my evening, I spent such a lovely time at Macellaio and we will be going back again.
49: Title: Amazing food and great service

Review: One week ago I went to macellaio with some friends. We heard a lot good things on this restaurantand we are completely agree with it. The food was amazing and the service great. All the staffs were professional and kind. Amazing service from the manager Federica and Luca, the guy in the macelleria, that gave us suggestions and explanations about the amazing food that they served to us. From the beginning to the end always with the smile and with professional. Absolutely recommend.
50: Review: Che dire locale molto carino,personale professionale e molto attento al cliente in particolare Federico, carne così non l’avevo nemmeno mai mangiata in Italia. Speriamo decidano di aprire in altre città come Manchester,successo assicurato.
51: Title: Cena all'insegna dell'amore e del buon gusto

Review: Locale molto accogliente, sereno, dal clima familiare, sembrava di stare in Italia! Cibo delizioso, staff cordiale, disponibile e molto professionale. Consigliatissimo specie per condividere un bellissimo ricordo con qualcuno di speciale, come abbiamo fatto noi. Torneremo senz'altro!
52: Review: Visited the shop had amazing customer service by Alessia. She advised us on what was best to buy and gave tips on how to prepare it. We went with 1kg of Fiorentina and some appetisers. Best Valentine’s Day meal by far
53: Review: This is the best Meat restaurant in London and in all UK! Exceptional Food with amazing products, Excellent Service with professional Team. We had the honour to meet the owner Roberto Costa in our last visit and we really hope he can open soon in our home town, Rome. Every time we visit here it is magical, we feel at home and we leave with a smile and with a satisfied belly :) Great job everyone, in particular a big thanks to Federico!
54: Title: Carne Da leccarsi i baffi

Review: Ieri sono andata a cena al Macellaio di South Kensington con amiche. È stata la loro prima volta E sono rimaste molto soddisfatte come me. Abbiamo preso diversi piatti per assaggiare un po’ di tutto e la Cottura della carne era perfetta, piatti presentati molto bene e il servizio è molto buono. I camerieri sono cordiali e il prezzo è accessibile a tutti. Ci vogliamo tornare presto, troppo buona quella carne.
55: Title: Sono stato in questo ristorante

Review: Sono stato in questo ristorante ieri sera su consiglio di un vecchio amico di infanzia e sono rimasto stupefatto dalla qualita’ della carne e da un servizio che anche con locale strapieno non ha sbagliato nulla, la mia ragazza che odia la carne cruda una volta assaggiato il carpaccio non me lo voleva piu restituire sicuramente da provare
56: Review: Went here with my girlfriend for our first evening meal in London. The staff are courteous, friendly and attentive. Had the beef heart to start, not overly hot but tasty. We ordered the steak Florence to share and were shown the meat before it was cooked. Wow the steak was so tender and delicious, best beef I’ve ever tasted! Highly recommend.
57: Review: Thank you very much Federico for the amazing service! The food is very good and nothing is too much for you and for your team! I will definitely come back! Hidden gem in South Kensington 😍😍😍😍
58: Review: 1st visit after reading Tripadvisor reviews, boy are we pleased we did. The most succulent steak we have ever had, great service.
59: Review: Era da tempo che desideravo andarci. La particolarità di questo ristorante è il bancone come una vera macelleria dove puoi scegliere il tuo taglio di carne.La qualità della carne è indubbiamente eccellente, i piatti deliziosi. Da provare assolutamente gli starters di tartare, senza farvi mancare i dolci, davvero particolari, come la panna cotta alla menta e il latte dolce fritto. Un ringraziamento particolare ad Emanuele e Federica per il loro servizio impeccabile e per la loro simpatia. Ci torneremo sicuramente!
60: Title: Best meat service desserts interor

Review: I am chef myself and I want to say thank you for the amazing food and service.The restaurant its very beautiful.Quality of the steak its high. Only one chef but he did great job doing all the dishes by himself.
61: Review: Ottima ristorante di carne italiana a Londra nel quartiere dei musei. Ottimi gli antipasti e bei tagli di carni.
62: Review: The food is simply amazing! We tried the T-Bone (medium-rare, as suggested by Billy).. and we had no regrets. It melts in your mouth. And to finish it off.. the tiramisu is to die for. I would visit again and again!
63: Review: Se siete a Londra e volete mangiare carne, ottima carne, vi consiglio vivamente questo ristorante. Vasta scelta e prezzi giusti. Si mangia (e si beve) benissimo! Voto 10+ alla tartare con il gorgonzola sciolto al momento quando te lo servono in tavola! Lo staff è super accogliente e gentile. Io e il mio fidanzato abbiamo passato un’ottima serata!
64: Title: in just one word excellent!

Review: in just one word excellent! we took tartare, carpaccio evo, fiorentina steak. it is one of the best restaurant where you can taste the real Fassona piemontese. i will come back there for sure. also service is very good..
65:
Review: Amazing food and amazing costumer service. The meet was perfectly cook and Giacomo, the waiter, was highly professional, very friendly and gave us really good advices. Thank you Giacomo.

I highly recommend this restaurant
66: Review: Sono stata per san valentino con il mio fidanzato. Cena ottima e di qualità. Prezzi un po’ alti ma considerando che si trova a South Kensington ne vale la pena. Tiramisù eccezionale!Sicuramente ritorneremo
67: Review: Stasera io e il mio fidanzato siamo stati lì a cena,è stato tutto perfetto a partire dalla gentilezza e professionalità di tutto lo staff... Un grazie particolare lo facciamo a Federico per averci consigliato dei piatti squisiti, ma anche per il servizio e la disponibilità che ci ha offerto per tutta la cena... Ci ritorneremo sicuramente...Altamente consigliato a tutti coloro che desiderano mangiare bene ed avere una piacevole esperienza...  Roberto e Veronica...
68: Review: We have visited Mocellaio for my husband's birthday and I have to say that we left very satisfied and impressed. The food is delicious, the staff is amazing and helpful with high standards of service. Big thanks to Federico and Billy who looked after us so well. Great pasta, brilliant meat and great selection of wines. This is where I had the best steak in London so far. I definitely recommend it for the meat lovers out there, and we will be back for sure.
69: Title: Nothing to say but good things.

Review: Nothing to say but good things. Food is excellent, beef is just incredible. The staff are so lovely and gracious. We normally eat in but decided to buy from the butcher and bbq at home. I keep forgetting how good this place is. And you can buy the balsamic vinegar which is some of the most delicious I’ve ever tasted.
70: Title: The best meat I’ve ever had.
Review: The best meat I’ve ever had.  Service from Frederico was over the top.  The beef tartar and the rib eye were so good I can’t wait to go back next week.  I’m crazy about this place
71: Title: The best italian meat and service ever you can possibly find in London

Review: My girlfriend and I went out to celebrate a lovely dinner out post-lockdown.We have already been in the branch located atUnion Street for New Year's Eve, and we genuinely fell in love so much that we wanted to experience it again.The atmosphere is charming, and the staff is exceptionally customer-focused! The sommelier was outstanding in suggesting and guiding us to a perfect red wine choice without being pushy or too wordy. The waiter Federico was looking after our table and explaining to us very passionately the menu and the different cut of the meat. The owner and the whole crew was truly reflecting an Italian spirit and origin, making us feel at home like nowhere. We have been also offered a jaw-dropping dessert and the dinner was an absolute success! This place was 45 min away from where we live in London, but given the fantastic experience, we will certainly come back.
72: Review: Me and my friends were looking for a place for a lunch in the area and we stumbled upon this place.We shared a few starters (some of which they kindly offered for us to try) and some focaccia. The bone marrow starter was delicious and you could tell the meat was the best quality.for mains we had one ragu pasta and two steaks. Every single dish was packed with flavour and we enjoyed every single bite.The best part was the service. Our waiter Federico was amazing. He made sure we were well looked after and that our food was to our liking.I look forward going back to this great place.
73:
Review: The Fiorentina del Macellaio was great, as well as the Bianco al Basilico, very fresh and tasty dessert.
Also our waiter was the best!!!
So happy to be able to come back after the lockdown!!!😊
74: Review: It is always worth going to this restaurant as the meat is awesome and the service is always nearly perfect. It is a good place for friends, couples or families and the quality of the food is always impeccable. Highly recommended and look for Federico :)!
75: Review: In questa realtà italiana di grande successo a Londra, è possibile gustare le prelibatezze nostrane, preparate in maniera superba, con una meravigliosa commistione di tradizione (carni a cottura molto lenta, patate arrosto, polenta) e innovazione (affumicatura, grande disponibilità di crudi di carne, panna cotta al basilico). La qualità della carne è indiscutibile. L'antipasto "L'imperiale", contenente un po' di tutto, è un ottimo modo per provare che a Il Macellaio hanno un'offerta davvero prelibata di carni e formaggi, perciò lo consiglio vivamente. Tutte le carni servite successivamente, per quanto chiaramente non le abbia provate tutte, sono preparate con grande rispetto e cura, sia per la carne stessa che per il cliente, che viene davvero coccolato dallo staff, mentre si gusta tutto ciò che gli viene servito. A finire, ci è stata offerta la panna cotta al basilico. Dessert fresco, perfetto per stemperare i sapori dei piatti precedenti e farti uscire dal locale (ancora più) felice. Il conto rispecchia l'alta qualità della cucina nel contesto di uno dei quartieri più ricchi di Londra, per cui non mi sembra il caso di dargli troppo peso nel giudizio complessivo. Per gli amanti della carne, italiani e non solo, è un must.
76: Title: Enough to even impress Her Royal Majesty the Queen!

Review: 3/15 Sunday evening in LondonAs we entered Macellaio, we were greeted with a big welcome by Federico, a smiling server originally from a town near Cinque Terre, Italy. However, Federico was so much more than just our waiter for the evening. Full of charm, great humor and expert attentiveness, he was our master host, our gastronomical guide, our story-teller and entertainer. In fact, it seems the staff there love a bit of theatre: viciously sharp knives are stabbed into tables with a thud, meat is butchered loudly to order and steaks are delivered under silver cloches until presented to guests with a dramatic reveal. Still, the restaurant and its dishes had a true authentic feel, reminding us a lot of our nostalgic travels in Italy. The restaurant generously started us off with some complimentary and fantastic cured bresaola and house-made focaccia. We added to that an order of perfectly paired prosciutto and creamy burrata cheese. Once we found out the soup of the day was a Ribollita, one of our favorites from Tuscany, we ordered that right away. This soup is very popular after the wine harvest is done and autumn is in full swing, made of bread, cannelloni beans, and vegetables. We also ordered a superb house-made potato Gnocchi with Castelmagno cheese fondue. And then the star of the night was the tender and tasty Costata del Macellaio, a 9-week dry-aged Fassona beef rib steak, cut and trimmed right in front of us before going to the kitchen. For dessert, we each ordered digestives: a Limoncello, Montenegro and a Cynar. And even though the free starter and gracious service was already far enough to delight us, Federico still brought us a complimentary tiramisu to celebrate Bailey’s birthday trip. All the food and service was amazing and I would give this place 6 stars on a 5-star rating system. The whole experience was enough to even impress Her Royal Majesty the Queen. :-)
77: Review: Dont be deceived by the outside this is a meat eaters paradise. Expect lots of Italians to be here and for good reasons. They have their own butcher on site cutting meats and provide a range of specialists meats. I went for simple sirloin with oil and salt with sauteed potatoes - outstanding, the taste the texture were perfect. It has been a long time since I have had steak this good...with a carafe of wine it was perfect. This was great service, great food and a delight
78: Review: Had a steak here split between two people and it was quite the best steak I have had in a long time! The wine list is also great. If you are a real steak connoisseur then you will not be disappointed here! There is also a butchers at the front of house and had it been open at night I would have bought some to take home! Loved it!
79: Review: This is the Kingdom of the hospitality good good food simple but essential and Roberto just add the magic to his restaurant with his impeccable staff.. Macellaio nothing else!
80: Review: Nous sommes ravis. Le concept est original, nous mangeons dans une boucherie. Les serveurs sont souriants, très sympathiques et patients, ils ont pris le temps de tout nous expliquer malgré la barrière de la langue. La viande est de grande qualité, le vin était excellent, les frites et les pommes de terre sautées maison très bonnes. Et les desserts nous ont enchantés. Nous y retournerons avec plaisir. Tout était parfait.
81: Review: Ottimo ristorante di carne a Londra. Staff preparato, competente ed accogliente; abbiamo apprezzato molto la qualità del cibo e la disponibilità da parte del personale.
82: Title: Il ristorante migliore di londra

Review: Nel cercare su tripadvisor abbiamo trovato la macelleria. Abbiamo prenotato e siamo andati ad arrivarci e molto comodo. Entrata bellissima con la carne appena e il bancone della macelleria subito all’ingresso dove lavorano la carne. I ragazzi italiani sono super ospitali e ti trattano da principi. Ti offrono antipasto e poi ti ordini. Fanno tutti i tipi di carne dalla fiorentina alle costine al carpaccio al pollo tutte in maniera ottima anche pasta e formaggi. Dolce buonissimo sia il la panna cotta al basilico sia il gelato fritto e il caffe piu buono di londra. Il prezzo e correttissimo infatti abbiamo mangiato cosi bene che abbiamo fatto tutte le nostre 5 sere con loro. Appena tornero a londra ci torno subito.
83: Title: Servizio ottimo carne ok prezzi dei vini ..un po' cari ....

Review: Dopo le recenzioni su trip advisor siamo stati in questo ristorante devo dire che si mangia bene abbiamo preso una Costata peso 840 circa delle patate al forno, una insalata di finocchi 2 birre moretti Siciliana siamo stati serviti da Federica che ci ha spiegato tutto il menu',la carne era buona, ma il tiramisu' era meglio della carne....servizio ottimo, tutti Italiani in sala service charge incluso nel prezzo.
84: Review: Von außen denkt man zuerst es sei ein Metzger, da im Fenster das Fleisch ausgestellt ist.Das Essen war super und wenn wir mal wieder in London sind, werden wir da wieder Essen gehen.
0: Review: Locazion top,accoglienza italiana fantastica ci siamo sentiti a casa,Federica è stata attenta e professionale a illustrarci i piatti da degustare,tutto molto buono dalla carne alla pasta al pesto..da ritornarci sicuramente.
85: Review: A friend of mine was visiting and decided to have a celebratory dinner at the restaurant. We ordered pasta with white truffles and steaks. The food was absolutely amazing with the white truffles freshly shaved in front of you and the most perfectly cooked steak! Dessert and wine offering compliments the entire meal beautifully. The service we received was absolutely the highlight. It was a very busy Monday evening but they were able to fit us even without reservation. Our server, Federico, remembered me as a return customer. He was very accommodating and the most attentive / funny server I have come across - really adds to an amazing dining experience.
86: Title: The best welcome ever received

Review: Beyond any reasonable doubt, the meat is really good here. However, we were impressed by the service and the welcome received. We arrived yesterday a bit late, the kitchen was closed. Nonetheless two gentlemen, Federico and Luca (hopefully I got it right) opened the doors and led us in for a glass of wine. We were amazed by the wine knowledge of a young chap who brought us this superb Montepulciano and Luca Who explained the meat "nibbles" we managed to order a moment before the closure. I reckon this is where this place won our tribute. A perfect balance of quality food, high standards and the perfect sense of hospitality. We will return again soon. Thanks Federico!
87: Review: We descovered this little jewel by chance. We had a rib steak and a fillet, both excellent. The waiter was very hospitable and appeared very careful to ensure we were comfortable and happy with the food. The desserts were a very good surprise too. Fantastic tiramisu and very special custard fried balls. Definitively worth a second visit.
88: Review: Sono stata con la mia famiglia a cena una domenica sera . Siamo stati accolti subito con un sorriso e la focaccia genovese !! Abbiamo mangiato degli antipasti e due tagli di carne strepitosi che abbiamo diviso in quattro .Per finire un tris di dolci eccezionali e fatti in casa ! I gestori e il nostro cameriere sono stati molto simpatici . Consiglio a tutti una sosta in questo locale . Non è economico ma la qualità è giusto pagarla .
89: Title: Very good food and nice enviroment
Review: Our friends recommend this restaurant and it was a good choise, as the food was very good, the enviroment was cozy ant the staff was friendly
90: Review: Tu pousses la porte et tu arrives dans une petite boucherie, très chaleureuse et avec une vitrine qui donne déjà tellement faim !Ensuite on nous a emmené dans la salle du fond, une petite salle charmante, rustique et de belle dimension pour ne pas se sentir étouffé et dans laquelle on peut s'entendre parlé. Juste parfait avec la petite musique de fond qui va bien :)Pour nous ça a été un T bone maturé 9 semaines d'1kg... et là.... c'était un orgasme culinaire !!!!Servi avec des patates au four et une salade de choux rouge. C'est descendu tout seul!Mention spéciale pour Frederico notre serveur qui fut exceptionnel ! D'une gentillesse incroyable, il nous a mis à l'aise, bien expliqué comment fonctionne le resto et la carte et a délivré de superbes conseils pour le choix du plat !!! C'est une toute autre expérience si c'est lui qui s'occupe de vous!Nous recommandons fortement !Nb: faut compter environ 110£ pour deux (plat dessert sans vin)
91: Review: We went for dinner, the place is run mostly by Italians. we had the burrata salad, lard bruschetta, boiled tongue and the ribeye to share, everything was delicious... our waiter was Frederico he was great and extremely helpful with everything. I would definitely recommend this place.
92: Title: Our favourite meat restaurant in London

Review: This is one of our favourite restaurants in London. The food and atmosphere are fantastic, whether you’re coming on a date or with a group of friends. Federico is a wonderful waiter, full of passion for his job. He made our evening ever more fun and was really attentive throughout the night. Top service.And of course - the meat is incredible! We recommend the Fiorentina (T Bone). And Montepulciano wine to drink with!
93: Review: called on spec last night and managed to get a table. our waiter was extremely helpful and guided us through the menu. the meal was simply sublime. steak so tasty and the wine choice complimented it perfectly. great location and atmosphere. woukd definitely visit again.
94: Review: Excellent cuts of beef, prepared to perfection. Knowledgable wait staff, good service. Thumbs up, carnivore heaven!
95: Review: The food was great. Awesome.But what is a great food if the service isn't excellent?So, we had Federico serving us and he made it a most special night! Though the restaurant was fully occupied, each and every table received 200% of attention. By the end we asked him if he has shares in the restaurant (otherwise, how can you explain such devotion...?). Surprisingly, he isn't the owner, he just loves the place and what he does.Federico, we'll be back for sure!
96: Review: Amazing service! We have been served by Federico, one of the supervisor. He has been fantastic, his customer service is one of the best we ever received. The beef was amazing as well. Billy served us the drink and has been special. Federica has been amazing as well. Compliments to the staff. We will go back for sure.
97: Review: Ein eher ungewöhnlicher Laden mit einem super freundlichem Service und sehr gutem Wein - Aber das Hauptthema ist Fleisch und das wird hier mit Hingabe und echtem Können gegrillt. Eine 100% Empfehlung!!
98: Title: Wonderful dinner and wonderful service. Thanks to Federico

Review: Had dinner the 4th of february. Wonderful experience. The meat is simply amazing and tasty. The place is great with a unique atmosphere. But I’ll come back for sure because of the service. Since the beginning Federico was really friendly with me and gave me wonderful suggestions on the plates and the wine pairing. Even if the place was full he was always there ready to help. I give 5 stars to Macellaio RC South Kensington and 5stars cum laude to Federico. Thank you again for the great service and for the friendly attitude.
99: Title: "LE" restaurant de viande incontournable à Londres !!!

Review: Après un repas d'affaires, je m'étais promis de revenir en famille.Viande maturée au goût et à la cuisson incroyable !Accompagnements excellents : même des pommes de terre sautées au four sont justes délicieuses.Desserts à tester sans aucune excuse...Personnel et ambiance très "italien".Merci à Frederico pour ses conseils et sa gentillesse.Je recommande vivement !
100: Review: A great night out for a special occasion. Federico, our waiter, was solid gold; funny and helpful, with sincere suggestions and some Italian humor, def made our night. I had written in the booking that we had a birthday and he made sure to surprise us with a cake and a song. Everything is great in its simplicity and very tasty. We loved it.
101: Title: Shocking lack of basic hygiene by staff members

Review: We were there yesterday evening to celebrate my partner's birthday. Everything was going pretty well (apart from the fact I had to ask twice for a highchair, which was already requested when booked the table). After having finished my meal, I went downstairs to the ladies. While i was waiting to get in, sat in front of them (female and make toilets are close), I saw something revolting: a staff member with black uniform, went to the gents, I heard the toilet flush and in seconds he was out. Clearly he had not washed his hands. When we were asked if everything was ok with our meal, I did mention what I saw to her and told her I did not want to review the restaurant without telling them first. The waitress told me she would speak to the manager. To my biggest surprise, when he came to speak to us, he told me the guys working in the kitchen did not use the toilet in the time frame while I was waiting to use the toilet. At that point, I definitely felt insulted, and told him if he did not believe my words (why on earth would a customer make this up?!) he could go and check their internal CCTV system (I noticed there was a camera pointing that corridor). I should mention there was no hot water to wash your hands, which is not acceptable in winter time and in a restaurant that charges these amounts.The meat (900 grams did cost us 66 pounds) was just average, nothing special, and I am afraid the review I read on tripadvisor about the meat being hard was quite right. It's not the softest. Also, the wine is seriously overpriced. A carafe of wine (half a litre) costs us 28 pounds.
102: Review: After reading all the reviews on TripAdvisor, we decided to have dinner at Macellaio. We reserved a table for 4 and we were told that we have to leave in an hour which was fine.We ordered the carpaccio which was excellent and my son the rump steak, my daughter the pasta and my husband and I ordered the Ribeye for 2. The Ribeye was so dry and chewy when it was cooked medium rare and it was small, it was supposed to be 600 grams. The pasta was dry , my son enjoyed his rump steak .We paid 125 £ to have chewy and dry meat. Never again ....
103: Review: Very disappointing experience tonight. We have been going to macellaio for the past 6 years and never had the experience we had tonight. We had a reservation at 8pm, a lady welcomed us in saying we had only 1 hour 30 minutes to eat (the booking said 2 hours, however I don’t feel it is nice to say it as first thing as soon as we entered the restaurant). I informed the team we had 2 hours stated on the booking confirmation. We ordered starters, main and wine. After 5 minutes we received starters, we finished the starters and after maybe 3 minutes we had our Fiorentina ready on the table. In 30 minutes our dinner was over and immediately 2 waiters came to ask for desserts. We still had more than half bottle of the wine ordered (90£ bottle) to drink and we obviously informed the team that the service was way too fast... definitely not an enjoyable dinner and meat was not as good as usual.Unfortunately we also heard the table next to ours complaining with the manager of something we could have never thought. The butcher cutting the meat went to toilet and left without washing his hands... unacceptable. Moreover we found the restaurant very dusty, same as cutlery and dishes. We never had in many years such a negative experience.
104: Review: Ambiente un po povero. Servizio gentile. Piatti di carne modesti. Fiorentina non all'altezza. Vini modesti, prezzi un po alti. Non ci torno
105: Review: Torniamo volentieri per cena di lavoro dopo 6 mesi e tutto è rimasto inalterato a livello di qualità. Ottimi piatti di carne serviti su piatti di pietra con buoni contorni. Un appunto sulla posizione del tavolo vicino alla porta di ingresso che alle varie aperture dei clienti portava aria fredda. Il locale non era pieno e quindi non capisco, pur avendo prenotato, perché non ci sia stato dato un tavolo interno. Camerieri molto gentili come sempre anche se questa volta sembravano un pó scarichi e stanchi. Conto un pó salato ma tipico di Londra. Almeno si mangia bene. Consigliato ma fatevi dare un tavolo nella saletta interna.
106: Review: My bday dinner celebration couldn’t be more tasty. Lovely presentation and qualities of ingredients. One of the best Italians tried in London. Made me feel like home with superb recipes.
107: Review: Excellent meat cuts cooked to perfection. Great meat tartare and lovely roasted potatoes with herbs. Very nice chocolate cake.
108: Review: Not sure whether to tell everyone about this wonderful restaurant but really couldn't fault it. Excellent friendly service, wonderful meal and all recommended by the staff. Very good wine selection. Will definitely be back. Thanks for a very good evening.
109: Title: Meat and lots of it

Review: We had seen this restaurant and actually went there after many years. The main restaurant is in the back. The meat is on display, loads of it. The tables are a little squashed but adds to the atmosphere. The staff are charming. The only drawback is if yiu are disabled the toilets are downstairs with steep stairs covered in slippery tiles. We had our own starters but did what most people were doing and shared a giant T-Bone. This is ordered by weight.
110: Review: Sehr gutes Essen, guter Wein und freundliche sowie zuvorkommende Bedienung in ungewöhnlicher Atmosphere. Sehr empfehlenswert.
111: Title: Don’t buy steak from Italy.

Review: The staff were friendly enough but we were told the rump steaks were only 150 grams (they looked larger when we saw them arrive at other tables) so decided to have the t-bone. It was only post ordering that we were informed that the beef came from Italy. It arrived and after ordering medium rare, it was rare to blue, flavourless and tough as hell. In summary, the best beef in Europe in my opinion comes from Great Britain, Ireland and Northern Spain. At £32.50 per person without sides it was expensive and underwhelming. Other dishes may be great at the restaurant and reviews seem to show this, but avoid the t-bone.
112: Review: Tutto buonissimo, ristorante molto carino personale super gentilissimo e attento a tutte le esigenze pronto ad illustrare tutti i tipi di carne disponibili... Unica pecca il conto abbastanza salato 168 euro in due e penso a mio parere una piccola caduta di stile un limoncello gentilmente offerto e poi ritrovato nel conto per 7 euro. Però per una vacanza a Londra vale la pena provarlo.
113: Review: Great food, amazing service. We've been follow by Peter and Deborah, two amazing guys doing amazing stuff. Highly recommended for anyone who's looking for a good time accompabied by great food!
114: Review: Locale informale con cucina a base di carne di ottimo livello,personale cortese e gentile con ottima professionalità e passione per il proprio lavoro impersonata da Peter.Consigliamo tartare di fassona con gorgonzola e aceto balsamico come antipasto e tagliata con olio extra vergine e sale.Il prossimo viaggio che faremo a Londra torneremo di certo!!!
115: Review: Eccellenza Italiana con servizio all’altezza della qualità delle pietanze. Atmosfera molto particolare del locale con il banco macelleria all’ingresso. Non avendo prenotato, siamo stati sistemati in un tavolo proprio fronte banco frigo . Tutto secondo aspettative, consigliato anche da un amico che aveva mangiato qua in occasione di una vacanza.
116: Title: As usual EXCELLENT. You will be greated by HOURIA and your food will be prepared by ILLARO: Out of this world.

Review: As usual EXCELLENT. Steak tartare and Carpaccio OUT OF THIS WORLD. I strongly recommend this venue!
Never fails.
117: Title: Un po’ di Italia 🇮🇹 a Londra 🇬🇧

Review: Sono stata in questo ristorante con la mia migliore amica, portata da lei che vive a Londra. La qualità del cibo e il sapore italiano sono solo alcune cose che caratterizzano questo posto. Era come essere in Italia. Tutto veramente buono e genuino. Per non parlare della simpatia di due camerieri, un ragazzo e una ragazza, che ci hanno tenuto compagnia tutta la sera e ci hanno fatto divertire in vista del nuovo anno. Lo consiglio a tutti gli italiani a Londra che cercano un posto per sentirsi come a casa.
118: Title: Amazing steak, the best I’ve
Review: Amazing steak, the best I’ve had. Impeccable service and such a great experience, if you can sit close to the butcher and watch him at work. Will definitely be back.
119: Review: Questo ristorante che si trova nella zona di South Kensington a soli 5 minuti dalla fermata della metro. All arrivo siamo stati accolti da una gentile ragazza e da un fantastico federico, al quale avevamo prenotato il tavolo, che ci ha fatto accomodare nella sala più intima del locale, facendoci gli onori di casa ci ha anche spiegato per filo e per segno tutto il loro menù con le loro punte di diamante. Seguendo molti dei suoi consigli siamo riusciti a mangiare molto bene rimanendo particolarmente colpiti dalle varie tartare di carne, dagli gnocchi fatti in casa e soprattutto dalla costata di fassona piemontese frollata che rimaneva tenerissima e squisita al gusto. Un plauso va fatto a tutti gli altri membri dello staff dal barista ai camerieri passando per i cuochi per averci fatto sentire a casa in quanto essendo tutti italiani sono stati di estrema cortesia e simpatia. Per quanto riguarda il conto bisogna solamente stare attenti a cio che si beve. Posto consigliattissimo se si è a Londra per vacanza impossibile non passare a rilassarsi in questo locale.
120: Title: Best meat ever had in London!

Review: The best place ever !! If you want to have a great meal with friendly and expert staff it’s the right place where to go! I’ve spent a really nice evening with my boyfriend ! The food was delicious, the staff was awesome! Thank you to Peter, Luca,Leonardo, Billy and Federico! Great service! See you soon
121: Title: Cenone di Capodanno al top!

Review: Abbiamo passato la serata di Capodanno con amici presso questo ottimo ristorante ed è stata un'esperienza più che positiva: dall'antipasto ai primi, i contorni fino al loro punto di forza, la carne. Tutto davvero di qualità e sofisticato, accompagnato dalla professionalità dei ragazzi dello staff. Con nostra meraviglia ci sono stati anche offerti degli assaggi dei loro dolci tipici. Grazie ancora, altamente consigliato!
122: Title: Per chi ha voglia di Carne buona

Review: Io, mio marito e mia figlia di 2 anni ci siamo recati in questo ristorante dopo che non ne potevamo più di mangiare hamburger e fish and chips( ma a Londra questo c’è fondamentalmente) ed attratti dalle recensioni positive e dal menù che abbiamo trovato. Ci siamo trovati molto bene, camerieri gentilissimi e molto professionali, nell’attesa della carne ci hanno OFFERTO del salame ed un pò di focaccia e a mia figlia a fine cena un pò di gelato. Non è scontato trovare tante qualità in un ristorante a Londra dove la carne viene direttamente dall’Italia. Complimenti.
123:
Review: Ottimo ristorante italiano!
Scoperto grazie a un consiglio di amici e molto apprezzato.
Buonissima la carne.
Da provare.
124: Review: Federico ci ha coccolato, ma Peter,lo Zalone genovese, ci ha entusiasmato con la sua simpatica ironia. Grazie per la piacevole serata. Abbiamo mangiato davvero bene,però la mozzarella....
125:
Review: Sencillamente excelente. Burrata y prosciutto crudo y crostata, totalmente recomendado. 
Buen ambiente y los meseros atentos y amables.
Lo recomiendo.
126: Review: Tappa obbligatoria se decidete di trascorrere qualche giorno a Londra e siete in dubbio su dove andare a mangiare. Il locale è curato, informale ma non manca di personalità. Materie prime davvero di qualità e piatti ben cucinati e curati nella presentazione. Il servizio è stato impeccabile, il personale è giovane, preparato e cordiale. Federico ha dimostrato un'ottima preparazione nel presentarci i piatti, aiutarci nella scelta delle carni e nella scelta dei vini. Ci tornerò sicuramente, complimenti a tutto il personale. Siamo usciti con il sorriso, la pancia piena e un ricordo felice.
127: Review: Horrible experience.. Booked a table for Christmas Day for 4 people and we were travelling from abroad to have a good lunch and enjoy some good food but did not go as planned.. As I booked a table for lunch 3 weeks before Christmas the lady on the phone accepted my reservation and I even confirmed the reservation a week before my arrival.. When we arrived to the restaurant it was closed - desperately I tried to get in touch with the restaurant or someone but without any success. And thats our story - reserved table on Christmas day with closed restaurant. Thank you so much for the unforgettable experience Macellaio! And fun story is that there was another group of people that had the same experience like ours amazed by the great communication and service of the restaurant. Excuse me if your food is good, but for this experience you deserve nothing more than 1star.
128: Review: Esperienza fantastica. Cibo di qualità superiore. La carne era tenerissima e squisita. Tutte le portate deliziose. I camerieri Peter e Leonardo due ottime persone e due fantastici camerieri che ti fanno sentire a casa. Lo chef Alessandro è il numero 1. Ottima location per trascorrere una serata in una steakhouse in compagnia e farsi una bella mangiata.
129: Review: We had a reservation for New Years Day 2020 and they just called to cancel on us. Now we need to scramble to find a place that is open...not sure what the food is like, will never give them my business after that move.
130: Review: Ottimo cibo,atmosfera calda e accogliente,servizio perfetto. Un ringraziamento particolare a Federico che ci ha fatto sentire a casa,lontano da casa,attento senza essere invadente. Ci siamo affidati a lui nella scelta del menù,costata superlativa,vino azzeccato,dolci golosissimi. See you soon!
131: Review: Un ambiente giovane,molto gentili,ottimo cibo ,Federico,Peter molto simpatici ,lo consiglio senz'altro
132: Title: Una bella sorpresa a Londra

Review: Due sere a cena con dei ragazzi fantastici: Federico, Peter, Federica e Debora. Locale caratteristico, carne e cucina di prima qualità, servizio super. Sentirsi a casa é un attimo. Da provare assolutamente!
133: Title: Qualità ottima, ma un po’ “braccino”

Review: Il locale è molto bello per chi adora lo stile industriale/Loft , a me personalmente non fa impazzire ma mio marito che è appunto un amante del genere è rimasto stregato. I camerieri parlano perfettamente italiano e fa piacere a noi conterranei. Io conosco il titolare di fama poiché sono di Genova, ho anche guardato la trasmissione 4 ristoranti prima di recarmi qui. Abbiamo ordinato una costata in due (700 grammi) , due contorni mignon di verdura (una insalatina scondita in un piattino minuscolo da salatini, e degli spinaci cotti in una quantità simile , un calice di vino “normale” (nella lista vini si può salire fino a centinaia di sterline) ed una panna cotta al basilico ed abbiamo speso circa 120 euro. È sicuramente tanto , considerando il “braccino” tipicamente ligure con cui viene servito il tutto. Ovvero non viene portato il pane al tavolo neanche a chi consuma la carne , viene servito un piccolo omaggino della casa costituito da 3 fette di salame in croce ma soprattutto 4 pezzettini di focaccia fatta in casa grossa come un unghia. Non sto esagerando, erano grossi veramente come un unghia. ragazzi ma che scherziamo ? La fate in casa ed andate in rovina per un po’ di pane e focaccia in più con quello che spendiamo di carne ? C è veramente poca italianità in questo ! Il prodotto è comunque eccezionale , carne tenerissima, panna cotta Squisita e fresca.
134: Review: This is absolutely the best meat Italian restaurant in London! Every time we come here is a surprise. The food is too delicious and for being an Italian it is so nice to feel at home with a bite. The Service is exceptional! The Team is very hard worker and attentive to details. Thank you Ilario, Federica, Federico, Peter, Alessandro and Bilel for making our Saturday so special. 5Stars!!!
135: Review: Conosciamo il titolare essendo di Genova, ed è una garanzia di qualità. Quando ci capita di andare a Lo sta un salto qui è d’obbligo, carne di ottima qualità e cotta all perfezione,estrema cortesia del personale, preparati su vini e prodotti. È stato molto carino ritrovare il cameriere simpaticissimo di “ muscoli”, come sentirsi a casa. Speriamo di ritrovarlo un domani da “mangia fuoco” a casa nostra.
136: Review: Ottima cena, all'insegna dell'italianità. Tartare di Fassina poi fiorentina di Fassina 1,4 kg frollata 7 settimane. Bottiglia di Montepulciano molto buono, contorni vari e due dolci. Servizio molto cordiale e gentile, ambiente rustico elegante. La carne a vista è spettacolare così come i salumi. La qualità si paga, e qui alla fine il conto diceva 225 sterline. Sopra la media ma ne vale la pena! Torneremo.
137: Review: Ci siamo recati in questo ristorante per assaggiare la cucina italiana a Londra e devo dire che è stato come sentirsi a casa.Abbiamo iniziato con un antipasto di salumi e burrata davvero gustosi, abbiamo proseguito con una saporita tartare di manzo mentre il piatto forte è stata una deliziosa costata di manzo da 700 grammi; abbiamo terminato la cena con tiramisù e latte dolce fritto davvero buoni e ben presentati.L'accoglienza ed il servizio sono stati ottimi, l'ospitalità e la cordialità di Federico ci hanno accompagnato durante tutta la serata.Il conto è assolutamente in linea con ciò che offre la città di Londra e, per la qualità del cibo offerto, saremmo stati disposti a pagare anche di più, perciò ritorneremo sicuramente.
138: Review: I'm Italian and I've found there the tipical Italian atmosphere. All staff was friendly and the food has been cooked and served in amazing ways. I love the basil panna cotta. So delicious! And of course the meat!! Such a taste!I will definitely go there again!
139: Title: Un po’ delusa. Dopo averne sentito parlare

Review: Dopo averne sentito parlare abbiamo provato, qualità del cibo molto buona ma il servizio pessimo. Il cameriere, italiano come noi,ha esordito dicendo che il Tignanello, vino da noi scelto non era possibile averlo al calice, dopo avergli fatto notare che era presente sulla lista dei vini è sparito ed è tornato con due calici senza neanche mostrarci che cosa ha versato,avrei dato valore alla nostra scelta. Al momento dell’ordine fa’ presente che erano rimaste 5 porzioni di tagliata ed allora la potevamo ordinare, infatti l’abbiamo ordinata. ( un ristorante che si chiama Macellaio di sabato sera ore 20.30 ha finito le tagliate...) Abbiamo mangiato una tartare ed una fettuccina al ragù ( buonissime, fatte in casa) dopo 40 minuti di attesa la cameriera si ricorda di dire che hanno avuto un problema e le nostre tagliate saranno pronte tra due minuti. Dopo un altro quarto d’ora arriva un filetto minuscolo tagliato a fette troppo cotto, a quel punto faccio presente al cameriere che non è arrivata una tagliata e lui ha la faccia tosta di dire che non era vero negando l’evidenza ( sono italiana,abbiamo parlato solo in italiano, e la carne la conosco) neanche le scuse per aver dimenticato di passare in cucina il nostro l’ordine. Comunque la cameriera, mortificata ci ha chiesto mille volte scusa.
140: Review: The place is small, cozy, and has nice family atmosphere. The service is a bit uneven but friendly. Food is excellent. Recommend for meals with friends on week-ends.
141: Review: Mangiato veramente molto bene, la carne molto buona.La tagliatella al ragu a mio figlio è piaciuta tantissimo.Zona ristorante meravigliosa.
142: Review: We arrived with high expectations, but this was soon to turn into disappointment, disorganised staff, mixing orders to the wrong tables, ok meat - but far from their own promises and not very good value for money. One definitely has to go elsewhere to eat good meat in London.
143: Review: Sono stata in questo ristorante giovedì sera, piatti di ottima qualità, ma la cosa che più ha colpito me e mia sorella è stato il servizio molto efficiente, simpatico ma allo stesso tempo non invadente. Federico ha saputo gestire al meglio la sala!Consigliato!!!
144: Review: Location molto carina, personale simpatico e gentile.Prezzi un po’ sopra la media ma ne eravamo a conoscenza. Vasta scelta di antipasti e immensa di vini.Federico ci ha consigliato la carne da prendere ed è stato un ottimo suggerimento! Una fantastica Fiorentina da 800 gr.Molto buono anche il dolce. Ritornerò :)
145: Title: Italian steak restaurant for meat lovers..

Review: Everything was excellent!!First of all, the place is very warm and cosy, with good music.The staff was amazingly kind and helpful. Especially Federico who explicitly explain each food and made good recommendations.Vero Italiano for meat lovers and not only!!
146: Review: Servicio super amable, un chico italiano encantador y la carne buenísima!! te enseñan el trozo y el corte antes de hacerla.Super recomendable, sin duda repetiremos.
147: Title: Decent pasta but slow and pushy waiter

Review: We went here after a recommendation. I get it, it's a meat place but our friend had recommended the pasta and we were also not willing to spend a small fortune on a steak. It was one of these places where the waiter tries to push you into having all of the fancy meat and it made me feel a bit uncomfortable. The pasta was delicious but I had to have something else to eat after as it was so small. We then had a parmesan cheese board, once again nice but SO MUCH PARMESAN... (although what can I expect from ordering a cheese board?). Overall the service was very slow from ordering the drinks through to the food and I wouldn't go back.
148: Review: Siamo stati questa sera in un gruppo di amici. Ci siamo fatti consigliare da Federico sul percorso della cena e devo dire che oltre a essere molto preparato, ha saputo soddisfare pienamente le nostre esigenze! Ottima la tartare, la costata è il pezzo forte! Ci tornerò sicuramente! Consigliatissimo, qualità ottima e servizio super
149: Review: They do beef or pasta, and not much else. If that’s what you fancy then they do it to a good standard. The only thing I really didn’t like was a regular customer coming in and getting so much attention that the rest of the room was ignored. I understand making a fuss of a regular, but not to the cost of others. It made us feel uncomfortable. But the food and wine was good if you qualify a place from just that.
150: Review: The restaurant at first gives the impression of being in a very cool/fancy place, which it is. Focusing on the details though, it is very easy to notice disorganization within the servers. Fries were good, wine was good even if overpriced, service was ok, but the meat was not even worth a quarter of what we actually paid. We were served COLD STEAKS, and definitely blend in flavor. Overall a bad meat night out experience and would 100% not come back. Way too overpriced for the quality of the service, of the meat, and of the wine. Would not recommend.
151: Review: Just had lunch here with an old friend. Steak tartare, rump steak with rocket and Parmesan, Parmesan selection with balsamic vinegar, espresso - Perfetto! Peppoli Chianti. One of the best meals I have had (63yrs). You’ve got to love meat.
152: Review: Ottima cucina italiana, porzioni abbondanti, gusto italiano, pasta al dente, servizio super, Peter e’ un ciclone!!!
153: Review: The place is very popular and it is one of the best addresses for meat lovers. However, I received impressions from my dine experience. The meat was tender and juicy but we found the rest of the menu with no character. The bruschetta with lardo was nothing memorable and the chips had probably prepared using an exhausted oil. The wine was ordinary, despite the price. The service overall was poor organised and despite the appearance it seemed to be low professional. The place is always crowded and the booking is highly recommended. Anyway we found this popular address overpriced and overrated. The meat is good but it needs improvement in service, less pretentious and more friendly as I aspected from an informal italian trattoria.
154: Review: Assolutamente consigliato! Conosciuto tramite il programma di Alessandro Borghese. Bella l'atmosfera, personale gentile e molto molto attento. Prodotti ottimi e piatti curati. Se proprio dovessi trovare una pecca... sarebbe la porzione un po' piccola... ma credo sia soggettivo!
155: Review: Party of 6. Went for our daughter's birthday. Ordered food at 830. It came at 10. And it was awful. Cold and not tasty at all. Pesto pasta had zero flavour. Fillet stake inedible. We had to return it. The manager came and lectured. Bad attitude. I had to argue to get the fillet off the bill as it had been returned. Table next to us had the same problem and actually got up and left before their mains came.Never going back. Suggest no one else does either. Atrocious
156:
Review: You will be greeted by very friendly HOURIA and their meat dishes prepared by ILARIO are simply EXCELLENT. 
Steak tartare and carpaccio are out of this world!
157: Review: Vi var forbi til middag, og blev bestemt ikke skuffedeVærten gav sig god tid til at forklare koncepten og rådgav omkring vinvalgVi fik serveret T bone og Ribeye bøffer. Og det var simpelthen noget af det bedste kød jeg har smagt absolut et besøg værd, men husk at booke bord
158: Review: We called in tonight, spare of the moment and had a mixed experience...Initial service could have been quicker, our hostess was lovely and friendly, but I had to chase the wine which was disappointing.The actual steak was reasonable, nothing special - their medium rare is probably more rare and the meat was bordering cold (which makes me think it was sitting around for a short period). The chips were nice, but no good steak sauces sadly...The clanger for me was the egg shell in the tiramisu (which I promptly stopped eating) - rightly, this was removed from the bill, but I would have though a token gesture of some kind would have ensured (as is usually the case in decent restaurants) - sadly not - 160 quid later (for 2) = wish I’d gone to Hawksmoor...Oh and be prepared for the possibly of - raw meat scent frequently wafting past your nasal passages, depending on where you sit. We were literally parked up in front of one of the fridges used to age the meat...
159: Review: Che dire, tutto eccezionale e sopra qualsiasi aspettativa.La qualità dei prodotti serviti, dalla tartare alla bistecca, senza dimenticare dei dolci, sono decisamente sopra la media.Locale pulito e accogliente. L’unica nota veramente negativa sono le hostess all’ingresso, aggressive e poco guest oriented, almeno il sorriso, quando si lavora al pubblico, è necessario.Per fortuna Patrizia e Peter hanno fatto la differenza! A presto,
160: Review: Ottimo tagliere con tante cose e ottimo filetto per proseguire. Buona la location e ottimo il servizio.
161: Review: Abbiamo scelto questo ristorante per le recesioni. Un po' deludente, vero, ma siamo a Londra e forse va bene cosi'! Sono decisamente lenti. Ci hanno dato il tavolo al piano di sopra: uno stanzone con poca illuminazione. La cosa peggiore secondo me è stato assistere al litigio permanente tra il pizzaiolo e il suo capo donna!!! Ragazzi questa cosa non si fa, neanche a Londra. Per il resto cibo decente , per noi italiani. Per il londinesi sarà il.top!
162:
Review: Very nice meat , we went in this restaurant couples months ago and we very enjoined the dinner 
Waiters are friendly and they knows the job
163: Title: Great steak but slow service

Review: Came here without a booking and we were told we could only have the table for an hour. As we were in a rush that was fine. We then waited for 30 mins to get our order in! When the food turned up the steak was amazing so really enjoyed the food just disappointing service! Seriously though the steaks are great!
164: Review: Come le altre volte dal Macellaio tutto è stato ottimo dal cibo al servizio. Ottima qualità dei prodotti e ottima preparazione. In particolare complimenti a Federico, super attento al cliente, con la sua conoscenza e passione ci ha consigliato delle portare da leccarsi i baffi. Ritorneremo presto sicuramente.
165: Title: Caro que vale a pena
Review: O preço é alto, 7,5 libras a cada 100g e não se consegue determinar exatamente o peso. Mas, a carne é deliciosa, acompanhamentos bons, vale o investimento .
166: Review: Ovviamente bisogna sempre prenotare perchè è superfrequentato!Noi abbiamo mangiato qui un sabato sera e devo dire che l'organizzazione e la puntualità del servizio è OTTIMA. Tutti italiani dal proprietario ai camerieri sono stati disponibilissimi nel consigliarci cosa prendere. Tagliata strabuona e pasta al ragù da urlo! Certo le porzioni non sono grandissime come da noi ma il sapore e la qualità compensano il tutto. Ovviamente non ci siamo fatte mancare del buon vino rosso di Montepulciano e.... i dolci! Tiramisù, cheese cake e torta al cioccolato, uno più buono dell'altro. Conto alto ma giusto.
167: Review: Une boucherie transformée en restaurant est un gage de qualité pour la viande. Les viandes maturées sont excellentes et le service est tres professionnel. Si vous voulez déguster un bon morceau de viande, il est preferable de réserver car le nombre de places est limité
168: Title: Federico is absolutely the BEST!

Review: My wife and I visited and dined here while on vacation. The service provided by our waiter Frederico was absolutely outstanding. His attention to detail and sincere interest in making our evening special was much appreciated. He is a great example of someone who truly understands what customer service is all about!On top of this the food was outstanding as well!
169: Review: I went here with a large group. We ordered four large (1kg) steaks for the table--two ribeyes and two t-bones. All were dry-aged grassfed Italian beef. The quality of the beef was outstanding.We had sides and wine with dinner, and they were also excellent.The servers were busy, but they were informative and did a very good job.I can't comment on the value because a friend picked up the entire tab for the table.But I'd eat here again, even on my own dime.
170: Title: Delicious Food service not so good!

Review: The meat was so tasty and cooked perfectly although I sent the dried up fries back too the kitchen. New I've arrived, hot but not good inside - the restaurant is overpriced somewhat, house wine at £24 carafe!The waiter and waitress were knowledgeable but found them arrogant and their service style was too casual.Unfortunately, thus spoilt the experience quite a bit.
171: Review: The steak here is about the best we have ever had. You can see why is was so packed when we went.The staff are very knowledgable and will talk you through the menu, but I suspect whatever you order would be outstanding.It’s the type of place where you would travel to go again, which we intend to doIf you love steak you have to visit here, the ageing is perfect and service outstanding. Also have great wineWould recommend
172: Review: This place is absolutely delicious mainly for meat lovers. It’s the third time we go and every time is an unforgettable experience.We booked the table for the day after by mistake but they let us sit down at the macellaio’s counter since it is was fully booked for the night. It was great to see how the cut the meat how the prepare the fresh meat and we had the chance to meet and spend the evening talking to Ilario. Also Tommaso gave us an amazing Service. We loved the food and it is always a joy being in heaven with a bite.Thank you again!
173: Title: 前菜からデザートまで完璧。
Review: 店頭の赤いソファとショーウィンドウに吊された熟成肉が気になっていたお店。2人で行って、前菜はタルタルステーキ、カルパッチョにタタキをシェア。メインはTボーン900g。 頼み過ぎかと思ったけれど、ペロリといけました。デザートはティラミスとチーズケーキ。これらも絶品。 これは通うだろうな。
174: Title: Amazing fresh food and the meat is so fresh

Review: I loved this restaurant , the meat is amazing ! I had the filet cut and loved it. The burrata cheese and the cold meats are very good as well. Very nice selection of wines. I would go back here many times
175: Title: These guys take their meat seriously.

Review: Stay away - if you are vegetarian.. If not, it's probably the best place in London for meat lovers. They fly the beef in every Monday from Italy. Their own butcher prepares it and hangs it for dry aging. Cosy venue and great personal service. Mid to high prices, but you get what you pay for. Highly recommended.
176: Review: Carne dalla qualità ottima, la tartare si scioglie in bocca, la tagliata è molto tenera e il sapore è ottimo. Per non parlare dei dolci... tiramisù buonissimo, da provare! Personale molto cordiale e simpatico...Insomma se si vuole passare una cena perfetta, è il posto giusto!
177: Review: We went there for dinner tonight. We have been served by Chiara, a very friendly and professional waitress. She explained everything in the menu and about the meat provenience and quality with impressive proficiency and knowledge. We were really impressed by the passion she put in her job, expeccially on a Saturday and busy night! The food was delicious as expected! We highly recommend this place and ask to be served by Chiara, you won't be disappointed!
178: Review: Every time I come to London, I return to Macellaio! Very friendly personnel, very high quality meat cooked with simplicity and attention to detail! Authentic flavors and nice Italian specialties! Well done!
179: Title: Se le papille gustative potessero parlare

Review: Se le papille gustative potessero parlare, urlerebbero un grande "WOW!!"Per il compleanno del mio fidanzato, avevamo deciso di non fare piani, ed una volta ritrovatici nella zona di South Kensington, con un discreto languorino, lui si è ricordato di questo ristorante di carne molto buono dove era stato tempo fa. Decidiamo quindi di entrare, come prevedibile di venerdì sera, il ristorante era al completo, la ragazza alla porta ci ha dunque invitati gentilmente a tornare dopo 40/45 minuti, che sono volati via con una birra in un pub lì vicino. Una volta seduti siamo stati seguiti tutta la sera dalla fantastica Chiara, che si è presa cura di noi e dopo averci consigliato nella scelta di una meravigliosa costata ed un'ottima bottiglia di rosso, è riuscita anche ad esaudire la mia richiesta segreta di una candelina sul dolce!Che dire, davvero una bella serata ed una buona mangiata! Consigliatissimo, torneremo presto!
180: Review: I love when a steak house proudly displays its meat, it shows to me that they are serious about their food. Being a confirmed carnivore I’m appreciate great meet and the ways that it’s prepared. Macallaio did not disappoint. We ordered five mains and five appetizers and then shared family style. Everything along with the service was extremely excellent. I’ll definitely go back the next time we are in London.
181: Title: Qualità della carne ottima, servizio cordiale.

Review: Quando si visita Londra non si può non andare a provare questa macelleria con cucina.Il locale di per se non è grandissimo e quindi, di conseguenza, vi consiglio di prenotare online altrimenti rischiate di non trovare posto.Menù ben fatto e particolare, le ragazze che ci hanno serviti sono state veramente molto professionali e competenti.Tartare e costata che meritano. Abbiamo preso anche una bottiglia di vino e due dolci, entrambi molto buoni.Ovviamente si è a Londra per cui il prezzo è un po' più alto rispetto all'italia.Due tartare, 1 acqua, una bottiglia di Vino (29 sterline), una costata da 860gr e due dolci con il servizio 155 sterline! Circa 86€ a testa! Costicchia però non posso lamentarmi di niente, ve lo consiglio comunque.
182: Review: We had the best time at Il Macellaio in Old Brompton Road. The meat was amazing, the place is just lovely and the staff makes you feel at home. A special thank to Peter, the funniest and loveliest waiter ever!Totally recommended a visit :)
183: Review: With the vast array of good restaurants in South Kensington I can’t stress how below it’s peers this restaurant is. The issue with this restaurant is twofold. Firstly on the grounds of poor customer service and secondly poor value. While the food quality is adequate, the portion sizes are intolerably mean. It took me 20 minutes to get customer service after I was seated in a corner bench and ignored throughout my stay. Now let’s discuss the food. Do not try the rump. The portion size once served could not have been any more than 80 grams. I just wished I took a photo to show how mean the portion size was. While I understand margins are slim in the restaurant trade this is a joke ! With increasing competition this restaurant needs to take note. Poor service and mean portion sizes will not be tolerated and ultimately will turn all customers away.
184: Review: Scoperto da amici arrivati a Londra prima di noi, ci ritorniamo assieme per salutare proprio il macellaio, Ilario Vietri con cui abbiamo affetti in comune. Cena eccellente, garantita non solo da un'ottima qualità di carne (Fassona piemontese) ma dalla maestria di Ilario che la maneggia con amore e professionalità antica. Un plauso a Silvia giovane ed inventiva chef che ha saputo sovrintendere ad una cottura perfetta e ci ha deliziati con dolci freschi e strepitosi. Anche a Federico un plauso particolare. Occhio alla cantina! Trasversale. Mette tutti d'accordo! Grazie.
185: Review: Wonderful restaurant, beautiful dishes and best food ever, sweet red house wine. Service with a smile.
186: Title: Sehr lecker und super Service

Review: Macellaio kann ich uneingeschränkt empfehlen. 
Herzliche Begrüßung, toller aufmerksamer Service und leckeres Essen.
Wir kommen wieder.
187: Review: Ottima carne italiana per le fiorentine,personale adeguato.Locale ben arredato gli antipasti erano ottimi. Se vi trovate a Londra da provare.
188: Review: Myself and my husband went in August to have a Dinner.... our feedback is:-Lot of team members but only Chiara taking orders.-I order mozzarella, they gave me burrata and the chef was convinced that he gave me mozzarella.- Meat AMAZING quality but we order MR and arrives Rare.-Even if the pan was hot, the meat was very cold.
