That's a shame.I've been in Macellaio in union street and was fantastic from the beginning to the end.
189: Title: C'è chi crede alle coincidenze e chi no...

Review: Indubbia è l'eccellenza di questo ristorante di Roberto Costa (come Mangiafuoco RC!) : materie prime di altissima qualità, grande professionalità e accoglienza speciale. Grazie. Grazie a Walter, Federico, Peter e a tutto lo staff per la BELLA italianità che avete portato a Londra!
190: Title: Slagterbix med virkelig lækker restaurant

Review: Er du til “kød” kan denne lille restaurant varmt anbefales. Fra gaden ligner det en slagterbutik, med en rød sofa, men indenfor er der en hyggelig restaurant og tjenere, der kan deres kram, og gør besøget til en oplevelse. Vi fik lækker Rib Eye (7-9 ugers velhængt kødstykke, der blev grillet og skåret i skiver). Det er helt sikkert ikke sidste gang vi er her.
191: Title: Ignore the red sofa outside the restaurant.

Review: Trying to get a brilliant Steak is very difficult. Often you ask in a restaurant for a steak to be cooked a certain way and it disappoints. There’s nothing you can do. Too late. All the meat here is laid out in a cold cabinet as you enter the small restaurant. This restaurant’s reason for being is Italian beef. The waiter Tommaso explained all the cuts and made recommendations based on our tastes. We didn’t think we’d be able to eat a Starter so we went straight for the main Course. One Fillet medium rare minimum size and one Rib steak medium rare. One portion of fries and a raw red cabbage salad. Plus a tomato and onion salad not on the menu. No sauces. They believe you should eat the steaks “bare”. They even dissuade you from ordering mustard. Happy to bring it but say you won’t taste the flavour of the meat. Presentation was simple. The steaks were divine. We will be returning. No more mediocre steaks elsewhere. Wines by the glass excellent. A delightful Prosecco. Desserts are truly delicious and made on the premises. One beautiful creamy cheesecake and a custard type ice cream. Gorgeous. Plus 2 glasses of excellent Dessert wine. Tiramisu was highly recommended but that’s for next time. Espresso to finish. The bill soon mounts up but it is worth every penny.
192: Review: I go to restaurants for the food, and this place did not disappoint. Steak Florentine and simple, delicious, well prepared sides. Could not have been better. AND the kind, friendly staff made such an impression on my kids that my 10 year old told me to use his allowance to leave extra tip. Fredrico and Monica-thank you! For noticing my foodie kids curious were about balsamic and offering suggestions on how to try it. For making us laugh. For taking such good care of us.
193: Title: Llegó el dia de entrar

Review: Bien atendidos. Explican la carne que ofrecen, preguntan tus preferencias y te muestran lo que te cocinan.La testura de la carne muy buena. Si tengo oportunidad volveré a probar otras carnes que disponen. Gracias.
194: Title: Pour les super fans de viande

Review: Ici on est chez des passionnés de bonnes viandes, délicieux vins italiens en particulier ( valpolicella au top). Prenez les côtes de bœuf vous ne serez pas déçus elles sont extrêmement tendre. Bons accompagnements pour nous purée et épinards, parfait.Je recommande !
195: Title: Room for improvement but -hell!- really Italian

Review: Honestly it Should be a 4 star Because there were few things that could have been better. But, thanks god, someone here is trying to be Italian for real! Excelent meat (tried the battuta and it was Just like the ones I had in Alba), the salsa verde was perfect, powerful but balanced as It Should be. Not gonna mention the small imperfections; Who May be concerned has been informed already ;)Big big plus and probably what made me go for 5 star was Federico's service. Great attitude, knowledge and whenever I was getting annoying with very specific questions he was happy to run to the kitchen and find out more.You guys are doing great. Keep it up!
196:
Review: Carne e pasta a volonta' cucinate molto bene.
Dolci un po meno 
Servizio rapido e gentile.
Lo consiglio.
197: Review: Ristorante pittoresco ed accogliente. Menù abbastanza ampio che comprende anche piatti che richiamano molto l’Italia. Noi abbiamo preso 2 secondi, una tagliata ed il fegato con contorno di purè di patate: piatti molto buoni e ben presentati, carne di ottima qualità. Personale gentile e molto disponibile (grande Tommaso: italiano e prodigo di buoni consigli). Lo consiglio!
198: Title: Amazing food and excellent service by Federico sang.

Review: This is my second time visiting this amazing little gem in South Kensington.However, this time was even better as our waiter Federico was so knowledgable and friendly. He created a very authentic atmosphere with great jokes. His food recommendations were spot on. Superb service there is not one bad thing to say!!!Please visit.From mariam and Mario
199: Review: Finalmente sono riuscita a mangiare un piatto di carne sana e buona a londra , senza che questa sia fritta o dentro un panino. Siamo andati in questo ristorante perché il mio ragazzo lo conosceva altrimenti difficilmente a caso avrei notato fosse un ristorante in quanto, da fuori, sembra una normale macelleria: la cordialità del personale e la precisione con cui ci sono stati spiegati i piatti è stata davvero molto apprezzata. Carne buona e tenera che ti viene anche gentilmente mostrata nel momento in cui la scegli. Solo la porzione della tagliata era un po' piccolina per il prezzo pagato, ma da quanto dicono, i prezzi sono in linea con quelli di Londra.
200: Review: Went to The Macellaio on a casual day, I was just after a delicious meal at a random time actually (17:00), anyway I must say it does meet the expectations. You will eat kind of tastes surely never tried before, I don’t really want to spoil too much about the food as soon as you see it talks on its own. Highly recommended will definitely go back.
201: Review: Il locale sembra una macelleria....all’apparenza. Gestito da Italiani, si mangia molto bene carne e non solo, la pasta e’ ottima come la carta dei vini. Materie prime di ottima qualità, direttamente dall’italia. Servizio ottimo, con Federico ( uno dei camerieri) mattatore della sala. Si consiglia veramente . Prezzi in linea con la zona. Da tornarci
202: Review: Anche se non è mia abitudine andare a mangiare in ristorante italiano all'estero, sono stata colpita dalle recensioni e ho voluto provare.Mai scelta fu più azzeccata.Personale giovane, tutto italiano, preparato gentile e disponibile.Antipasto con burrata e prosciutto da dieci, non era possibile capire quale dei due si sciogliesse di più in bocca: una favola.La costata altrettanto meravigliosa, così come i contorni.Da buona genovese ho apprezzato che il gestore fosse proprio di Genova (ha anche ristorante ad Albaro)Visto che era il mio compleanno mi hanno offerto anche una fetta di torta al cioccolato con tanto di candelina, degli amori davvero. La gentilezza, la simpatia e la superba qualità del cibo non ti fanno impallidire al momento del conto. La qualità si paga, e il macellaio vale la spesa. Prossima volta che torno Londra tornerò sicuramente a trovarvi, continuate così. L'Italia anche all'estero è sempre il top! Alessandra e Mauro
203: Review: We arrived from the US today and are staying with my son and his family at a house that they rented for a week in this area. Since there are 7 of us, my daughter-in-law was fortunate to get a reservation at Macellaio. What a unique restaurant with sides of meat hanging in the front window and the option of ordering different cuts of beef. Among the many delicious entree items that we ordered were the hangar steak, lamb and 700 gram portions of the Costata del Macellaio and Fiore del Macellaio. Appetizers included beef tongue, steak tartare and a tagliere misto charcuterie. Our server Patrizia was excellent and spent a lot of time explaining all our options since this was a totally new experience for all of us.
204: Title: Taste sensation for meat lovers

Review: This was a chance visit but if was as if we had planned it. Amazing service from waitress Michaela- we were hoping just to have a main course but her enthusiasm and love of the food came through and we ended up having a full menu. The steaks are to die for. Recommend the pannacotta Bianco basili and the latte dolce fritto
205: Review: Fantastic steak, having the knife stabbed into the table added to the theatre of the restaurant. great service even as a solo diner.
206: Review: great service great meat, absolutely recommended!too many Italians :D but the quality was great. a must if you want to get some great meat :D
207: Title: Within the hour I had stomach ache

Review: A lovely meal. I had the Hangar steak, followed by Gelato. Both were delicious. I also had a Bacardi and coke. Unfortunately I had stomach ache within the hour. Coincidence or connection? I cannot say.
208: Title: All'altezza della fama che lo procede!

Review: È paradossale ma in Italia non abbiamo mai mangiato piatti di carne così buoni come quelli gustati in questo posto in cui ci siamo sentiti a casa grazie alla simpatia e alla gentilezza di Federico. Prodotti di ottima qualità, dall'antipasto al dolce, tutto curato con estrema attenzione dallo chef siculo. Siamo usciti proprio soddisfatti, direi felici! Grazie!
209: Review: Ate here in June, while on a business trip with some colleagues. While space in the restaurant was minimal, the service and atmosphere were second to none! Our waiter was friendly and helpful and the deli meat counter at the front on the restaurant was certainly unique and unexpected. Although my ravioli portion size was rather small it was delicious and I could not recommend it to others more. Would certainly come back next time I'm in the area.
210: Review: Siamo stati consigliati di provare questo ristorante di carne di gestione italiana come spesso accade da queste parti .Abbiamo preso un ottima bistecca di scottona molto tenera e saporita al punto giusto come la cottura richiesta. Il locale è grazioso e accogliente, anche se la cosa che ci ha più colpito è stato il sorriso solare di Michela, che ha portato a tavola, senza costi aggiuntivi, anche il vento caldo della sua amata terra sarda e sempre da queste parti a volte ce ne davvero bisogno...la ragazza ci ha ben seguito adeguatamente consigliato. Il prezzo è assolutamente adeguato alla qualità del cibo e della location. Io ci tornerò sicuramente visto che è stata subito buona la prima!!!!!
211: Review: I took my boyfriend here for his his birthday - and wasn’t disappointed. The meat was excellent. A massive slab of delicious medium rare rib eye. We both thoroughly enjoyed it. Along with an excellent bottle of red. Only criticism is the sides, which aren’t particularly good and let the meal down just a little bit. It’s not cheap but it’s a really lovely restaurant in South Kensington so it’s not a surpise that you pay luxury prices. The ambience was fantastic and felt cosy. The star of the show was our waiter Federico who was excellent. He was so attentive and helpful throughout. He even surprised my partner with a cake with a candle in it and sang happy birthday which was a really lovely touch. He made the night so special and we want to thank him!
212: Review: Ad accoglierci c'è Michela, una bella ragazza sarda, che ci darà ottimi consigli. La carne migliore che abbia mai manguato in vita mia. Un'esperienza da ripetere!
213: Review: Gruppo di amiche capitate per caso nel locale di union street ... che dire ... ottima carne, meraviglioso locale e personale cordiale ... da nn perdere ... prodotti tutti italiani
214: Review: Vendredi soir, nous passions par hasard devant le restaurant Macellaio. Nous avons décidé de nous arrêter, intrigués par la devanture et curieux de découvrir l'intérieur. Quelle belle surprise! Nous avons passé une excellente soirée, Michella était de très bon conseil de l'apéritif au dessert!Nous avons essayé le coeur et la langue, nous étions un peu inquiet au départ mais Michella nous a convaincu et nous n'étions pas déçus, c'était délicieux! Les desserts étaient également merveilleux..Milles merci Michella pour votre gentillesse, vos conseils et pour cette magnifique soirée! Et à très bientôt :)
215: Review: Il locale si trova in South Kensington, una zona molto carina, con un frigo a vista e vari tagli di carne in esposizione. La ragazza che accoglie i clienti è molto cordiale e simpatica. Per quanto riguarda la cena abbiamo speso 90€ per:1 bistecca1 acqua (da 750ml)1 insalata in una ciotolina (senza olio e sale)e una porzione di patate al forno. Eccessivo il conto, a parer mio. La bistecca nulla di entusiasmante, era buona (ci mancherebbe). L’insalatina sapeva di frigorifero, non era condita, e ne ci sono stati portati i condimenti. Le “patate al forno” riscaldate al microonde sapevano di tutto tranne che di patate.Un cestino di pane 1€ (poco male)E 9€ di servizio sullo scontrino(quale servizio..)Peccato, di Italiano c’è solo il personale.
216: Title: We will definitely come back !

Review: I was eating here today with my boyfriend, and we had such a nice experience! The meat was great, and the cheesecake super fresh and delicious. the Italian waitress super professional and friendly, she gave us information about their history and she had a very knowledge about the meat! She take care of us like if we were guest in her Owen home. We will definitely come back !
217: Review: Came here on a Sunday night needing a fix of red meat. We are always a bit cautious when it come to chains but of course there are chain restaurants and there are chain restaurants. We needn’t have had any concerns because Macellaio is right up there with the best steak we’ve had. The starter of ham and creamy mozzarella was ideal and then the Costata was out of this world. Our excellent waiter Federiquo explained everything to us and got the size of steak we’d need for the two of us just right and it was fantastic. Will definitely come back.....and also try some of the others in the Macellaio chain!!!
218: Title: Eccellente carne in un ambiente unico

Review: Ho cenato qui insieme ai miei colleghi durante un viaggio di lavoro. Mi ha colpita prima di tutto l'ambiente unico e insolito da tipica macelleria italiana. Si viene catapultati da subito in un mondo di carne di ogni genere che per chi ama la carne è un paradiso! Siamo stati accolti in modo davvero caloroso da tutti facendoci sentire a nostro agio. Ci ha serviti il cameriere Federico che è stato molto professionale, simpaticissimo e coinvolgente. Ha saputo entusiasmare pure me che solitamente non sono un'appassionata di carne! Abbiamo scelto degli antipasti misti di crostino con lardo, tartare accompagnati con del buon pane e focaccine. In seguito, mentre i miei due colleghi hanno optato per un filetto con rucola e scaglie di parmigiano, io mi sono avventata in una bistecca di agnello davvero squisita soprattutto perché cotta nel miglior modo e accompagnata da una salsa di melanzana affumicata, yogurt e menta che mi ricordava il babaganoush ma era molto più leggera e si sposava perfettamente con la carne. Come contorno abbiamo ordinato delle patatine fritte con la buccia e un insalata di finocchio e arancia. Uno dei miei colleghi ha anche ordinato un dolce a base di panna cotta e essenza di basilico che aveva un sapore davvero fresco e piacevole! Non ho dubbi sul fatto di ritornarci sicuramente un giorno!
219: Review: Un endroit insolite avec un canapé rouge à l'extérieur....en fait une devanture de boucher.......des cotes maturées à souhait.....3 petites tables dans la première salle....une équipe d'une gentillesse incroyable....nous avions réservé le premier soir pour diner après un concert en prévenant le responsable des aléas ..le manager nous a appelé vers 22h45 pour nous demander si nous pensions arriver avant 23 heures en raison de la fermeture des cuisines......Jamais au grand jamais je n'ai vu une telle attention .....CHAPEAU....venant en à l assiette.....une viande maturée 7à 9 semaines....belle tendre a couper à la cuillère et un goût.......je n'ai plus qu'un mot à dire MERCI
220: Review: Our hotel concierge recommended and made a reservation for us. It was just a short walk from our hotel on Gloucester Road. Our dinner made us so happy! We ordered a T-bone steak for two and a few sides. The waitstaff showed us the cut of beef before it was grilled. The steak arrived perfectly cooked and was incredibly tasty. I enjoyed two glasses of an excellent Italian wine with dinner. The staff was welcoming, the service was spot on and the cost was fair given the quality of the food. We will highly recommend this restaurant to all of our American carnivore friends visiting London,
221: Review: Nice little place in london.Good quality, great service(our female waiter was very professional and friendly) and quiet restaurant.Not cheap, but if you want to eat delicious meat with a good Italian wine, you cannot complain about.I'm Italian and I advise you warmly this restaurant.
222: Review: Sembra di entrare in una macelleria...e invece ci si trova in un ristorante molto carino, rustico ma curato e con personale molto attento.Naturalmente la carne la fa da padrona ed è di ottima qualità in tutti i tagli proposti.Ottime le tartare che si possono mangiare come antipasto oppure come “main course”.La costata era spettacolare...Vi consiglio di assaggiare anche il bianco al basilico, dolcetto delicatamente sorprendente!Unica nota dolente il prezzo...decisamente non per tutte le tasche
223: Title: Family friendly, meat oriented nook on Old Brompton Rd
Review: Macellaio is not spacious but it is comfortable and the staff are cheerful and helpful. the menu is meat heavy but the accompanying sides are interesting and well presented.
224: Review: We had a lovely meal here last night. The steaks were tender and juicy.  We four finished 1.5 kg total!  Wine was nice as well.  Strongly recommend.
225: Title: Amazing! Best steak we’ve ever had!!

Review: We absolutely loved our visit to Macellaio. We had the ribeye beef to share (first item on the main menu but I can’t remember the name of it) and it was to die for. The chips and Savoy cabbage as sides were also really good. Red wine was well recommended and both Roxanne and Patrizia were superb. The vibe here was really cool and almost back-streety which was exactly what we wanted. We’ll definitely be back next time we’re in London, best steak ever.
226: Review: Ristorante dall'atmosfera piacevole, arredato in modo semplice ma con carattere. Specializzato sulla carne, ne possiede varie Frollature, la qualità del prodotto è eccellente. Ho mangiato un filetto, ottimo direi.. mia figlia un un'antipasto misto e un primo. Personale accogliente ma a volte approssimativo, "l'assenza di personale professionale" e una cosa molto comune a Londra, anche in quei ristoranti il cui target prezzi non è propriamente basso. Prezzi diciamo Londinesi, il mio Filetto seppur buonissimo 95£ al kilo
227: Review: I’ve been at Macellaio for the first time and everything was absolutely amazing. Simple place and efficient menù, very comfortable atmosphere and the waitress, Michela, was really helpful with the explanation of the food, the choices and the presentation of every course. Very good value for money. I’ll come back for sure!
228: Review: Nous cherchions un restaurant italien et sommes tombés un peu par hasard sur ce restaurant....de viande ! Ici, tous les morceaux sont exposés en vitrine et on salive très rapidement et le choix du morceau s’avère compliqué tellement tout donne envie. Le morceau testé était délicieux, fondant et parfaitement cuit mais la portion un peu petite à notre goût. Le service est agréable dans une petite salle au fond du restaurant et une salle en sous sol. Réservation recommandée mais il faut y aller pour la viande, c’est certain .nous recommandons !
229: Title: Italian aged beef at its finest

Review: On a recent trip to Italy we dined at a steak house in Chianti that is known for its aged beef grilled in large quantities. Somehow we had found the London equivalent. We sat overlooking the butcher as he hand cut our 700 g rib eye that we were going to share. It was perfectly med. rare and accompanied by roasted potatoes and a green salad. The steak was world class great. The cheese cake was one of the best I’ve had. The other dessert was also very good but I was unfamiliar with its name
230: Review: Grazie ad un eccellente guida ( Federico ) ho potuto apprezzare a pieno le varie pietanze da me ordinate, piatti ben spiegati e ben rappresentati, antipasto fantastico, mai mangiata della carne cosi buona un lardo cosi delizioso e una bresaola cosi appetitosa.Tanti complimenti allo chef, soprattutto nel dolce, la ciliegina sulla torta a fine pasto, un dolce inaspettatamente delizioso '' Bianco al basilico''.Servizio davvero eccellente, a partire dalla musica non fastidiosa, in tutta la mia vita e' la prima volta che mangio cosi bene dalla A alla Z , tutto perfetto , soprattutto il servizio, mai ricevuto un servizio cosi attento, soprattutto nei particolari e nelle piccolezze...grazie davvero per la magnifica esperienza culinaria, ritornero' sicuramente.
231: Review: Carne davvero buona, in un ristorante dal cuore e dal servizio tutto italiano. La location non ha molti coperti ed è quindi consigliata la prenotazione. Se si ha voglia di carne....assolutamente da provare!
232: Title: Amazing service from Federico and Martina

Review: Big thank to Federico and Martina, the service was excellent and they were very friendly and helpful, is our favourite restaurant in London. The food is to die for it! I will definitly come back!
233: Title: Nice steak and wine for last day in London
Review: I found this restaurant utilizing trip advisor. I enjoyed the service, the dry age steak was a nice treat, the wine was outstanding and the tiramisu was out of this world.
234: Title: Management imbarazzante, servizio mediocre ma prodotti di alta qualità!!!

Review: Ottima carne e dolci, ma per quanto riguarda i primi non sono stati eccellenti, porzioni piccole e scipite. La cosa peggiore è stato il servizio, lento e poco curante del cliente, in particolare da parte del manager. Il nostro tavolo ha fatturato quasi mille pound e il manager non si è interessato nel assicurarsi che il tutto stesse procedendo per il meglio, non si è neanche approcciato al tavolo, anzi verso la fine dopo averlo salutato e ringraziato gentilmente non ci contraccambiato con lo stesso entusiasmo e passione come un manager dovrebbe dimostrare in ogni momento del suo servizio. In generale, il servizio è stato mediocre ed è un peccato poiché i prodotti serviti sono di alta qualità; siamo clienti del Macellaio e in altre location il servizio è stato eccellente seguito da un cibo preparato con attenzione. Suggerirei l'assunzione di personale nel management più competente e attento al cliente, considerando che quest'ultimo dovrebbe essere il perno dell'attività. PS: complimenti per l'assoluto comfort del divano che si trova all'esterno del locale, ottimo per un drink en plain air.
235: Review: Great restaurant and very authentic Italian. I started with Steak tartare which was excellent, not too much dressing, condiments were well proportioned and meat was fresh and tasty.Then had Sirloin, medium rare which was a beautiful piece of meat. Very happy man!
236: Review: Ciao, we been here this monday and we had a very good service by Ferderico and amazing food, filetto and hank steak we can raccomend. The wine selection is good. Enjoy!
237: Review: Bella location per un ristorante davvero tutto italiano. Per chi ama la carne, posto top. Ambiente e staff ok.
238: Title: Fantastic food, drink and service.

Review: This place was fabulous. On entry you are greeted by a counter full of age and marbled slabs of beef that set the mouth watering. We began with beef heart and bone marrow starters. My friends were happy enough with their heart but my marrow was sublime: beautifully cooked bones, topped with beef tartare and a salad of onions and herbs that cut the richness beautifully. One friend opted for the calf's liver as a main, which she very much enjoyed but the rest of us shared a piece of the Costata (800g between three of us). The meat was succulent, marbled with melted fat, well rested and sprinkled with salt that brought out the rich, umami flavour. As sides we had savoy cabbage, chips and a delicious nutmeg spiced mashed potato. The waiter, who was very charming and helpful, recommended a truly gorgeous wine (see photo) which I have subsequently bought a case of, so good was it. Pudding was a little bit of a downer for me (Frito leche) but my friends loved their chocolate icecream. There are lots of nice restaurants in this area but you should definitely choose to visit this one.
239: Title: Excellent food, even better service!

Review: Food here is great - steak and beef ragu a particular highlight, think this is clear from the other reviews. For me the wow factor is that I am always very impressed with the service provided by the wait staff and how family friendly they are. It’s a joy to be able to have a nice grown up steak meal, with lovely pasta options for the kids and they being treated so well by waiters - nothing was too much trouble!Being surrounded by Italians clearly enjoying the food is also good endorsement for an Italian restaurant I suppose!
240: Review: Un tempio della carne in piena Londra si potrebbe definire questo locale gestito da ristoratori italiani. Gli appassionati carnivori qui potranno soddisfare ogni desiderio. Tutto qui gira intorno alla carne: all'ingresso in bella vista un banco-frigo con una esposizione dei migliori tagli di carni da far scegliere ai propri clienti, l'arredo interno che riconduce sempre alla carne (stampe, quadri, attestati, titoli) e poi il murales di un manzo con indicate tutte le sue parti, degno delle migliori macellerie italiane.Inutile dirlo la bistecca era superlativa, carne morbidissima e saporita. Molto buono anche il resto dalla vellutata di zucca con porri alle penne al ragù e per finire un tiramisù davvero delizioso. Come per tutti i ristoranti italiani a Londra, il conto si fa sentire ma almeno qui si mangia bene. Consiglio per chi a Londra vuole ritrovare la sua italianità.
241: Review: The best in the London, from A to Z. This is the only place where you experience Italy in all of it means. From the second you enter till you leave. The food is A class, the staff are super nice, our waiter Fredrico is so professional, with his recommendations, kindness and amazing smile. Their bar-man gave amazing recommendation for the wine. They surprised me with their sweet gesture, a cake and candle. Thank you so much for making it extra special. Above all they are all so authentic and genuine, loved everything about it. You deserve to be awarded the best in London
242: Title: Che bello tornare a Londra

Review: Sono innamorato di Londra, appena possibile ci godiamo qualche giorno in questa splendida città!!!! Alloggiando a Chelsea, ci capita di prenotare al Macellaio, ottimo come sempre ed è bello dopo un giorno in giro per Londra venire a cena in questo ottimo ristorante. Servizio ottimo e gentilezza unica, la carne è di buona qualità, buoni i dolci, unico neo il vino. Un po' caro, ma ci può stare dai.
243: Review: Bel locale in bella zona. Quando entri sembra una macelleria con una stupenda carne esposta. Il personale simpatico ed accogliente. Tanti tipi di tartare come antipasti,ma a me non piace la carne cruda ed ho preso la lingua in salsa verde buona, ma non eccezionale. Abbiamo preso una costata da 1kg in 3, ma non ci siamo sfamati molto perché l'osso era molto grosso. Tutto buono,ma da un vincitore del programma di Borghese mi sarei aspettata di più. Lista vini molto cara come in tutti i ristoranti italiani, ma hanno anche i calici e la birra .È il ristorante dove nella nostra settimana a Londra abbiamo speso di più, ma abbiamo mangiato carne ottima. Prenotazione obbligatoria.
244: Title: Rump steak alle pere caramellate very goooood

Review: Locale "caldo" e servizio cordiale e puntuale..presente e non invadente. Necessaria direi la prenotazione..noi abbiamo avuto il piacere di mangiare al bancone di marmo in front of la macelleria e il macellaio che con garbo preparava i tagli di carne, tutto nella massima pulizia e trasparenza.Carne, tutta fassona, ottima. Ho apprezzato il rump steak con pere caramellate delizioso e ottima l'insalata finocchi e arancia di contorno. Dolce "simpatico" con pavesini ripieni di nutella fritti e crema pasticcera fritta. Il quinto pallino la prossima volta..con l' assaggio delle tartare...Unica critica..ma commercialmente efficace soprattutto in un contesto londinese..il vino a caraffa con prezzi un po' esosi..(considerando il prezzo consequenziale della bottiglia).Prezzo totale sull'alto ma meritevole..considerando il cibo doc. italiano offerto e preparato di qualità come se fosse a km zero.Curiosa di scoprire anche gli altri "Rc macellai" della proprietà!!!
245: Review: Situato in zona gradevole di Londra, è possibile gustare cucina italiana di buon livello. Le carni in particolare sono ottime, il servizio è puntuale. Si può prenotare parlando in italiano, nel caso non si abbia dimestichezza con la lingua inglese.
246: Review: Consiglio di prenotare con almeno un giorno di anticipo perché il posto risulta molto affollato. Eravamo in due, ho chiamato un paio d'ore prima ma era già tutto riservato, ci hanno comunque trovato un posto a sedere al bancone che non è proprio la migliore opzione se si vuole cenare con calma e privacy (eravamo praticamente schiena schiena con le persone sedute al tavolo dietro di noi), ma si sà, meglio di niente! Il personale è cordiale e gentile, forse un po' troppo "presente" ma noi italiani siam fatti così. Il cibo è di ottima qualità. Abbiamo ordinato un tagliere ed una tartare per iniziare, assolutamente DIVINI, per continuare le costine ed un filetto buoni anche quelli ma le porzioni sono un po' ridotte per i prezzi proposti. In generale ottima cena, anche se dopo aver speso £100, eravamo ancora un po' affamate diciamo così. Consiglierei di eliminare qualche tavolo per rendere l'esperienza del cliente più positiva possibile, senza dover mangiare appiccicati al muro o con le persone dietro di te capaci di ascoltare cosa stai dicendo e viceversa. Capisco la richiesta alta ma insomma c'è un limite a tutto, il cibo merita, non vedo il motivo di ricavare più posti possibili perdendo in comfort.In generale 4 su 5.
247: Review: Great Tartar, Great steak, great dessert, great waiter Frederico gave us great service and was very friendly, kind & made us laugh a lot
248: Review: Personale ultra professionale sotto ogni aspetto.Abbiamo iniziato con antipasti crudi che sono stati un'autentica gioia per le papille; dopo siamo passati alla costata.La carne era sublime; prima di essere cotta, viene mostrata al cliente.Ovviamente la cottura e la preparazione sono impeccabili.È un angolo di Londra dove ci hanno fatto sentire a casa nostra e ci hanno deliziati.Anche la musica era italiana.Ci siamo sentiti coccolati e cogliamo l'occasione per ringraziare nuovamente l'intero staff!
249: Review: My boyfriend brought me there after visiting the branch in Southwark. What to say, great experience from beginning to the end. We had three types of tartare for starter and a Fiorentina that we shared, all with a nice glass of Primitivo.The quality of the meat was excellent, the service was great and the two waiters who served us really good at their job and especially very friendly. We enjoyed our stay a lot and will definitely go back.Thank you guys, Italians just do it better :)
250: Review: Nous sommes tombés sur ce restaurant par hasard. Très bon accueil et la viande est merveilleuse. Le cadre est sympa sur des tables hautes avec vue sur le boucher.
251: Review: Poco da aggiungere a tutte le precedenti lusinghiere recensioni.In due abbiamo condiviso una battuta di fassona ed una fiorentina; la carne era eccezionale e cotta perfettamente.Ottimi vini, buoni dolci, personale sorridente, attento, disponibile, simpatico e preparato.Ci hanno fatto trovare il seggiolino per il nostro bimbo di 15 mesi già accanto al tavolo.Con una tale qualità della materia prima, il prezzo non conta proprio.Complimenti davvero ed andate avanti sempre così.Quando ritorneremo a Londra, passeremo certamente a trovarvi.
252: Review: It would of been 5 pips but they seemed to be having a problem with the lights so they were flickering and buzzing and they kept turning them up and down to try and stop it. It was very distracting.The food and the staff are both very good. Used the online service to book a table which was fine with just a phone call the day before to confirm. My wife and daughter some normal things of the menu which were very tasty and good value I thought. I opted for one of there special rib steaks which was very tasty but was told that the smallest they would cut would be 600grams that turned out to be 700grams when cut. That made it quite expensive for one I thought so my suggestion would definitely be to share a slightly larger one between 2 as others were doing. That being said it was tasty and I don't regret it.
253: Review: Ate here for my birthday after reading good reviews and was staying just around the corner.It didn't disappoint, fantastic selection of good aged steak and the staff are very helpful with recommendations on what to have based on your own personal preferences.They also have an excellent and very extensive wine list to accompany your steak.Enjoyed the Crudo e Burratina starter too.
254: Review: Came here with my hubby for a date night and we couldn’t have been more delighted. Charming little restaurant with a menu to die for. Service was absolutely superb and we can only thank Frederico for that. He worked alone downstairs and it was busy but he couldn’t have been more attentive. Will return without a shadow of a doubt. LOVED IT.
255: Title: ottimo ristorante italiano di carne a Londra

Review: un ristorante in una zona sofisticata che offre ottima carne, un menu ricco di prodotti e ricette di qualità. Siamo stati accolti dal proprietario e tutto il personale è molto cortese e professionale. Andrò a provare anche quello di Milano!
256: Review: Locale piccolo , se poi ti mettono a mangiare sotto terra ti senti in una catacomba. Ottimo il servizio, una ragazza italiana molto molto gentile illustra bene la loro filosofia e la qualità della carne. Al dunque però discreto solo il filetto che è di circa 250 gr, mentre le tagliate sono in porzioni troppo esigue e di qualità appena discreta. Li Vicino ci sono steak house che hanno qualità migliore e porzioni più abbondanti. Costo infine eccessivo per ciò che si mangia. Non ci tornerò
257: Review: Visst är det häftigt när köttet hänger synligt och man får välja en riktigt rejäl köttbit. Maten va helt ok, men man ska inte välja Macellaio om man vill ha sås till köttet. Lite arrogant italiensk service kan väl vara ok, men då måste det va med stil. Vi va inte missnöjda men hade större förväntningar.
258: Review: The name of the restaurant translates to butcher's shop. We made the mistake of ordering rabbit and chicken. Both were good but the steaks that other diners were served looked out of this world. We were given beef carpaccio as a complimentary appetizer and it was wonderful. We were warmly welcomed and made to feel at home. Book ahead as the restaurant fills up fast and order the steaks!
259: Title: Face steak place in London

Review: Brilliant service and insanely good steak. I always keep it simple, salted steak, no sauce, then add my sides. The starting meat platter is great too. Don’t be put off by the random sofa outside. You won’t find better steak in London.
260: Review: Suggerito da amici, ci rechiamo a pranzo e mangiamo carne eccezionale ed un tagliere di salumi ottimi accompagnati da un ottimo Primitivo.Cordialità massima del personale
261: Review: 久し振りに美味しいお肉を食べました。カルパッチョとタルタルお勧めです！生肉が美味しければ、もちろんステーキも美味しい。リブアイステーキは、500gから注文とのこと。女性3人では多いかな？と思いきや、ペロリでした。値段が思ったよりリーズナブルでビックリ！お肉を食べたくなったら、また行きたいです！スタッフの方もイタリア人らしく明るくて気さくで、とても楽しいランチタイムでした。
262: Review: Our 2nd visit after new years eve, the food then was perfection , not so much the service as it was understandably very busy,New years eve, how ever tonight the food , carpaccio, steak tartare, beef liver , ox tongue, bone marrow, steak medium rare all round excellence,.outstanding! Well done and the service with Water Giudice, was an absolute delight, perfection all around even with his recomandation of the Merlot wine, Loved the atmosphere , busy and fun our very favourite steak house
263: Review: Per chi fa fatica ad abituarsi ai fish and chips e cucina inglese o etnica...e’ come stare a casa.Rump steak e tartare,fiorentine da paura.
264: Review: Che dire ? Ottima accoglienza e puntualità . Simpatico e professionale lo staff ( in particolare Federico ) . Qualità dei cibi : ottima . Da non perdere , credetemi .
265: Title: Fiorentina eccezionale, servizio ineccepibile, location originale

Review: La nostra esperienza dal Macellaio a South Kensington è stata oltremodo positiva. La tartare è spettacolare per non parlare del Bone Marrow che è una delizia! Fiorentina super, cotta alla perfezione. Ottima lista vini. Anche i dolci non ci hanno affatto delusi, anzi. Il servizio è gradevolissimo, preparato ma non assillante. La location di South Kensington è molto originale, semplice ma al tempo stesso ad effetto con la riproduzione dell'interno di una classica macelleria italiana anni '70. Personalmente ho molto apprezzato anche il divano rosso, immediatamente fuori dall'ingresso. Prezzi adeguati alla qualità delle pietanze e alla zona. Non è certamente un posto economico ma almeno una volta merita una cena. Consigliatissimo!
266: Title: Fabulous Italian steak restaurant in South Kensington

Review: To focus simply on steaks sounds a wee bit disingenuous. That’s because this is a top drawer restaurant and everything about it is pretty much as it should be. In other words, all round excellence; and a real pleasure to visit.But the beef, steaks, cuts, delivery, professionalism and style....well, that was our primary raisons d’être. And for that only one word is required.....outstanding!Well done and thank you
267: Title: Ottima carne, consigliato agli amanti delle bistecche!

Review: Personale tutto italiano, tutti molto simpatici e cordiali, la carne è buonissima, buona anche la scelta degli antipasti.Ma soprattutto, io sono molto difficile sulla cottura della carne, e devo dire qui cotta alla perfezione!
268: Review: Having just arrived in the UK for a weeks vacation and stumbled upon this little gem of a restaurant around the corner from the flat we were renting. Needless to say we thought it was just a butcher shop, but upon peering through the window we could see a lively group of people indulging just beyond the butchers counter.I have to say this was not only an amazingly fun start to our vacation, but probably one of the best meals we enjoyed over our 2 week vacay! Dry Aged Beef from the North of Italy, masterfully handled by the gentleman working behind the counter.....Steak tar tar, followed by grilled dry aged rib eye, accoutrements, and dessert to follow!Loved the atmosphere even though we were crammed into a high top counter in the corner(last table available) The entire cast made us feel welcome.....will visit again next time in London!
269: Review: Perfectly cooked fiorentina steak, amazing wine list and wonderful deserts. It doesn’t get better than that!  Federico was amazing guiding us through the menu. Every single suggestion was spot on. Great service!!!
270: Title: Paradiso culinario nel cuore di Londra

Review: Sono venuto spesso a Londra ma non avevo mai avuto il piacere di cenare dal famoso ristorante macellaio ,ho mangiato una tartare di carne eccezionale per non parlare della costata che sembrava un burro per quanto tenera consiglio a tuttti almeno di andare una volta ma mai senza prenotazione,il locale è sempre pieno !!! Ci tornerò di sicuro
271: Title: Great Italian beef in London
Review: Best steak I had I London. Every dish was good. Certainly worth visit just for the T bone steak. Although nothing beats the real deal in Firenze...
272: Title: Dove si può trovare carne buona come in Italia

Review: Il posto è molto carino fin da subito , dalla vetrina e dal ingresso come si vede nelle foto! in una zona molto carina di Londra !Prodotti qualitativamente molto validi e servizio molto curato!Rapporto qualità prezzo niente male (essendo a Londra )
273: Review: We’ve been here with some friends for a lunch. We couldn’t wait to try this place. Amazing selection and quality of meats directly imported from Italy. Great staff and atmosphere. The meat here is on a different level, absolutely delicious. Staffs here are friendly, and interesting; a one of a kind experience, and notice how the knives are place on the table. Pretty cool. Thanks to Alessandro di Bello for the good entertainment.
274: Review: Walked past the place and looked interesting. Once walked in we manage to find a table for two. The menu is compact but offers a good variety. Having the meat was a no brainer as we saw it on the table next to us. The flavours were just insane!!! Thanks guys
275: Review: My partner and I have been looking forward to our anniversary dinner at Macellaio for over two months and it did not disappoint. Since we has a reservation we were seated straight away (I had a lovely chat with the hostess, who had lived in Barcelona for a bit).The tatare was superb and my boyfriend particularly enjoyed the testicles. The fillet was great and we loved that it was shown to us before it was even cooked. I had the gnocchi and it was really tasty.The service was excellent and we felt really spoilt by Federico and Nicolas who never let our wine glasses go empty.Keep up the good work! We will definitely be back.
276: Review: Il Giornale del 5 febbraio u.s. pubblica un articolo su Roberto Costa esaltandone lo spirito imprenditoriale ed il mecenatismo nei confronti di chi voglia imparare un mestiere. Ottimo proposito.Allora, sig. Costa, spieghi ai suoi allievi ciò che una qualsiasi massaia sa, cioè che non è neppure pensabile di cuocere un coniglio arrosto in 15/20 minuti.Se le vostre specialità sono la Fiorentina e le altre carni bovine (così pare leggendo le recensioni) limitatevi a quelle. Inutile rimpolpare il menù con piatti non all’altezza della fama che la cucina italiana si è giustamente meritata nel mondo.Per correttezza aggiungo che ho apprezzato le scuse e l’offerta del dolce da parte del cortese cameriere (in questo ammetto che lo ha bene istruito).
277: Review: Fantastic little place. We had an awesome T-Bone steak and an awesome rib-eye. Food was delicious, sides were delicious. Service was also wonderful. Thanks Patricia.
278: Review: OTTIMO !!! tutto e tutti !!! Carne strepitosa, ottimo format! Sicuramente la qualità e la professionalità di chi sta dietro le quinte fa la differenza....Bravo COSTA
279:
Review: Can say without hesitation that this is the best steak I have had outside of Argentina.

The fiorentina and costata were delicious. Casual atmosphere and attentive/ friendly waiters.

Overall, an incredible experience and we have every intention of going back!
280: Review: This is my second review of this restaurant but it is truly deserving of the praise. The meat is perfection and cooked exactly as it should be, the menu is diverse enough to care for frequent visits (although we could never go frequently enough as far as we are concerned) and the staff are absolutely delightful. Love love love it.
281: Review: Locale italiano di carne a South Kensington. Locale carinissimo con il macellaio a vista che taglia la carne. Consiglio come antipasti la tartare che si scioglie in bocca (ottima anche la variante con il gorgonzola) e il carpaccio di fassona! Come piatto principale invece tagliata con pere e aceto balsamico, ci tornerò per assaggiare la loro Fiorentina.Se alla fine della cena vi è rimasto un posticino vi consiglio di assaggiare il bianco al basilico come dolce !! Costo più che onesto considerando qualità, posizione e servizio
282: Review: Nice restaurant in a nice location. It’s quirky, for example there’s a comfy sofa outside and there’s a nicely displayed meat counter with the various cuts.The food was good, cooked to our liking. However, this is not a cheap place – and we did not expect it to be cheap. But this brings me to my only criticism of the place. When we arrived, before being taken to our table we were reminded that the restaurant operates a 2-hour turnaround for tables. At a restaurant that, by all accounts, charges around the £100/head for a meal with wine, we expected to have a bit more luxury with time. Prior to arrival we’d planned on staying on to have desert wines but decided to eat up and move along to a wine bar next door. Had we known this we would probably not have booked here. Although communicated very politely, the introduction made us feel that we needed to order, eat and vacate. If I’m not mistaken, this place started as a single restaurant but has rapidly expanded into a mini chain, and is clearly doing well. I wonder if this has resulted in a more corporate approach, with practices like the above. As it shifts to this model it risks becoming another Gaucho Grill.
283: Title: Un anniversario festeggiato alla perfezione

Review: Esperienza stupenda, cibo di qualità e servizio perfetto, un particolare ringraziamento ad Alessandro che ha reso la nostra cena perfetta ci siamo sentiti coccolati dal antipasto al dolce. Ci ritorneremo sicuramente!!!! :)
284: Review: Abbiamo cenato in 4, locale sporco personale accogliente ma quasi privo di esperienze, abbiamo ordinato kg.1,9 carne, 4 birre, 1mozzarella,4 fettine di prosciutto asciutto perche non conservato a dovere Totale 250£ a nostro avviso una esperienza da dimenticare, non consigliabile da evitare assolutamente..PS proprietari classici italiani trasformati in signorotti, l'occhio del padrone......
285: Review: Four of us came here for lunch after a visit to the V&A. The food is incredible, as is the service. We shared the prosciutto and burratina to start with, followed by different types of steaks. We shared spinach and roast potatoes - everything was stunning. Beautiful ingredients / produce and cooked to perfection. The puddings are incredible too.
286: Review: Everything was perfect starting from the service. I absolutely will be back again and again. I recommend it.
287: Title: Great food and excellent service

Review: I was there with my parents-in-law hopefully to have a great meal. And that was, indeed: wonderful and tasty dishes, with some special Italian touch. More, the service by the guys in the room was excellent: ready, quick, kind. They made our evening perfect. I'll be back for sure with other friends.
288: Review: Once again the service, steak and wine, excel every expectation.If you love your beef, red wine and want waiters that know and understand every aspect of giving you the service over and above what you desire you need to visit this restaurant.Various small plates to start including, liver, heart, tongue, lardo bruschetta and pepper stuff with tuna followed by medium rare ribs of beef and t-bones and accompanying side of rosemary roasted potatoes, creamed spinach, Savoy cabbage and some triple cooked chips.Absolutely amazing, faultless as always.All washed down with a magnum of extremely good wine.If you are in the area you must visit, obviously you need to love beef.Will be visiting again soon
289: Title: Superb starters, expected more of the meat

Review: I have to say that the starters at this place are absolutely delicious. The red peppers with Tuna are amazing and very good value for money. The beef carpaccio is for sure the best i have had in years. Try their cheese which is so fresh. The piece of resistance is the meat of course, but for some reason it did not really deliver. We ordered their top meat, the tbone. It is good but i have tasted much better in several other places. And it would have needed a bit more time on the grill as it was too red for what i would expect for medium-rare. We will go again, at least for those delicious starters.
290: Review: Attirati dalla presentazione in uno show televisivo, abbiamo cenato (al bancone) del locale di South Kensington. Zona molto bella. Il locale si presenta accattivante per la "mostra" delle carni, sicuramente ad effetto. Abbiamo ordinato una tartare in 2 di antipasto che sembrava un disco di macinato, una Fiorentina in due che onestamente non ha saziato (9 etti con osso) , 55 euro a testa con 1 bicchiere di vino ! La carne era un po' nervosa! Per il prezzo è il taglio proposto non doveva esserlo .Non credo ci tornerò anche se devo dire che il personale è gentile e il locale molto bello, con ospiti si fa sicuramente bella figura. Ps. Il coltello te lo piantano sul tavolo :)
291: Title: One of the best meat restaurant we have ever been to!

Review: The service is very friendly and professional. The food is so delicious and for the meat lover this is the right place. I love simplicity in the food and when is fresh you don’t need anything else.The bruschetta we had with lardo,honey and walnuts was amazing, perfect combination with the 3 ingredients. The tartare and the ravioli were very unique dishes but the Fassona rib steak was something that we cannot find words to describe it. We dreamed with a bite. Spot on!The dessert was panna cotta with basil absolutely delicious.This is what i call a real italian restaurant we real food real chefs and real service!Thank you so much. We will definitely come back soon.
292: Title: Meat,arket in the entrance, just like Galhager's in New York

Review: We went to this place as a second option as Bocconcinos (at Berkeley Square ) was fully booked and we had no reservation.Not a bad choice at all !Quite packed, but we promised to leave within two hours after arriving, and shared a fantastic bottle of wine and a carpacciotype of starter covered with gorgonzola flambé.Maincourse two types of grilled meat which was quite good, but not up to high end US steaks, say at Galhager's or Taste of Texas.Fine dessert - tiramisu in a variety hithertoo untested, but certainly great.Quite expensive, but all in all worth the money.
293: Title: Amazing meat and service in Kensington

Review: Wow! From the moment we arrived to the moment we left, just a wonderful experience. Greeted at the entrance like an old friend and while we waited for our table, they explained the origin and curing of their meats. For starters I had the trio of steak tartars, with each one being better than the previous. For main course I had a Fiorentina that simply melted in my mouth with an explosion of wonderful flavor. A vertical section of Parmesan cheeses finished the meal. Great wines by the glass helped wash everything down. Certainly this is a future must stop location for all my trips to London! Grazie!
294: Review: Hopefully mr. Roberto Costa will read this and act promptly......I have been many times at Macellaio in South Kensighton and I it was always a nice experience. Recently I have been there again. Last time I was a bit in a rush and asked for a quick place if available.... reply : No problem at all, give me 5 min.......those 5 min became almost 40 mindoesn't matter ! at least the girl was nice and gentle.... I can understand she was trying to catch some money for the company and find me a seat, but I did asked few times : if you haven't got a place in short time doesn't matter just let me know..............going ahead ..... after finally have a seat I place my order as quick as possible ....all good as always apart that I did receive first food and only after my wine ..........and finally the main reason of this not positive review........next to my table were sitting a table of 3, italians as me and I unfortunately overheard as follow :.... all 3 of them into mozzarella business, so they decided to try mozzarella di buffala into the menu'. When mozarella arrived they were quite disappointed. Just to begin you never serve a buffala's mozzarella cold (this was the case). Usually you put this kind of mozzarella in warm water few miinutes before serve it in order to realize all the flavour and juice into it. When arrived manager they question him and try to have more information about the product they were served with. Manager at the beginning declared he didn't know exactly where from the mozzarella come (was the best reply considering what happen after), so he added was made locally..... italian buffalo's mozzarella made in UK ??? so he begin to show of his very low culturale level into his field. Firstly telling better UK made cause where are done in Italy the territory is contaminated so mozzarellas aren't good (the 3 seating of course not happy to hear that but they let the young ignorant manager go ahead)..... young manager went ahead with his ignorance show of. The 3 customers congratulate him for all the rest of dinner but politly addressed how awful was the mozzarella. The young manager first left with a face mimic that deserved a straight punch on his nose. Not happy about that, he dare even to come back and rudely said to customer to enjoy them mozzarella........Now since a while I spotted myself as quality and customer service went slighty down, especially in different branches. This time it was really too much not to review what I withness myself.Now mr. Roberto Costa, I have been your customer since a while and I saw youngster beginning as waiters and be rewarded for them hard job with new position as managers.Mr. Costa please keep an eye and don't let some ignorant spoil your and others hard work be spoiled !I do love Macellaio and many italians does as well I'm sure and not only, maybe you can trick English people or whatever clients can come from but considering you got many italians clients your stuff should be much more carefull and informed about what they sell and don't take the piss of well informed clients.KEEP IT SIMPLE ! FORGET ABOUT THE MONEY AND BECOME A CHAIN AND KEEP OFFERING US QUALITY !
295: Review: The quality of the meat and the cooking is perfect. With good starters like an amazing burrata and great wine list. Definitelly recommended !
296: Title: One of the best restaurants for steak in London

Review: This was not the first time I have visited Macellaio rc South Kensington and it certainly won’t be the last. First of all the hostess was amazing very friendly and polite and knew her stuff! Any requests I had she catered for with absolute finesse! When seated our waiter (Sam) was the best of the best!!! Recommend a great wine to pair with our starter platter (L’IMPERIALE) was amazing and every meat was described to me and my friend with such detail and with a recommendation on how it should be eaten. Furthermore when we ordered our steak (Sam) recommended the COSTATA which was amazing! Finally to finish off the meal we had the tiramisu which has always been good in this restaurant and a cheesecake! The price is correct for the level of service and excellent food you receive in this establishment. Thank you Macellaio RC I will be back soon ready for more!!
297:
Review: A little bit expensive but every pence is deserved.
Amazing meat, very nice wine list, lovely staff and particulars meticulously cared. +++high suggested.
298:
Review: Had a great time with a friend. Service was impeccable and we we had a wonderful waiter which suggested a wonderful cut of meat to share. 
If you enjoy a really good peace of meat I absolutely suggest this place.
299: Review: Wir sind zufällig an diesem Ort vorbei und haben glücklicherweise einen Tisch an der Theke bekommen. Wir wurden super beraten und konnten live sehen, wie das wirklich gute Fleisch frisch zubereitet wird. Eine top top Adresse für Fleischliebhaber, auch wenn nich ganz günstig aber jeder cent lohnt sich!
300: Review: Cenato qui in un Week end a Londra,tutto davvero ottimo..tagliere con tartare davvero ottima e Fiorentina da 1 kg che invitava a mangiarne ancora..locale molto carino e personale gentilissimo..fiera di essere italiana quando all'estero ci sono persone così a rappresentarci.. consigliatissimo..
301: Review: What I'm most annoyed about.. is that I haven't been before :)The concept is as stated in other reviews.. a butcher with a restaurant attached. It's not fancy dining but that's fine because for 3 courses and a drink each, including service it was £136 is not unreasonable... especially if you've seen some of the other places I've been to. I liked the informal nature, the quirky Italian service (which I thought was very good and attentive) and the overall vibe. Ultimately could I see myself going again or recommending it and the answer to both is YES.All the waiting staff were friendly and attentive and super helpful at explaining and helping us choose the right cuts and meats.To avoid chewy steaks order fillet and go with what the chef recommends.I'll leave you with some piccys. It was all delicious and cant wait to go back again with friends.
302: Review: Cool spot, great location, it looks like a butcher more than a restaurant, I ordered a steak with sides they were good especially chips and salad but the steak was too chewy!
303: Review: We stumbled on this restaurant while wandering around and went in to have a look was amazed by the fantastic steak counter that we book to eat here tonight so glad we did it’s got to be the best steak I’ve ever eaten the service was spot on and the food to die for thanks for a wonderful dinner experience highly recommended and we will return table 12
304: Review: The difference between a Good and a Great restaurant, or hotel, is their ability to listen to feedback and adjust accordingly. I had a ‘Good’ meal at Macellaio and in 9 out of 10 restaurants I would have left it at that but I suspected they aimed to be better than just good and I was right. I gently gave some feedback which was duly noted and they made sure the rest of the meal surpassed my expectations. That is the sign of a Great restaurant. Thank you.
305: Review: Sono stato con amici in questo magnifico locale di Londra. Il tema è la macelleria, la carne. Per cominciare abbiamo preso una lingua è una battuta con fonduta al gorgonzola, finendo con una fiorentina accompagnata da un ottimo vino. Che dire, il servizio è ottimo e la carne davvero magnifica, c’è né per tutti i tipi. Da ripetere.
306: Title: El mejor sitio de Londres para comer carne

Review: Si te gusta la carne tienes que pasar por este restaurante, un sitio muy agradable y peculiar en el que puedes ver las piezas de carne. Tomamos un T-Bone con 45 días de maduración y un chuleta de vaca de 90 días de maduración. Las dos muy bien cocinadas y con extraordinario sabor. El personal muy amable y atento.
307: Review: My Husband & I had our weekly date night at Macellaio's. The food was just as amazing as the service. 5 Stars!!!
308: Review: I have been dining here with my family, and we had the best time.The service was spotless from beginning to end, and the food is simply amazing!We had some cured meats, burrata cheese and AMAZING tartare as a starter and then best T-bone steak ever!If you fancy meat there isn’t better place to go to in London!Thank you Macellaio, we will see you soon!
309: Review: I was in this Italian restaurant a couple of weeks ago with a friend and we had a great experience of food and wine, yesterday I came back with my girlfriend and they confirm what I thought.I have never eaten a tartar like that and carpaccio as well.The "costata" is amazing.. Perfect cooking.. Perfect seasoning..All accompanied with awesome Italian wine.everybody need to try this restaurant.Absolutely amazing
310: Review: My partner & I had the pleasure to visit " il Macellaio " in South Ken last night .We have been welcome by the manager at the door and kindly showed our booked table on the ground floor of the venue.The restaurant was full but the service was smooth and the staff well trained even though was loads of people to be served. We share a "Burratina" And a Skirt Stake as it was recommended from our server. GOOD choice! It's good to see the company is actualy investing resources to train their staff. The food was great and the price was reasonable for the quality and service you get.We will return for another vist for sure & there is no other place I would haile recommend for some good "cuts".We had a great date night!All blessing to Macellaio Roberto Costa! Real signature of Italian Cooking !
311: Review: We went yesterday with two friends in this great place!It wasn’t my first time but it was for my guests..I have to say is difficult to find in London such good meat.The raw cuts were to die for, delicious carpaccio (unusual but amazing served with robiola as well as plain).We had a middle course of Tagliolini, as good as the one I had in Monforte time ago, well done!The meat I cannot even describe goodly enough the quality and the pleasure eating it..cooked to perfection (we even asked 2 different cookings in the same Rib eye on the bone), juicy, delicate and super tasty!Desserts are up there with the rest of the meal.The waiters were attentive and knowledgeable even if the place was very busy at the time, as it often is...easy, when something is good Londoners know it!Thanks Macellaio for the great experience, we’ll be back soon!
312: Review: We had a dreadful experience at this restaurant. Everything from the service to the overpriced meat to the pasta and the wine was a disaster. The menu is dishonest by omission. Only after you have decided to order are you told that there is a weight minimum for the beef (not on the menu). When the server suggested a carafe of wine that goes well with the meat, it turns out that the 34 GBP price is for a half carafe rather than the misleading 'carafe' from the menu (quantities also not on the menu). The simple pasta we ordered to share as a starter arrived with barely a moist coat of sauce (we do understand how pasta is served in Europe) and we had to ask 4 times for a server to bring us some grated cheese, while the pasta grew cold on the table and 2 servers stood chatting nearby. We should have paid for the pasta and walked out then and there. The 58GPB piece of meat was delivered "medium rare," which in this restaurant means close to raw, and it arrived already sliced up so we couldn't send it back for another minute or two in the oven. A bad experience from start to finish. Caveat emptor.
313: Title: It's a tourist restaurant so they do not expect to see you again!

Review: Sad wasted opportunity. Good marketing of a potentialy interesting venue but a disapointment.The Steak Tartare starter was good and fresh but the simple ravioli main course was dry, tired and tasteless.The small hanger steak and the grilled rabbit were not good. If you look after apparent tourists they will come back!
314: Review: Ho appena visto la puntata di 4ristoranti,complimenti per il tuo gesto,pur avendo vinto il primo premio ,come miglior ristorante italiano a Londra ,hai deciso di dividerlo con l'avversaria sconfitta...
315: Review: Ho trascorso 4 giorni a Londra e per tre sere di seguito sono andato molto volentieri io e la mia famiglia a cena in questo splendido locale.I proprietari ed il personale sono liguri ed offrono una grande professionalità e gentilezza.La carne è eccellente, con un processo di frollatura rara da trovare che la rende molto digeribile, gli insaccati ed i salumi sono molto gustosi, ma il top è il lardo della valle d’Aosta con noci e miele.I primi piatti, di grande qualità e gusto, nella piena tradizione italiana, consigliata la pasta con il pesto ligure (da leccarsi i baffi).Ottima lista dei vini.È un degno baluardo all’estero della nostra amata cucina italiana, da loro ti senti a casa!Faccio i miei complimenti a tutti i camerieri e alla proprietà, bravi!!!!
316: Title: Ottima carne e prodotti di qualità

Review: Mi sono recata qualche giorno fa in questo ristorante e devo dire di essermi trovata bene. L'ambiente non è molto ampio, ma accogliente. Il personale è ospitale e gentile formato da ragazzi italiani. Io e i mei parenti ed amici abbiamo ordinato dei taglieri di salumi ed erano davvero di ottima qualità cosi pure la tagliata di carne tenerissima e cotta alla perfezione. La quantità delle porzioni, però, non era abbondante, avrei gradito e gustato volentieri qualche fettina di carne in più. Comunque consiglio a tutti i carnivori italiani e non di pranzare o cenare in questo ristorante.
317: Title: best place for meat in London
Review: it is the best, the atmosphere is fantastic, very cozy place with stunning meat and great service, definetely a place to go if you are looking for steaks or meat in London
318: Title: Really impressed with the service and the quality of meat!

Review: We came back and we were not disappointed! Food was amazing, the quality of meat incredible and the staff were friendly and very hospitable. Definitely dining upstairs was a much more pleasant experience! Grateful for the wonderful dining experience!
319: Title: NON NE VALE LA PENA

Review: In sintesi, la cosa che mi ha dato assolutamente fastidio è stata la fretta, scusandosi, che ci hanno messo i camerieri per liberare il tavolo per il cliente del turno successivo, ben 40 minuti prima dell’orario che ci avevano comunicato al nostro puntuale arrivo.(Avevamo ancora da finire il vino, ecc., più semplicemente la nostra cena)È un atteggiamento che non accetto a maggior ragione se il conto è di 190 sterline circa, ma anche se fossero state 10. Il misunderstanding con il cliente successivo va risolto con il cliente successivo non con noi.  Detto ciò, carne buona ma non te la ricordi.
320: Title: EXCELLENT FOOD NOT THE SERVICE

Review: There were three of us and we had a reservation, to sit at the bar , then we found that that was impossible to talk or eat at new years eve, we then were about to walk out , to find suddenly we can get a table if the service had been better. we had to ask for every single thing- can we get a menu? - do we have a waiter? - can we order? -The busboy, who mostly spoke Italian, was only slightly helpful. The waiter seemed more focused on people he appeared to know or had seen before The carpaccio was very nice, given free which was very kind and very nice, a very busy restaurant, with very slow service, nothing was cleared from the table until we keep asking to clear, However my steak medium rare was perfect so as was the liver, , the bone marrow was good , but not the hearts was tough , all in all as it was very busy new years eve the food was very good , service was not so , will go again on a different night
321: Review: Sono stato a mangiare in questo ristorante molto originale proprio questa sera. Entrando il locale si presenta come una vera macelleria con banco frigo, carni esposte e mattonelle bianche e rosse sulle pareti. Il personale, composto interamente da ragazze e ragazzi giovani quasi tutti italiani, è molto cordiale. Il menù simpatico, stampato sulla carta da giornale a imitare un quotidiano. Vini italiani di ottima scelta. Consiglieri a tutti questo locale, in particolare agli italiani a Londra che si trovano spesso in crisi con la scelta.
322: Review: Ottimo ristorante di carne, italiano. Un po’ caro ma ci sta piccolo con carne bene in vista, ottima la carta dei vini. Un unico appunto usano poco il sale...
323: Review: Une cote de bœuf simplement divineQui vous transporte au delà du réel Un bœuf italien spécifique importé maturé 6 a 9 semaines Une qualité incroyable. Le boucher la découpe non loin de vous. Elle vous est présenté. Les autres convives étaient sur filet et tagliatelles. C était excellent. Les vins grands. L addition à 55 par pers mais un moment exquis dans un service aux petits soins. 10/5 ou 40/20 voir 100/50. Les yeux fermés Réservez ou allez y tôt.
324: Title: Only thing missing is a Michelin Star

Review: Macellaio means business, and that’s made abundantly clear as you enter the restaurant. The butcher counter to the left of the entrance proudly displays formidable cuts.The restaurant itself is unconventional and pleasantly laid back. Clearly Il Macellaio is all about the meat. We had battuta Albese (steak tartare Italian style) followed by a proper Fiorentina (T Bone steak). Steamed spinach and cannellini beans as sides.Meats are perfectly aged and impeccably cooked, worthy of a Michelin star. An extensive wine list is the added bonus. Premium wines come at premium prices, but there’s ample choice in the mid price range.Yes, it’s not cheap, but definitely worth every penny. We will be back!
325: Review: Big thanks to all the staff who were very kind and helpful, the food was great! And thanks to Roberto for making our dinner special! I will definitely come back.
326: Title: Molto male il servizio e il menu

Review: Servizio pessimo in quanto la cameriera faceva trasparire poca voglia di essere li in quel momento e poco incline a suggerire la giusta scelta per me e la mia ragazza. in poche parole oltre a portare i piatti a tavola bisogna essere cortesi, saper indirizzare il cliente alla scelta dei piatti e non far trasparire sufficienza agli occhi. Detto questo le tagliatelle erano senza sapore, la trippa non amalgamata nella sua salsa e la carne .... bhe'.. bocciata!Non lo consiglio
327: Review: The beef here is so superior. From Italians, served by Italians. That’s how it should be. We shared a tartare with Gorgonzola, a fiorentina, a wonderful salad of fennel and orange, sautéed spinach and toast potatoes. The basil pannacotta is one of the best ‘adaptations’ I’ve ever tasted. Wine mark-ups are a little high. Nevertheless, the food is sublime.
328: Review: Well what an amazing experience, nearly walked past to be honest as it wasn’t what I expected but on walking in I loved it. We sat near the butcher counter so we could see what was going on. The staff were lovely and looked after us beautifully telling us about the meat and helping us with our choice of steak even advising us what we were going to have would have been to much for 3 of us to share.........they were completely right and for that reason alone I would recommend the restaurant. The 4th person in our group chose a fillet steak and was delighted saying it was the best she’d had, the rest of us felt exactly the same about out T-bone and rib eye. Loved the way the knives were stuck in the table and the way the steak was presented with the domes over the meat. Spotted the offal section and decided to try that as well All in all a fantastic evening thank you very much.
329: Review: Het leek een leuk en mooi restaurant waar zelf het vlees door een slager wordt klaargemaakt. Dit klopt ook wel maar dat is het dan ook wel.Wij kregen een tafeltje in de kelder, niet erg gezellig en je krijgt de ambiance van het restaurant dus totaal niet mee.We werden slecht geinformeerd over het menu en maakte daardoor verkeerde keuzes. Ze lieten ons twee stukken vlees zien en vroegen of dat goed was. Bleek niet voor ons te zijn achteraf. Het eten was prima maar zeer weinig.
330: Title: E’ necessario non aver appetito

Review: L’ambiente è caldo e familiare, il servizio è garbato. La carne è buona ma non eccezionale. Il punto dolente sono le porzioni, davvero esigue, mentre il conto è salato. Assolutamente non equilibrato il rapporto qualità/ quantità - prezzo, anche tenendo conto che siamo a Londra.
331: Review: Vi havde fået anbefalet denne restaurant i London, hvis vi ‘var til kød’. Faktisk er det en slagterbutik, hvor kødet kan ses fra vinduet, og der er en disk lige indenfor døren. Men det er også en virkelig fantastisk lækker restaurant med belevne tjenere, og en smagsoplevelse vi sent vil glemme. Næste besøg i London vil bestemt inkludere et besøg her igen.
332: Review: J’ai découvert ce bon restaurant par hasard, amateurs de viande vous serez servis, la viande est vraiment délicieuse, le service est bon, l’ambiance est cosy, mais le prix est assez élevé comptez une moyenne de 50£/personne . Seul ce soir là l’addition était de 80£ (entrée et un bon plat ) c’est un peu normal on est à Londres aussi . Je recommande ce restaurant si vous voulez déguster une très bonne viande !
333: Review: Se volete un bel locale in un quartiere tra i migliori di Londra e magari avete voglia di un buon pezzo di carne non ci sono dubbi questo é il ristorante giusto. Cibo ottimo, gente simpatica, locale accogliente, sempre affollato prenotazione d’obbligo. Se siete da quelle parti da non perdere anche perché il prezzo é assolutamente competitivo tenuto conto che siete a Londra.
334: Review: Bevor wir überhaupt die Reise antreten, der Tisch im Macellaio RC wird vorher gebucht. Dann steigt die Vorfreude. Es sind nicht nur die Vorspeisen, Fleisch, Beilagen, Wein etc. Es ist ein Zusammenspiel auf höchstem Niveau das uns dort erwartet. Die Mitarbeiter sind einfach klasse und damit der gesamte Service drumherum. Hier stimmt einfach alles. Halt italienische Lebenskultur. Al nostro prossimo incontro!!
335: Review: Nous avons été très bien accueilli, et avons très bien mangé. La viande était délicieuse et de bonne qualitée. Nous nous sommes régalées. Le service impeccable. Je recommande vraiment ce restaurant :)
336: Review: Divine... There really is no other way to describe this restaurant. A haven for meat lovers. One not to miss!!!
337: Review: The 1 kilo Costato (we shared) was just superb! Although I usually eat my steak medium the waiter convinced us to order it medium-rare ... and of course he was right! Why not the maximum ‘excellent’ score: we felt a bit rushed by the 2-2.5 hours time-slot (not uncommon for the better rated restaurants in London) and the sides, starters and desserts were underwhelming. Conclusion: a must for meat lovers ... but with some minor flaws!
338: Title: Scorcio di Italia "carnivora" a Londra

Review: Trovato tramite tripadvisor per la vicinanza all'hotel, arriviamo senza prenotazione ma si prodigano subito e gentilmente per trovarci un tavolo per due persone. L'ingresso si presenta come una normale macelleria italiana ma nel retro si apre la vera e propria sala con tavolacci di legno spartani ma voluti per creare una bella atmosfera rustica. Il Personale quasi tutto italiano molto gentile ci porta un menu a forma di giornale con buona selezione di primi e soprattutto di secondi di carne. Ci viene proposta l'offerta del giorno a base di tartufo che non accettiamo. Selezioniamo due piatti di carne ben cucinata che ci viene servita su piastra di ardesia e i coltelli ci vengono piantati nel tavolo con effetto scenografico. Entrambe le scelte sono ben cucinate e la carne è di qualità. Conto abbastanza alto ma nella media dei ristoranti di Londra. Consigliato per godere di atmosfera italiana e buona selezione di carne.
339: Review: I came to the Macellaio to make a good impression with foreign investors, and it was an exceptional evening! we took a kilo of Costata, baked potatoes and spinach. All accompanied by wine from Puglia, I think Negramaro, recommended by the very nice waiter Lele. I made a good impression with my guests, thanks to Patrizia who explained the concept of the Macellaio way! I will definitely return!Amazing staff and food!
340: Review: Ottima presentazione e cena. Vini di alta qualità e personale all altezza del ristorante. Mi sono stati presentati i piatti e la carne gustata al sangue come volevo.
341: Review: Ristorante fantastico (come sentirsi a casa), cibo ottimo, personale super cordiale e attento! Veramente bravi! Prenotate in anticipo o potreste aspettare un bel po’! Consigliatissimo!!!
342: Review: Siamo venuti domenica 25 Novembre dopo 3 giorni all insegna dell'agghiacciante cucina inglese. Al primo sguardo hanno capito subito di cosa avevamo bisogno.Personale gentilissimo e preparato, fassona di prima qualita e frollatura difficile da trovare persino in Italia.Il locale era pieno e ci hanno sistemato sul marmo della macelleria, cosa che ci ha fatto veramente piacere , cosi abbiamo potuto osservare il macellaio al lavoro..abbiamo ordinato un carpaccio e una tartarre veramente di livello superiore, una costata da circa 900 gr succosa e si scioglieva in bocca, un contorno con spinaci tutto accompagnato da una bella bottiglia di Barbera caffe grappe ad un prezzo onesto per la Citta.Dimenticavo che il titolare ci ha offerto uno spettacolsre salame di fassona.Un oasi nel deserto del cibo londinese.Da provsre assolutamente se si capita a Londra
343: Review: I have visited Macellaio numerous times the last years. Lovely warm atmosphere, tasty meat at reasonable prices. You can bring your own wine for a corkage fee. I will definitely go back next time in London
344: Review: Seguiti con gentilezza dall’accoglienza al dessert, in particolar modo da Gianluca (ragazzo barese) che ci ha consigliato in maniera onesta e molto preparata. Carne di eccelsa qualitá. Abbiamo preso la costata e la tagliata al castelmagno deliziose.Antipasto una tartare meravigliosamente buona. Per dolce su consiglio di Gianluca abbiamo preso Lattedolce. Non proprio a buon mercato ma ne vale decisamente la pena! Torneremo sicuramente!
345: Review: Very very slow service (we had to ask 3/4 times for the same thing before they would bring it to the table) and portions are definitely too small for the price (we left the restaurant still hungry and having spent about 50£ each). The waiter also complained and was very rude when we asked to split the bill and pay separately. I won't go back for sure.
346: Review: This is probably one of the best meat/steak restaurants in London! So an important tip is: book at least 4-5 days in advance!!!!Small, cosy, authentic and above all unbearably delicious place, Macellaio is just a place which you will revisit multiple times.You can see the raw meat with your own eyes, choose it and then of course enjoy eating it. We went for some starters and then for a solid 1kg of T-bone steak (as we were three persons). The steak was an ace, especially when you have in mind that we asked for medium-rare (but French medium-rare). The wine selections of Italian wines was also pleasing and we manage to couple the seam with an excellent Sicilian Ciro Reserva.... We completely enjoyed the time spent at Macellaio, the outstanding meat-experience and the fact that we generally had an amazing evening there..
347: Review: Restaurante de carne estilo butcheries, com carnes penduradas na entrada. Varias opções de vinhos bons. Excelente opção para carnívoros. O ponto ruim ficou pelo garçom italiano, mal humorado e sem educação. Do resto, perfeito.
348: Review: Sempre una garanzia il Macellaio!! Quando mi concedo un weekend a Londra, devo gustare la fantastica fassona piemontese , una vera prelibatezza..,cucinata magistralmente . Bravissimi tutti! Che dire?? Il top! Bravo Roberto, alla prossima.
349: Title: Not a fancy place but great food and service
Review: Go there for great meat. Simple restaurant but so good food and service. A bit noisy but you will be taken care of by the great staff. Reservation is recommended.
350: Title: Better if you're a regular?

Review: It's all about expectations and, clearly, my expectations of this place were higher than the result of our visit. I was thinking more "steakhouse" and less "retail shop that serves steak." There were three of us and we had a reservation for 7 pm on a Monday night.
