When we arrived, the host made sure we understood that the table had to be vacated by 9 pm and this would have been no problem at all if the service had been better. As it was, we had to ask for every single thing- can we get a menu? - do we have a waiter? - can we order? - can we order dessert? The busboy, who mostly spoke Italian, was only slightly helpful. The waiter seemed more focused on people he appeared to know or had seen before because he sure wasn't interested in us. As for the food, the steak is sold by weight, with a minimum (I think) of one kilo. So, like most other diners, the three of us split a large piece of beef. We asked for it medium rare, but it was really rare. Tasty, but rare. And the dull knives were little help at all in cutting it. On the other hand, the sides were just servings for one person. The French fries were good, as were the cannellini beans, and the spinach, but they were not for sharing and, in the end, we were still hungry. The tiramisu for dessert was probably the best thing we ate. The entire evening, the waiter never came by to ask how we were doing or if we needed anything so, once again, we had to flag down the busboy to ask for the bill - because it was getting close to our 9:00 deadline. Nearly two hours for three of us to eat a little bit of food! Interestingly, the place emptied out between 8:30-9:00, but then was full again as we left at 9:00 - on a Monday night! (There were probably 12-15 tables, plus some more downstairs near the bathrooms.) In our opinion, this place is not worth the price.
351: Review: .... I raccomend it to everyone.I'm stay il London in holidays and I find this restaurant turning to South Kensington.I was greeted by Ilaria,very kind girl. She made me sit in the front with the butcher's section.I was advised by the assistant manager, very nice and knowledgeable.Very welcoming and characteristic local. Quality food and a very interesting story.
352: Review: The best place for meat eaters..we were a group of 5 hungry guys!!Nice atmosphere,the interior design looks like a typical italian bautcher and match perfectly the kind of food..good wine selection.Must try the Fiorentina TBone and the Costata.Special thanks to Gianluca that make us feel like home!We 'll come back for sure
353: Review: Amazing place to eat the really Italian meat! Location nice and staff very nice, Especially Gianluca thanks for your great service!See u soon!
354: Review: beautifull place cozy and amazing food. A special thanks goes to Gianluca for excellent service, he made us feel like home, highly recomended.
355: Review: ho scoperto questo ristorante grazie al programma dello chef Alessandro Borghesee alla prima occasione eccomi qui. un sabato di novembre con marito e figlio....accoglienza perfetta ..location molto bella e particolare. ora passiamo al cibo:antipasti ottimi invece i primi sono risultati senza infamia e senza lode......carne e dolce super......comunque ritornerò.
356:
Review: Big thanks to Gianluca and Ezio for amazing service and for making our evening special! Amazing food and drinks but that kind of service always wins!
Alessio and Justina
357: Review: We ordered the T bone which was really huge. The quality of the meat was great but the edged were really burnt and the inside was really soft and nicely cooked. Not sure why
358: Review: Appena entrato ho ricevuto un’ottima accoglienza e il personale per quanto ho visto era tutto italiano mi sembrava di essere a casa! Servizio ottimo e molto attento ai particolari. Esperienza fantastica da ripetere assolutamente.
359: Review: Due coppie di amici..locale con un bel banco di carne e le affettati.bella location su due livelli. Carne eccellente sia la cruda presa come starter, sia le costate e le fiorentine prese come main. Senza infamia e senza lode l’amatriciana. Ricarico sui vini accettabili per essere a Londra. Consigliato
360: Review: Great Italian meat restaurant, went here for dinner with a few work colleagues, and was pleasantly surprised. Not the normal stuffy restaurant in this neck of the woods, but very friendly and relaxed atmosphere. As you enter the restaurant it looks a bit and smells like a butchers, with meat hanging on hooks. We were led to a private room downstairs which I was glad about, as for me personally the raw meat hanging was a bit off putting, definitely not a place for vegans or vegetarians.The food was plentiful and great quality, it just kept coming and coming, the cheese and wine was also superb.
361: Review: 廚窗豪氣地掛上十數塊枕頭那麼大的風乾牛排全無裝修門也是爛了似的卻是人龍不斷一半還是說義大利文的識貨快排隊牛扒！
362: Review: first the hostess could not find our reservstion on opentable. i showeed it to her on the phone and she said , in any case i have a table available".... i was unlucky the tongue was like chewing gum and the rabbit was very disappointing . my other 2 freinds were luckier, the carpaccio was very nice as well as fillet and costata . the waiter when i asked about the rabbit told me that he would have recommended the fiorentina ....i should have listened ....
363: Review: We ordered beef filet and were shown two nice cuts on a plate prior to being grilled. What we received seemed different. One steak looked okay but the other came out in five different chunks of meat loosely arranged in a circle like a filet should be. They offered to redo the steak and I sent it back and received a thicker cut which was good but it was cold and raw in the middle. I didn't send it back a second time. The pasta sides we ordered were just okay. The steak was flavorless and the meal seemed overpriced for what it was. If I go back I will have to try the aged steaks instead. That seems to be the specialty.
364:
Review: I hade a very nice dinner
Good service, good food, good environment! 
5 star, need to be visited and tried by everybody🖒
365: Review: Qualità della carne ovviamente perfetta!Steak Tartare eccezionale.Ravioli al tocco nemmeno in Piemonte .Trenette al pesto strepitose .Conto 9 Bravo Roberto
366: Title: Best Italian meet in London
Review: Best Italian meat in London!! We been there yesterday night for a business dinner.Amazing steaks!!! Thank you for the good time provided.
367: Review: Scelto per caso si è rilevato un ristorante con i fiocchi! Pasti ovviamente a base di carne con diversi tipi di tagli.Dalla costata alla fiorentina alla tagliata...tutta carne fresca e squisita.Locale molto romantico anche per cena di coppia.Personale interamente italiano molto attento e disponibile. Consigliato se si vuole mangiare dell'ottima carne.
368: Review: A great place to meet friends; the restaurant is quirky but that doesn’t distract from the good food. Excellent quality meat and delicious sides, accompanied by an extensive wine list. What’s not to love?
369: Review: Siamo stati questa sera a cena dal Macellaio :) Trovato su tripadvisor, ci ha incuriosito essendo noi amanti della carne. Una cena come si deve. Tutto ottimo, carne, vino e accoglienza. Siamo stati serviti con amabile attenzione da Ezio. Soddisfatti a pieno. Grazie.
370: Title: Good option for Italian food
Review: Everything is above average, good quality food (steak can be better), friendly service, nice atmosphere, lots of choices. Worth visiting. I have been there about five times.
371: Review: Abbiamo veramente apprezzato la qualità degli ingredienti, abbiamo preso una costata da 700 gr in due e due contorni di patate entrambi fatti in casa, buonissime le patate fritte!Siamo stati accomodati al piano inferiore caratterizzato da un'atmosfera calda e non troppo formale.Unico neo, ci saremmo aspettati una scelta un po' più ampia in termini di varietà di carni e tagli essendo l'anima del ristorante.Tutto sommato abbastanza caro (Poco più di £70 in totale per la costata due contorni è una bottiglia di acqua)
372: Review: Busy restaurant but with  very  slow  service  and without and surprise. Food nothing to exptional. Can find  more  better restaurats for  eat  the perfect  stai.
373: Title: Great food in a nice location
Review: Great dinner with friends, excellent italian meat perfectly cooked, warm welcome and fantastic service and suggestion from our waiter Gianluca. Cannot wait to come back!
374: Title: Cena di compleanno in famiglia

Review: Tra i migliori ristoranti visitati (ovviamente italiano). Qui si magnifica la carne arrosto.Tutti i tagli e tutte le pezzature. Basta affidarsi al personale come ad esempio a Gianluca, esperto, gentile e disponibile che ha trovato anche il tempo di regalrci una carina e gustosa sorpresa di fine cena per il compleanno di mia moglie.Prezzo adeguato.
375: Title: Auch nach 3 Jahren wieder ein gelungener Anend

Review: Vor 3 Jahren haben wir das Macellaio im Vorübergehen entdeckt und waren begeistert.Gestern unser zweiter Besuch nach 3 Jahren. Wir bestellten ein T-Bone mit 850g medium rare. Die Sirloinseite war perfekt, die Filetseite well done. Auf unsere Anmerkung hin, haben wir umgehend ein neues separates Filetsteak medium rare gebraten von hervorragender Qualität erhalten. Fehler können immer mal passieren, wie in unserem Fall die durchgebratene Filetseite - bei Macellaio wurde hervorragend damit umgegangen. Deshalb alle Punkte für Service und Fleischqualität!
376: Review: Personale gentile e professionale, servizio attento e rapido cibo buono e ben fatto, materie di prima di qualità cucinato in modo naturale. Una serata gradevole
377: Review: Una ceno con gli amici, bellissima sera divertente . Nn mi aspettavo a trovare un locale così bellissimo e buon
378: Review: Semplicemente magnifico: sono venuta a cena con amici.. alla porta una super accoglienza da parte della receptionist che ci fa accomodare al tavolo , il cameriere, Marcello,chiede subito se gradivamo acqua per cominciare e inizia a raccontarci la storia della visione Macellaio e della Fassona piemontese.. abbiamo iniziato con un misto di antipasti consigliati dal cameriere, tagliere misto di salumi , tartare di carne cruda tagliata a coltello e come sorpresa finale....IL CUORE!!! tenero e saporito.. da provare assolutamente.. gli antipasti vengono accompagnati da una bottiglia di vino di corpo leggero.. arrivati al momento della carne... wow una vera sorpresa!! Una costata da 1.2Kg.. tenera e saporita..la fine del mondo!! Il servizio ben curato, Marcello: divertente, preparato, coinvolgente .. ci siamo sentiti a casa, atmosfera Perfetta!!Per concludere: una selezioni di dolci preparati in casa.. cheesecake e torta di mele? DA PROVARE!!!Un’esperienza unica.. ritorneremoConsigliatissimo!!!
379: Title: si può dare di più

Review: Siamo andati per pranzo e la cosa che mi ha colpito a l’ingresso sono stati i 2 macellai che abbiamo trovato estremamente seri....quasi stessero facendo qualcosa di soprannaturale nel tagliare carne d’accordo che non erano i preposti a ricevere la clientela ma un sorriso non guasta.le 3 stelle che ho loro attribuito se le sono guadagnate con il loro atteggiamento...i camerieri invece si sono dimostrati molto cordiali e sorridenti...il mangiare non male...ottima la battuta di carne....i tortellini al contrario risultavano non cotti.....ottimo il dolce.....ristorante nella media...
380: Review: We had lunch today and we were seated downstairs which is a bit dark and small for my taste. We ate carpaccio and the T steak which were ok and well cooked but we ended up paying a bill which in my opinion was too high for what we got. Nice location (if upstairs) good steaks but overall expensive
381: Review: I've been yesterday for my friend birthday, we were 15, over a number of people the restaurant makes you choose between 2 menus, 1 for 45£ and 1 for 65£(of course without drinks)First I have to say that the quality of the meat is amazing, but for me overall still not worthed...We choose the 45£menu without knowing that it's actually 180£per menu because they bring on the table 1 menu to divide for 4 people,even for dessert they brought 1 tray for 4 people but with 3 pcs of dessert so it was complicated to divide. And for this price I pretend a good service, when we ordered wine (extremely overpriced,it was 50£a bottle that we pay 8€ back home) it was taking 20 minutes to arrive, we asked for 4 still water and 15 minutes after it arrived 1still and 1 sparkling, we asked for prosecco we got really hot gasses just out the dishwasher and the actual bottle arrived when the dessert was not only finished but they cleaned the table already...So in the end 83£each it's absolutely not worthed considering that I had to stop for food on the way home because 1 menu was to divide between 4 people (1fiorentina/tbone was to divide between 8 people)
382: Review: It is a good small steakhouse in the heart of London. It is popular and so it Is crowded and noisy. Service is good. Good selection of different meats.
383: Review: For meat lover . The bill will not be cheap , but those money are spent in a right way!!! Very good variety of wine. Good service and great location.
384: Review: Excellent restaurant de viande que nous avons trouvé dans cette petite rue, de grosse pièce de viande pendant un peu partout et la qualité est au rendez-vous ! N'hésitez surtout pas !
385: Review: In questo ristorante sembra di essere, per qualche attimo, immersi a Firenze piuttosto che a Londra: fiorentina da leccarsi i baffi, qualsiasi taglio di carne scelto con cura, sempre il migliore sul mercato, servizio prodigo di consigli e descrizioni. Conto sui 90 pounds per due persone.
386: Review: Locale spartano ottima carne ottimo servizio un po caro. Prenotato con un coupon abbiamo ricevuto sconto del 25 %.
387: Review: Ottimo locale per far conoscere la Fassona Piemontese in Londra Un grande imprenditore che sta facendo molto bene Servizio corretto, carne fantastica in un locale ben realizzatoPrezzo corretto per la " cara" Londra
388: Review: We had beef tartare and a tagliere with a selection of salumi and bufalo mozzarella.Then I had an amazing tagliata and it was superb and my boyfriend and a beef fillet with vegetable as side and he was happy. Staff was nice, they suggest us a nice Italian wine! Coffe was ok nothing special. I think is a big overpriced but it s my opinion. Liked this Italian restaurant and the way you can see the macellaio working!
389: Review: To keep the review breif. It is one of the places that you go to enjoy your time with friends or loved ones, the place is cozy and makes you feel that your family.The staff are kind and they gave good suggestion for food and even gave us a breif view of how they do things.
390: Review: Ottima cucina (non solo la carne), location di stile, servizio attento e premuroso ma non affettato, conto sopra la media ma giustificato dalla qualità. Bravi!
391: Title: Ho appena visto la trasmissione di Alessandro Borghese

Review: Ciao Roberto!!! Già eri il mio eroe per l’altare alla carne! Ma il gesto che hai fatto con i soldi della vincita ti ha portato ed essere sopra a Superman! Sei il mio eroe numero uno! Io ed il mio compagno ci siamo emozionati! Ed è con gli occhi ancora “umidi” che ti domando: i tempi di attesa per prenotare una cena da te di media? Non amo particolarmente Londra.. ma abbiamo appena deciso di venire un weekend solo per cenare da te! Che sei il mio eroe ci tengo a dirtelo di persona!!!
392: Review: Stumbled across this very unusual Italian restaurant in South Kensington-London. The meat hung in the Window display was a great attraction. I had the Tongue for a starter. I thought it would be s cold cut, but was pleasantly surprised when it came cooked to perfection with 3 blobs if parsley sauce. V Nice. I also had the hung steak with potatoes (and smoke?)......Macelldios was most unusual and felt like I was in a speciality restaurant in Milano. The Merlot went well with the meal and the atmosphere was “buzzin” and added to the experience- if you were solo, couple or a group event, as long as u like food and meat, u will have a fab time at macelldiosl
393: Title: Italians do it better... the meat chapter
Review: Authentic, traditional and genuine Italian steakhouse where stardom is left to the meat with the beautiful sides and starters are supporting characters.
394: Review: Nel contesto tra i più fascinosi di Londra, South Kensington, è un locale sobrio, nel quale puoi scegliere un taglio di carne da vedersi cucinare alla griglia Ottima è varia scelta di viniNon esattamente a “buon prezzo”, ma, ne vale assolutamente la pena. Esperienza di gusto
395: Review: Buena calidad y muy amables. Proceden de gente Italiana y se nota. La comida, carne, muy buena. Recomendable 100%. Los bares de al lado estan más llenos, pero es más para Ingleses, este es para gente que le gusta comer bien. Coger bisteck y compartir es una versión más que atractiva. Mínimo 1 kg,
396: Review: Sono stata a mangiare con una mia collega ed abbiamo trascorso davvero un piacevole pomeriggio. Personale attento e professionale, tartare e fiorentina di qualità. Unica pecca forse il conto, leggermente alto. In ogni caso tornerò con piacere la prossima volta che vorrò trattarmi bene!
397: Review: We are from Somerset and found this restaurant by accident walking down Old Brompton Road a couple of years ago.. The meat in the window was wonderful; well hung and beautiful. We ate there again on Saturday night and the food and the service was perfect as always- they are so friendly. But above all what really attracts you is the genuine passion for the meat they are serving. If you want steak there really is nowhere else to go in London - from farm to table their meat is lovingly nurtured, prepared, hung and served
398: Review: Il miglior ristorante di carne che abbia mai provato! Staff eccellente e cordiale. I nostri camerieri sono stati Vincenzo e Gianluca e ci hanno fatto sentire a casa. Ho chiesto se potevano fare qualcosa con il dessert visto che era il compleanno del mio ragazzo e loro sono arrivati in sala spegnendo le luci E cantando "Tanti auguri" con una candela sul dolce. Veramente carini. La carne è incredibile, non ho parole per descriverne la bontà, la delicatezza, l'odore, ma ciò che rende unico questo posto secondo me, oltre alla carne in bella vista e il suo sapore unico, è lo staff. Ci ritorneremo al 100% e spero al più presto! Complimenti.
399: Review: Everything delicious! The tongue, the testicles, the peppers with tuna, the beef rib ans ESPECIALLY the bone marrow..... the menu doesn't mention the beef tartare on top of the sizzling, unctuous marrow. Oh my. We've eaten a lot of steak in London, this is 2nd best (sorry) but still incredible. Service delightful. Definitely returning
400: Title: "Get Your Meat On" at Macellaio's -- South Kensington

Review: Our "accidental" visit was an amazing dining experience from start to finish — miles ahead of any of the very finest steakhouses in NYC, but in a quaint and cozy way. Each of our menu choices (this night was fillet and ribeye) was cooked to absolute perfection and the recommended wine pairing was spot on. Our cheese plate, salted caramel dessert and espressos were a delectable end to a most unforgettable meal. And the service? BRAVISSIMO!
401: Review: Buona carne e servizio !Siamo stati in questo ristorante e devo dire di avere mangiato bene .Ottima la fiorentina
402: Review: Premetto che, ogni volta che mi trovo a Londra questo ristorante è una tappa fissa .... sogno anche di notte la loro carne... e sopratutto L antipasto imperiale con varie tartare e salumi da sogno... straconsiglio questo ristorante la qualità della carne è ottima e poi contornata da un personale professionale e cordiale!! Per non parlare della loro cantina dei vini rigorosamente italiani!! Bravissimi continuate cosi!
403: Review: Il locale è piccolo ma molto particolare. Il personale tutto italiano è pronto a consigliarvi cosa ordinare (costata e fiorentina sono le specialità). Noi abbiamo provato le tagliatelle al ragù (buone), due tagliate (carne ottima ma porzione ridotta) e due dolci (tiramisù e Apple cake con salsa al caramello salato servita al momento buoni!).Forse un po' caro, ma comunque un ristorante con carne di qualità.
404: Title: La cucina e i prodotti italiani TOP

Review: Non si discute: macellaio RC è superlativo! Il locale è particolare e curato nei dettagli. Il personale molto attento unica nota negativa la ragazza bionda all’ingresso ci ha trattati con poca cordialità quando avevamo detto di non aver prenotato. La qualità e la bontà del cibo è di altissimo livello. Le portate non sono abbondanti ma sono davvero squisite. La carne non ha bisogno del coltello per essere tagliata. Bravissimi
405: Title: Per capire devi venire qui a cena
Review: Prima volta a Londra quindi ecco cosa dico!!! Posto meraviglioso, personale divino, non puoi sbagliare la cosa migliore è farsi consigliare ☺️
406: Title: Stopped while walking to hotel

Review: Popped in on the way to the hotel. Place was full and I was able to get a seat at the bar. I had a G&T , steak tatare, glass of house red, rump with walnut and gorgonzola. All items where excellent, I am sure this will become a weekly carnivore visit.
407: Review: Siamo stati per la seconda volta in questo ristorante a distanza di pochi mesi,e come la prima volta volta ci siamo sentiti a casa,tutto perfetto dall’accoglienza al cibo,carne di prima scelta e di ottima qualità.una particolare nota di merito al cameriere Alessandro nostro conterraneo che ha saputo consigliarci alla perfezione e con la sua simpatia intrattenerci per tutta la serata!ci ritorneremo sicuramente!!!
408: Review: Seduti al primo tavolo all’entrata del ristorante abbiamo notato la cura e la sicurezza con cui Roberto ha lavorato la carne, di fronte a noi.Una tartare di carne delicata seguita dauna bistecca favolosa mi fanno segnare 5 stelle al ristorante, senza dubbio.Il personale poi è la ciliegina sulla torta, accogliente e amichevole, ci hanno fatto sentire ancora a casa.La serata giusta dopo la lunga giornata di viaggio.
409: Review: Personale simpatico e cordiale ( bisogna sottolinearlo perché a Londra la maggior parte dei camerieri sono scorbutici ), la carne era ben presentata ma aimè non era quello che mi aspettavo, purtroppo la Fiorentina è un altra storia e non quella che mi hanno servito...altra nota dolente il conto troppo salato, esagerato per quello che abbiamo preso.
410: Review: Carne deliziosa, personale preparatissimo, simpatico e disponibile. Ottima carta dei vini. Anche i dolci erano squisiti. Da provare assolutamente almeno una volta! Inoltre ho apprezzato tantissimo la pulizia e l’igiene. Consigliatissimo
411: Title: Excellent meat ! Do not miss the T-Bone

Review: Certainly one of the best meat restaurant in London. 
The T-bone is just excellent and so are the sides. 

The prices are very expensive, though. Count approximately 55+£/person if you have a few drinks.
412: Title: A “meaty” place in the heart of Kensington

Review: My wife and I are on holiday in London this summer. We love Kensington which is full of little jewels to fulfil our desires and curious palates. Well if you love meat and you are in Kensington then you must try this restaurant. The staff is polite and courteous, the newly appointed manager is ready to help you to feel at home and, most importantly, the food is fantastic!I did not take any picture...as I was too intent in enjoying the food but I can assure you that I had a great steak whilst my wife enjoyed a tasty ham platter with burrata. We will definitely mark this on our food map!
413: Review: Locale carino, servizio ottimo, carne straordinaria. Da provare assolutamente. Il locale si trova nello splendido  quartiere di South  Kensington
414: Review: Abbiamo scelto il macellaio perché eravamo alla ricerca di un buon ristorante vicino al nostro hotel. Non abbiamo l’abitudine di andare in ristoranti italiani all’estero ma le recensioni sembravano ottime! Abbiamo ordinato bruschette con il lardo di colonnata con miele e noci e fagioli cannellini per antipasto.. ovviamente abbiamo fatto il bis delle bruschette! Superlative!Ci siamo lasciati consigliare sul tipo di carne ed abbiamo scelto la costata .. tenerissima e gustosa! Abbiamo anche assaggiato il prosciutto crudo Sant’Ilario di Parma...una favolosa bresaola ed un carpaccio di fassona memorabile! Mangiamo spesso carne.. in Italia e all’estero e quella del Macellaio è nella top five! Tra l’altro abbiamo trovato la nostra amatissima acqua Ferrarelle ( un miraggio per italiani frizzodipendenti abituati alle bollicine naturali senza additivi!) e dulcis in fundo... un tiramisù con vero mascarpone!Il costo... in linea con la qualità!Il personale, italiano, gentile ed accogliente; il macellaio Fabio: un vero artista!!!
415: Title: A Fantastic Evening in Italy

Review: We dined here last night and the welcome, atmosphere, food and service was perfection from start to finish. We are local and this is our new favourite steak restaurant (sorry Hawksmoor); we felt like we were in Italy! The staff are friendly, hard working and incredibly proud of their produce and we were surrounded by fellow very happy diners. The meat is of exquisite quality with an excellent choice of starters, sides and desert and fabulous and very reasonably priced wine list.
416: Review: We visited this restaurant because it was recommended as a great place for steaks. Unfortunately, neither me nor my husband were impressed. I have ordered a medium cooked fillet and actually they brought medium well, therefore it was quite dry. My husband's steak was really thin and also extremely fatty, so half of the portion was left in the plate as it was only fat. Just an observation: really poor dessert menu as for Italian restaurant.Despite this we enjoyed the starters: beef tartare with gorgonzola and pasta with fassona ragu. Overall, there are so much better places for steak lovers.
417: Review: In questo locale la carne è veramente di ottima qualità.....Fiorentina e Costata di grandissimo livello. Il personale è molto gentile e professionale. L'ambiente simpatico. Peccato per il caldo.....ma d'altra parte in questi giorni il calore è veramente da record per Londra.Unica osservazione.....forse il prezzo è un pò troppo alto.....però alla fine siamo usciti tutti soddisfatti
418: Review: We were served by Walter who was a delight to talk to, giving us a brief history of the restaurant and its beginnings in Italy.We shared a t bone steak, which has to be one the best if not the best we have tasted.Certainly to be recommended.Thank you for a great night.
419: Review: An interesting place, with its own “butchery” at the entrance with some fantastic looking beef. We were there on a very hot evening. They couldn’t find our booking, even though it was confirmed but nevertheless, we got a high table near the “butcher”, sitting on high stools, which were not very comfortable. The starters were a mixed bunch, but particularly disappointing, given the price, was the steak tartare. It was nice and fresh but lacked flavour and probably needed more seasoning. The rib of steak main course was cooked perfectly and very enjoyable. There is a pretty good wine list, but I was surprised that the red wine brought to us had not been chilled and was very warm. It was so warm that I am sure it had not been kept in a wine fridge at all. Service was good and friendly.
420: Title: Hot in London but cool restaurant

Review: Family night out for our last night in London. Two of us are massive steak eaters and one s but reluctant  unless cooked to perfection. The steaks were fabulous, the wine choices excellent and the staff attentive and really on the case. 
Highly recommend.
421: Title: The best beef in London!

Review: The steak was out of this world!! I ordered a fillet. It was tender and perfectly prepared. I accompanied my steak with the fennel salad and fries. The tables are butcher block and the waitress comes out and stabs the table with your steak knife just before your steak arrives. The waitress was extremely knowledgeable and told me all about how the cows are raised in Northern Italy. You must order everything a la carte so it can get a little expensive. To me, it was worth it! You might miss the restaurant when you are walking by because it looks like a butcher shop. DO NOT hesitate to eat here if you love great steak!
422: Title: Excellent authentic steak place in South Kensington

Review: We came across this after visiting the NHM in South Ken last Friday. Ordered some ham for starter and steak - the latter was medium rare - perfect in texture & seasoning. Service was friendly as well, highly recommended!
423: Review: What took me so long?? This was my 7th Wimbledon in South Kensington, which I believe corresponds to how long Macellaio has been in business...maybe it opened my 2nd year. Either way, I've walked by it 100 times. It's hard to see what the restaurant is like from the sidewalk; the front room is the retail meat shop. But it's worth going in if you enjoy beef. I had the meatballs app, which actually was interesting but just ok (I wish there had been more sauce, it seemed good and had flakes of chocolate). But the carpaccio was fantastic (unusally thick slices) and the rump roast with the gorgonzola and walnut on the side...Wow, that cheese was more like cheese-butter!! Not a huge portion but very very tasty, and reasonably priced (other cuts, ordered by the size, cost $$). Even the chianti was great. Best of all was all the info and background on their special beef -- and the very detailed, multi-step drying process -- from the waiter, Mauro. A young man, he is very new but was helpful and knew all about the special beef. I will have to return!
424: Review: Tutto buono ma ritengo che i prezzi siano eccessivi e che si possa trovare di meglio in zona. Non lo suggerisco. Locale rumoroso e servizio quasi da fast food.
425: Title: molto buono, prezzo nella media

Review: siamo stati due sere fa a cena in questo posto. piccolo ma molto carino, molto simpatici i camerieri e proprietari, italiani. carne molto buona, sia il filetto che la costata. Anche patate al forno deliziose. ci tornerò.
426: Review: This was a first visit here and we went with another couple of friends for an early evening sitting before the Royal Albert Hall.On the outside, it all looks like an unremarkable butchers shop. Well unremarkable except for the settee outside!The seating is at the back of the building and is a very cool, bit rough and ready dining area. The staff are all extremely friendly, professional and helpful, especially when deciding upon which cut to have. The wine was delicious and when our steak arrived, just wow! Beautifully cooked and very bit tasted amazing! I recommend this place to anyone who enjoys a very good quality steak at a not too ridiculous price!
427: Review: Cena fantastica, cibo eccellente e servizio di prima classe. Consigliato a tutti gli amanti della carne e del cibo italiano. Accoglienza perfetta. Ci rivedremo molto presto. -I Genovesi
428: Title: Discreta la qualita' del cibo ma non ci tornero'. C'e di meglio!

Review: Siamo stati venerdi sera presso il Macellaio di South Kensington.Discreta la qualita'' del cibo.Il locale e' piccolo, l'ambiente era molto caldo seppur il condizionatore ( a mio parere datato e non in manutenzione), fosse al massimo della potenza a detta del cameriere, e non sufficiente a rinfrescare il locale. Ogni tanto si era costretti ad uscire all'aperto per prendersi una boccata d'aria.L'ambiente e' datato, non molto curato, e, a mio parere, la pulizia dovrebbe essere migliorata da cio' che ho constatato.Unico aspetto positivo la qualita' del cibo anche se aspettatevi porzioni molto scarse sulle portate di carne ( i ns amici sono usciti dal locale non sazi)Il conto e' molto alto rispetto al rapporto qualita', quantita'/prezzo.Considerate che viene applicata di default nel conto la mancia salata per i camerieri..Esperienza nel complesso non piacevole.Sicuramente non ci torneremo
429: Title: We had a memorable dinner!

Review: The meat hanging in the display probably speaks for the restaurant.  We tried beef tartar, think sliced beef before our 1kg t-bone steak. According to our real experience, everything was truly good.
430: Review: Locale piccolo , i filtri dell’aria che non sono puliti da tempo memore ! Aria condizionata poco funzionante! Cibo mediocre ! Bevande calde ! L’unica cosa forse la Fiorentina!
431:
Review: Fantastic service , stuff really friendly and really good quality of food!! 
However we went there for the second time we found it little bit over-priced.
432: Title: Incredible Italian beef and charcuterie

Review: Dining alone on a workday can be a challenge. i chose to return to M_RC simply because I wanted steak perfection in a very relaxed setting. Since it's a busy weekend there wasn't a regular table, but there was a little hidden, private single table directly across from the meat cooler and prep station where one can watch all-things-meat being created. A simple dinner of wine, a starter and some beef was my focus - and relaxing service. I was not disappointed.The prosciutto and burrata were amazing, as was the generous 621gm costata - done very rare. A Barolo to pair with the wonderfully Italian meat was Mauro's suggestion - and paired perfectly. This young man knows service; can read his clients; understands wine, and; is a genuinely good representative of Macellaio RC South Ken.
433: Review: We booked a table just a couple of hours before, and usually it’s quite impossible find a table.... plus this time we had a baby with the stroller.But everything was perfect as usual, food is amazing, fresh and a superior quality.Macellaio is always the best choice if you would like a steak!This time our waiter was Vincenzo, he was super professional, friendly and he gave us a lot of suggestions about the wine or the food.We skipped dessert, because we were stuffed..... but they are amazing too!Thanks
434: Review: Un grandeIl cibo non sono riuscito a provarlo dalla televisione..:)))Ma ho visto classe ho visto passione e professionalitàMa soprattutto rispetto per lo staffEd infine la classe dividendo il premio con la ragazza dell altro ristorante che ha coraggio da vendere ad aprire un ristorante a BrixtonContinua cosìUn rapallino che ha vissuto a Londra 18 anniDi qui 12 a south Kensington Ciao
435: Review: Macellaio RC is one of our favourite restaurants. This time we were celebrating my fiancé birthday with our friends. The quality of the meat is always perfect. And also the service is always good and friendly, this time we've been served by Vincenzo. We all left very happy and satisfied.Thank you for another splendid dinner at Macellaio, see you next time!
436: Review: Απλό και ποιοτικό . Βρεθήκαμε μεσημερι μας το είχαν συστήσει και τελικά δικαιωθήκαμε . Ιταλική κουζίνα πολυ καλα εκτελεσμένη
437: Review: Ho provato due tipi di tartare, e una Hanger steak che non avevo mai assaggiato. Il tutto consigliato da Alessandro che ha spiegato alla perfezione il taglio di carne e il tipo di cottura. Ottimo sia il cibo che il servizio
438: Review: Sono venuta con un gruppo di amici per una cena infrasettimanale. Abbiamo mangiato antipasti e secondi di carne molto buoni. La Fiorentina è stata come averla mangiata in Toscana. I dolci fantastici! Consigliamo il lardo e la apple cake! Servizio top di Alessandro!! Super consigliato!
439: Review: What a great place !!!i love this place !food and atmosphere is unbelievable we will sure come back! Thank you all!
440: Review: Dropped in without a reservation on a Monday night and was lucky to get a table. Had a ribeye (700g!) and carafe of very nice barbera, with fries and broccoli. Perfectly cooked and served (sliced, exposing perfect pink medium centre). No complaints on the service either - fun and unstuffy. Well worth a visit.
441: Title: Absolutely amazing food and restaurant. Would highly recommend and visit again.

Review: I made a reservation in advance but upon arrival there was only 1 other party of four in there but it did pick up by 2pm. Me and my partners both had steak (although it does not say on the menu that the minimum cut you can have is 700g) with rocket and chips and the food was delightful.Not a lot nearby though by way of other bars. Would highly recommend.
442: Review: Nice environment and very good service, however the t-bone is slightly overpriced. I perfectly understand the business rates are high in London but I guess the restaurant has good margins anyway on both wine and the famous steak. I will probably go back for a dinner but will need to be ready to spend.
443: Review: Steak tartare was really nice. Sides came 10 mins before mains. Waitress was informed who apologised and said they were busy. Once the steak did arrive the order was wrong which we didn't mind as didn't want to make a fuss. The base steak (sirloin, rump and ribeye) were cut too thin. The larger cuts were not of the same value for money as hawksmoor, gaucho or guinea and surprisingly just as expensive?? Waitress did try offer a complimentary bottle of wine which was a nice but irrelevant gesture.
444: Review: From Alexander’s knowledge of the menu and suggestions, we shared a filling charcuterie and rib eye dish. The steak is brought to you before cooking for approval and comes back cooked to perfection. Definitely would recommend this unpretentious Italian steakhouse in South Kensington with any visit. We will definitely be back.
445: Review: Appena rientrato pochi giorni fa da Londra con la Famiglia ...assolutamente ve lo raccomando per chi ama la carne di ottima qualità Frisona Piemontese..quindi si parla di carne e sughi strepitosi..un isola felice per chi come ama la cucina Italiana e non vuole compromessi...vi consiglio tutto dall'antipasto con degli affettati strepitosi ai primi piatti con dei sughi fantastici a base di carne...e poi una bella bisteccona oppure carne cruda preparata nelle varie Ricette Piemontesi ect...dal Fantastico e Cordiale personale Italiano un saluto al bravo Alessandro ti facciamo tanti auguri a Te e ai tanti Colleghi...qui é una Fantastica vetrina della nostra Magnifica Italianità. Complimenti alla prossima !
446: Title: Great Steak Restaurant in South Kensington

Review: Excellent beef from Italy. Had the Fiorintina steak with some friends. It was excellent. The equivalent of the steak tartare with gorgonzola melted on top is quite special as well. I would recommend going for dinner.
447: Review: We were staying at the Kensington Hotel and happened to pass by this restaurant. The window display of huge cuts of meat caught our eye, and we decided to try it for dinner. Oh my... We were asked to pick our steak, cut, and size. They cut it right in front of us.We ordered the tartare, and it was magnificent. I am rather a carnivore, so despite disapproving looks from other customers, I chewed the porterhouse bones clean. LOL!! Delicious! A good bottle of wine made the night memorable.This food was so good we went back the very next night. The manager must have recognized my carnivorous self, because they sent over a trio of tartare, gratis!
448:
Review: if you love meat that's the right place,
been there with friends, fantastic steaks!, good Italian wine and good time.

recommended.
449: Title: All you can meat in London

Review: Nice atmosphere, caring and professional staff. I had bone marrow, so good that can compete with that you can find in fine restaurants in France.High quality meat, the filet was awesome. Only low, i would have loved to drink the Nebbiolo, which was on the wine menu. The Cabernet Franc was a valuable alternative. I will surely come back on my next trip to London.
450: Review: Great night and great wines in south ken at macellaio. Best fiorentina in town with a long list of great Italian wines. Amazing service from Alessandro and Marcello and all of the crew. Highly recommended.
451:
Review: We have an amazing night and learn a lot about the meet with Vincenzo! 
Thanks for an amazing night! We will definitely come back soon :)
452: Review: We had a fabulous dining experience at this authentic Italian 5 stars quality restaurant. The meat was succulent and the cheesecake soft as a cloud but the best part of the night was VINCENZO! He was fun, enthusiastic, welcoming and explained us a lot of things about meat with love and pleasure! Thank you! Recommended to everyone
453: Review: We stumbled upon this little gem and had a wonderful experience this evening! Vincenzo was super friendly and extremely helpful! He guided us through the menu and we’ll definitely make it our regular local restaurant! To start with, the bone marrow was to die for. Mouthwatering. Both recommended cuts from him were perfect, too. Til next time.
454: Review: Sono stato a cena in questo locale ieri sera consigliato da amici. Posso soltanto dire che la qualità della carne provata (cuore, battuta e costata) è risultata favolosa, qualità e cottura impareggiabili. Il servizio eccellente così come il locale piccolo e accogliente. Il personale è molto preparato e competente. Anche i contorni e i dolci erano super!Consigliatissimo!!!!!!!Andrea
455: Title: One of the best steaks ever

Review: The day before having dinner at this place, my boyfriend and I were in Florence and left it still craving a good steak. Imagine our surprise when we've actually had one of the best experiences ever with the Fiorentina here in London! We recommend this place without hesitation. And thank you Vincenzo for the amazing treatment, we felt at home.
456: Review: Absolutely the best steak you can eat in London. Not easy to find a table but definitely worth waiting!
457:
Review: We came here to have dinner with friends, the food was really nice amazing steak and Vincenzo was very helpful and polite, best service I had for years!

Congrats!
458: Review: Viandes de très grande qualité. Un pur délice ! Entrées, plats, desserts 100% top qualité et cerise sur la gateau une carte des vins énorme et fort belle ! Je recommande les yeux fermés et la bouche ouverte !
459: Review: Ristorante di altissima qualità, dall'ambientazione caratteristica all'arredamento. Il personale è attento e molto competente, i salumi sembrano arrivati freschi direttamente da una norcineria e le carni sono tenere e succulente. Ci tornerò alla prima occasione.
460: Review: I was staying just down the road and this place had come highly recommended. Called to see if they had a table for one and they managed to squeeze me in. I am so glad they did. The food is amazing. Probably one of the best steaks I’ve had in a long time! Highly recommend
461: Review: A true gem in London. Wonderful service, stunning food and wine. An absolute must try. We ordered a large T-bone steak and it was cooked to perfection. My husband likes it more rare while I like my steak medium plus. We have received steak with both sides of the bone exactly how we liked it. Thank you. We will be back!
462: Title: Carne top vicino Hyde Park

Review: Non adatto ai vegetariani già dall'ingresso dove sono in bella mostra interi carrè di costate e fiorentine quasi nere per le sette settimane di frollatura che le rendono tenere come burro e succulente. Taglio minimo 600g.che è possibile condividere insieme alle ottime patate fritte o al forno. Vini e dolci di alto livello, mentre per la birra non c'è scelta se non tra Menabrea e Peroni. Il costo al kg è alto, circa il doppio che a Firenze ma una serata il posto la merita.
463: Review: Firstly you do not have to be hungry to eat there because once you start it is very difficult to stop. You have to be a carnivore to eat there and the choice of meat is just so mouth watering but I knew what I wanted. All of it looked and am sure is superb-I had the liver to start which was so delicious I ordered another portion. To follow a filet steak cooked to perfection I am not going to tell you in what style my taste buds directed me but it's just the way the Chef(s) prepared it. I also had chunky chips and spinach with garlic. No desert because I had mine earlier in the day.Now to the crew-Paola (The Best) in a long time runs the ship with precision, Ratona and Mauro assisted and were ever so attentive. I cannot forget Patrizia and Ilaria as they were meters and greeters and it was great to be welcomed with such style. Although I never met Francesco and Daniel as they were in charge of the bar I am sure if I wanted wine they would have offered useful advice.Finally, although this is fine dining it is not an arm and leg job it is just perfect.Thank you I will return and hope they remember me! Perfecto in every sense of the the word.
464: Review: What a surprise... This restaurant, while unassuming from the outside, turned out to have the best steak I have ever had in England.. Featuring rare and uniquely bred Italian cattle, the meat was robustly flavorful and tender... Not cheap 6.8 English pounds per 100 gram wgt. (recommended 600 grams for two), the result was outstanding.... Give it a try, you won't be disappointed.. Ask for Paola, she's the best. PS. Entire staff is Italian.. Chow.!!!
465: Title: One of the best steaks I’ve ever had!

Review: Now I like to think I know a good steak. I am American and from California so we have some very nice restaurants catering to amazing steaks. We got the T-bone and split it and it was fantastic! Probably a top 3 steak that I’ve ever had! Service was great, the set up of the restaurant was very cool! Definitely a little speedy but well worth it! If you’re in London check this place out!
466: Title: Ottima accoglienza, ottimo servizio,ottima carne

Review: Sono stata ieri in questo ristorante con mio marito e mio cugino.Sono stati gentilissimi, molto attenti alle nostre richieste,disponibili a condividere scelte e opinioniCarne perfetta , cottura come richiesta .Grazie ottima esperienza
467: Review: Il ristorante è’ molto caratteristico, il cibo ottimo , la costata piatto forte, per non parlare della tartare, il personale molto cortese e preparato. Da ripetere complimenti!!!
468: Review: This is real gem of South Kensington. Looks like a butchers shop from outside, but when you enter, and if you're lucky to get a seat (if you have no reservation), you'll realize how lucky you were. You'll be delightful with fresh, outstanding Italian food prepared on a spot, butcher's station at the entrance, where you can also select your cut of aged beef that will be prepared to perfection. Selection of wines is excellent. You'll enjoy friendly, cozy, relaxed atmosphere from the entrance. Shall I mention Patricia, so lovely girl from Sicilia that made us feeling like being home. Every visit, every dinner was unforgettable. Thank you!
469: Review: Spinti dalla curiosità dopo la puntata di 4ristoranti, siamo venuti a mangiare qui e siamo rimasti piacevolmente colpiti da tutto. Tagliere di affettati buono, tartare magnifica. La carne è tenera e cucinata a regola d’arte. Prezzi alti ma onesti per la qualità dei piatti.
470: Review: nice concept, at the entrance, fridge that exposes meat excellent quality that makes you immediately understand what you have to eat. I have  the “tagliata “,accompanied by excellent red  wine reccomended by the waiter. I'll definitely come back
471: Review: Siamo al top della carne. Ci siamo trovati per caso dinanzi a questa macelleria girovagando per Kensington e cercando un pub londinese. E invece non abbiamo resistito all’impronta italiana( non c’è niente da fare... noi non ci integriamo) ed abbiamo mangiato due filetti da ca 200 gr. divini : io con purea e olio d’oliva e mio marito con patate fritte rigorosamente tagliate a mano. Sapori unici ben definiti senza salse poco sale come piace a me. Mezzo litro di Merlot e una porzione di torta al cioccolato ( una caprese in Italia) che era fantastica. Il conto 84 pounds alto decisamente ma quando mangi bene sai che è ben speso.
472: Review: Lunch med kanin och lite kallskuret som dom bjöd på. Här skall man äta kött. Lite tråkig inredning dock.
473: Review: Saturday dinner at this cozy Italian restaurant.This kind of restaurants is very common in the North of Italy, I was surprised to see the same “format” here - although here we have the “fancy and more expensive London version”, but hey, that’s what you get if you want to eat good-quality meat in London! I called on Thursday to book a table, hence no problems concerning the reservation. We ordered a really delicious battuta - I must say I ordered it because I saw how they treated raw meat, and I already tried their meat which is really good quality. Then we had a costata that we shared. We also had a bottle of red Merlot (okay; but not the best I ever had), water and some bread (focaccia was fantastic). Can’t say it was a cheap dinner but the meat is extremely good, service is friendly and polite and overall we had a very nice dinner.
474: Review: Ottima bistecca. Sia per la qualità della carne sia per la cottura. Croccante fuori e morbida dentro.Consiglio anche la loro torta di mele.Bella l'idea del bancone da macellaio dove puoi vedere che tagliano la tua bistecca e la mandano in cucina.Porzioni molto piccole. Immagino per contenere i prezzi. Si sa che a Londra costa tutto molto caro.
475: Review: Antipasto misto con tartare e vari affettati ottimo e fresco. Personale simpatico e ospitale. Cena ottima
476: Review: I am sorry the only downsize I could found was the service. Behaving as they were working in a low end restaurant. Food is very good.
477: Review: obsessive steak lovers restaurant.....with special steaks (we shared a rare and huge delicious one!) from a single Italian breed. Absolutely delicious and well explained by knowledgeable and friendly waiting staff.
478:
Review: Fantastic meal great service. 

Great venue and the steaks are to die for .
Staff are friendly and helpful advising you of the dishes and wine selection .
479: Title: Very good. Really top class meat resturant.

Review: We went there for dinner with our 15 year old daughter. Just a walk-in, No reservation, resturant was fully booked, but they kindly sorted a table for the three of us. Carpaccio was delicious for starter, as was the skirt steak and rump steak for main course. Veggies and chips as sides. Also very tastefully. We were recommended a wine that did well with the meat. I really recommend a visit! We will come back!!!Thanks!!!
480: Title: Uma carne saborosíssima em plena Londres por um preço bem legal

Review: Eu e a minha esposa ficamos impressionados pela qualidade da carne e plo serviço impecável da casa . Escolhemos uma bisteca temperada apenas com sal grosso acompanhada de batatas e espinafre . Se estiver perto de Kesington e quiser comer uma ótima carne a um bom preço eu recomendo a visita ao Macellaio
481: Title: La viande oui, les reste non

Review: Restaurant à la bonne franquette et sans chichi. La viande est magnifique, gouteuse et très tendre. Mais les accompagnements étaient ratés, des frites pas assez cuites, de fenouil très fade et le choix du vin un peu restreint.
482: Title: Good food but probably a touch overpriced

Review: Ate midweek with a couple of friends as it was right opposite one of my pal’s flat.+ liver was cracking; really fresh and tasty. + shared 1.1kg t-bone with a mate and whilst tasty, it left us both wanting more. + red cabbage salad was beautiful accompaniment to the beef.+ wine list was extensive and the chianti was offered at a decent price. - little cramped and awkward for space on entry. - there wasn’t much broccoli in the side dish. Nice taste and cooked with a bite but really not enough for the price. Will definitely recommend but I’d advise to choose ask more questions of the staff than we did to check you’re ordering enough.
483: Title: Un ottimo tempio per carnivori

Review: Gran ristorante di carne. La Fiorentina di più di 1kg, frollata per 7 settimane, giustifica già da sola il conto, non economico. Ottimi anche la lingua con bagnetto verde, il cuore a straccetti e la battuta di fassona piemontese. Buonissimo anche il dessert, di fatto una panna cotta al basilico. Carta dei vini buona ma non vastissima. Per la verità, abbastanza giusta per un tempio dei carnivori. Servizio attento e molto simpatico. Gradevole la musica in sottofondo e bello l’arredamento del locale, in parte anche negozio di macelleria di alta qualità. Ci torneremo.
484: Title: Good Food but a little pricey & service wasn't great

Review: We came here on a Weekend as a party of 4, managed to book a table fine and without any issues. Arrived at our booking time, we were seated straight away on a little table upstairs. Our Waiter was friendly but a little off, we dont think he was too fond of us. We tried to order a particular bottle of Red, Waiter returned saying the one we ordered was out of stock but tried to offer us several pricier alternatives (about £12 - 15 more expensive that the one we originally chose). We didn't want to spend that much on Wine so it was a little tricky trying to find a nice bottle within the price range we were trying to keep to.We eventually found a different bottle of Red and ordered some water for the table too, Wine arrived in good time. The water never arrived and we had to ask 3 times until it eventually arrived.We ordered some Carpaccio to start with Bread & Oil which was lovely, we ordered our mains one of the party tried to order a steak medium/well which didn't go down too well with the waiter and he shot him a look of death! The Waiter convinced the person in our party to settle with Medium as opposed to Medium/Well which he actually preferred. The service was okay I wouldn't say it was particularly friendly or welcoming, we didn't feel too comfortable asking the waiter for advice or getting his attention to order as we didn't get a great vibe from him unfortunately.Meal was a good one but a little pricey! We were also charged £23 service charge which is a pet hate of mine as it is always so awkward to ask for it to be removed. I think £23 to serve a table of 4 is also a extreme price wise. We would of happily left a tip as we always do but I think this is a little expensive for the service we received.
485: Title: Probably the best steak I have had. Expensive and very popular place

Review: Very popular place so book early.Great choice of meats, brought to your table to select your cut. Complemented by an extensive wine listCrowded but a good atmosphere.Not recommended for vegetarians.Knowledgeable staff with good recommendations.Expensive but worth it if you like good meat and wine.
486: Review: It took a long time before being able to get a reservation at Macellaio in South Kensington. In the restaurant there was not ambiance, lighting was bad, decor even worse, restaurant itself was very dull as the staff. Food matter it was nothing special, small portion and very expensive, we spent not more than an hour because was not pleasurable to be there. I am still wondering why is so difficult to get a table for such mediocre place. In the nutshell I do not recommend this restaurant.
487: Review: Domenica scorsa abbiamo provato questo ristorante italiano, convinti dalle ottime recensioni lette, nel bellissimo quartiere di South Kensington.È stata sicuramente un’esperienza positiva, ad iniziare dalla cordialità, dall’accoglienza e dalla professionalità del personale di sala, preparato e attento.Abbiamo iniziato il nostro pranzo domenicale con degli assaggini e questa, devo dire, è stata una delle note stonate: due micro fettine di bruschette con lardo e noci (a parte la modestissima pezzatura, il pane non era bruschettato correttamente, risultando troppo duro) e 3 fili di peperone arrostito con un piccolo ripieno di tonno (bella l’idea e la presentazione nel barattolo, ma esageratamente esigua la quantità, nonostante si trattasse, appunto, di assaggi). Queste sono solitamente le quantità degli « amuse-bouches ».Abbiamo poi gustato un ottimo fegato su pure di cipolle arrostite come antipasto, due primi, ravioli al tocco e trenette al pesto genovese. I primi piatti erano molto buoni, ottimi il ragù di Fassona ed il pesto con i tipici fagiolini e patate, peccato solo che non abbiano usato acqua salata per cuocere la pasta e quella piccola mancanza di sapidità non mi permette di dire che fossero eccellenti.Ciò che è stato superlativo è l’hanger steak! Un piatto senza dubbio perfetto, dalla concezione, alla preparazione, alla presentazione, alla degustazione.Molto buona anche la fresca insalatina di finocchi profumati all’arancia.La piccola torta di mele non ha entusiasmato, forse accompagnata da una crema liquida o altro dress avrebbe più appeal.Buona la carta dei vini. Eccellente il caffè! Buon rapporto qualità / prezzo.È sicuramente un ottimo ristorante dove torneremo e che consigliamo.
488: Title: 美味しいステーキの店
Review: サウスケンジントン駅から徒歩5分にあるイタリアンステーキハウス。ステーキの他、日本では食べる機会が減っている生肉もあり、カルパッチョやタルタルなどが食べられる。ステーキはリブアイが一押しだが、サーロインやTボーン等もありどれも非常に美味しい。イタリアンだけあってパスタもあり、こちらもお勧めだがパスタはやや量が少ないかも。何回行っても飽きない良い店。店員の対応も○。
489: Review: Been here twice on date night with my husband, who is Italian. Maybe he gets special treatment) But I didn't notice anything to complain about. The food was excellent, treatment attentive, staff nice, overall magic evenings. Both time we stayed until closing and nobody pressured us to leave, we even managed to order more desserts. Maybe British people can find Italian ways rude in some ways, but for me it only adds to the experience, feels very homie and at the same time high class. People complaining about smells - didn't feel any, except good aroma of good meat :) And, well, look at the name.. Interior is great, wine was excellent and served with appropriate glasses. Thank you for the experience and will definitely come again!
490: Review: Il 26 febbraio 2018, durante un viaggio di piacere, ho cenato qui con la mia famiglia e con quella degli amici con cui eravamo in vacanza. Il personale è stato molto cortese, soprattutto considerando che eravamo solo 4 adulti e 6 tra ragazzi e bambini. Ottimi i tagli di carne e altrettanto ottima la cottura. Molto buono il Barbera d'Alba. Prezzo: nella media di Londra.
491: Title: Ottima cena pre Champions Juve 🍀😊
Review: Come da Recensioni, il personale è professionale e gentilissimo, la qualità del carne e vino è eccellente, ottimo anche il dolce e caffè ☕️ alla prossima
492: Review: Un endroit vivant où il fait bon se retrouver pour se vider du stress quotidien. Ici la joie de vivre l’emporte sur les règles rigides de la société. Une ambiance brasserie où on trouve une cuisine traditionnelle. La spécialité de la maison est la viande et on en a pour son argent. Pour un établissement londonien les tarifs sont correctes et le choix de viande est important. Service souriant et plats délicieux. Je vous invite à découvrir!
493: Review: This is a recent find for us... but have already been twice this week!It is all about the meat - you can even have testicles if you feel like it - we declined! Probably not s good place to bring your Vegan friends to - although the spinach and mash potatoes were delicious! It was the hint of nutmeg in the potatoes that made them so morish! Service is really friendly and efficient and the host treats you like a long lost friend.I cannot resist the Rump with gorgonzola and walnuts - but the smoked Hanger Steak is very mouthwatering!!It is all a bit of a show... steak knives thrust into the table in front of you and the glass dome lifted of the steak to release the delicious smell of smoke!If you have enough room.. the Tiramisu is irresistible!
494: Review: Personale e Titolare gentilissimi,Bel locale, ingresso originale con carne esposta in vetrina,Antipasti ottimi, La costata una meraviglia, consigliato a occhi chiusi, sicuramente ci ritorno al prossimo soggiorno... top
495: Review: Io e mia moglie viviamo a Londra da oramai 4 anni e sono 4 anni che quando abbiamo voglia di farci una bella mangiata e bevuta in coppia o con amici per assottigliare la mancanza del buon cibo del nostro bel paese veniamo qui!!! Il servizio è buono il vino e fantastico e il cibo ancor di più!!! Noi siamo carnivori a livelli estremi e scegliamo sempre la tartare di fassona come starter e la Fiorentina come main!!! Abbiamo provato molte altre cose nel menu nelle nostre diverse visite e in tutta onesta tutto è fantastico!!!! Tenetevi un po’ di spazio alla fine per il tiramisù!!! (e se lo dice un veneto potete fidarvi).
496: Review: I walked by this restaurant and never really thought of walking in. I am not sure if it was because of the meat hanging in the window or the leather sofa in front of the restaurant, that looks more like something from the red-light district in Amsterdam.When we did finally come in, it was a surprise after a surprise! Fantastic helpful and friendly staff, great food (mostly meat and a few pasta dishes) and a superb wine list. The steak tartare was the best I have EVER had!! Also, the place (which is a Italian steakhouse) was full of natives (Italians)... which is always a good sign! Highly recommended to all meat lovers!!!!
497: Title: Très bonne Viande mais L'addition monte vite.

Review: Il est préférable de réserver pour de restaurant. Nous sommes arrivés et avons du revenir 30min plus tard. Un grand canapé est a l'extérieur pour faire patienter.Le service est bien, par contre pas possible d'avoir une cuison bleu pour toutes les viandes. La viande est excellente mais quand on rajoute les accompagnement, l'entrée et surtout le service qui n'est pas compris donc 12% à rajouter à L'addition.
498: Review: Sono stato a cena in coppia in questo locale, essendo un ristoratore, avevo molta curiosità di vedere un locale visitato da Borghese, mi è subito venuto il dubbio che non fosse la sede dove è stata girata la puntata, perché il locale è molto piccolo.Quindi ho chiesto alla cameriera che mi ha risposto invece che era proprio quello, rimanendo un po’ perplesso ho riguardato la puntata e avevo ragione io è tutto un altro locale, non ho ben capito perché invece la ragazza mi ha puntualizzato che forse in tv mi era sembrato più grande! Boh!Comunque passiamo alla sostanza, ho mangiato bene non posso dire altrimenti, la battuta col gorgonzolaMolto saporita, filetto buono, anche se leggermente più cotto di quello che avevo chiesto io! I dolci buoni ma forse un po’ piccolini! Il prezzo è sicuramente rilevante 110pound in 2 : 1 stracciatella, una battuta, 2 filetti 2 dolci e un acqua! Noi avevamo prenotato e arrivando 10 minuti prima la ragazza ci ha chiesto se nell’attesa poteva offrirci da bere, forse ho capito male l’offerta visto che lo spritz è stato messo in conto! Comunque diciamo che ci ritornerei appuntanti quell’ora piccolo difetto da migliorare! (Ps forse troppo spettacolarizzazione nella presentazione con la cloche che poi viene sbattuta con l’altra!)
499: Review: We managed to have a table last minute in this busy place. Great service and good food ! We'll be back !
500: Title: Not sure why there is so much hype about this restaurant

Review: This restaurant has meet hanging on the outside and when you enter you are welcome by a butcher counter. This kind of decor may not be to everyone liking. However the service in this restaurant is good. The staff were friendly and helpful. No complaints there.The food however was average or even below average. I was hoping for a very savoury matured meat taste when I ordered the 600 grams of ribeye steak. First of all, there was a huge chunk of rib bone that took up at least a third of the meat weight. Then there is a think skin too that cannot be eaten. So I think out of the 600 grams only about 300 grams are actually edible. The taste was so bland. The wine selection was good though. Oh also I had the beef tartar on bone marrow. Now that one was excellent.
501:
Review: I have been here twice and both visits were amazing great staff and awesome food. Thanks to all the team for a great evening.
Do not miss it!!
502: Review: Sono stato qui per pranzo e ho preso come antipasto una bruschetta al lardo e noci molto saporita ma non pesante, poi una rump steak molto saporita ma non tenerissima accompagnata da patate al forno! Abbiamo concluso con dei dolci squisiti, su tutti cheesecake e torta di mele! Il servizio è ottimo, così come la location! I prezzi sono alti ma in linea con gli standard Londinesi e di zona!
503: Review: ステーキを注文しました！フィレが美味しかったです。また友人の頼んだパスタもちょっと頂きましたがこれも美味しかった。リピートしたいです。
504: Review: The service was outstanding and we were instantly made to feel at home. I had the beef fillet, which was cooked perfectly and with great flavour, while my wife's pasta was fresh. The serving sizes were not massive but more than enough for us to be very satisfied and need a walk afterwards! That walk may also have been prompted by the desserts, which ended the meal very well. I can still taste the tiramisu... it is good value for money.
505: Review: Ho cenato dal Macellaio insieme a qualche amica e devo dire ristorante caldo, pulito e accogliente, personale gentilissimo, carne ottima, una lista dei vini infinita. Il prezzo assolutamente in linea per quello che abbiamo mangiato e bevuto (pensavo molto più salato). Consiglio vivamente! E spero di tornarci presto.
506: Review: The 'shop' window is a clue; it's a view into a refrigerator that is full of pieces of beef, including well-hung ribs of all sizes. Our main course was a no-brainer; we shared a rib of beef, cooked to perfection. For starters we shared an platter of mixed Italian cold meats, with crusty bread and olive oil. Simple, but tasty and excellent.  The wine list was all-Italian if I recall correctly, with many serious and pricey reds. We found an excellent Primitivo at a reasonable price for a restaurant in Brompton Road.  The service was attentive and friendly.  All in all, a most enjoyable leisurely lunchtime experience with old friends. We will definitely be coming back for more of the same.
507: Review: Un angolo di italianità con proposte di carne pizze e focaccia di recco.Ambiente informale in tema di macelleria con tavoli in legno a vista.Il sevizio è risultato molto molto lento e le pietanze erano di quantità modeste.Buona la qualità.
508: Review: Ci siamo recati in questo ristorante avendo visto il programma "4 ristoranti ". Location bellissima con luci soffuse. Servizio ottimo e la qualità del cibo è molto alta. Abbiamo preso 2 filetti di 200g.
509: Review: As we walked by on Old Brompton Road, we noticed the dry ageing beef in the the shop window... and yes, it made us wet our lips. We walked in and asked for a table and were lucky to be seated accross from the butcher's work space. That man just loves his meat. We asked him to show us the various pieces that were available to us and followed his recommendation of Fiorentina, which turned out to be simply delicious. So, if you are a meatlover, this is a place you'll appreciate. Good quality. Good price.
510:
Review: Finally Macellaio closer to my house, if you area steak lover this is the place
Fantastic ambience, attentive and friendly service with superb dry aged beef
Highly recommended
511: Title: Inizio di una sfida impegnativa!

Review: Ottima carne! Ho mangiato con tre amici una fiorentina di 1,4 kg cucinata alla perfezione! Ottima anche la carta dei vini italiani ovviamente! Il prezzo importante è credo allineato al fatto che si è a Londra in un locale con ottima cucina italiana
512: Review: Non posso che confermare quanto detto nelle recensioni di altri clienti: Carne buonissima e tenerissima. Con una quarantina di sterline abbiamo mangiato due tagliate, una porzione di patatine, un cestino di pane e una bottiglia d’acqua (che contrariamente al resto dei locali di Londra qui fanno pagare perché in bottiglia). Particolare il servizio con il coltello infilzato sul tavolo. Consigliato
513: Title: viande tres bonne mais etre chronometre pour manger n`est pas acceptable

Review: La viande est effectivement de tres bonne qualite. Mais il n`est pas acceptable de se faire ejecter de table. Nous n`vons pas pu prendre de dessert ni café. On nous a apporte l`addition et hop dehors !!!!
514: Review: La vera emozione di consumare una bella tagliata in macelleria, ottime le tartare (insaporite con le varie salse) per poi passare alla costata mostrata prima della cottura appena tagliata dal macellaio con un bel bancone a vista. Ottimo anche il menù dei dolci tutti rigorosamente fatti in casa.
515: Title: Un posto dove mangiare ottima carne e non solo!!!

Review: Durante la nostra visita a Londra siamo capitati in questo ristorante tipico italiano, dove abbiamo mangiato dall’antipasto al dolce ed era tutto ottimo! Lo staff gentilissimo ha saputo accompagnarci per tutta la serata.Come secondo consiglio la costata (che prima di cuocere viene mostrata cruda al tavolo) mentre come dessert consiglio il gelato, fatto in casa, buonissimo!!
516: Review: Ci siamo recati in questo rinomato locale con la consapevolezza che i prezzi sono al di sopra della media per una cena a base di ottima carne...e qui confermo che tutte le aspettative non sono state disattese, anche per la qualità e modalità di cottura della Fiorentina da circa un kilo e dell'ottimo filetto...complimenti allo staff cucina, e per il personale di servizio ai tavoli una medaglia, meritatissima, a ribadire che per le 3 stelle ha prevalso la loro gentilezza sulla pochezza del manager, persona elegantissima solo esteriormente!  Posto consigliatissimo a chi digerisce anche le battute infelici
517: Title: Super Fleisch. Sehr zu empfehlen

Review: Durch Zufall haben wir das Macellaio entdeckt. Haben super Fleisch, dry-aged, aus Italien. Wird nach Gewichtswunsch vom großen Stück abgehackt, und nach Wunsch gegrillt (am besten medium rare - man kann es danach immer noch etwas mehr Grillen lassen). Beilagen sind auch sehr lecker, allerdings etwas kleine Portionen. Sehr freundliche und nette Bedienung. Sehr zu empfehlen.
518: Title: La migliore scelte fatta nei ristoranti della City

Review: Ieri sera ho avuto il piacere di cenare in questo fantastico ristorante, come si evince dal nome, ha nella carne il suo cavallo di battaglia, direi che potrebbe tranquillamente averlo anche negli antipasti, nei dolci o nella scelta dei vini, è tutto ottimo. Ho trovato un pezzo di Italia, personale professionale e cortese tutto il cibo è di ottima qualità. Sicuramente sarà una tappa che non mancherà nei miei futuri passaggi a Londra. Lo straconsiglio.
519: Review: very genuine, sweet, charming authentic place. Steak ( and pasta) were both exceptionally good...Very casual dining...We also had a great inexpensive bottle of Valpolicella...We were shocked at how inexpensive the place was. Everyone in the place was having a great time...perhaps the restaurant inspires that in diners!
520: Review: Wir waren für einige Tage in London und per Zufall haben wir dieses Restaurant entdeckt, wir haben für den Abend reserviert und müssen sagen, wir sind nicht enttäuscht worden. Erstklassigen Service und super Steak. Einfach wunderbar, gerne kommen wir wieder.
521: Review: In vacanza a Londra io e il mio compagno abbiamo deciso di venire a provare a mangiare in questo ristorante molto incuriositi perchè lo avevamo visto nel programma “4 ristoranti” di Alessandro Borghese di cui ne è uscito vincitore...nn avevamo prenotato ma il personale gentilissimo ha fatto del tutto per trovarci un posticino...che dire cena ottima posto delizioso e personale eccellente...un ringraziamento al proprietario che quando ha saputo che avevamo visto il programma ci è venuto personalmente a salutare...ci ritorneremo di sicuro!!!
522:
Review: I wouldn’t recommend for a vegan!

This is a meat place and there’s nothing to be afraid even if the employee stabs a knife on the table.

The meat was very good and the service also. A little bit pricey
523: Review: Such a nice place, the food is awesome! Real Italian meat! Our waiter was very kind, just like all the other staff members. And the carmel apple pie... divine! Surely be back again.
524: Review: We visited for our anniversary as a pre Theatre dinner.This place has a lot of charm. From the theatrical butcher shop entrance to the whimsical yet friendly staff. The menu is small but perfect really, we chose the T-bone steak to share with sides of chips and spinach. We also had a charcuterie starter to share and a bottle of wine. The steak was cooked perfectly rare and tasted delicious. My partner is a farmer and v picky with meat but even he commented on it positively.We didn’t need the table for long but we were warned we only had 2hrs. Be wary if you like a place where you can linger..and it is a little on the pricey side.Great food, good honest service and an excellent ambiance. Would recommend!
525: Review: Wir haben per Zufall dieses Restaurant gefunden und ich möchte behaupten, was für die Katholiken ROM ist, ist für den Fleischesser il „macellaio“ das Paradies... zugegeben, wenn es voll ist dann versteht man sein eigenes Wort nicht mehr.Der süße Duft des abgehangen Fleisch macht alles wieder wett. Ich möchte nicht ins Detail gehen...Nur eins... alle die Fleisch lieben, sollen und sogar müssen beim nächsten London Aufenthalt dieses Restaurant besuchen.. Ihr werdet es lieben...
526: Title: Eerlijk, heerlijk, alleen een beetje gehaast

Review: Fantastische belevenis om hier te gaan eten. Leuke ambiance, top eten, goede bediening etc. Alleen je hebt je tafel maar twee uur (geven ze van te voren aan) en na het hoofdgerecht beginnen ze je wel beetje weg te kijken. Maar dit mocht de pret niet drukken en niet overdreven duur.
527: Review: Abbiamo cenato in questo ristorante! Abbiamo prenotato ( sempre cosa consigliata) , e siamo stati davvero bene!!!! Il locale è gestito da italiani ( il proprietario ne ha altri a Londra) e siamo stati davvero bene!!!! Carne sublime, freschezza della materia prima, vino eccellente, e ricca scelta nel menu del cibo! Un complimento particolare va ad ANDREA , il cameriere, che ha saputo consigliarci dall’inizio alla fine della cena, sempre con il sorriso sulle labbra e con estrema gentilezza e cordialità! Sicuramente un’istituzione a Londra da non perdere per nessun motivo!!!! COMPLIMENTI RAGAZZI!!!!
528: Review: Locale molto accogliente e ben arredato, ottimo servizio ma sopratutto grandissima qualità! Là tartare di manzo con il gorgonzola è una prelibatezza, la carne tenera e gustosa! Prezzi giusti per Londra, qui però valgono quel che mangi!consigliatissimo!
529:
Review: Food and wine are excellent, the staffs are funny and entertaining all the night. 
This is not very easy to get there BUT it's worth for the great food and service.
530: Review: My boyfriend an I we’ve been there to try a bit of Italian style just cause we are Italians. We wait for 30 min to go in, we had a table and after we asked for just a bottle of water we waited there for more then 20 mins without receiving any attentions by waitress and manager. A lot of people (3 tables) which arrived after us already order food and wines. We felt like unwelcome because we were the only Italians in that room so we deserved no attention instead French people? After that we decided to wait 5 more min and then we were leaving. Lucky them! One of the floor manager arrived to ask to order wine and food. About food we ordered 5 dishes and all of them were amazing. We spent 140£ and it’s high price that what we were expected (not ya liking about quantity) I was focus on the making of meat and dishes how they looked like. Poor service at all. Please improve it cause people wont coming anymore for that reason.
531: Review: I went there more than once. The quality of the meat is undisputable and the atmosphere is lively and typical of an italian restaurant. In my opinion one of the best place in London where you can have meat although it is little bit too expensive. The only thing I was unhappy with was the fact that sometimes you could be asked to leave because they need the table free for Others clients. Truth be told, they notice it to you in advance but I still think that it is inconceivable for a restaurant of this level. Service is ok.
532: Review: What a great place! The restaurant had a very friendly and welcoming atmosphere with the staff being very attentive and helpful if you were not sure about the drinks or food menu. We got the T-bone steak to share which was a beautiful cut and asked for it rare which it actually was! Beautiful and tender and the wine accompanied it so well. Quite pricey but definitely worth a visit for a special treat.
533: Title: Ottima carne e aria di casa

Review: A Londra si sa è difficile mangiare bene, spinti dalle recensioni positive abbiamo prenotato qui e abbiamo fatto benissimo: la carne era ottima (i fagioli di contorno un po’ meno, forse non è stata una scelta azzeccata) ed essendo un ristorante italiano abbiamo avuto tutte le spiegazioni sui siti di carne in italiano. Il prezzo nella media di Londra (medio/alto). Lo consiglio.
534: Title: Italian charm at its best!

Review: Reception is warm with a smile which is always a nice start. Atmosphere is great and the food is delicious. I have been going to Macellaio since the opening and they always deliver. My favourite dish apart form the T-bone steak is steak tartare (both editions). As for wine, you have plenty of choices but I usually follow their recommendation. Overall service, food and atmosphere are great.
535: Review: Per l'ennesimo viaggio a Londra siamo stati in questo ristorante, incuriosito anche dalla trasmissione tv che lo aveva coinvolto, devo dire che il luogo è molto bello e caratteristico, nonché molto organizzato. Il servizio con ragazzi molto attenti al cliente, e sopratutto il cibo è strepitoso con circolato rosso sulla carne, veramente saporita e ben cotta, ma sopratutto di eccellente qualità. Il conto è rapportato alla qualità del luogo e del cibo, ma sinceramente non ho avuto il benché minimo problema a dargli quei soldi. Strepitoso.
536: Review: Ottimo locale abbiamo cenato per l’ultima sera dell’anno bella atmosfera Andrea ci ha consigliato molto bene il menu, molto competente, gentile e simpatico sa come trattare i clienti, abbiamo mangiato benissimo carne di qualità molto buona la tartar con il gorgonzola fuso con il cannello e il dolce bianco al basilico favolosi ECCELLENTE
537: Review: Durante il nostro soggiorno di capodanno a Londra, complici anche l’aver visto la puntata nella quale il ristorante vince nel programma “4 ristoranti” di Alessandro Borghese e le recensioni positive, decidiamo di prenotare per mangiare un’ottima carne. L’ambiente è molto caratteristico e tutti i piatti sono ben spiegati nel menu. Ho gustato una buonissima bruschetta con del lardo, esattamente come la mangerei in un’osteria del nord Italia, per secondo tagliata succosissima. Qualità davvero al top! E il conto per : 1 antipasto, due tagliate, un bicchiere di vino e l’acqua è stato di circa 60 sterline!  Prezzo incredibile per mangiare così bene a Londra :)
538: Review: Thanks Federica for such a wonderful night. Tasty and delicious! From wine to desert awesome! Casual wear for New Year’s Eve
539: Review: Tienen una carne excepcional. No sabreía decir qué corte me gustó más. El nivel es impresionante. El personal muy atento y agradable.
