540: Review: in questa Londra bellissima ma in cui è quasi impossibile mangiare decentemente il Macellaio ci permette di mangiare bene ma davvero bene con vero gusto italiano.Il locale si presenta come un macelleria organizzato poi a ristorante.Si parla italiano dall'ingresso e già dalla qualità al banco sai che mangerei bene.Carne ovviamente eccelsa(ti tagliano il pezzo e te lo mostrano prima di eseguire la cottura)ma devo dire che ho gradito molto anche le trofie al pesto,cotte al dente(con pesto non commerciale) fino ad i dolci:il tiramisù però ha bisogno del caffè mentre per il dolce genovese latte fritto un applauso è obbligatorio.Veramente ma veramente consigliato
541: Title: Pour les amateurs de viande

Review: Endroit atypique et sympathique. Je recommande le T-bone et le baby chicken. Ils servent également un très bon tiramisu. Par contre nous avons été déçu par notre choix de vin. Les tarifs sont corrects.
542: Review: Great atmosphere where delicious meats are prepared in front of you. Amazing  service by Andrea who helped make all our guests feel right at home. Thank you for a great evening.
543: Title: Terribly off-putting, dirty and expensive!

Review: One could forgive the off-putting smell of meat when entering, as after all this is a butcher shop-cum restaurant. The small "restaurant" at the back of the shop is small, dingy and the food is awful. Poor hygiene masqueraded by fancy techniques of sticky tables aimed to resemble butchers blocks etc. The ravioli sauce tasted as if made with dog food; the tartare was actually fit for a dog, served as it was with no toast, no eggs and little condiments.The visit to the lavatory was no better experience either: dirty, like the rest of the place. At £120 for 3 must have been one of the most expensive bad restaurants we had the misfortune to encounter in a long time!
544: Review: Popped in for dinner and was made to feel welcome despite not having booked. Was told that the table was needed later in the evening, but there was plenty of time before that in any event.We had steak tartare and skirt steak. Both were excellent and would definitely revisit if in the area
545: Review: A rustic atmosphere, sublime meat prepared directly in front of your eyes a wide selection of wines and the perfume of pure Italy that even Tuscany can not make you feel. This is the perfect mix that has pampered us culinaryly throughout the evening, relying on the knowledge and experience of Andrea who has always been able to give the right advice at the right course. It also has cons, the place is not particularly spacious, always convenient to book a few days in advance.
546: Review: For the 3rd time Macellaio RC gave us a very great experience and the food was absolutely delicious. My friends were over the moon for the quality of the meat and the wine list gives you also enough choice to combine a bottle with your food.Absolutely recommended
547: Review: Abbiamo passato una bellissima serata, il cibo veramente buono e il servizio all’altezza. Andrea ci ha consigliato piatti buonissimi ed è stato molto gentile e simpatico. Consigliato a chi vuole mangiare bene a Londra. Qualità top! Tornerò
548: Review: E per la 4a volta in quest' anno ci ritroviamo a cenare al macellaio, che non delude mai; la carne di ottima qualità proveniente da Alba dalla famosa razza fassona.Ottimo servizio, Andrea che ci ha serviti ci ha proposto un bel menu strutturato e molto apprezzato.
549: Review: Ich war mit meiner Tochter die ebenso Fleisch mag auf Empfehlung hier Abendessen. Die Location ist super gemütlich eingerichtet und durch die tolle italienische Betreuung kommt man sich auch wie in Italien vor. Einfach schön.Die Fleischgerichte sind ein Traum und einfach ein MUSS für jeden Fleischliebhaber.Unbedingt vorab reservieren, sonst kriegt man hier keinen Tisch. Meiner Tochter haben sie zum Geburtstag auch einen tollen Schokoladenkuchen mit Zündkerze gebracht worüber sie sich sehr gefreut hat.Danke nochmals an das tolle uns sehr freundliche Team. Wir kommen gerne wieder und wir empfehlen Euch in der Schweiz auf jeden Fall weiter. Grazie di tutto.
550: Review: DeliciousAmazingWorth - every - pennyThe only negative comment I have is I asked for Gluten Free Bread, was given bread and quickly realised it wasn't GF (it tasted too good) although this was replaced, there was no real apology or offer of compensation. Had I not noticed, my evening could have ended a lot worse...however, the rest of the evening and food made up for it - so hence the 4 star ratingCame here with a friend on a cold December night after a long day at work. Left with a full belly and a big smile on my face. My friend ended up getting stuck at work and so was very late for meeting me but the staff didn't make me feel uncomfortable and let me enjoy my gin until she came.We shared the T-Bone steak (800g) and I asked for it Medium Well (no blood) I think the poor waiter nearly died at my request but he handled it graciously and guided us so that we didn't butcher (pardon the pun) the flavour of the meatMy friend is really into wine and due to so much choice, the waiter helped us choose a respectable but rather delicious red (and I don't even like wine!)Nice wee place if you're into meat or even for a (not cheap) date night!
551: Review: Ottima carne,costata al sangue cotta alla perfezione,antipasti eccellenti per non parlare del macellaio "Nico"che mi ha aiutato in tutte le mie scelte!!!Ristorante da consigliare!
552: Title: Confermato: qualità altissima e cortesia!

Review: Siamo tornati qui dopo più di un anno dalla nostra ultima visita e non posso che confermare ciò che avevo pensato la prima volta: ristorante eccezionale, con qualità altissima. Locale rustico, molto "Italian style", personale prontissimo a soddisfare le richieste dei clienti. Un particolare ringraziamento ad Andrea, che è riuscito a convincermi a mangiare il mio filetto "medium done" anziché "well done" come di solito lo mangio io :-)E grazie anche per il consiglio sul dolce: il biancomangiare al basilico è davvero straordinario.Indubbiamente è caro, ma sarebbe folle immaginare quella qualità in zona South Kensington a prezzi inferiori: significherebbe dover sicuramente rinunciare a qualcosa - la qualità della carne, dei vini, della focaccia, del pane, del servizio - e francamente non mi sembra il caso.Mi è solo dispiaciuto non essere riuscita a conoscere il "mitico" Roberto Costa: spero in una prossima volta!
553:
Review: This restaurant is very friendly.
Fassona beef excellence and Federica was amazing with the service at the table, she was very kind and polite. Compliment. I'll come back with my family. See u soon. Kiss
554: Title: Excellent experience at Macellaio RC Kensington

Review: Visited this lovely steak house in Kensington, food was unbelievable and the attention was fenomenal, we were attended by a chap called Cristian, he was well educated in the meats and wines especially. Will definitely be going back asap. Thank you Macellaio and especially Cristian for making our night.
555: Review: È una tappa fissa ogni volta che sono a Londra... qualità della carne buonissima, e staff molto cordiale... la cosa che mi ha colpito di più è la selezione dei vini, eccellenti! Consigliatissimo....
556: Review: Cannot fault this place. The quality of the food and staff is superb. Meat eaters paradise with excellent wine to boot!
557: Title: Great food and great experience

Review: We were looking for a child friendly place around South Kensington and we fancied steak, having had too much pasta already at lunchWe ended up going to the Macellaio and it was brilliant. Steak was the best we’ve had for a while, and there was an element of theatre about it that made the experience great (such as knives stabbed in the wooden tables just like in a film or something) Christian was our host who took great care of us. Rest of the staff were just as friendly. Place is casual yet quite a few notches above the standard casual places. Will definitely be back.
558: Review: An excellent choice for our anniversary! Juicy and tasty meat, great wine choice, superfriendly and caring staff (grazie, Federica!!). We'll definitely be back
559: Review: Piatti ben curati, carne squisita, vino di qualità, personale gentile, non c è nulla da dire..tutto perfetto
560: Review: Ieri ho mangiato in questo ristorante di south Kensington. Posto da raccomandare se si vuole mangiare della buona carne. Sono rimasto molto impressionato dalla lista dei vini, davvero un’ottima selezione che necessiterebbe soltanto di piccolissime integrazioni.Prezzo giusto per la location e il menu. Consigliato anche agli Italiani con un po’ di nostalgia di casa.
561: Review: Every single time is better and better! The meet is very nice, last night we was the last ones to leave and thanks to Chris for he’s recommendations, the dessert was supper good! And thanks for the Free Grappa!.will be back!!!
562: Review: The restaurant is situated in South Kensington. The decor resemble the one from an Italian Macelleria (butcher’s shop). The overall service was average although the several delays. In terms of food, it was good. From an Italian point of view, the meat was of good quality. Two dishes that I would recommend:Battuta all’Albese (starter)Bone marrow (starter)Great choice of Italian wine to pair with the different cuts of meat.
563: Review: Consiglio la Bruschetta con Lardo e la tagliata con i vari condimenti. Come dolce il Latte fritto abbinati a savoiardi con cioccolato e crema pasticciera. Ringrazio Il locale per l’ospitalità e in particolare Andrea per gli ottimi consigli.Senz’altro tornerò qui!
564: Review: Nice piece of beef, great service. Thanks andrea for your lovely meat. Hope to come back soon. You must go
565: Review: I visited Macellaio few times and I was never disapointed. Recently I've discovered the South Ken branch which is sooo nice and cosy. The atmosphere And enviroment of this place is very enjoyable even thou it was super busy. The staff is extremely friendly so it feels almost like you are dinning at your best friend's house ;) At our last visit we were recomend by lovely restaurant manager Bone Marrow and Costata which was absolutely delicious.
566: Review: Era da tantissimo tempo che non mangiavo una carne cosi di ottima qualità e cucinata divinamente.Delle costate da 6/700 gr. cotte rigorosamente al sangue buonissime.Gestito da italiani di Genova con carne di origine piemontese (uno dei pochi fornitori con bovini nati ed allevati in loco).Caro ma ne vale veramente la pena.Complimenti!
567: Review: Abbiamo pranzato con un mix di antipasti fra cui spiccava un'ottima focaccia di Recco e a seguire ravioli al tocco.Gusti tipicamente italiani e che ci lasciano davvero soddiafatti.Il rapporto qualità prezzo è giusto.
568: Title: Still a great local Chelsea / South Ken secret

Review: It's telling when you are there for a late Saturday lunch and the (small) restaurant hidden behind the butchers is packed with Italian families. The wine list has expanded and the food menu simplified... and this is where you come for amazing T-Bone italian style, aged from prime Italian beef and grilled. Fantastic for a catch-up with friends, particularly if you need a break from the ubiquitous american steak style at Hawksmoor etc.
569: Review: Amazing experience at MacellaioWent there after we saw the tv program and it was sublimeWe have been serve by the manager, he reccomend us food and drink and everything was so good, tartare - tagliatelle and a big piece of steakVery knowledgeable he did explain us all the story of their breed and food in generalDefinitely coming back next time we will visit London
570: Review: I have been to Macellaio twice in the last months I have to say that they propose one of the most delicious meats in London. It is difficult to find such a rump or rib-eye steaks finely cooked in some other part of the city. In addition, they have a remarkable wine list and a considerable alternative for vegetarian that includes salads and grilled veggies. However, it is a place for whoever likes to combine strong tastes of meats with superlative wines.
571:
Review: I don’t usually write reviews but this’s well deserved. 
Whiteout any doubt this is the best place in town.
The food, the team and the atmosphere are just special.
Highly recommended
572: Review: Been there first time, restaurant was very busy even tho was a week dayEnvironment is cosy and well decorated, we have been sat downstairs by the meat fridge.We followed Christian suggestion and we couldn’t be more happy about it, raw meet with melted blue cheese on top, prosciutto and beef heart followed by a mouthwatering 7 weeks dry aged beef rib to share perfectly cooked and presented, apple cake and caramello to finish withService was attentive and professional, price worth it considering the qualityDefinitely coming back soon
573: Title: Fantastic food, atmosphere and service!

Review: I was recommended this restaurant by a friend of mine, and I was not disappointed. We were served by cristian who coincidentally also happened to speak spanish which really helped us understand the menu better along with his detailed explanation of it. He recommended we eat steak tartare, burata as well as tbone rib of beef. We were gobsmacked! Everything was delicious. Thanks to cris for going that extra mile for us and always checking up on us. Everyone there looked like they were ontop of everything which is great to see. I will be back very soon!
574: Review: Perfect dinner with friends, the waitress is really kind and friendly specially Federica and Giordano
575: Review: Pedimos un entrecot y estaba cojonudo!!! Tambien un entrante xa compartir como sedcarne cn diferentes tratamientos y muy rico todo. Servicio mas flojo
576: Review: A traditional butcher shop by day on Old brompton Road livens up to become a specialist steak house for lunch and dinner. Excellent quality with decent waiter service. Simple setting but great cuts. Good wine selection as well
577: Review: Very busy and crowded. Food is ok, but nothing special. The bread is less than average. Stakes are big but you pay per 100 grams for a minimum of 500 g. Good to share. Also they are not seasoned. Stake tartar is served with no chopped onions, egg yoke or capers, and it is not seasoned which seams to be the trend of this restaurant. You could say this is the "Italian way" but Stake Tartar is not Italian anyway. It is not served with Wostershire sauce or Tabasco either. In conclusion, although the meat is good quality, it is bland in taste. It is somewhat primitive to consume raw meat without seasoning. Garnishes also lack imagination or diversity. Staff is generally friendly, but forgetful, as they are very busy. The place has that overwhelming feeling of a factory for money of the "I need this table in 1,5 hour max" type, rather than a nice, relaxing restaurant. When booking, ask for a table upstairs, downstairs is completely claustrophobic and unpleasant small room with an extremely noisy, buzzing fridge full of meat. It is ok to go once, but with so many restaurants in London i don't think we'd be braking our legs to go back.
578: Title: Best red meat in London and first class Italian wine list

Review: These are very special cows: Fasano from Piemonte. Double layers of muscle (and much less fat) which makes for VERY tasty eating and much healthier. I would highly recommend the Bistecca Fiorentina (T-Bone), and to start, the steak tartare with gorgonzola. Don't bother with the chips (French Fries). Tremendous Italian wine list, if very fully priced. Tables are too small and cluttered. Our service was not knowledgeable or attentive until the waitress took over (see photo). She was fantastic. The manager was also very charming and proudly showed us his new wine cellar in the basement.Have been here at least 10 times and will definitely keep coming. It's the go-to place for red meat in London. Very honest and real.
579: Review: Cena tra amici.. Location veramente bella e accogliente, personale gentile e disponibile.. Carne a dir poco squisita... Una costata cotta perfettamente.. Antipasto di trippa e tartare in ossobuco... Vino amarone del 2011.... Tutto perfetto... Se volete mangiare della carne a Londra, è il posto ideale.. Prezzo medio alto... Ma ne vale la pena!
580: Review: TERRIBLE!!!! I have been to the restaurant with some friends to have a taste of my county in Italy, Piedmont, and I was so disappointed... our steaks where cold and over cooked, we sent it back to the kitchen (it’s not molecular gastronomy, can you please cook a rare steak!!!!!?!?), ridiculous portion and CRAZY OVERPRICED... that is not a top quality steak even close!!! I can imagine my Italian butcher while seeing a steak like that in my plate A WORLD OF PAIN!!! 1 star is for the service, the waitress was very nice!!!
581: Review: Saw Macellaio as we strolled past and very pleased we could get a table at short notice. Staff were helpful and friendly. Meat was everything promised.lovely laid back venue and full of diners so very atmospheric.I shall book next time so not to be disappointed. Thank you
582: Review: Checked out this place after doing some reviews and we weren’t disappointed. Service was excellent and so was the 600-700g aged ribeye we dug into. Didn’t make the best wine selection but still a very enjoyable evening.
583: Title: Lives up to its reputation

Review: I had high hopes for this restaurant as I have had a lot of recommendations and it did not disappoint. The staff was all friendly and extremely helpful, a special mention to their chef Francesco who made several recommendations to us on what to eat.
584: Review: Ottima carne, locale rumoroso ma piacevole. Carta dei vini buona ma con sovrapprezzi eccessivi su vini commerciali..ma nel contesto londinese vista la qualità ci sta.
585: Title: Amazing atmosphere, great date night.

Review: i had heard a lot about this venue, and was looking forward to going myself.The venue is fun - it looks like a shop, but then once you are in you realise it is a restaurant, too, and it looks lovely !service is good - our waiters were polite and efficient.I got tartare as a starter which was great - and fillet steak as a main.My husband got stracciatella to start, which was excellent - and fiorentina for main.we chose tiramisu as dessert - amazing!Only note is that to be honest, in London i have eaten better meat. Food here is good, BUT you can have better steaks in my opinion.However, the venue is fun and cozy, service is good, and food is still very good, so i would be very happy to try macellaio again :)
586: Title: Italian atmosphere in the heart of London

Review: Typical Italian meat restaurant, combining the butchery-like entrance (hence the name!) and cozy informal restaurant. Staff was friendly, a bit confused (typically Italian-style), meat quality was excellent and steaks delicious (my recommendation: Fiorentina steak), as well as steak tartare which exceeded my expectations.Wine list is rather interesting, combining well known brand-names and unknown small Italian wineries.The prices are reasonable.The cons goes to too small tables and the noise, but...it's Italian restaurant :-).
587: Title: Costata ottima ma con topo che GIRAVA per il ristorante

Review: Esperienza mistica, direi stomachevole...Sono stato a cena in questo ristorante e ho preso la costata di manzo (ottima) accompagnate da patate al forno con rosmarino, il tutto annaffiato da un ottimo nero d'avola. Purtroppo durante la degustazione, mentre inforchettavo un pezzo di carne, camminava per la stanza un sorcio di notevoli dimensioni.Al mio segnalare la cosa alla cameriera questa scappava, sconvolta, a chiamare la principale di sala, la quale si scusa e mi sposta di tavolo. Comunico che non abbiamo più voglia di mangiare e ci offrono un dolce, che lasciamo li intonso!Ci portano il conto, salato!Senza parole: come minimo avrebbero dovuto offrirci il conto, senza aggiungere che gli altri clienti non si sono accorti della presenza dell'animale e nonsono stati spostati di...e il topo era proprio tra i loro piedi!!Esperienza bruttina, non ci tornerò !!
588: Review: Sono venuta qui su consiglio di alcuni amici.. appena arrivati sulla porta c'erano altri quattro ragazzi in attesa davanti a noi nessun cameriere/addetto che li servisse.. Dopo 10 minuti li hanno seduti e dopo altri 10 hanno seduto noi (20 min di ritardo quindi).. ma vabbè, lasciamo perdere..Ci mettiamo a sedere e ordiniamo due tagliate, una normale e una al gorgonzola, e due porzioni di patate: ci arrivano delle porzioni veramente piccole (4 fettine di carne) che ci costringono a ordinare anche un'altra costata.. arriva la costata: sembrava roast beef da quanto era sottile.. Sarà che sono fiorentina e la carne la mangio diversamente, ma proprio non ci siamo. Il personale è veramente gentile questo è da riconoscere. Ma in rapporto qualità / QUANTITÀ / prezzo non ci siamo proprio.Prima e ultima volta.
589: Review: Come in Italia ! Carne buonissima super tenera e fresca .. da sentirsi male !! La tartare ciò gorgonzola fenomenale , altrettanto gli affettati e la bistecca , straconsigliato
590: Review: Superbe restaurant italien. Viandes sont d italie...vins sublimes et pâtes excellentes ....que du bonheur
591: Review: This is a brilliant restaurant. Very different concept. Who thought of it? . Fantastic steak. A full And interesting wine list. good accompaniments. Atmosphere is buzzing with a happy hum - fellow customers a chilled and stylish crowd. You can go there if you don't like steak but maybe you shouldn't....
592: Review: Tt bono carne ottima di qualità, locale carino e accoglienza piacevole da ritornare sicuramente, complimenti allo staff.
593: Review: Siamo stati a cena lunedì sera a coppie, ovviamente tutto ciccia.....ristorante, carino situato in una bella zona, carne buona, un po' caro ma siamo a Londra.......la carta dei vini buona ma con dei rincari altissimi.....
594: Title: Very good meet, poor service

Review: Meet was delicious and the place is very nice. However the service was not the best.Half of the menu was not available: the filet was over, the roster potatoes and the tiramisu as well. We asked for bread three times.
595: Title: the perfect restaurant for a perfect date

Review: Dining at Macellaio was one of the best experiences i had. The place is warm and friendly. Nico the macellaio is an artist in making sensational tartare but what makes this restaurant unique is the head chef Francesco. If Nico is an artist the macellaio's head chef is the Leonardo Da Vinci of the meat. Every time i came there the meat was perfectly cooked and Francesco usually came out the kitchen to speak to the clients and see that everything went properly. I had the opportunity to speak to him and what amazed was the incredible talent despite his young age. I would recommend this restaurant to anyone who wants to spend a good night with quality food.
596: Review: We walked past this place saw the meat hanging in the window and decided to book the next day. Its a bustling place with fast paced service and a small focussed menu with the Fiorentina T-bone being the hero. We loved the Lardo and other starters but the steak was king, well cooked tasty, dry aged Fossona beef. Its not fine dining and you don't pay fine dining prices; its fun, honest and a good time.
597: Review: Very good meat restaurant, warming service by the Italian staff, good style in the furnishing inside and outside the local, good relation quality/price!
598: Review: hi all,l have been with other 2 friends of mine for a lunch, in this amazing place. The meat is really taste, we share The Imperiale and a 1.2kg T-bone steak.The staff is super, Federica & Patrizia were our waitress, professional service and brights smile! thank you and we will be back
599: Review: Lo consiglio veramente. Ottima cena in un ambiente simpatico ed accogliente. Personale efficiente e preparato. Conoscono bene i prodotti ed i piatti. Carne ottima
600: Title: That's what I call it a Steak

Review: Excellent steaks and sides , lovely atmosphere really cozy place .The staff were very hospitable and friendly . I would like to thank Federica who served us , She was kind and helpful with the recommendation .
601: Review: We went there for dinner with friends and were really late the manager and team were really nice and accommodated us even if the kitchen was about to close We had a wonderful meal great meat and wine.We will be back and recommend
602: Review: Semplicemente squisita la carne cruda, divine le bistecche, scelta infinita tra più tagli e tipologie. Ottima anche la scelta dei vini. Chiaramente il prezzo finale è decisamente alto, ma mi sento di scrivere che anche in Italia non è così facile mangiare carne ottimamente cucinata.
603: Review: Locale italianissimo, così come le materie prime, davvero eccellenti, anche rispetto agli standard italiani. Anche i primi piatti sono stati eccellenti. Ragazzi gentili e alla mano. Insomma è stato davvero una manna dal cielo, in una città dove abbiamo fatto fatica a trovare buon cibo ben fatto. Conto abbastanza alto, ma giustificato dalla qualità. Ci tornerei subito.
604: Review: Vale decisamente la spesa: ristorante ottimo sotto ogni aspetto. Per gli italiani in città è il massimo. Cibo buonissimo, giuste porzioni, la carne di ottima qualità, ovviamente. Anche i dolci meritano per la qualità!Vasta selezione di vini, e persino scelta di amari. Purtroppo non ho potuto assaggiare il caffè ma sono sicura fosse un vero espresso italiano.L'ambiente è informale ma confortevole, con camerieri italiani e rispettosi. Moderno ma non troppo freddo, con la giusta italianità non pacchiana.Unica pecca: il tavolo nella sala al piano sopra è abbastanza piccola e ci si sente un pò stretti (il locale era pieno), non ho visto la sala al piano inferiore ma copre un buon numero di coperti.Ci tornerò sicuramente e proverò senz'altro anche gli altri due ristoranti della catena.
605: Title: Serata piacevole, anche se carnivora.

Review: Immaginate una vegana entrare in questo ristorante. Per uno strano scherzo del destino, mi sono ritrovata a cena in questo posto, delizia di ogni carnivoro che si rispetti. Ebbene sono riuscita a mangiare ugualmente grazie all'affabilità del personale, accogliente e preparato a ogni richiesta. Faccio i complimenti allo staff per il rapporto che riesce a instaurare con la clientela.Marianna - Gricignano di Aversa (CE)
606: Review: We are here for a business dinner on a Tuesday evening. Everything starting with the service and food was perfect and we truly enjoyed the evening at Macellaiao.
607: Review: Il ristorante usa unicamente ingredienti Italiani pregiati. La qualità della carne e la cura particolare nella sua frollatura la rendono decisamente migliore della maggior parte di ristoranti in Italia. Anche gli affettati e i formaggi sono conisgliati. la lista dei vini è ampia e offre ottime scelte per tutte le tasche. dal nome si capisce che non è adatto ai vegetariani! Atmosfera italiana con servizio da ristorante inglese. Prenotate con anticipo perchè è sempre pieno.
608: Review: I came here with a friend. Our intenctions were those to have finally a good meat meal, and our expectations have not been disappointed! The beef meat has been perfect, tasty and very fresh, as well as the wine, a good Negroamaro. We treated ourselves whit a dessert too, that well concluded our experience (cheescake and truffles). The service has been very welcoming and friendly, the location very characteristic. Surely we will come back.
609: Title: Cornice ideale per un compleanno a Londra da ricordare
Review: Qualità impeccabile, mise en place azzeccatissima, ambiente accogliente italiano ma dal tipico tono londinese
610: Review: Ragazzi non credo che servono le mie due righe per descrivere quanto sia perfetto questo locale.La qualità delle persone/staff, materie prime, cottura, servizio, vino e dolci.Ti fanno sentire a casa, ti coccolano e soprattutto si mangia benissimo.Ogni volta ritorno e devo sempre fare i complimenti a Valter e Maurizio per la gestione della sala e del bar.
611: Review: Ristorante Italiano, carne in bella vista che subito ti fa venire l’acquolina.Entri da Macellaio e ti senti subito a casa, tutti Italiani, il clima è quello giusto.Ordini Tartare di Manzo ed una Fiorentina e ti ritrovi subito in paradiso.Rapporto qualità/prezzo imbattibile.Impossibile non tornarci.
612:
Review: Small space/tables as good is generous
Great meat steaks 
Excellent carpacio and tartares
Very unique Lardo
For meat lovers : a must
613: Review: Assoluta qualità/prezzo Ottima carta dei vini, in particolare ben rappresentato tutta la galassia Antinori.Vini serviti ad ottima temperatura.Servizio attento e premuroso.Scelta di carne italiana suplime sia nella versione battuta che alla brace.Ritorno volentieri.
614: Title: Qualità eccelsa, servizio sempre al top!

Review: In una location londinese di assoluto prestigio, questo ristorante non tradisce mai le aspettative.L'atmosfera è molto suggestiva specialmente a cena.Il servizio è sempre al top con ragazzi gentilissimi (quasi tutti liguri), veloci e attenti ad ogni esigenza del cliente (la settimana scorsa al compleanno del mio nipotino hanno spento le luci ed acceso una candela sulla torta intonando la canzone tanti auguri a te).La qualità del cibo è ad altissimi livelli (la trippa è strepitosa).Quando sono a Londra non posso non cenare almeno una cena in questo posto.Consigliato al 100%
615: Review: Looks very 'butchery' from the outside, but do not be put off. The food is amazing, and the place is relaxed and welcoming. I will be returning!
616: Review: Ambiance et décoration sympathique dans ce restaurant italien spécialisé dans la viande de bœuf. La viande maturée s’affiche sous les yeux des convives dans une salle au réa de chaussée et au sous sol. Presque toute la carte lui est consacrée bien qu’on trouve aussi un choix de pasta. Les prix restent raisonnables pour Londres et surtout les saveurs sont au rendez-vous dans l’assiette! Accompagnement un peu salé mais sinon rien à redire, le tiramisu final était aussi une réussite !
617: Title: Qualità di carne italiana a Londra

Review: Dopo quello famoso per la trasmissione di Alessandro Borghese sono andato al secondo dei 4 ristoranti MC. È una bella di qualità e seppur lo stile e il menù di fatto è lo stesso ha le sue peculiarità che lo contraddistinguono.C'è un vero e proprio banco di macelleria all'ingresso con mostra di splendidi tagli di fiorentina, costate...Ho preso un ottimo carpaccio e una fantastica rump steak con un buon bicchiere di nebbiolo.Servizio gentile e cortese.40£ è un prezzo medio basso per Londra
618: Review: Polpettine di bollito, lingua alla piastra, tartare condita e infine una fiorentina come Dio comanda .Il tutto annaffiato da del buon vino friulanoServizio gentile anche se un po' impacciatoPrezzo onesto Bravi davvero, ma lo sapevate già...
619:
Review: We enjoyed the freshness of the meat. Interior was cozy, but I would prefer to seat upstairs.
Was not really stunned by the cooked steak, but the raw plates were awesome!
BTW don't recommend trying the bull's Heart - nothing special.
620: Review: I love this place. I come here EVERY time I visit London, which means 3-4 times a year. It's a fixed date in my schedule. Federica and all others are super-friendly, the food is just amazing (I have tried the entire menu over time), and you are reminded of the uniqueness of the Italian lifestyle - whenever you go there, it will be a perfect evening.
621: Review: I reallt enjoyed the meats, and the kind hospitality of the staff. The lady Federico who served our table gave us great recommendation on food to order, and a genuine hospitality that really sways us to come back in the very near future.
622: Title: So good on a Sunday .. We went back on a Monday

Review: Firstly brilliant concept , great atmosphere. Some great gimmicks like the knife in the photo. beef tongue reminded me of old times,, t-bone for two melt in the mouth.
The food made a monotonous business visit to London much more fun
623: Review: I have traveled all over Europe and have learned do NOT order steak. It’s never good. It looks good but is tough, not aged properly and/or over prepared. This restaurant overcomes all those prejudices. The meats were great. Preparation was perfect and the flavor great. The side dishes even better. Make a Reservation. Walkins are tough on the weekends. Don’t know about weekdays
624: Review: Good meat, very pleasant but slow service, much noise, nice list for wine, great tartare and carpaccio!
625: Review: As you enter the restaurant you see a butcher counter which is in the style of the restaurant. The menu is fair enough for what you are expecting. Unfortunately the service is not good enough, as you pay something (a little bit overpriced in our opinion) you expect as well a good service that we haven't received. The wine arrived after the starter was already on the table (15 min after we have actually ordered it). Secondly, the meat as a main course has arrived cold, this is something that's not possible to happen. Nevertheless at least the quality of the meat was good. Coming as side dishes the potatoes arrived a few minutes after the meat... The only good thing we actually loved was the dessert, apparently all of them were homemade and delicious. But the main point of our dinner it was to have a good meat not pleasure with desserts...
626: Title: Memorable steaks and great service

Review: My 13 year old son was keen to try Steak Tartare and Macellaio RC is a short walk from the V&A which we were visiting.The restaurant features a range of steaks and meat dishes plus pasta. Included on the menu are three Tartare dishes which was ideal for us. We tried the beef Tartare which was simply presented in olive oil. My son described this as "too delicious" which made the whole visit worthwhile. The rump steak which followed was also excellent and we thoroughly enjoyed our meal.Service was great too. It took a while for the steaks to come out so we were offered a complimentary plate of cold meats and our service charge was waived. Sometimes things don't go perfectly and it's a sign of great service when you don't have to complain to have that recognised.If you like meat you should try Macellaio RC. We certainly hope to return.
627: Review: Buonissimo tutto , carne italiana di alta qualità e i ragazzi sanno cucinarla e lavorarla.. difficile trovare di meglio a Londra sulla carne.. prezzi alti ma giusto per prodotti e centro Londra Tornerò sicuro
628: Review: In uno dei quartieri più eleganti dove non mancano le proposte questo ristorante stupisce e incuriosisce passando davanti alla vetrina. A prima vista potrebbe essere una macelleria. L'arredamento è molto curato mantenendo uno stile da antica bottega,ogni dettaglio è molto ricercato. Il cibo è ottimo e sono disponibili tanti tagli diversi tutti provenienti dall'Italia. C'è veramente da togliersi la voglia di carne.
629: Title: Best steak l have had the pleasure of eating

Review: I have been several times the service is friendly, casual and the staff know there menu. It is always a pleasure and the only place l would eat steak tartare and pork fat. A trusted restaurant for any occasion.
630: Review: We got off to a bit of a bad start in this place, the "welcome" was cold and the air-conditioning was freezing. This was remedied to be fair.The menu had lots of interesting, different dishes, which included testicles, pigeon and rabbit. Sadly the waiting staff didn't inform us of the things which were no longer available when we arrived so we waisted a bit of time choosing only to be told our choices were unavailable. Disappointing. We also felt a bit pushed by the waitress who seemed intent on us sharing some meat for the entire table. We made our own choices however, and were very pleased with the food. The staff were surly, unfriendly and gave the general impression that they hated us, we eventually asked to speak to the manager. Walter "the manager" saved the day. He managed to turn things around and spent time listening to our complaints. He was very kind and treated us like royalty for the rest of the evening. Ultimately we had a great meal with great service from him. We would try this place again as the chef is obviously very talented. Walter assured us that the staff would have some more training in customer service. Give it a try.
631: Title: ガッツリお肉を喰らう
Review: 優雅にディナーを愉しむのではなく、兎に角、美味いお肉に喰らい付くならこのお店がお勧めです。入口にはお肉の固まりがぶら下がり、席に案内されるとペラペラの広告の様な紙が渡されますが、これがメニューです。テーブルで注文するとナイフがテーブルに突きたてられました。出て来たステーキは味わい深くお腹一杯に成ります。ワイルドステーキが楽しめました。
632: Review: Questo locale, un po' angusto, e' il regno della carne piemontese, o meglio di Alba .Ma oltre a ottime fiorentine , costate e filetti, offre anche deliziose zuppe del giorno ( ceci, zucca, ecc...)delle bruschette con il lardo di Arnad, delle paste con la giusta cottura( ottime le trenette con un pesto delizioso e delicata o).Da rivedere la lista dei vini, attingendo al territorio di origine senza azzardi con vini siciliani o altro.Da migliorare il seri vizio un po' caotico. Vale una visita.
633:
Review: Ottima Location
Cibo di ottima qualità a prezzi corretti.
Personale molto cortese e disponibile.
Consigliato.
634: Review: The window full of meat and the line of eager customers made us think this was a must-try place. It didn't live up to our expectations, mainly because the steaks were just ordinary. It may be a cliche, but this restaurant is better at selling the sizzle than the steak.
635: Review: Locale storico in SK dove mangiare carne. Il cibo non è male, io personalmente ho provato un'ottima tartare. Unico neo la rumorosità veramente eccessiva che lo rende location poco adatta ad una cena romantica e più indicata magari per una cena tra amici.
636: Review: Desideravo mangiare della carne di ottima qualità, e devo dire che non ho sbagliato. Il Macellaio mi ha davvero soddisfatto. Ottima orecchia d'elefante, tenerissima gustosa. Consiglio a tutti di provare questo locale. Sicuramente per mangiare carne, magari accompagnata da un vino pregiato, di cui la cantina è fornitissima. Non è un ristorante elegante, ma si mangia davvero bene.
637: Review: Bel quartiere, locale arredato con gusto, qualità ottima, carta dei vini esauriente..nota dolente mancava qlc piatto, ma quando si lavora col "fresco" ci sta!
638: Review: This is a meat restaurant . The tatars are fabulous- had one with Gorgonzola and Next time in London I have to go back to have it again
639: Review: Decidiamo una sera di cenare in questo famoso ristorante italiano. Situato in una delle zone più in di Londra lo si capisce anche dal fatto che uscito dalla metropolitana c'è uno store della Lamborghini esagerato. Arriviamo. Ci accoglie una ragazza italiana molto gentile e ci accompagna al tavolo al piano di sotto. Piano di sotto curato, non come il piano di sopra ma tuttavia arredato bene e con gusto. Siamo 3 ordiniamo 3 tartare di fassona con gorgonzola squagliata sopra. Deliziosa, poi la cameriera ci consiglia una fracosta, buona, peccato che per 2, tolto osso e grasso c'era veramente poca ciccia, quindi noi proseguiamo con una classica T-Bone. Tutto delizioso, buona anche la carta dei vini, per essere a Londra c'era una buona scelta a prezzi discreti. Conto 140£ a persona, diciamo in linea con location e città sopratutto. è pur sempre un locale esclusivo. CONSIGLIATO.
640: Review: Cenare qui è stata una bellissima esperienza. L' ambiente è accogliente ed il personale molto simpatico. La carne è spettacolare, ottima scelta di vini. Prezzo alto ma assolutamente adeguato alla qualità. Veramente molto italiano.
641: Review: Went to this place for dinner with some friends, overall the experience was average at best. They were out of fillet so we had T-Bone, Rib, Beef shoulder and a bunch of sides.The rib was decent. Everything else was below average. No distinct flavour, the actual quality of meet is average, service was average. If you're looking for a proper steak house or even a casual place that really specializes in meet don't be fooled by the meet on display.We had the chocolate cake for desert - it was quite moist yes but literally tastes like cheese. Tiramisu was far from memorable.Overall I'd avoid this place - really nothing memorable at all.
642: Review: Location molto curata nei minimi dettagli, come del resto la presentazione dei piatti.Sfortunatamente siamo stati consigliati male dalla cameriera la quale ci ha proposto la bistecca da 1kg e 6 (compreso l'osso) da dividere in 4 invece di un piatto di carne a testa. All'arrivo di questa ci siamo immediatamente accorti che questa non era sufficiente (appena due fettine a testa) ma abbiamo lasciato correre. Qualità della carne buona ma dal prezzo troppo elevato. Avremmo risparmiato a fare come preferivamo noi e mangiato di più. Buoni i contorni anche se veramente piccoli e i dolci. Rapporto qualità prezzo non sufficiente.In una frase: tanto fumo e niente arrosto.
643:
Review: Atmosphere was busy yet relaxed, friendly service and a good wine selection. 
Steak was beautifully cooked and tasty.
644: Review: My fiancé and I decided to try this restaurant for our anniversary dinner tonight. The staff has been amazing, polite and thoughtful all the time. The location is nice, the place is tidy and clean.We ordered two starters, two side, one pasta dish and to mains. Because of our anniversary they offered us complimentary wine and desserts. The food is delicious, proper and real italian flavours. Everything was really fresh and perfectly cooked. Prices are not high, also considering the quality of the meals!We really want to come back to try all the nice offers of the menu!5 stars!
645: Title: Fun meat place in South Kensington

Review: Fun décor, buzzy small place, good and original food, Italian ambiance. Only thing is waitress kept insisting for us to have the 700g T-bone while we wanted the filet (200g each). A bit odd. Was it because the 700g T-bone ended more expensive?
646: Title: Qualità e cortesia ottima, prezzi in media con londra

Review: Eravamo in zona e avevamo voglia di cibo italiano. Ci siamo imbattuti in questo bel locale, abbiamo dovuto aspettare un po' ma devo dire che l'accoglienza è stata veramente ottima. Cibo buono e di qualità, porzioni forse leggermente scarse. Prezzi alti, in due persone circa 72£, sicuramente non adatto a tutte le tasche.
647: Title: Very good just a shame a bit pricey

Review: Very good food and wine. Even better staff. Even better atmosphere. Just a bit pricey for what it is especially sides and drinks . It's very (very) good, but not the best around. But a really , really nice place. This place gets a lot right, and little wrong Our first time there. Mixed crowd very relaxed feel. We had our two young boys with us there were also couples, groups etc there too. Lovely atmosphere. Would recommend it especially as a special treat. Just make sure your wallet is full before you go to enjoy it to the full.
648: Title: Ottimo - Great food and service

Review: Sono venuta a Londra per festeggiare il mio compleanno con amici italiani e inglesi e volevo qualcosa che ben rappresentasse la buona cucina italiana. Questo ristorante dall'accoglienza, alle materie prime sicuramente è così. Tagliere di salumi ottimi e una fiorentina degna di questo nome. Un servizio cortese e accogliente hanno reso una serata perfetta.I've come to London to celebrate my Birthday with Italian and English friends and I wanted to show them the best of Italy. This restaurant has a very charming atmosphere and very good italian food. Don't miss it!
649: Review: Tutto ottimo, accoglienza  , qualità della carne , servizio ottimo con una PATRIZIA superlativa. Ci torneremo
650: Review: Great steaks in a small restaurant that you access by walking through a high end butcher shop. The steaks were some of the best we've had this side of the Atlantic though sides could be a bit better, lacking in imagination and/or size
651: Title: INCREDIBLE MEAT! BEST SERVICE! WOW.

Review: I don't even know where to start describing our perfect night at Macellaio. My partner and I went for our anniversary and couldn't have had a better night. Let's start with the meat, which is one of the best (if not the best) I've ever had around the world. Super tender, juicy and an explosion of flavours! The waiters are all Italian and so lovely, they immediately make you feel like home. Especially, Giorgia and Anita were super sweet. They smiled all the time, were very attentive and gave great advise on what to order. Considering the incredible food, the prices are totally reasonable. It's not so easy to find such honest and excellent food in London, at these prices. Will definitely return very soon! Thank you Macellaio.
652: Review: The steak is so good ! Ordered medium rare and the steak was prepared perfectly well! Very tender and also tasty! Also tried the ox tongue and capriccio must try too!!
653: Review: Redan i entren ser man biffstockarna hänga för mörning. Du bestämmer själv storleken på din T-bone. Priset/hg. 6-700 g är OK för en hungrig köttälskare för det går bort en del i benet mm. Hög stämning och hög ljudnivå - mätte och över 100 db. Ett ställe att njuta maten snarare än konversationen. Boka för stället är litet och ta bord på gatunivån.
654: Review: Il primo giorno siamo andati senza prenotazione e ovviamente nn c'era posto abbiamo così chiamato il giorno dopo e fortunatamente hanno trovato due posti liberi... La location è davvero suggestiva, ricorda molto le vecchie macellerie italiane e il personale è molto cordiale e simpatico. Ma passiamo alla carne, che dire, SQUISITA ,sia per quanto riguarda la cottura che per il gusto. Anche la lista dei vini è molto assortita e offre un infinita varietà di eccellenze italiane.Il rapporto qualità prezzo l'ho trovato giusto, d'altronde se sei a Londra la qualità puoi farla anche un po' pagare.Bravissimi, continuate così.. alla prossima. I ragazzi di Voltri!;-)
655: Title: Excellent steak, could be best ever

Review: Amazing fillet steak, perfectly cooked, no blood left on the plate - perfect. The rabbit was also very good, although it had too may small bones.

This is a must go to restaurant if you love you meat.

The prices are very reasonable.
656: Review: Ce restaurant italien sympathique se situe dans l'agréable quartier de South Kensigton. C'est là son principal attrait, mais aussi en partie sûrement l'explication de ses prix très élevés.Le concept est simple : cuisine italienne... et énormes pièces de boeuf ! C'est plein comme un oeuf et il faut vraiment penser à réserver. En revanche, la salle est horriblement bruyante (on se croirait dans un bar à Tapas de Barcelone, c'est dire !)Bref, pour moi : les pâtes au basilic étaient parfaites, les frites façon potatoes splendides (et peu grasses). Quant à la "super viande", je ne l'ai pas trouvée si géniale (il est vrai que j'ai un bon boucher au quotidien) et surtout très mal découpée !Vin correct (à prix exhorbitant, of course). Pas le top, mais correct (si on n'est pas celui qui paye l'addition, bien sûr) !
657: Review: So funny because I was greeted with the question "have you a booking?" Even though there were only four other people dining at the time! As it happens I did have a booking and I was taken to the back area to a simple table with straw mat type chairs. Wine bottles on shelves and they have a chandelier made of bottles. Also on the wall was an award for best Italian in Kensington. I was with my daughter and we ordered soft drinks, steaks, mashed potatoes and french fries. They show you your cut of meat before they cook it to make sure it meets your approval. We had to ask them to hurry up because we waited quite a while, considering there were only six customers. They served the bread and olive oil just as our meal was delivered. My mashed potatoes were good, my daughter enjoyed her fries and we both really enjoyed our steaks! £55 for lunch for two, no starters or desserts.
658: Review: Great value for money meat. Excellent quality. Unfortunately Sides and wine are really expensive and push up the price a lot! The sides are extremely small in portion and very expensive for their quality/quantity.1/2 caraffe of red wine for £33??? If you are up for protein and bulking up on meat alone,its the best value and amazing quality.
659: Review: Siamo stati in questo ristoran te il 29 -6-2017.,Abbiamo telefonato avendo con noi il nostro nipotino di 6 anni grande mangiatore di carne , pur sapendo che era già tutto prenotato. Sono stati molto gentili hanno fatto il possibile per accontentarci e ci hanno trovato un tavolo. La carne è veramente squisita molto buoni ancghe i ravioli con il tocco il gelato fatto in casa e il classico tiramisù. Non è economico,ma il prezzo è adeguato alla qualità,
660: Title: Great Meat just a little high-priced

Review: after visiting Natural and science museum, I was looking somewhere to eat meet, find this restaurant. the wine bar looks cool and stuff's knowledge about meet was high. the taste of meet was really good and also enjoyed the wine, service was nice and friendly, just to say it's a little bit high-priced.
661: Review: Have been there 2x and was always well received and had a great time. Meat and side dishes are very good. Waiters are very friendly. I think most are Italians…. Macellaio has a nice atmosphere. I´ve eaten steaks in the best houses in Brazil, Argentina, Uruguay, US, Japan, Italy, etc. Macellaio RC doesn’t disappoint! Overall a great experience.
662: Review: Trovato per caso alla ricerca di un ristorante che permettesse una cena gluten-free per uno di noi (famiglia con due bambini, di cui una celiaca) e ci siamo ritornati molto volentieri, anzi i nostri bambini ,in particolare hanno adorato la costata mangiata il primo giorno. Il,servizio è cortese ed efficiente, Il locale carino, meglio prenotare perché molto frequentato. Sfiziosi ed insoliti i contorni, ottima la birra di Biella . Bambini (e genitori) hanno gradito la torta al cioccolato. Il conto è equilibrato rispetto alla qualità dei piatti (specie la carne!,!!)
663: Review: The restaurant was recommended by very friendly staff at a wine store nearby. The restaurant's front staff were very pleasant and accommodating when booking the reservation (stating that it would be a 2 hour seating) and when greeting us. We were seated in the front section of the restaurant (see comments below). Wait staff was efficient if not a bit formal/stiff. To start we selected a starter, appetizer and pasta dish from the multi-course menu -- oddly we were served all three selections at the same time creating a feeling we were being rushed out of the restaurant. The beef tartare was excellent ( with a splash of the stunningly delicious EVO that was placed table side) and a grind of salt, and the penne (perfectly al dente) in pomodoro sauce with basil was simple but delicious. The bollito croquettes were a disappointment - tasteless boiled beef meatballs in a fried crust with a scant dab of sauce anchoring the three small croquettes to the slate plate - definitely do not recommend. In regard to the entrees, my partner had the rabbit ( apparently a new item on the menu with an herbed yogurt sauce) which I was told was quite good. I had a 230 gm fillet of beef, medium rare, which was cut by the butcher in the front of the shop and prepared perfectly. Additional sides included crispy roasted potatoes and green beans, both deliciously prepared. The wine list is not inexpensive but there was a delicious Maremma region wine (for about 45 pounds) that was delicious and paired quite well with the meal. The chocolate truffle dessert (with candied citrus and cocoa powder) was delicious and the aged grappa that we had to accompany it was very smooth. Overall the food and wine experience was very pleasant. However, as a gay couple there were two disconcerting issues with the dining experience which for me dissuades me from highly recommending this restaurant. The first was presenting all the pre-entree courses (starter, appetizer and pasta) at one time which seemed to rush the meal (creating a feeling that the restaurant was trying to get us out asap). Also during the two hours we were there, there was pretty strict segregation of same sex couples to the front of the restaurant and mixed couples to the back dining room. When I questioned the hostess about this she assured us that it was coincidental .... but it seemed to be quite prevalent through the evening seating. If others have had the same experience then I would discourage gay couples (and others who support equality) from supporting this restaurant.
664: Review: I've been here with a friend and gotta say it was amazing! We had 3 different tartare as starter and all of them were really good. We decided then to order some homemade pasta and it was delicious. The best part was for sure the meat we had as a main course, perfectly cooked and tasty. Dessert worth a try too. Staff really polite and smiley. Will definitely recommend to who's around this area!
665: Review: We arrived a bit in late, in most of London's restaurants when that happens, especially after half an hour, they just give your table, that doesn't happen to us and was a good first impression. We were 4, firstly the waitress who was serving us was the blonde one with glasses, a classic waitress with a fake smile who tries to sell you more as is possible, obviously it's good for the restaurant's business, but isn't when a customer can really see that because a good restaurant doesn't need this sad attitude and the table next us was saying the same about her service. Fortunately then another waitress was taking care of us, she was just incredible so attentive, patient and organized and with a fluent english (instead of the other one) so thank you Patricia (?) if this is your name! The food was so good, unfortunately they were reorganizing the wine list, but anyway we had a lovely red wine. We loved the Carpaccio, Fiorentina and more, everything was so good and arrived very quick but without giving us the pressure for leaving. We end with a lovely Tiramisu and Afogato, also we get some liqueurs. The bill was fair enough for what we had and for the nice service, we obviously will be back (but with Patricia serving us) thanks a lot!
666: Review: La prima sera siamo andati per mangiare ma ovviamente non c'era posto per cui abbiamo prenotato per la sera successiva. Peccato che la sera dopo ci hanno cronometrato il tempo e alle 21 abbiamo dovuto lasciare il locale. Per quanto riguarda la carne niente da dire però avevo ordinato della stracciatella raccomandandomi di portarmela senza rucola che a me non piace e cosa mi hanno portato? Stracciatella ricchissima di rucola........ Nel complesso il personale è gentile e premuroso quanto ai prezzi.....non per tutte le tasche
667:
Review: all good
excellent food
great staff
a bit crowded and a bit expensive

will try again during the week
668: Review: We are visitors to London and a relative booked a big table here for a family get-together (7 of us) for dinner.I didn't pick up the tab, but I could tell it was expensive.Service was great.The wine was very good.The meat and sides were heavenly!A great night out!
669: Title: Exceptional Italian cuisine in the heart of London

Review: Visited this restaurant with a group of friends and found it to be fantastic. The food was truly authentic and made with a passion only the Italians can master. After sharing a few delicious starters ranging from beef tartare and carpaccio to tongue with parsley sauce, we had the Fiorentina steak for the main course and the meat was mouth watering and cooked to perfection. There are also plenty of desserts and wines to choose from. The overall ambiance is relaxed and the service efficient, yet very friendly. Hope to return soon.
670: Review: Nos guetó mucho este restaurante italiano diferente ! Una carne estupenda . Lo recomiendo 100% , muy buena atención!
671: Title: every time i feal like to have some meat and feeling like at home I go to Macellaio any one of them will be the same

Review: Today I went to the one in South Kensington and as usual the meat and the service where OUTSTANDING ...capital letter because it really is, the older I get the more demanding I become and thats way I chose very carefully where I spend my money.At macellaio every time I've been there its always been a great experience, been the South Kensington one or the others. You just eat the best meat, pasta, bread, side dishes and good wine all the time. The people working there on the floor or in the kitchen are simply fantastic, a thing very difficult to find in London, so when you find this situation your money are very well spent! Thank you guys!!
672: Review: Man kann das Gewicht des Fleisches selber bestimmen und bezahlt dementsprechend.Wir hatten ein 850g T-Bone für 54£.Das Fleisch kommt ohne Saucen oder andere Beilagen. Der Knochen ist bereits entfernt.Die Qualität ist unglaublich gut. Never had a better one.
673: Title: The best steak I've ever tasted!

Review: Pricey, but worth it...I have travelled worldwide and am lucky to have eaten at the most Luxurious finest restaurants and hotels, but this steak and dining experience was a cut above the rest for me No sauce, served medium, perfectly seasoned, just how you should eat a steak...I loved tasting different wines to compliment each dish...Thankyou!
674: Title: A lovely inexpensive Italian restaurant
Review: This was a good find, close to South Kensington tube station, great menu and do some great steaks and pasta dishes. Good service and value for money. Highly recommended.
675: Title: Boa carne em Londres? RIGHT HERE!

Review: Conheci este restaurante graças a uns amigos italianos, não fosse este restaurante italiano. Devo dizer que bate muitas churrascarias brasileiras e portuguesas. É simplesmente fantástico. O staff é todo italiano dando ainda mais autenticidade ao espaço. Antigamente era um Talho dai chamar-se "Macellaio" traduzido em italiano. Desde entradas até sobremesa e até vinho, tudo puramente italiano. Os bifes fiorentinos são de chorar por mais. É caro sim, 80 libras cada pessoa com vinho e sobremesa. Mas compensa quem queira gastar numa boa refeição!
676: Review: booked last minute and sat down for an early servicewe took various choices and were slightly pushed by the waitress for a different choice we did not regret it, we enjoyed the best beef we have had in London so far... and we will go back for more !
677: Title: Personale cortese e carni di qualità

Review: Visita in famiglia (moglie più bambino). Prenotato on line.Il personale quasi tutto italiano è molto disponibile e cortese. Molto carini col bambino di 3 anni. Locale molto bello.Prezzi medio/alti (siamo sempre a Londra e si mangia carne di qualità).Tagliatelle per il piccolo con ragù di scottona molto buone (forse un pelino di sale in più ci stava..) e molto abbondanti.Le nostre porzioni un po' più "risicate (tagliata rucola e grana e spezzatino).Cmq consigliato.
678: Review: Location vermanete suggestiva, dove si sente la qualita' delle carni che vengono servite. Un locale innovativo con servizio veloce e cortese. Ottima carta vini ed esperienza londonese nel complesso molto buona.
679: Review: Buon ristorante a South Kensington. Si deve prenotare per tempo per trovare posto.Propone piatti di carne per tutti i gusti e anche qualche primo regionale italiano. Si può anche scegliere la carne e poi cucinarsela a casa.Clientela mediamente giovane.Prezzi altini ma nella media londinese. Questa volta ho assaggiato i pansotti alla noci e poi la cotoletta che consiglio.
680: Title: Very tasty, great service, but crazy pricing

Review: First of all, the meat was truly incredible. We had a 1.9kg steak between 6 of us, which unfortunately was slightly too little. To remedy the our underestimated order, we got a few more portions of french fries and spinach. It needs to be said that both of these sides are extremely small (spinach was one mouthful on a plate) and outrageously priced. The wine selection was also confusing. Instead of offering cheap, mid-range and expensive wines - they only offered mid-range and extremely expensive.. This doesn't really accommodate your everyday clientele.Having said all this, it was my mothers birthday and they organised a small bit of cake. The deserts were also delicious. It has to be said that the service was outstanding.
681: Review: servizio eccellente personale garbato e competente nell'illustrare le voci del menu, carne squisita e ottima lista dei vini, appena ritorno a Londra ci ritornerò.
682: Review: Came in for dinner and had very high expectations after reading the reviews.My boyfriend and I decided I have the rib eye as I was said to be dried aged and it was recommend on the menu to have 600g but the waitress said that for two 700g would be better. They came and showed us the steak that was mean for us, it had no marbling at all and looked extremely pink and moist for a dried aged steak. When it came, it had no flavour whatsoever, was over cooked, chewy and full of condensation from the silver dome. Sides were also bland and flavourless, including te chips!! And we were not offered any condiments.And it was unfortunate that there was no sommelier around to explain the very complex wine menu. But all in all, if you like real steaks there are so many better restaurant in London to go for.
683: Title: Buena opción a la salida del Museo de Historia Natural

Review: Íbamos toda la familia con mis tres hijos de 8, 5 y 3 años. Aunque no teníamos reserva y el local estaba muy concurrido nos hicieron hueco en una mesa alta de la entrada (mejor para no molestar en el comedor...). La pasta fresca, acertamos con los ravioli de ragú, los tagliatele y el otro plato de pasta normales; buenísimo el steak tartar; de postre, 5 pounds por un helado de vainilla me parece excesivo; el chocolate cake muy rico (de esos brownies que sirven calentitos), y el blonze inglese demasiado dulce. En cualquier caso, creo que acertamos ya que nos trataron genial y fueron muy amables con los niños que estuvieron bastante "movidos". La carne fresca tenía muy buena pinta pero está claro que la cuenta hubiera sido desorbitada. De este modo, incluyendo dos cervezas y agua, fueron aprox unas 80 pounds, que para lo que es Londres y un local como este, pues no está mal (siendo cinco). Recomiendo el sitio por la proximidad a los museos de Ciencias e Historia Natural que deben visitarse si vas con niños a Londres.
684: Review: Atmosfera indimenticabile in particolare modo grazie a un servizio di qualità da parte dei camerieri sempre sorridenti e disponibili per rispondere a qualsiasi esigenza del cliente. Uno dei posti in cui ho mangiato la carne più buona in assoluto.Sarà il ristorante in cui in assoluto tornerò sicuramente non appena farò di nuovo tappa a Londra!!
685: Title: My favourite Italian restaurant in London!

Review: Premetto che IL Macellaio di South Kensington è il mio preferito, ma quando posso vado molto volentieri negli altri due, soprattutto in quello di Union street che sembra davvero un teatro ed è veramente curato nei minimi dettagli. Conosco il menù a memoria per questo vi suggerisco di provare la fassona e la steak tartare, per non parlare del filetto e dell'entrecote. Ravioli e tagliatelle come primi d'eccellenza e i dolci che sono davvero unici, in particolare il bianco al basilico che non potrete gustare in nessun altro ristorante come in questo! IL rapporto qualità prezzo è davvero incomparabile con gli altri ristoranti che fanno o che dicono di fare carne e lo staff ti fa sempre sentire a casa. Ve lo consiglio per tutte le occasioni, anche in coppia se volete sorprendere il partner!
686: Review: I'm s big fan of Italian cafes which do great food. This is one of the best. I got here just after 7 and by 8 it was very busy. My starter of mozzarella cheese and cherry tomatoes was divine. The flat breads looked excellent but I went for the tagliatelle with beef steak. The beef was cooked beautifully and the pasta was spot on. The dessert of apple pie and vanilla ice cream was the best sounding dish and didn't disappoint. The food is homemade and faultless. Services was very good too.
687: Title: il mio ristorante preferito a Londra

Review: La prima volta che ho avuto la fortuna di mangiare in questo ristorante sono rimasta estasiata. Avendo viaggiato tanto conosco la carne, quella buona e qui è tutto squisito. La carne è di altissimo livello, il servizio impeccabile e la location curata nei dettagli. Venire a Londra e non andare a fare una capatina in questo posto è da folli. E' diventato il mio ristorante preferito, quello dove vai per le occasioni speciali e quando ha vinto il premio miglior ristorante italiano a Londra, non mi sono stupita per niente. Andateci, ne vale veramente la pena.
688: Title: LA CARNE OTTIMA COME I RAVIOLI

Review: ottima carne come i ravioli al tocco. il personale cordiale,professionale e veloce. la qualita' del cibo giustifica il prezo medio-alto.anche i dolci buoni.unica critica l'arredo del locale con dei piatti bianchi sulla parete e le sedie scomode li cambierei.cmq per qualita' e servizio vivamente consigliato.
689: Title: Excellent meat and lovely ambient

Review: The experience was perfect from the beginning, with an intriguing newspaper menu guiding us through the courses. I chose prosciutto with burrata as appetizer: just perfect, prosciutto was so sweet and burrata was drooling milk. Then I went on to a T-bone steak (fiorentina) to share with mashed potatoes: so juicy and tender, really delicious. They deserved the 5th star because of an unexpected dessert: zuppa inglese, one of my faves in Italy: it was really delicious. Overall a great experience. If anything, the bread should be fresher.
690: Title: cibo eccellente, servizio di alto livello

Review: Sono cliente abituale del ristorante di South Kensington in quanto abito in zona- ma vado spesso anche a Union street. La carne è la migliore di Londra , io la mangio quasi esclusivamente qui, specie quella cruda; i miei piatti preferiti sono la cotoletta "alla milanese" e la cima alla genovese. ma ci sono anche dei primi buonissimi e in Union street una pizza strepitosa. Il servizio è sempre eccellente e accurato, non solo con me "habituee" ma con tutti i clienti. Il rapporto qualità prezzo decisamente buono specie per la zona, tra le più belle di Londra, e il livello della cucina. Ho mandato diversi amici e clienti al macellaio e sono sempre rimasti tutti contenti e affascinati anche dalla bellezza dei locali. Un ristorante all altezza di ogni aspettativa
691: Review: Non c'è che dire una conferma ogni volta Tutto super ottima carne ottimi vini. Piatto presentati benissimo e una piacevole scoperta : i dolciiiiiii bravi tutti è sempre un piacere essere coccolati da tutti i ragazzi
692: Review: I went for lunch to impress some business partners and I did so thanks to the delicious food, great wine list and excellent service. Is the only place in london where you can find real Italian meat like fiorentina or tagliata. Strongly recommended!
693: Review: Un ristorante così non L ho mai visto. Accoglienza fantastica, tutti i camerieri molto disponibili, simpatici e tutti sempre molto sorridenti e attenti. Il cibo spettacolare partendo dagli affettati, carne cruda per finire con una bella fiorentina tutto preparato e cucinato perfettamente. I vini tutti provenienti dall' Italia e non capendone molto i ragazzi al bar sono stati molto disponibili a farmene provare un paio.Sono uscita dal ristorante SODDISFATTA ritornerò il prima possibile e lo consiglio a tutti gli amanti della carne.
694: Review: Lavorando con la ristorazione in tutto il mondo , sono stato in molti posti differenti per assaggiare la qualità di moltissimi ristoranti. Poche settimane fa mi è capitata L occasione di andare a cena con il Presidente della camera di commercio italiana a Londra ( Dott. Simonelli ) rimanendo sbalordito dalla qualità della carne e la simpatia del personale. Una carne così non L ho mai vista in nessun altro ristorante. Talmente morbida che si scioglie in bocca. Da andare assolutamente se avete la possibilità di venire a Londra.
695: Review: One of our favorite places in London. Great meat and a very nice wine list. Staff is very kind and knowledgeable.. always looking forward to go back.
696: Title: Una tappa obbligatoria a Londra

Review: Sono stata a cena in questo meraviglioso ristorante dove ritengo che la qualità della carne sia assolutamente la migliore a Londra, ci tornerò spesso e sono orgogliosa che il gusto italiano sia esportato così nel mondo .. auguro ai proprietari nuove mete e nuove avventure, così l'Italia vince.
697: Review: I went to Macellaio a couple of days ago, the place is fantastic, the staff is also very attentive and prepared.We seated at the bar because the place was busy and the Jung tall guy which I think was the bartender helped us choosing a wonderful wine.The waitress advise us with the best rib steak we ever had for a long time. Also the raw beef Battuta with Zola that we had as a starter was delicious.I definitely go back as soon as possible!!!!!!Everybody should have a taste of The Macellaio and their amazing staff!!!!
698: Review: Amici Italiani me ne avevano parlato molto bene ma non credevo fuori dall'Italia di riuscire a ritrovare così tanta qualità e ricercatezza nel menù. Ho mangiato una carne davvero ottima e bevuto del buon vino consigliato. Appena rientrata dal lungo we londinese mi sento di suggerire questo ristorante come una tappa da non perdere.
699: Review: I invited a Client of mine (who is interested in investing in "Made in Italy"): needless to say that quality of the food & wines, the warmth of the meet & greet, the smile on the waiter's face, the passion in the story telling...all this made him fall in love with the concept! Well done !
700: Review: I m sure is the Best restorant in South kensington...really delicious and properly food!!Best staff waitress amazing and really delicious food and meat...só amazing place
701: Title: IL miglior ristorante di Londra

Review: Vivo a Londra da 3 anni e sono un cliente fisso del Macellaio di South Kensington, perché amo mangiare carne e per me carne significa mangiare bene e di qualità. IL servizio è ottimo e lo staff veramente eccellente. Grazie ad un consiglio di una cara amica che prenota per me e per la mia ragazza provo per la prima volta IL MACELLAIO di Union Street! Un grandissimo successo! Rapporto qualità prezzo come nessun altro ristorante a Londra offre, piatti ben curati e di grande qualità, carne fresca e servita alla cottura desiderata, per non parlare dei primi e dei piatti vegetariani anche se, dal nome non si direbbe! Poi che altro dire? Sono riusciti a rendere la cheesecake, dolce che non è nella cultura culinaria italiana molto diffuso, il mio dolce preferito e molto più buono di qualsiasi altro ristorante in Town! Per concludere il conto veramente sorprendente, in senso positivo, considerando che in altri ristoranti abbiamo speso il doppio e mangiato la metà con un servizio scadente. Lo consiglio a tutti gli italiani e non che vogliono provare un vero e proprio ristorante italiano! Complimenti soprattutto allo staff e al proprietario che rendono l'atmosfera accogliente come a casa.
702: Review: The experience commenced from stepping over the threshold & never lapsed.My partner & i feasted & drank like kings!The decor..the service & the choice of authentic dishes are outstandingAnd to make it an even more outstanding experience the price was extremely good value considering the amount of food and wine ( and the wine list is something else may i add)The two starters were outstanding Steak Tartare outstandingly served & freshStracciatella &Rocket a mouth drooling combinationFiorentina x 2 immaculately seasoned with a hint of olive oil & salt(no more no less)Plus 2 x fresh side dishes of fresh vegetables with the just picked from the farmers field tasteI highly encourage if you are in south Kensington please visitIf you are nowhere near south Kensington jump on a tube/bus/car or simply walk &feast at Macelliao if you don't you are missing out on a gastronomic feast
703: Title: Wow simply the best, outstanding service :)

Review: Having dined here with a group of friends, we all left with a big smile on our faces! The rib eye was absolutely Devine the best meat I've ever tasted and I'm sure my friends would agree, accompanied by some lovely fresh vegetables and very tasty starters that we shared ( I would recommend the battuta yum). The overall spend was impressive for the quality of food consumed. The service was very smooth. The staff are very polite, knowledgeable and attentive. If you like meat and wine this place is a winner. Defiantly will be returning very soon
704: Title: Staff could do with service training

Review: Buzzing atmosphere and good food, though not as good as on previous visits, but service was slow and unwelcoming. The scowling female who served us was disinterested in working but did manage to crack a smile for one of the male waiters though was incapable of it for us. At the very high price it simply isn't worth it when there are other places serving equally good food in less frenetic surroundings and with better trained staff.
705: Review: Wordless!! Service 0 , location tick the box, meat counter they might have forgotten to clean since the opening, wood used as chopping board major non compliance with the Food Safety, portion invisible quality unacceptable. You keeping report my review because I'm writing the true coward!
706: Review: Siamo stati per 3 gg a Londra, e su consiglio di un nostro amico italiano che vive li da tantissimi anni ci ha portati a pranzo in quest'ottimo ristorante! non credevo di dover mangiare cosi' bene...tartan favolose, fiorentina favolosa e dolci ottimi! Vero ristorante italiano!
707: Review: Abbiamo scelto questo ristorante perché vicino allo stadio del Chelsea e perché eravamo già stati all'altro Macellaio a Union Street che ci aveva soddisfatto.Non posso dire altrettanto di questo a South Kensington, la carne è arrivata fredda, cottura sbagliata. I fagiolini di contorno erano vecchi. Prezzi esagerati. 110 sterline, una bistecca, 2 contorni, 2 bicchieri di vino e 2 acque.Non mi è piaciuto neanche lo show che fanno quando ti portano la carne. Are you ready? Are you sure? 3...2..1...con il colpo al coperchio...Non ci tornerei
708:
Review: Très bonne adresse spécialement pour les amateurs de très bonnes viandes. 
Service au top également 
A ne pas manquer
709: Title: Gutes Essen, sehr lautes Ambiente

Review: Wir waren an unserem ersten Tag in London hier zum Abendessen. In Fenster hängen Dry Age T-Bones . Das Restaurant ist wie ein kleine Italienische Trattoria. Einfache Tische ohne Decke, Holzfussboden. Es gibt eine gute Auswahl aber eigentlich jedoch Hauptsächlich Fleisch. Gute Weinkarte. Das Steak wird nach Gewicht verkauft, dafür Daumen hoch. Daumen runter für die Geräuschkulisse. Nicht ganz preiswert
710: Title: Good meat but the rest........................VERY EXPENSIVE

Review: We arrived at 20:30 and the young manager welcomed us and first thing he said that we needed to free the table for 22:30 as they had other bookings.......I found this very rude in particular if you consider that at 22:15 the restaurant was empty!!!!! Not sure it's a strategy to show that the place is very busy...............We ordered some starters and then a "fiorentina" as a main and some sides.The fiorentina was good the rest was very bad including the bread basket (we found pieces of bread probably from other tables emptied in our basket.....). The sides were expensive and the portions very very small. Roast potatoes not good at all.Overall the service wasn't good. We mentioned to the waitress that we found a broken piece of bread in the basket and she was very ashamed and told his boss who didn't even come to speak to us to apologize........the staff is very young and you notice this........A real pity as a couple of years ago when it was called "MAXELA" I found the restaurant quite good. I wouldn't recommend this restaurant!And after all this the bill................extremely expensive not justified AT ALL.Sorry
711: Title: La buona qualità della carne

Review: Sono stata in questo locale con il mio fidanzata giusto ieri... ci siamo trovati davvero molto bene, il servizio è impeccabile e cordialissimo. Abbiamo preso un tagliere misto come antipasto, composto da salame prosciutto bresaola e stracciatella... e poi abbiamo preso la fiorentina, ben 1kg di carne con contorno di patata tagliate a mano e patate arrosto... vi consiglio di prenotare, è impossibile trovare un tavolo disponibile.
712: Review: Tappa fissa a Londra per mangiare veramente benePersonale qualificato , gentile e simpatico .Antipasti appettitosi, primi buonissimi , la carne strepitosa e i dolci fatti in casa sono super
713: Review: Tartare buona ma molto piccante. La carne nella media, niente di straordinario.Le scaloppine al limone senza sapore.Complimenti al personale molto gentile ed educato.
714: Review: Dovendo recarmi a Londra con amici ho prenotato in questo ristorante dopo aver seguito la trasmissione di Alessandro Borghese. Devo dire ero molto scettica invece mi sono ricreduta. Abbiamo mangiato dell' ottima carne accompagnata da un buon vino rosso scelto tra una discreta varietà. Location accogliente e pulita. Il personale gentilissimo e il conto adeguato. Lo consiglio sicuramente .
715: Title: Vera tradizione italiana a Londra

Review: Locale in ottima posizione a South Kensington, ottimo il menù e carta dei vini, personale molto competente e affabile. Consigliato agli amanti della carne e a chi cerca un angolo di vera Italia a Londra. Prezzi in linea con la qualità delle portate e del servizio. Ci tornerò quanto prima
716: Review: Dopo aver visto la trasmissione Quattro Ristoranti con Alessandro Borghese, abbiamo deciso di cenare in questo ristorante e non siamo restati delusi.Locale molto bello, carni prelibate e di altissima qualità, personale molto gentile e disponibile.Assolutamente prenotare in anticipo per evitare di non trovare posto.
717: Review: Locale molto carino,personale italiano ed arredamento originale.La carne è di ottima qualità, abbiamo mangiato una tartare sublime e il filetto altrettanto di livello..il tutto accompagnato da una fresca Menabrea.Bella serata
718: Title: Overpriced meal, I get better filet mignon from the grocery store

Review: Seemed like a meat lover's dream -- gorgeous-looking dry aging cuts hanging in the window, a menu that looks like a newspaper and touts their exclusive Italian bovine sourcing that makes for the finest and most tender meat ... Turns out my husband makes a much better steak from our local grocery store, and for a much better price!!! Cool decor but food was SO disappointing (not just the meat, the sides as well) and this was by far our worst meal in London, even though it was one of the pricier ones. Service was also terrible - it felt like if you were not Italian they didn't want to wait on you. I would avoid.
719: Review: Ci è stato consigliato da un amico che vive a Londra. Carne molto buona e location particolare. Consigliato!
720: Title: Che sorpresa: a Londra ho gustato una delle migliori fiorentine!
