Review: Simpatico locale: personale -quasi tutto made in Italy- gentile e competente (grazie Enzo e Federica); buona cucina - made in Italy- e ottima, ma davvero ottima, la fiorentina così come i dolci. Cantina di qualità!Prezzi elevati, ma siamo a Londra!nico, paola and family
721: Review: We went to Macellaio on Easter Sunday (early dinner) by coincidence as initial place of our choice, near by, was closed. I have to admit, it was an amazing time accompanied by great and friendly staff and even better food / wine. Seriously, if you are in the area and looking for unpretentious place full of charm and character - you have to visit Macellaio! Simply "The Best!"
722: Review: Quirky entrance, but the restaurant at the back is all to be discovered!The butchers counter at the very front has the most incredible selection of fresh meats, and everything on the menu can be found there.We booked a table for 5 on a Tuesday night. The restaurant was busy and service seemed to be a little slow. We had a selection of beef carpaccio with parmesan shavings and rocket to start, followed by steak tartare (quite a small portion, but taste was second to none), orecchia d'elefante (BIG portion and delicious), scaloppine (3 of them, regular size), coda alla vaccinara (perfectly cooked) and one more dish - all plates were wiped clean, so we definitely all VERY MUCH enjoyed it. All accompanied by some Dolcetto and lovely bread.Cannot recommend this place highly enough for the quality of their meat. I would definitely ask the waiters next time how big portions are before ordering, but overall, would definitely go again.
723: Title: Outstanding quality food; super professional and friendly staff.

Review: Organised a birthday dinner for my niece last week. Not only was the food delicious, but the management and staff were so kind to her -- surprising us with a special birthday cake/candle after dimming the lights in the entire restaurant. They couldn't have been nicer ! But back to the food..... high quality ingredients and creative/authentic dishes (pastas). Great variety of cuts of and meat preparations. All around focus on quality of food (which is rare today in London restaurants of this kind). Atmosphere very casual -- so not "fine dining" -- but that doesn't matter....... delicious food with charming staff. Best combination. We look forward to returning. Grazie Carla.
724: Review: Just got home form Macellaio RC South Kensington it simply has to be the best meal I have ever, ever , ever had. From the moment we arrived we were warmly greeted and taken to our table from here things went from fabulous to extraordinary. The service, food and wine was amazing! I had the rump with gorgonzola and walnuts 15/10 magnificent! Whatever you do BOOK AND GO you will not regret it.
725: Title: Bravissimo!!! Best steak I ever had!!!

Review: Fresh cut of dry-aged beef, glass of flavorus red Italian wine, exclusive atmosphere of small Italian tavern...its a gastronomic orgasm! For true connoisseurs of meat must have to go!!!Thank you so much for such brilliant experience
726: Review: Ottimo ristorante in south kensigton. Personale molto gentile e alla mano,quasi tutto italiano. Location bella ben arredata ottima carta dei vini. La carne era molto buona cotta perfettamente. Prezzo non economicissimo ma neanche esagerato
727: Review: Ambiente particolare caratteristico...molto carino...personale gentile....l unica grande pecca il rapporto qualità prezzo...porzioni piccolissime, assurdo per quel prezzo avere porzioni cosi povere....poi la tagliata al gorgonzola è completamente un altra cosa...cmq per quanto riguarda la qualità sicuramente alta per essere a londra ma in italia sarebbe nel livello medio alto.Mi dispiace perche avevo molte aspettative...mi dispiace ma nn ritornerò...quasi una rapina
728: Review: We dined at this unusual amazing place the other night. We had a child in our group and also a friend who was vegetarian and gluten free. Coming from Australia that has the best meat in the world I wasn't expecting to be surprised. I was wrong! The whole experience was fantastic from the moment we entered the restaurant until we left. They bent over backwards to assist our friend who needed gluten-free and vegetarian , unbelievably in a meat restaurant. The staff were amazing, the food was absolutely delicious. I'd love to go again.
729: Review: Really good quality meat, you won't be dissapointed, however, be prepared to pay for it as the prices are quite high.
730: Review: My friends and I had such a lovely dinner yesterday night! The food and wine were incredible! The atmosphere was awesome.The staff were really friendly also.We were impressed also of their knowledge regarding the meat really well done to ELISA that made our night an amazing experience! Grazie!
731: Review: We bumped on Macellaio randomly with a friend of mine, even though they were fully booked they accommodate us by a table close to entrance. We spend there lots of time, having literally everything from starters to coffees, as everything was so good! There was a very friendly butcher who came to help us and advise us on our steak and also very helpful sommelier. Atmosphere was very relaxed and I call it a very nice experience. Will definitely go back!
732: Review: Me and my boyfriend had lunch here on a Monday. At the beginning it was really quiet and we were the only table. We've been served by Elisa who recommended a delicious board of carpaccio, steak tartare and salami. We accompanied the meal with an amazing bottle of wine and completed it with a very tasty and tender Beef Costata. We enjoyed the service and the food very much! I highly recommend this place if you're looking for some good Italian food! Thank you very much for the experience! We'll definitely come back
733: Review: The food was delicious & it was a great experience! We were celebrating my husbands birthday & could not have picked a better place. The food was outstanding!
734: Review: I've been in this restaurant with a couple of friends. The food was really tasty. Everything was perfect and the atmosphere was typical of an Italian restaurant, the waiter was amazing... he takes care of us from the beginning until the end, very professional. I'll come there again very soon.
735: Review: Now officially my favourite steakhouse anywhere.... My favourite restaurant in London.I've been here a few times in the last few months. Each time I visit and order a huge steak, well over a kilo each time I'm asked "are you sure you can finish it...." At the end of the meal they're smiling because I've finished it, I'm smiling because I'm happy and satisfied.I went there again last month. Had the Heart, nicely done, sliced cooked just right. Then I tried what they used to call Ox courage (the testicles), and the grand event, my one kilo Costata, rib steak, just some Olive oil, sea salt and the wonderful flavour of dry aged Fassona beef. Excellent. A caraf of Italian red wine did me good too.I tried a Zuppa Anglaise for dessert, it was ok.This is without doubt a super restaurant. Every time I visit London, I make sure I eat here at least once.If at all I can criticise a wee bit, I'd like to see a change in their dessert menu. The Tiramisu looked good but I don't like the flavour of coffee so I didn't have it. The other desserts maybe need a bit of change. I've seen people have the Tiramisu, they seem to enjoy it.
736: Title: La Carne purtroppo non era integra

Review: Il posto e molto bello e molto originale / anche il personale e molto gentile ... ma ho da discutere sulla fiorentina .Chiedendo da quanto partivano i tagli mi dicono da 700gr ...... in genere almeno 1,300 gr ci vuole tra filetto e controfiletto x chiamarsi tale .Purtroppo ci arriva Il grassetto ha un sapore rancido ....
737: Review: Here in SK had start the Roberto Costa's London history and here is possible eat a very slice of Italy inside the "Fassona" meat.What else (no citation)!Congrat RC for this and for the other two places in London.All is very good, the dishes, the environment, the flavours and the wines but five stars at the staff.I come back certainly and thumb up!
738: Title: La migliore immagine della ristorazione Italiana

Review: Ero in zona con amici e siamo stati attirati dalla vetrina dove pendevano tagli di carne per meravigliose fiorentine. Siamo entrati in questo piccolo locale e siamo stati accolti come raramente accade, con simpatia e professionalità. Personale italiano e molto ben preparato ad illustrare pietanze e vini. Il proprietario, originario di Genova ha portato a Londra la carne Fassona Piemontese e prodotti italiani di prima qualità. Ci ha simpaticamente intrattenuto e coccolato. Nell'attesa ci hanno "omaggiato", cosa rarissima, di ben due taglieri con focaccia genovese fatta in casa ed ottimi salumi. Il conto è stato adeguato a quanto è stato adeguato alla qualità del cibo. Lo consiglio vivamente e sicuramente tornando a Londra ci torno.
739: Review: Went for dinner with a friend/client. It's designed for meat lovers. You choose your cut of beef, they prepare it and show it to you before they cook it and you share from the middle. Also you can share starters. The food was delicious, gorgeous steak well cooked and tender. The wine was great- all Italian. The set up is unusual within a butcher's shop and the atmosphere relaxed. They serve the menus from newspapers. It was busy and noisy so if you want a formal quiet dinner this is not the place. For a great beef meal with friends its fantastic.
740: Review: Went there on a friday night to celebrate with my friend who I did not see for a year and it was absolutely stunning; From the moment we got through the door, Carola ( perfect host ), Patty who served us etc etc , thank you ever so much and keep up the good job.
741: Title: Un Vero ristorante di Carne in UK

Review: Sono stato qui per mi è stato consigliato da vari italiani residenti a Londra ...Ho mangiato benissimo, il filetto era di altissima qualità e cotto secondo tutti i principi della cottura media, piatto caldo e non bollente, ilPersonale aveva un po' troppa recita e poca professionalità ma per i prodotti 100&lode
742: Review: We were abroad and had not visited for a while. Macellaio is as excellent as ever, if not better. Great service, great food and great wine.
743: Review: Ci sono stato con la famiglia per pranzo. Location bella e molto calda. Ho prenotato e sono stato accolto con molta gentilezza e garbo. Buon tavolo e servizio puntuale. Carne eccellente. Veramente di una qualità sopraffina. Ben cotta secondo i gusti dei commensali e servita in modo adeguato. Contorni così così, ma questo rileva poco. Ci siamo fermati anche a fare due chicchiere con il personale (rigorosamente in italiano per il piacere di parlare la propria lingua) e abbiamo scoperto tante belle persone. Lo consiglio vivamente e per me è un appuntamento fisso.
744: Title: Best of Italy in London a Must

Review: If you want to test Italian food and Italian atmosphere you must come here. You can eat fantastic meat, very very tipical dishes and an incredible choice of good wine. I had battuta all'albese as a starter and entrecote as main. Both delicious and served with a fantastic Red wine suggested by the barman. Frendly service small place but very very beautiful. Excellent price 52£.
745: Review: Came here with my 4 yo, and even though this is definitely the best Italian meat restaurant I've been to we were welcomed and very happy. The staff were very kind and we had a lovely dinner. Not the place you bring tired children too but my son behaved and loved the pasta with fesan ragu very much. I had a piece of meat which was prepared with great care and the wine was excellent! Definitely a place to visit again!
746: Review: I have been there for work few times. Good service overall and food was ok, especially the pasta while the meat was very good. Decent Italian food overall a bit pricey.
747: Title: For the carnivore in Kensington

Review: When I saw the meant hanging in the window I couldn't resist dining at this cosy Italian restaurant.We had lard with honey and walnuts a starter and I had a 350 gram entrecote with beans for main. It was all good, but not worth the price.
748: Title: Best meat ever in London

Review: One of the best meat restaurants I have ever tried.The imperiale is a must, tender tartare meat, fine carpaccio and I recommend closing with delicate stracciatella.Costata is also great. Prices are on pair with the food quality.Wines are a bit expensive but it won't s happen you going there and pick up a bad one.Desert are also a must, tiramisù is very peculiar and tasty!We spent 56£ each but every penny was worth it.Staff is friendly and welcoming
749: Review: Buon posto vicino al Museo di storia naturale. Cibo di qualità e ottimo servizio.sono stato con mia figlia per pranzo. Caffè pessimo.
750: Review: Meraviglioso ristorante che serve piatti a base di carne di prima qualità. Ho avuto modo di assaggiare una tartare di carne e una costata servita su pietra lavica davvero ottime! Il servizio è ottimo e molto caratteristico, il personale, praticamente tutto italiano, è gentilissimo, molto simpatico e sa consigliare i clienti nella scelta dei piatti! Il prezzo è certamente superiore agli standard italiani, ma perfettamente adeguato alla media londinese!
751: Review: We went for dinner before a show at the Royal Albert Hall, therefore we were in a hurry, which was a shame, otherwise we would have eaten more and taken our time to savour starters as well. We ordered 200g fillet and a rump steak. Both were seasoned really well and the sides of chips and green beans were good too. The fillet was tender and cooked to exactly how I like it (medium rare). I didn't find it too pricey. £18 for 200g fillet, although it did not come with sides (being around £4.50 each was steep), but the meat is really good and one of the best I've had so far in London!
752: Review: We all struggled a bit with the raw meat hanging up in the window but once inside and past that bit the atmosphere was buzzing, the waiting staff were lovely and OMG the food was incredible. Fabulous beef – not cheap but then you get what you pay for, and the quality was wonderful. Wines were particularly expensive but all in all a great night out and can’t wait for the next visit.
753: Review: I was at the Macellaio Restaurant today for lunch and it was a thoroughly enjoyable experience. Service was excellent, they managed to fit us in without a reservation and all the waiters were extremely corteous. The atmosphere was fantastic, they cut the meat right in front of you. If there were one thing that could improve, it was that the meat was only tepid when it arrived. Nonetheless, I fully recommend the restaurant! It is perfect for lunch and dinner and also good for families.
754: Review: Wow - great atmosphere, excellent service and the best steak I've ever had in London. I almost didn't write this review because I don't want too many people to find out how great this place is. We had steak tartare wth Gorgonzola (applied with a blowtorch), bull's testicles(!), ribeye and T-bone, and every mouthful was an absolute joy. Our group ended the meal completely full and very satisfied - to be pleasantly surprised by a bill that was less than exorbitant. Only one very tiny quibble - why garnish desserts with cress??
755: Review: Sono stato qui con la mia ragazza a marzo dopo aver conosciuto il ristorante grazie al programma 4 ristoranti di Sky (vinto dal ristorante) e presi dalla curiosità ci siamo catapultati subito il primo giorno di vacanza.. risultato?? Ottimo come le aspettative!!! Siamo arrivati senza prenotazione e nonostante il locale fosse pieno e quasi al completo ci hanno fatto cmq accomodare su un bancone intorno a una colonna da dove vedevamo perfettamente come venivamo preparate le portate e quando il macellaio tagliava le fette (e che fette) di carne al monento!! Menù eccellente ottima la scelta di carni crude o cotte, affettati di qualità e eccezionali anche i formaggi!! Dolci molto buoni (conisglio il bianco al basilico)..il tutto condito da un simpaticissimo e cordiale personale!! Il conto e i prezzi giusti in rapporto alla qualità e là tipolOgia del menù!! Dovessimo tornare a Londra sarà sicuramente una tappa da ripetere!! COMPLIMENTI!!!
756: Review: Abbiamo avuto il piacere di mangiare in questo ristorante... la definirei una bellissima esperienza... il personale è molto professionale e cordiale, il cibo eccellente...per non parlare della vasta scelta di vini di qualità! Da buon amante del vino italiano non ho potuto rinunciare a chiedere al simpatico Enzo( il cameriere che ci ha servito ) un giro in cantina...un piacere trovare così tante etichette italiane importanti!Non aggiungerei altro se no il consiglio quasi "dovere" di andarci se passate per Londra!!!! Ne vale la pena.
757: Review: This restaurant is great - fantastic meat, great atmosphere, good service and even better cocktails. The place is packed and noisy - but it just add to the atmosphere - and the meat.... fantastic!!! I actually considered to NOT write this review - because I fear it will make it even more difficult to get a table there in the future.... but that would be unfair to the place and the people working there ;-) So thank you for a great evening
758: Review: La carne era tenera,gustosa e cotta al punto giusto. I dolci ottimi e delicati. Ci è stato sugggerito un ottimo vino. Il personale gentile e sorridente. Lo consiglio vivamente.
759: Review: Siamo andati a pranzo.. un freddo bestiale! Su 5 piatti 3 sono arrivati freddi.. altro che 4 ristoranti di borghese !!!
760: Review: Il locale è molto carino, i piatti buonissimi e il personale gentile e disponibile. Vale la pena provare. Ci tornerò sicuramente!!
761: Title: First class in every way

Review: I visited Macellaio Roberto Costa in South Kensington last night with my 10 year old daughter. We couldn't have had a better experience. The food was delicious, fresh, tasty, perfect. The staff were so attentive. Nothing was too much trouble and they made a real fuss of my daughter, much to her delight. The atmosphere was superb and the extra touches like stabbing the steak knife into the table and serving the steaks under steel cloches. Brilliant. I would definitely recommend Macellaio Roberto Costa.
762: Review: Today was my second visit to Macellaio RC and again it was great. It is such an unpretentious place yet beautiful with a professional but friendly service. The food was top notch: Zips di Zucca as a starter and had a Steak Tartare as main with a delicious side of hand cut chips. Recommended for any occasion.
763: Review: Visited Macellaios on Saturday with family. Was visiting from Cardiff and was recommended my nephew and his partner who live in London and recommended This was a definite treat. The meat was divine. We all had different. For myself I had the rump with Gorgonzola and walnut. Was totally surprised when this came as a sort of butter and not a sauce. So tasty though. Everyone said their steaks were cooked perfectly. My sister in law had the liver which was on a bed of puréed red onion with spinach cooked in butter. Glorious. Will say this is an expensive restaurant but definitely one to treat yourself.
764: Title: Superior Quality Food and Drinks and all

Review: We have been at Macellaio South Kensington a couple of times already. It quickly became our favourite steak place in London. The service was very attentive and always spared a few moments chatting about the food or the drinks. You really feel you are being taken care of. I recommend L'Imperiale to share, it is a selection of cured and raw meat...well they will explain better what it is. It was fantastic, it was melt in the mouth and incredibly tasty. As to the mains, we have had the T-Bone, the Rump, the Rib eye (we always share) and they have always been cooked to perfection. One of the things we really like is the fact that there was lots of information on exactly where the meat,the food and the wines come from.The wines were excellent, every occasion we followed the advice of the Main Maitre after explaining our taste, and he never failed.Consider it a treat, as it is not cheap, but well worth every penny.
765: Review: Ma che ne sanno gli inglesi di questo cibo, di questo servizio, di quest'ospitalità! La carne è sublime, Nico è dolcissimo, Patrizia e Riccardo disponibilissimi e alla mano, Cristina divertente.. È il nostro nuovo posto preferito di Londra!
766: Title: E s a g e r a t o

Review: Venni qui un anno fa per il mio compleanno con la mia fidanzata di allora. Cena indimenticabile, ho mangiato davvero benissimo. Tartare allo Zola davvero di qualità è ben presentata è costata tenerissima. L'ambiente è perfetto curato ma non formale. I prezzi ovviamente sono da Londra qui di alti ma il rapporto qualità prezzo è molto più favorevole del 90% deiocali della zona. Consigliato a mani basse a chiunque sia in cerca di una cucina a base di carne difficile da dimenticare ;)
767:
Review: This is a lovely,  quirky (meat hanging in the window) and highly original restaurant. 

The meat is fantastic - some of the best (if not best?) i have ever eaten. 

The service is well meaning and enthusiastic but has some improvement to make.
768: Review: Today, we went unexpectilly to Macellaio, it was really fantastic!!!! The waitress Elisa was unbelieveble!!! Such a kind person, very good service and especially The Food don't forget, we will return to this restaurant for the super good food but also for Elisa!!!! You meant a lot to us! Big Kiss Marco & Laurence
769: Review: Ho visto la trasmissione 4 ristoranti su La 8...e volevo davvero complimentarmi con il proprietario Roberto. Sia per il locale e il cibo, sia per aver avuto l'ultimà di apprezzare anche il ristorante nel mercato ortofrutticolo. E soprattutto per aver donato 2,500euro alla prioritaria. Davvero un gran persona, e se verrò a Londra verrò di certo verrò a cena nel vostro ristorante!!
770: Title: Davvero ottima carne, prezzo giusto (a Londra)

Review: Veramente ottima qualità di tutta la cena.Fantastica tartare all'albese, tagliata cotta alla perfezione, cheese cake buonissima.2 tagliate, 2 tartare, 2 birre, 2 acque, 2 dolci e 1 caffè : 104sterlinePrezzo secondo me giusto a Londra.Personale gentile, ritorneremo.
771: Title: Exactly what I was looking for
Review: Amazing, clean, organized and super cool restaurant. The best Italian restaurant in London if you are looking for proper meat.
772: Review: This is the best place in London for Italian meat! You can order tartare, steak and a great selection of sides. The meat is displayed at the front of the restaurant and the butcher prepares dishes in front of you. The meat is also shown to you before it's cooked to your preference (from blue, all the way to volcanic). We chose a £65 bottle of red wine but it was the best I've ever tasted! We've been twice and will definitely go back. It's a tad pricey (3 of us went all out and spent a healthy £240!) but going every 6 months is a good choice.
773: Review: Thank you to our lovely waiter Enzo. We had a birthday dinner in which 5 of us ate a fiorentina and a costata with some sides. The meat was excellent and the service was very good. Definately a place for meat lovers! The staff also put candles on our cake and turned the lights of for us at the perfect time. I will definitely be back.
774: Title: Meat, meat and more meat :-)

Review: This Italian place was absolutely FANTASTIC ! We went here for lunch to celebrate a friends birthday only last weekend. There was 8 of us. Oh man ! The meat was overwhelming - in a good way. Sorry for any vegetarians or vegans - with all due respect, this is not for you !!We had a whole bunch of starters - tongue was delicious, the ragu pasta was perfect - but for me personally it was the Steak Tartare - simply sublime ! there are 4 or 5 different cuts of meat, really loads to choose from. I shared a 600gm of Fiorentina Steak. Delicious !!Parking on a Sunday is not too bad.I highly recommend this place, but please book in advance to avoid any disappointment !
775: Title: Una scoperta italiana nella Londra italiana

Review: Buonasera siamo stati, su prenotazione di nostro figlio che vive in uk a cena da il macellaio . Una bellissima scoperta . Ambiente super confortevole, arredamento di gusto : una vecchia macelleria !!!!!Personale all'80% italiano .... tutti molto gentili e che amano laLoro terra di origine . Mangiato benissimo , servizio. Super ottimo . Lo consiglio e ringrazio Mirco Ed Enzo per la bellissima accoglienza .
776: Title: Giornata con i figli impegnati in PhD in U.K.

Review: Grazie ad Enzo che ci ha introdotto alla cucina del macellaio abbiamo gustato in cinque una fiorentina di 2.6 kg ed altre specialità dall'antipasto al dessert.Abbiamo anche goduto di un clima conviviale estremamente gradevoleI vini un Barbera e un barolo favolosoIl conto non lo conosco ancora.
777: Title: good and authentic italian food but overpriced

Review: nice restaurant, in the heart of south ken that offers prime cut italian beef. the "antipasti" and teh tartare were excellent. my main, the pear and balsamic vinegar tagliata was small and not up to my expectations. the tiramisu was not a tiramisu at all! ( no mascarpone no coffee!!!!) overall, for the price we payed (75 £ each) I was expecting more.
778: Review: I had the pleasure to have a dinner with 2 friends of mine at Macellaio RC in South Kensington. Being the only Italian in the group I wanted them to experience the best Italian food and after some research I brought them there. Amazing food and service: the beef is astonishing and the quality of the food is extremely high. We had the pleasure to be served by Enzo and Patrizia, two extremely professional Italian waiters with witch we enjoyed the experience at Macellaio RC. We will come back there soon. The pricing of the food is good, and the wine is well selected.
779: Review: It's our favourite local restaurant! Just went for a lunch date with my husband today and had a fantastic meal. I'm not a big meat eater (could easily live w/o it) but I absolutely love the "battuta all'albese" (beef tartare with olive oil, salt and pepper) to the extent that once I had it for starter and again for dessert! Being Italian I love pasta and usually have "ravioli al Tocco" with a slow cooked ragù, and today they were great as usual. The tiramisù is homemade and fantastic. There's a very good wine list and the staff is very friendly, our waiter Enzo spoiled us. Can't wait to be back!
780: Title: Un ottimo ricordo d'Italia!...per chi vuole ricordare

Review: Mi sono recato in questo locale pochi giorni fa con un gruppo di amici (11 persone) sotto consiglio degli stessi per la nostra prima cena durante il nostro weekend di vacanza a Londra. Abbiamo deciso di fare un menù uguale per tutti composto da tagliere misto iniziale + carne con contorni (se non erro costate per tutti). Appena seduto ci è stato chiesto, in modo molto garbato e coinvolgente (forse anche troppo per il tipo di cliente che sono io) se volessimo un drink pre-dinner e abbiamo optato per uno spritz generale. Dopo uno spritz, un tagliere misto mediocre (dal mio punto di vista, sono emiliano e sui salumi ovviamente sono super critico), una buona quantità di carne con vino annesso (6-7 bottiglie in 11) con caffè e qualche amaro sul tavolo il prezzo è stato di 100€ a testa. Personalmente ho trovato il conto salato...in quanto italiano appena arrivato a Londra la stessa cifra l'avrei spesa altrove! Comunque Londra è Londra e i prezzi sono alti si sa ma forse, per una categoria di clienti come me (ragazzo giovane, abituato alla buona cucina italiana con il suo rapporto qualità prezzo) non ne vale la pena! Comunque il locale è molto carino e caratteristico, il personale super disponibile e tutto quello che abbiamo mangiato era buono! Forse avevo troppe aspettative, lo consiglierei ad un italiano che è a Londra da un mese non da un giorno :)
781: Review: We came across this restaurant by accident. The window is more like a butchers and we nearly walked past it. The menu has offal and meat. The steak was exceptionally good. Personally I would have like a sauce with it, but that was frowned upon by the waiter - fair enough, the meat was good. It didn't come cheap, but well worth the price.
782: Review: Five of us had a delicious and unusual meat experience here for Sunday lunch. The exuberant and well informed staff were able to guide us to the meat delights on offer, don't take your veggie friends here!Great sides too, vegetable nicely presented and freshly cooked, all delicious!
783: Review: Elisa, my waitress, was excellent. She served me promtply, with a smile, and explained to me the kind of meat i was eating. This restaurant serves fresh, high quality meat- it is also a butcher. You feel as if you were buying the meat from the farm. The food is reasonable priced. I had teo courses for 31 pounds. The restaurant has a friendly atmosphere, it plays friendly music. It has a strong italian flavour and it fits well in south kensington - the most continental of all neighboors in london. I had milanese, a simple italian dish. However, i could feel the freshness of the ingredients. It felt very light. The staff cares deeply about the restaurent. Highly recommended.
784: Title: True italian meat place, meat from italy, very delicious, must go

Review: This place is all around meat.
The Meat is from Italy, from Piedmont
it tastes excellent and as we were a group we had the T-Bone for 3 people.
It was superiorly done.

Wines are well selected but, unfortunately, relatively epensive compared to meat.
785: Title: Delicious meat, a place to go if you like beef !

Review: I went to Macellaio for luncheon with a friend. We had battuta and tagliata nuda. I especially recommend the battuta zola, the gorgonzola pairs onderfully well with the tartare. The meat is nothing short of estupendous, the tagliata nuda with some Barbera Montalbera wine (silky, rich, long finish) was just incredible. There may be no better place for beef in London !
786: Review: Il Macellaio Roberto Costa di South Kensington è un posto fantastico...già la vetrina con i tagli di carne in frollatura è una dichiarazione d'intenti. Il personale è meraviglioso, disponibili, cordiali, sorridenti senza essere "forzati" od invadenti, c'è una atmosfera di divertimento all'interno del ristorante.Io ero con 2 bambini di 6 e 4 anni e sono stati assolutamente fantastici con loro (hanno portato anche il grande a visitare la cucina...)Il cibo è ottimo, qualità altissima: la steak tartare che ho mangiato era una roba da levare il fiato, livello eccelso tutto preparato a vista.Ci sono varie scelte possibili per la carne, andrebbero davvero provate tutte...e tornerò sicuramente a farlo.Ovviamente la qualità costa, ma sono soldi assolutamente ben spesiComplimenti
787: Review: Ormai un'istituzione a Londra, ha aperto ben 3 sedi.Carne meravigliosa, salumi ottimi, personale gentilissimo, simpatico sommelier.Prezzi un po' alti but London is London...
788: Title: Italiano, ma siamo a Londra for God sake!

Review: Sicuramente italiano, si sente parlare molto italiano, dal personale che è italiano, ai clienti, in maggior parte italiani.La carne è molto buona, cucinata molto bene, è senz'altro il punto di forza del locale, come si evidenzia anche dal nome: andateci se amate le bistecche, lasciate perdere se siete vegetariani. Non mi ha entusiasmato come antipasti e dolci. Conto in linea con la qualità. buona scelta di vini italiani.Infine, per spiegare il titolo: se siete turisti a Londra e volete l'atmosfera inglese non è il posto. Se vivete a Londra e avete voglia di un angolo di Italia, questo fa per voi.
789: Title: Doesn't quite deliver on expectations!

Review: Been meaning to go here many times as I pass it almost every day and the meat hanging in the window always is of slightly ghoulish curiosity.We came on a Sunday afternoon and there was a healthy size clientele. The restaurant and staff are certainly welcoming even if the interior and furnishings are on the eclectic side of the taste spectrum! It really annoys me when a restaurant opens for business but then says that certain menu items aren't available... even more so when it relates to its most important meat cuts!That being said the starters were delicious and the steaks were cooked perfectly with nicely done side dishes. Decent wine selection and with desserts, coffees and the grappas (has to be done!) the bill for two was a hefty £223 including service.Not sure if this is trying to be an upmarket steak restaurant or a good Italian restaurant but whatever it doesn't quite measure up to the best in either category .... I would still go again but you can get better value for money in this part of London.
790: Review: 非常美味，牛排上晒满大颗粒的海盐很入味，大块的肉，让人回想起佛罗伦萨紫色勋章的牛排店，不过牛排表面再焦一点就更好了。店员也很友好，走时接近8点门口已经开始排队。
791: Review: We came here for celebrate one of our colleague's birthday, we were a very loud group of 9-10 people and the staff managed it very well, they let us feel like at home. The food was outstanding, 100% Italian. We really enjoyed our lunch, thank you.
792: Title: Italiano vero che ci fa ben figurare

Review: Ristorante italiano con carne e prodotti di ottima qualità. Piatti particolari, curati e ben presentati, tradizione italiana un po' rivisitata. Il personale è tutto italiano, molto cordiale, amichevole e allo stesso tempo professionale. Unica nota negativa: visto il costo decisamente altino, le porzioni potrebbero essere più abbondanti.
793: Review: Me and my husband went here a week ago as we are Italians and we were looking for a good place to have dinner, we just walked in and it was feeling like home!We tried the carpaccio and the Bruschette con Lardo and then we got the Fiorentina!!!It was amazing perfect cooked and so yummy!!Elisa gave us the best service and she was taking care of us so thanks a lot!!Andrea e Matteo
794:
Review: I've travelled the world. This place is the closest if not on the spot Italian. Great food, just like the Italians like it. If you're a veggie or vegan don't come. 
I will be back a hundred times!
Ciao!
795: Review: Sabato sera siamo stati dal Macellaio per una serata carnivora... Antipasti e carne eccezionale... carta dei vini abbastanza buona ma il Dessert immangiabile, dava di carne!!!! Un dessert in 4 perché eravamo più di sazi e tutti noi abbiamo subito detto che dava di carne !! Però ci torno senza ordinare il dolce.. Riccardo il cameriere molto simpatico.. a presto
796: Review: Accoglienza calorosa da veri italiani, staff gentilissimo e preparato, qualità dei cibi ottima, desserts compresi. Ci siamo sentiti a casa! Tempi di attesa giusti e per quanto riguarda il conto, considerando di mangiare carne di qualità e bere vini italiani a Londra non ci possiamo lamentare!
797: Review: I'm an Italian butcher, I had dinner last night whit my family Amazing food, excellent rib steak,The best in London, congratulations to Elisa and Manuel our waiters,The service was impeccable.Many thanks to all Macellaio's Staff
798: Review: In vacanza con mia figlia decidiamo di cenare in questo ristorante che io già conoscevo... che dire cibo sempre ottimo , carne super e servizio impeccabile... i ragazzi in sala sono sempre gentilissimi...Anche mia figlia è rimasta contenta. Se si passa da Londra tappa obbligata!
799: Review: We had our dinner here last week, the place is small but cosy and the staff is professional, during the short waiting we have been offered a glass of wine. The meal was great, the menu had a wide selection of dishes and the meat was very fresh, we had a table in front of the kitchen where the meat was displayed and cut in front of you. We have been served by Elisa, she was very nice and extremely professional, she suggested as the best dishes to have, giving us information about them as well. During the night she really cared about us always asking if everything was alright. we do suggest to have a dessert there, they are really good! We will definitely go there again!!!
800: Title: ALLA RICERCA DI PIATTI E PIETANZE PARTICOLARI: TROVATI! DA NON PERDERE.

Review: In quattro giorni di soggiorno a Londra, ho avuto il piacere di pranzare e cenare nei tre Ristoranti "Il Macellaio RC" di Roberto Costa. In tutti tre i locali io e la mia famiglia siamo rimasti letteralmente impressionati dalla bontà e dalla genuinità dei cibi serviti da personale competente, disponibile, affabile e sempre pronto ad accertarsi che tutto fosse di nostro gradimento, mettendoci al corrente, ad ogni portata, della provenienza e della preparazione di ciò che ci accingevamo a mangiare e bere.Il locale Macellaio RC in South Kensington è accogliente e ben disposto. Ci siamo fermati per un pranzo veloce ed in cerca di piatti particolari ma genuini. Dopo un antipasto misto di salumi di ottima qualità, abbiamo ordinato ravioli al tocco e trenette al pesto (rigorosamente genovese). Ottimo il sapore ed il grado di cottura. Ci siamo avventurati poi ad assaggiare piatti che non sono per noi all’ordine del giorno: cuore e testicoli cucinati in maniera favolosa e ossobuco, con contorno di insalata di finocchi e arance di Sicilia, sapori nuovi che rimangono impressi. Il tutto accompagnato da una vasta scelta di vini sapientemente suggeriti dal personale ed adatti ai cibi consumati. Complimenti vivissimi al titolare Roberto Costa che abbiamo avuto il piacere di conoscere e di renderci conto che è veramente una persona semplice ed unica sia nel rapporto con la clientela che col personale: secondo me è il datore di lavoro che tutti vorrebbero! Abbiamo visto anche la trasmissione di Alessandro Borghese “4 Ristoranti” e siamo pienamente d’accordo che “Il Macellaio RC” di Roberto Costa sia risultato il miglior ristorante Italiano a Londra: la sua competenza in materia e il suo gesto finale non fanno che avvalorare la mia stima nei suoi riguardi. Complimenti!
801: Review: We booked this to celebrate a special occasion as a couple, having heard great things. The concept is great and we were really looking forward to a lovely evening. Unfortunately it proved to be a huge let-down. We were put in the soulless basement where one could hear a pin drop and we could easily have joined in the conversation with the couple next to us, had they been talking. The drinks order was wrong, and our water was simply forgotten. The two dishes that we were most excited about were unavailable despite it being relatively early on a Thursday evening. Although the starters were, admittedly, delicious when they finally arrived after a good forty minutes. Sadly, that was the only positive of the evening. Having been advised not to order the size of steak that I wanted, when it arrived it was too small and not with the correct accompaniments that had been ordered. So while I ate my steak without any sides, my girlfriend discovered that her supposedly rare steak (at circa £50) was, in fact, medium/well done. When we sent it back (reluctantly, as we hate to cause a scene) the manager was incredibly condescending and patronising, suggesting that we were just ignorant. He even brought out a small slice of rare steak pretending it was ours, in an attempt to make us look silly. Of course, in the grand scheme of things, this is not a problem and I am usually happy just to have a plate of food in front of me. But at the prices they charge, and when steak is what you're famous for, this is inexcusable. I have no doubt that Macellaio will continue to do well because Kensington clientele are highly unlikely to venture into some of the more undiscovered boroughs of London where chefs actually have to serve up something genuinely delicious (at a fifth of the price) in order to earn their reputation, but for those who want their food served with passion but without the pretence and snootiness, I would wholly advise to look elsewhere.To their credit, our food was refunded, but the evening was ruined and we will not be recommending this place to anyone.
802: Title: Löjligt bra, gott och gemyt
Review: Vi var tre som delade på 1,5 kg entrecote, helt grymt. Bra viner, bra service. Lite högljutt men restaurangen var proppfull. Jag skall tillbaka.
803: Title: Buzzing, good quality meat, service with room for improvement

Review: Macellaio holds to its name: Butcher in English, the quality of the meat is very good and I would recommend the Battuta all'Albese which is a tartar stake in Italian style which has a very simple and basic dressing; the low impact of this on the overall taste leave the dish's success dependant solely on the quality of the meat. It is really good. Cured ham cut tick by knife was very tasty and the burrata served with it was not one of the best I ever had but still satisfactory. As far as the main course it was a bit surprising that the waitress didn't ask how we would have like the meat cooked and that resulted in a slightly overcooked costata which was very tasty. It feels like you are in a restaurant owned by the Antionori wine producer as the wine list is full of their produce coming from Tuscany and other regions of Italy, also the attention of the maître de salle while consulting the wine list is a bit pushy as it seems aimed more at selling the most expensive bottle rather than providing advise: it is on the verge of being annoying. The wine list is overall very interesting even if the prices seems steep. The buss boys/girls are very active but could be more attentive. In substance very good meat, buzzing informal atmosphere and priced on the high side for the overall quality you get. Of note: as the name of the restaurant means butcher they also sell meat and it is worth trying it as Italian meat has generally a stronger taste than British one.
804: Review: I went for dinner with a friend of mine and had a great time! The food was excellent, the service was immaculate. Elisa who was our waitress took great care of us and honestly one of the best places I have been to in terms of service and authenticity.
805: Review: Nascondere un prodotto mediocre dietro l'insegna del "ristorante italiano" è facile. Qui parliamo di eccellenza. Vorrei ringraziare Enzo e Patty per il servizio UNICO. Tornerò.
806: Review: Che dire? Locale veramente carino con personale veramente in gamba e preparato. Ti fanno sentire a casa e prestano incredibile attenzione al cliente.Le carni sono fantastiche. Provata la tartara e la costata con patate al forno. Tutto ottimo. Carne spaziale, per sapore, morbidezza e cottura.Unici tanti dolenti: il dolce (non mi ha entusiasmato, decisamente inferiore rispetto alla media del locale), ma soprattutto il prezzo. Un antipasto di tartara, una costata da 600kg, pane, un'insalata, un bicchiere di vino, una birra, acqua e un dolce: TOT 95 sterline. Decisamente troppo. Mi aspettavo massimo 80.Decisamente consigliato, qualità alta, location carina, ma prezzi inaccettabili.
807: Review: Very nice restaurant , excellent food, friendly staff. Meat is the word here. Not cheap though. Worth trying.
808: Title: Delicious Italian Steakhouse in Kensington!

Review: Recently when visiting London for a relative's birthday party, we were taken to this amazing steakhouse. Before arriving here, I had peeked at the menu, but had no idea of what we were about to experience. Fassona beef, from Piedmontese cows, raised in the north of Italy, is amazingly delicious. Seems there is a lower fat and connective tissue content to the meat and therefore it is tender and flavorful, but with fewer calories. I had never tasted any beef like this in my life.We digested the menu and then ordered our "cuts". Four people decided upon the Fiorentina (T-bone), another the Filetto (fillet mingion) and two of us the Tailgate (rump steak) in two different preparations. I had been in Montana a month before and had a Culotte, (rump) steak there, and was curious to compare the two.We ordered a bottle of wine and were warned that it was the last of it's kind and that's when the service got weird. Some first courses arrived with bread and there was delicious olive oil and balsamic vinegar, but no vessels in which to pour the liquids - 15 minutes later that was solved. A wooden board, with the meat we had ordered, was presented and it was a good thing. The filetto was 250g which was way too large for the person who ordered it. They cut it smaller and everyone was happy. This was the theater part of the dinner.Everything was fairly well paced until they delivered the two Tagliate steaks a good 5 minutes before the others. We started to enjoy it anyway, but it wasn't conducive to a coherent meal. By the way, this steak was better than the one I had in Montana, (sorry US beef suppliers) The "special" steaks were then presented and dinner went on as usual, except a request to supply additional vegetables and chips (steak fries), took twenty minutes to complete.If it sounds like this was an unpleasant experience, it wasn't. Regardless of the uneven service, we had a really fun night and the food was fantastic. Had the service been a little more consistent they would have earned a fifth star.If you think you know beef, but haven't had Fasonna, check this out, it's fantastic!
809: Review: Really???? 4 1/2 stars.....Really????1: bread basket, mediocre bread and stale rolls and bread stir2: pasta, very tasty, almost cold walnut sauce, tiny serving3: rib steak, very tasty meat, cooked perfectly, excessive bone and not trimmed very well at all. Order twice as much as you might think. Smallest serving is 18 oz4: orange and fennel salad.....the highlight of the meal.5: house chianti....quite good.....small pourTotal price 65 poundsEven in London I've had better dinners.
810: Title: Molto buono, prezzi di Londra

Review: Si sta bene in questo angolo di Italia a South Kensington.Tartare, affettati e carne di qualità ottime. Possibilità di scegliere la pesatura della carne.Prezzi chiaramente da Londra (60-70 pounds a testa)
811: Title: the best meat in London

Review: We visited in January 2017, the best experience to start the year and treat ourself!It was our first time and the butcher Alessio suggests us what to eat, we couldn't miss the tartare, DELICIOUS! Meat has exceed our expectations! Costs are worthy.The staff tried to makes us laugh every time.
812: Review: Highly recommend. Best steak I've ever tasted! From outside, I wouldn't have chose, however, I am so pleased that my partner wanted to. Very family friendly, but even I wasn't put off by that. It really is a must if you enjoy steak
813: Title: Sadly, a very disappointing experience indeed :(

Review: It pains me deeply to write this review, because our first visit to the restaurant in Oct 2013 (then called Maxela) was amazing. We had a truly fantastic meal and the food absolutely amazing. But I have to be honest about our experience in Dec 2016, because it was so very far from that. In short, we were extremely disappointed.The meatball starter was truly horrible. It was so dry, over-cooked & tasteless, I spat mine back out into the plate. As did a few others.The main course was hit & miss. Some really enjoyed their steak, but myself & a few others got a bum deal. What looked like a nice piece of meat ended up being very sinewy & fatty. All I got was a few mouthfuls of decent steak.And then the chips. They were very nice but we only got about three or four each. Literally. So very mean given how expensive the meal ended up being.Then dessert. Nothing to write home about. Again, the batter was very over-cooked and there wasn't much of it. Totally under-whelming, I'm afraid.For what ended up being a £70 meal each, it was really disappointing. Especially when compared to the amazing experience we had there a few years ago. It couldn't have been further from that. Very over-priced for what we got, and the food was, on the whole, really quite poor.I honestly can't work out the reason for this, other than the first time we went, we ate à la carte. This time we were made to eat off a set group menu (which limited our choice), and given we knew the overall meal was going to be expensive, we decided to opt for the cheapest £30 option. I would therefore conclude by saying...avoid the set menu and eat à la carte!Lastly, there was a mess with the bill at the end. If it wasn't for one of my eagle-eyed friends, I would have missed the fact that each of us were over-charged by about £5. That was sorted by the manager straight away, but it made the end of an already disappointing night rather stressful.On the whole it's such a shame, because what was our favourite Meat Club venue, has ironically now become one of the worst.
814: Review: Visited in December 2016...from the starters the breads to the mains to the desserts FaultlessThe oxtail mains was outstanding and yet again my Favourite Panecotta with sweet basil and caramel brittle on topThe vegetables were cooked to perfection the breads including tomato bread olive bread focaccia lip smacking fantasticHighly highly recommended
815: Review: Abbiamo cenato all ultimo dell anno.Locale piccolo ma carino personale stra-gentile,cucina veramente ottima.Lo consiglio assolutamente
816: Review: Assolutamente ottimo sotto ogni punto di vista. La carnevè davvero saporita e ben cucinata dal fuoco genovese che l'ha creato. Il posto è caro ma merita
817: Review: Been there a few times now and they don't let you down. The steaks are absolutely fabulous. We had a T-bone, which was so huge that we had to share it. My wife showed an interest in their gin list and they gave her in depth info on and taster of the types of gin she thought she might like. It is not the cheapest restaurant, but definitively worth it.Will be going there again soon.
818: Review: Tutto perfetto, ho cenato il 30 dicembre 2016. Carne eccellente. Personale gentilissimo. La responsabile all'accoglienza super gentile. Un tagliere gratis per l'attesa. Un altro tagliere gratis, dopo, per un ritardo che non c'era. Vino eccellente e abbinato bene . Mia figlia ha detto che la pasta era ottima, noi non l'abbiamo mangiata perché non ce la facevamo più.... Prezzo onesto, ... mantenetelo sempre così.Ci ritornerò sicuramente, forse proverò anche le altre sedi.Ci hanno fatto sentire coccolati con la loro gentilezza e cordialità.
819: Review: Sicuramente il posto di presenta molto bene di primo impatto e l apparenza non inganna. La cordialità e la simpatia sono di casa e la qualità del cibo non è da meno. Abbiamo preso due tagliate semplici con rucola e grana di dimensioni modeste, non troppo abbondante ma nemmeno troppo ristrette. Ci è stato offerto nell attesa un piccolo tagliere di bresaola e salame molto buono e molto gradito. Il costo è stato di circa 42£ con acqua e ovviamente mancia inclusa nel conto. Prezzi piu bassi a londra non esistono questo è lo standard e la qualità merita.
820: Review: I really liked this place, the only reason I have rated 4 as I think it's overpriced. The meat was gorgeous it didn't need any additional seasoning or sauce (I am a lover of salt) which was extremely surprising. The portion sizing was a bit small. We went for rib eye 600g for 2 people and it was a bit fatty but like I said the meat was 5/5 beautiful, we would probably order about 800g next time as it was small. The chocolate cake is more like a brownie and once again... small portion. I recommend the mash to go with your meat it's amazing super creamy yum.
821: Review: Ho scelto questo posto per la cena di capodanno in attesa dei fuochi... Mi era stato caldamente consigliato dall'agenzia di viaggi e soprattutto avevo letto delle recensioni eccellenti. Premetto subito che il luogo é molto carino, il personale é gentilissimo e la qualità non é bassa (ma neanche eccezionale). Abbiamo ordinato due calici di vino (molto buono e consigliatoci con garbo e perizia) e per iniziare una tartare ed una bruschetta con lardo e miele . Fin qui tutto bene, anche se ci aspettavamo una bruschetta calda che tale non era... Arrivano le tagliate.. la mia con gorgonzola e noci (tiepida) e quella di mia madre con le pere decisamente fredda.. mia madre ha dovuto mandarla indietro ben due volte per averla solo alla seconda leggermente più calda ma ormai dura e davvero poco gustosa (ed io posso confermare perche l'ho provata).. il ragazzo che gestisce la sala si è preoccupato di farlo presente eliminandola dal conto (cosa che ci è dispiaciuta ma...). Abbiamo poi ordinato un tagliere di salumi con un cestino di pane perché le porzioni sono oltretutto TROPPO piccole (le foto non rendono la pochezza delle stesse) e sinceramente per la cena di capodanno restare affamate.... Due dolci(non male)...Per pagare 130 Pound circa... Peccato davvero per le porzioni microscopiche (portatevi la lente di ingrandimento ;p) per l'incidente della tagliata (la carne al sangue va servita calda...) E per i prezzi davvero eccessivi per quello che si mangia.. sinceramente non ci tornerei nonostante, ripeto, personale eccezionale per la gentilezza e location molto carina.
822: Review: I booked this for New Year Eve dinner based upon reviews and proximity to where we were staying. I had high hopes and looked forward to ushering in the new year with great food and company. Restaurant is narrow with meat displayed in window and behind a counter. Two men work at front of restaurant behind the counter, cutting huge slabs of gorgeous beef and preparing amazing looking beef tartare and other plates. Seating is in two levels. We arrived at 9:25 for our 9:30 booking and were promptly seated (always a good thing!). The menu is designed to look like a newspaper. There is a nice variety of options. Our server Elisa recommended the "rib" (prime rib) for 2 which we also ordered the roasted potatoes, spinach and the heart for a starter.Our experience:We were seated at the first table inside the restaurant. My view was of the hostess station, the men cutting the huge blocks of beef and preparing gorgeous "crudo" plates. That was very interesting for me to watch them use huge butcher knives to chop enormous pieces of beef for guests. But after waiting an hour for our starters to arrive, the entertainment factor wore thin. Also, being close to the front door, it got drafty as the evening wore on.The food: We had the heart for a starter. It said it was prepared with garlic, chilli and herbs. We didn't notice any of those flavour profiles but did appreciate the sea salt and the accompanying horseradish sauce.The beef was cooked to perfection and beautifully presented. Highlight of the meal.Sides: we shared roasted potatoes (which appeared to be really fried but nonetheless tasty) and spinach (menu said was to be prepared with garlic and butter...was a bit oily)Service:This was the biggest downfall and disappointment. We were promptly seated but that's about the only highlight of the service we received. We placed our order and we waited more than an hour for our starter to be served. We did receive an offering of salami and prosciutto. The restaurant appeared to have many friends and acquaintances present for NYE. I think that was a bit a distraction for the other diners who (like us) were there just for a meal as we noticed the friends who arrived after us were served very quickly and others who had no connection waited at length. To me, service what can set you apart from other establishments. I'm not sure the food could outweigh the current service standard we experienced.
823: Review: Adatto solo agli amanti della carne, astenersi vegetariani e dintorni.Una buonissima carne italiana a Londra, con altre prelibatezze del bel paese.Entrando guardate la carne, scegliete il vostro taglio, e la cottura. Il resto sarà solo piacere per il palato
824: Title: Mat och service på hög nivå

Review: Första besöket för oss, två vuxna och en ungdom. Riktigt bra service från hela personalen t ex från Fulvio! Vi fick en bra genomgång av de olika maträtterna och valde de omtalade kötträtterna. Min fru valde rumpstek med gorgonzola och valnöt medan jag och sonen delade på 800 g Costata (rib). De vuxnas efterrätt blev panacotta med basilika och sonens vaniljglass. Båda kötträtterna var underbara och köttet formligen smälte i munnen. Efterrätterna var även de toppen där panacottan med smak av basilika var en ny upplevelse, så god! Sammanfattningsvis kan sägas att ett besök på Macellaio i South Kensington är en smakupplevelse utöver det vanliga. Lägg därtill en enastående bra service och ni har en toppenrestaurang som får högsta betyg av oss!
825: Review: Can't comment on what some others from around the world think, or their tastes or expected price points with steak, but as a New Yorker, this is flat out better than Peter Lugers and as good as anything we have. If you want an amazing A+ medium rare ribeye for two for $40 (pretty cheap), with A+ prosciutto crudo, osso bucco, and other authentic Italian dishes, come here. One of the best meals I've had in the last few years, and while not cheap, I felt like our roughly $150 check for two (with a bottle of wine, steak, procuitto, ossobucco, and some vegetables) was a fantastic value for the quality. Next time in London, I will be back off the plane. Fantastic food.
826:
Review: Sicuramente da visitare nel viaggio a Londra
Ottima carne
Massima gentilezza
L'Italia a Londra ........
827: Review: Usually I don't go to Italian restaurants abroad but my friends insisted . Located in the most Italian neighbourhood, south ken , I really liked the actual restaurant, location is great . Portions , especially my tagliata were not very generous . I found the service very annoying, too much ....ragged expensive bill ...Rather eat fish & chips
828: Review: One of the Italian restaurant in London that I was usually suggesting to friend and colleagues.I ve been there too many times and the quality has slowly decreased each time but After yesterday I will never visit it again.Ordered prosciutto and buttata but the buttata was unavailable and they charged the entire price.They gave us Gorgonzola but the quality of the cheese was similar to the one that you can buy at a discount shop.The worst thing ever was the meat, that is was always excellent!The fiorentina was cut in a way that only someone that has never managed meat could do. After cooked they were making parallel slices to the bone this of course was killing the tenderness because they were cutting the meat fiber.This kind of mistake are unacceptable for a 200 GBP meal and for a restaurant that has the meat as core meal!!! This is is just blasphemy!Most probably they loved the right guy in union square and but guys you have lost all your appeal!!!
829: Title: Beast dinner I've had in months

Review: Visited with my friends. They had already been a few times and had told me how good it was, so my expectations were really high. Was not disappointed: the staff is friendly and professional, the meat is really high quality and the atmosphere is perfect for a night out with friends. Would definitely recommend.
830: Review: Siamo stati a cena su suggerimento di amici...prenotato un tavolo alle 21.30 prima che ci accomodassimo venti minuti in attesa...altra attesa per servirci il vino..in pratica sono passati in tutto più di 45min prima di iniziare a mangiare!Carne eccellente, servizio scadente e poco professionale e non attento al cliente.Prezzi sopra la media anche se oltre a pagare la qualità ( e ci stà) nel prezzo uno si aspetta anche altro...tipo servizio e attenzione o no?Sicuramente da migliorare sotto questo punto di vista!
831: Review: Great food, wine, atmosphere and service. Cozy restaurant in the middle of South Ken. Recommended for any occasion. Elisa is the best!
832: Review: Me and my girlfriend had a fantastic evening here. Love the raw style that is a mix between the butchers and a italian restaurant. Lovly staff, and Enzo's brilliant quality surpassed his good reputation! Recommended!!!
833: Title: Best steak restaurant in London

Review: We had a wonderful evening at Macellaio on Saturday. I would highly recommend a visit if you are a meat lover. I have lived in London all my life and been to a number of steak restaurants but this was by far the best in my opinion. Very authentic, genuine, high quality food and great service. We had a true gentleman waiter named Enzo who looked after us very well. He explained the menu, gave good advice and recommendations on what to choose and was very honest at the end of the night by highlighting (and rectifying) that we had accidentally been over charged. I would definitely return!
834: Review: The quality of the meat is simply outstanding, cheeses are very tasty and menu has a good variety. The only concern is about wine, we have been more than once and every time pretty expensive bottles were not good at all. Otherwise the food is amazing, well done!
835: Review: In pieno stile made in Italy. Accoglienza, servizio impareggiabile e qualità della materia prima lavorata con la cura e l'attenzione della migliore tradizione.Un piccolo/grande gioiello italiano nel cuore di Londra
836:
Review: It's a pleasure dining in Macellaio. 
The meat selection is superb!!
But it wouldn't be so nice without it's people. 
I would like to thank Enzo and Giordana for taking care of us tonight. Excellent service warm people!!!!
837:
Review: One of my favourite spot in London. 
Excellent quality of meat, nice vibes, great service and good choices from the wine list.
838: Review: Tutto é stato ottimo. Dalla tartar con blue cheese alla costata da 600gr. Fulvio il cameriere che ci ha seguiti per tutta la serata è stato semplicemente perfetto, friendly e simpatico. Ci ritorneremo sicuramente. Grazie per aver contribuito a rendere il giorno del mio compleanno fantastico!
839: Title: Una sorpresa nel cuore di Londra

Review: Nel cuore di Londra un locale tutto italiano. Ottima la location, il ristorante accogliente come tutti coloro che ci lavorano, freneticamente e con grande spirito di team. Ottima scelta del vino grazie al consiglio di Maurizio. Carne gustosa e saporita. Un locale dove potete andare almeno una volta.
840: Title: Comida estupenda pero reservar antes

Review: Fuimos a cenar mi pareja y yo, la carne es excepcional la verdad y el personal muy amable. Lo unico no teníamos reserva y nos pusieron en la barra la cual es muy incómoda. Pero repito, todo buenísimo.
841: Review: Ottimo ristorante e soprattutto ottima carne, accoglienza e servizio perfetto vorrei ringraziare i camerieri Enzo e Marylú per la loro disponibilità ,sicuramente ci ritorneremo .
842: Title: Top notch Fiorentina on The Brompton Road

Review: A cozy Italian Restaurant on the Brompton road proper. We were a party of 7 and all meat starters & mains were nothing short of exquisite. The carpaccio & tartare starters were excellent both in terms of presentation & taste.Our 4 Fiorentina T-bone steaks were all divine & cooked to perfection, as were the costolletta & fillet!Will be back for sure when in the area!
843: Title: un locale dai colori e gli odori che fanno bene all'umore

Review: ... che bell'atmosfera... si respirano degli odori tipici italiani... locale piccolo ma curato nei minimi particolari...il servizio è veloce e attento... si mangia dell'ottima carne ma si possono mangiare anche degli ottimi primi della tradizione ligure genovese... gli Italiani fanno sempre la differenza in cucina.
844: Review: Delicious beef. Casual. Good wine list.  Not a typical steak house.  Highly recommend. Large portions.  I only ordered a T-bone with sides if roasted potatoes and spinach and couldn't finish. The restaurant gave a portion of salami for free.  Definitely worth a visit.
845: Review: Avevamo l albergo in zona e ci siamo passati un po per caso e devo dire che non ci ha delusi, buona qualita del cibo, buon servizio, consigliato vivamente.
846:
Review: A small restaurant. Food was great.  
No excessive noise.
We ate there before going to the Royal Albert Hall.
Carpaccio and steak were perfect.  Spinach was very tasty.  And in the end we shared tiramisu.  Wow a perfect end to a great.  Highly recommended
847: Review: Locale molto piccolo ma estremamente accogliente e curato. Il cibo è sublime, dalla carne (consiglio vivamente la tagliata; il carpaccio e la tartare con il gorgonzola) alla pasta per finire ai dolci.Prendete i pavesini alla nutella fritti, sono una delle cose piu sfiziose che abbia mai mangiato
848: Review: Simply the best steak I've ever had. And a nice selections of wines. And perfect service. I have already recommended this place to all my friends:)
849: Review: premetto che non amo frequentare ristoranti italiani all'estero, ma in questo caso mai scelta fu più azzeccata. carne a dir poco strepitosa , una bistecca da cavernicoli tenera come il burro. ottimo . un plauso particolare al cameriere italiano, di cui non ricordo il nome ma so che è quello CIOCIARO ... un grande
850: Review: Excellent food. We ordered carpaccio, the rump steak with Gorgonzola cheese 2 vegetable sides and 1 kg of rib steak for 4 people. Everything was superb and the amount was generous. Service was excellent. Highly recommended
851:
Review: Had a great meal, the service was excellent and the beef fantastic. Excellent wine list with some unusual Italian wines.
Will go again
852: Review: Pleasant surprise in South Ken, off the tube station.Fantastic, juicy Fiorentinas with a very decent italian wine list, focused on the great Antinory.Relatively fairly priced (given the rather high London foid prices).The only minus that a tiny salad of some rocket leafs, or a couple of chery tomatoes or some (meduocre) roast potatoes, were eache pruced 4,5 GBP...Very efficient and friendly service
853: Review: We been there for a early dinner.. the food was very goodThe service was very good tooThe only problem was that the portion were a bit smallAnyway we will surely cone back.Thank you to Fulvio R and thank you to the young waiter from Genova don't know the name.Thank you guys!
854: Review: Dopo due giorni di girovagare per Londra e non riuscire a mangiare nulla di buono e sostanzioso abbiamo deciso di mangiare Italiano! Ci hanno consigliato questo ristorante, abbiamo prenotato e siamo state servite in tempi brevi. La carne è eccellente, cotta e servita bene. Il personale cordiale e ovviamente parla anche italiano. I prezzi sono un po' alti, ma essendo a Londra e' comprensibile!
855: Review: Per un italiano leggere insegne che ricordano il proprio paese, rende già felici.. se poi è un ristorante di carne ancor di più! Già dall'ingresso e dalla vetrina capisci che se entri farai l'amore con il sapore.. Carne di una qualità assoluta! Prima scelta! In bocca si scioglie che è un burro.. morbidezza e sapori unici.. Da Provare! Qualora dovessi tornare a Londra, andrei sicuramente a fare un salto lì! ps: proprietario e staff italiano, è un sogno a Londra! Ci si sente a casa!
856: Review: Macellaio = Meat lovers restaurantIf you are a meat lover, Marcelaio is your restaurant. We had two steaks 1.5 each. They were cooked to perfection and the meat was smooth and extremely tasty. Take your friends, a couple of your best red wines ( 8£ corkage fee) and have a great evening.
857: Review: I have had the good fortune to visit Macellaio twice over the last year: last years' company Christmas party and the celebration of the wedding of close friends over the Summer. On both occasions, Macellaio has delivered a thoroughly enjoyable evening with outstanding food and service. Most of the reviews regarding this famed establishment focus on the Fassona steak (which is of course first class). However, the quality of all ingredients on their tantalizing menu are really second to none: the burrata, the hearts fried in garlic and chili, the green beans and broccoli to name but a few.Outstanding food aside, the restaurant itself is always loud and busy so service can be a little challenging, but is always enthusiastic, friendly and attentive. The knowledge of the staff is extensive and frankly its almost better just to tell them your preferences and let them take over!You get what you pay for at Macellaio and this level of quality does not come cheap. Having said that, value is a subjective thing and I challenge to find quality like this elsewhere in London for the price. Most significantly, at Macellaio your connection with what your eating is strong as you have to walk through what is essentially a butcher's store front to your table. In a time when we have become increasingly separated from the origins of our ingredients, this is a particularly poignant reminder of what real food is and should be about.
858: Review: Ottima cena a base di carne, Elisa ci ha spiegato alla perfezione i piatti e consigliato ottimamente,servizio veloce, ottimo locale per gli amanti della carne.
859: Title: Sorprendente per essere a Londra!

Review: Abbiamo letto le belle recensioni di questo ristorante e data la vicinanza al nostro hotel abbiamo deciso di andarci! Le attese sono state soddisfatte! Carne molto buona, la costata era saporitissima e morbida, servizio attento ma leggermente rumoroso!
860: Review: Siamo stati in questo locale l'1 novembre avevamo prenotato un tavolo per 15 alle 22, quando siamo arrivati abbiamo dovuto attendere fino alle 22,20 prima di poterci sedere, siamo stati messi in una saletta nello scantinato dove ci si muoveva a malapena e c'era un forte odore di chiuso e di scarico malfunzionante, abbiamo ateso fino alle 23,15 per mangiare una tagliata che a qualcuno è arrivata fredda...Il conto altissimo, per una tagliata con patate acqua e una bottiglia di vino 35 sterline a testa
861: Review: Great place, very tasty meat from Italy, pleasant service with very good wine list. Always packed so i suggest to book well in advance. The battuta all'albese as a starter and the T-bone steaks are to die for!
862: Review: Veramente ottimo il cibo che viene servito in questo ristorante! Mi è piaciuto talmente tanto che sono tornata due sere di fila!! La carne la fanno arrivare da Alba ed è veramente eccezionale!! Io e il mio fidanzato abbiamo provato: la carne cruda, il pane tostato con sopra lardo, miele e noci, le tagliatelle al ragù e la tagliata...tutto buonissimo!! Lo consiglio!!
863: Review: Carne buonissima e selezionatissima. Sembra impossibile ma non si trova facilmente così in italia. Enzo, Fulvio e Giordana hanno contribuito a rendere l'esperienza piacevole e divertente.
864: Title: La miglior carne mai mangiata
Review: La miglior carne mia mangiata. Ottimo servizio. Bravissimo. La gentilezza di Enzo ai massimi livelli. Bravissimi e tutto buonissimo. Straconsigliato per gli amanti della carme
865: Review: Sono stato a cena con la mia fidanzata. Posto molto accogliente personale simpatico e professionale. Molto carino il banco della carne all' entrata in stile macelleria. Ho cenato nella sala al piano inferiore, carne molto buona, un sacco di proposte per i piatti . Ottima carta dei vini da abbinare alla carne in base alla cottura.
866: Review: A cena con amici, siamo davvero rimasti senza parole: Fassona Piemontese frollata 50 gg talmente buona che nemmeno in Italia si riuscirebbe a trovare di meglio. Strepitose le tartare e i tagli scelti, preparati e cotti al momento. Dolci deliziosi. Gentilezza e cortesia e soprattutto competenza! Un angolo d'Italia a Londra di cui essere orgogliosi!
867: Review: Ambientato in una vera e propria macelleria, location veramente eccellente, così come il cibo. Ti permette di rivivere i veri sapori di casa, anche grazie all'accoglienza eccezionale del personale, primo fra tutti Fulvio!
868: Title: the best steak in town!!!

Review: we were 4 celebrating my birthday. the place is super homey,the service excellent. our waiter was christina-very smart,very courteous and extremely efficient!!the food was absolutely amazing!! from the starters to the dessert..the steak was amazing and the wine excellent!!
869:
Review: Très très bon restaurant d une qualité exceptionnelle 
Le service et la cuisine de très haut niveau 
Bravo
870: Review: My partner and I went here yesterday for dinner with another couple of friends.On arrival we were warmly greeted and invited to our table. From the first seconds in the restaurant we were made to feel very comfortable and relaxed.We started with still and sparkling water for the table while we decided on the wine. We did choose a quite inexpensive red wine, which was great actually, quite light and went on very well with the food, as we ordered a second bottle after the starters.So, for starters: my partner and I chose a very meaty platter to share (bresaola, prosciutto, salame, tartares and carpaccio) together with some home bread, while our friends chose some individual starters, such as tartares, burrata etc. Our lovely server Elisa, couldn't have been better, we were surprised of how knowledgeable she is of all the products, she presented us the food incredibly, letting us know of the origin of each product, how is it made etc. Great way to start our dinner!We have also received a basket of foccacina on the house which was very tasty.The food was all superb, hence we didn't leave a single bit on our plates!!For mains: our friends ordered 800g of fiorentina t-bone and us 700g which initially I wanted it cooked medium-well. Elisa advised us it is best served medium-rare and offered to get it cooked medium-rare for us to taste it and if I would still want it cooked more, she will get it cooked more for us. That would've been a one time for me, as I always have eaten my steak medium-well, but I said - hell yes, why shouldn't I listed to my server, especially because she seemed so knowledgeable about her steak, so I decided to go her way. I couldn't have been more satisfied of the choice!!! The steak was so delicious, it was literally melting in my mouth so obviously I didn't want it cooked more at all! All the flavours were just brilliant, the meat was pure heaven ( and right now I started to dream about last night and I think I'm gonna cry..). All four of us were very satisfied with both food and amazing service given by Elisa. Also the manager was very nice and attentive with us. After we "erased" everything from the plate, we decided to have some deserts to share as well as some digestives to call it a night. We had the bartender coming to our table letting us know about all the digestives, grappas etc they have, which were offered on the house as well!!Booking our dinner quite late, by the time we finished it was around midnight, but not at any moment we felt pushed or hurried. All four of us working in the hospitality industry, it is definitely not easy for all of us to agree and be so satisfied both with food and service. As a restaurant manager, if all my staff would be like Elisa I would be blessed!We enjoyed our dinner so much at Macellaio RC and we will definitely be visiting again soon!All the best to Elisa and all the staff who made us feel so welcomed and to the chefs for such amazing steak in London!!
871: Review: Appena si entra si ha proprio l'idea di essere in una vera macelleria, si possono mangiare delle vere prelibatezze in stile italo-inglese. Personale gentile e professionale, vini sopratutto italiani. Da provare assolutamente!
872: Title: Steak heaven in South Ken

Review: Steak, Italian style. Think florentina t-bone and amazing red wines. This place has excellent food but also oozes character. Great for either a date or for a group of friends. Make sure to book in advance.
873: Title: ottima carne e atmosfere regionali

Review: Sono stato al Macellaio per una serata di lavoro. Il locale appare all'esterno come una macelleria, con i tagli di carne appesi ai ganci e il banco da macellaio all'ingresso (la carne e' tagliata al momento secondo le richieste). Siamo stati al piano inferiore, arredato con tavoli ed arredi stile "rigattiere", ed il cui personale (Fulvio e Giordana) e' cortese e professionale al tempo stesso, disponibile a consigliarci e a soddisfare le nostre richieste. Il menu' offre, oltre a diversi tipi di tagli (fiorentina, costate di varie dimensioni, tagliate di vario tipo), anche la possibilita' di assaggi regionali (lingua e salsa verde, coda alla vaccinara, bruschette con il lardo, etc.) e un assortimento di salumi italiani (che non abbiamo assaggiato). Buona la carta dei vini, con proposte di abbinamento legate alla cottura della carne. I desserts sono buoni, anche se non eccezionali; d'altronde il punto di forza del locale e' la qualita' della carne offerta. Infine, il locale non e' economico, ma considerata sia la posizione in un quartiere elegante, sia che si mangia bene e con un ottimo servizio, credo che il prezzo sia adeguato.
874: Review: Grazie a tutti i ragazzi cena super e ambiente favoloso la carne è ottima e la carta dei vini è super. Personale cordiale simpatico e super presente per tutto
875: Review: We love this place ! Try  the Old-style Fiorentina t-bone Steak !!! Join with Broccoli,fresh chilli !! Thank you Fulvio for the best service !!
876: Review: Trovi semplicemente quello per cui sei venuto, ottima carne (ma non solo). Da scoprire. Carta dei vini adeguata al menù proposto.
877: Review: Il locale è molto carino e dalla strada si riconosce perché dalla vetrina si vede la carne appesa, come se stessi in una macelleria. Appena entrati c'è una persona alla reception che ti accoglie in maniera gentile ed elegante. Sulla sinistra c'è un bancone dove tagliano la carne prenotata dai clienti (affascinante). L'arredamento è simpatico. La carne è molto buona e ben presentata. I camerieri parlano sia italiano sia inglese e sono molto disponibili. Tutti i piatti sono particolari e ben presentati. Prezzi sopra la media, ma ne vale la pena. Consigliato.
878: Review: We ate excellent rib with tasty vegetables and hand cut chips. Very good steak and good Puglia wine (our choice - they had more). BUT! Service . The junior waiters were pleasant but head of front of house was clearly not in control. No plates for our bread (tricky with oil and balsamic) and my bete noire - we waited so long for the bill we had to get up and leave to get their attention and they were thrashing around and clearly annoyed that we dared. Would I go back - yes because the steak was excellent but if the service is the same there won't be a third time and I'll try somewhere else. There are lots of eateries in London!
879: Title: Overpriced and overrated, with pretentious staff

Review: What a waste of time.An expensive, overrated and generally very self-important establishment attracting the usual crowd. If you can afford to eat here, you must be doing okay, and, as such, the staff are not better than you as a customer, so shouldn't pretend that they are.Really aggressive, condescending group of people working in this place where the food is okay, the wine is good, but the attitude of the people on the team is terrible.Definitely a one visit restaurant.
880: Review: Ristorante che ricorda una macelleria, uno stille eccentrico ma azzeccatissimo. Si mangia divinamente, anche in Italia si farebbe fatica a trovare di meglio. Carne squisita, un banco carni da fare invidia a quello delle migliori macellerie, cucinate al meglio con un servizio di alto livello ed in questo Walter è un assoluto maestro. La ciliegina sulla torta è stato il dolce. Eccezionale!
881: Review: Niente da dire.... Come si mangia la carne da voi neanche in Italia... Complimenti e a presto visto che la settimana prossima verrò ancora a trovarvi
882: Title: お腹いっぱいお肉が食べられます！
Review: 主人と二人で、フィレステーキとリブステーキをシェアしました。特にリブは舌がとろける美味しさでした。が、サーブされるまでに30分以上かかったのは残念な点でした。
