883: Review: Second time here, so I will be brief. We had once more a wonderful dinner. This time we were 5 co-workers so we could try more dishes, including the delicious choice of offals. Great new wine list, with top tuscan wines. This is a great place. Period.If I really had to ask for something, I would recommend the waiter that served us, very professional and helpful, to smile a bit more since he looked a bit annoyed.
884: Review: This restaurant is located in my favorite neighborhood of London,the meat is absolutely fantastic in particular the fillet and the owner is a very nice person.I'll come back definitely:-))))
885: Review: Staff was friendly and exuberant! They are passionate about their food, and the steak was the best I've ever had. The wine pairing that was suggested was sensational as well. What a fun experience!
886: Review: If you are going as family this is not the place. Not worthy for the money you pay. Amount of food they served to us was very little for the money they charge.service was very slow..and neglected..
887: Review: Ero curiosa di conoscere questo locale, che mi era stato descritto in maniera sublime da mio fratello. E' semplicemente fantastico! Arredamento easy, ambiente piccolo, personale gentilissimo. La carne è straordinaria: Fassona piemontese, tagliata al momento davanti agli occhi del cliente. Complimenti!
888: Review: Visited with my parents and kids - fantastic steak and side dishes - definitely won be some brownie points with the fussy parents.  Will be visiting again.
889: Review: after original plan went to pot we came across this place. We have a really great steak (rib of beeg with bone). The wine is different but of good standing. Staff friendly and welcoming. definetley coming back here
890: Review: Mi avevano accennato che fosse uno dei migliori posti dove poter mangiare la carne a londra...sono stato a cena con degli amici e dopo aver assaggiato dei crudi davvero ottimi , ho provato la cottura rare apprezzando il sapore unico di questa carne ....Per la scelta dei vini un grazie a Maurizio per la disponibilità
891: Title: Best meat and steak restaurant in London

Review: By far the best steak and meat restaurant in London. Carpaccio and Tartar - amazing - never eaten something like this before - the Bisteca Fiorentina - a dream - by far the best I have ever eaten anywhere. My favorite place in London!
892: Review: Sono stata in questo ristorante due settimane fa e devo dire che abbiamo cenato divinamente, sotto ogni aspetto. La qualità della carne superiore ad ogni altro luogo, la cantina dei vini ed In particolare il servizio della splendida Elisa che ha saputo consigliarci Facendoci cambiare idea sui piatti che volevamo ordinare.I gusti e le sensazioni di ciò che abbiamo mangiato si ricordano indelebili nella mente e nel tempo. Consiglio vivamente di andare in questo ristorante, con il sevizio di un valore aggiunto di Elisa . certa che ne rimarrete stupefatti.
893: Review: Ordered the steak tartare. It was so bland on the top and when I got to the bottom it was over salted and loaded with capers and onions. Not sure what happened with the mixing and the seasoning but it was rather disappointing and a bit inconsistent in its flavour profile throughout the dish. My partner ordered tagliatelle and was expecting delicious pasta with melt in your mouth meat as this is, ahem, a meat place. No, what he received was bland pasta with bland meat that compared to a Waitrose instant Italian meal. Honestly, one could get better value with the Waitrose meal. The service was so slow and appalling, the waitress, although sweet, forgot to serve us tap water and when she brought out the hand cut fries didn't bother to offer to bring out ketchup or mayonnaise so we ended up dipping the fries in the bland tagliatelle sauce. Honestly for £4.90, the fries were the only tasty part of the overpriced tasteless meal. The worst was we thought the service was so bad and slow because we assumed the front of the restaurant might've been busy as we were seated in the back, lo and behold when we left, there wasn't anyone out front!! The staff were just too busy to bother serving the customers and seemed bothered by the simple task of getting tap water. Not a good sign when an Italian restaurant that specialises in meat serves bland overpriced food where the winner of the meal is the overpriced hand cut fries. Real failure. The menu had so much potential. Avoid this establishment and save yourself the £30 to be ignored.
894: Review: Lets just say that although food was ok, being asked to move to another table in a very tight dining area during your meal, simply to allow them to squeeze more into the packed space is pretty appalling. They don't rely on repeat business so frankly they don't care. Shame really.
895: Title: OTTIMO CIBO E SERVIZIO CON ENZO!!
Review: Cibo top... non ho altro da aggiungere... siamo stati serviti da Enzo molto gentile e professionale ...
896: Review: Sono stata a cena da Il Macellaio RC diverse volte: personale competente, super disponibile e soprattutto amichevole; qualità eccelsa, impeccabile; come sentirsi a casa! Un grazie a Simone per l'estrema cura nei dettagli. Assolutamente un must per gli amanti di carne e tonno!
897: Review: Macellaio is a truly wonderful steak restaurant based in South Ken. Fantastic atmosphere, great service and most importantly wonderful steak. The Beef tartare with spicy gorgonzola was incredible and highly recommend it as a starter before tucking into a fiorentina t-bone. Macellaio is my new favorite London steak house.
898: Review: We were staying at the Kensington hotel in London and wanted somewhere to eat one evening.I had seen reviews for Macellaio,and being a carnivore decided it looked just the thing.We went at 6pm and got a table without reservation.The waiter steered us towards rib of beef which was fine with my wife and I.We were given steak knives in a rather dramatic fashion by sticking the knife point first into the table!We were told the rib would be about 700g and would come cut up ready to eat.I know there is a big bone in rib but what we got was about 100g of eatable meat.Apart from the bone the rest was fat,gristle and sinew.Even the eatable meat we had was difficult to cut-not helped by the steak knife being blunt.It was not even very tasty.This was the worst steak I have ever had-and I have had a lot.The steak came with a small portion of chips and a small plate of salad.We also had two beers,500ml of wine,two coffees and one ice cream.The bill came to £93!This was the worst meal out I have ever had.Looking at all the other reviews I can only think that we were unlucky with the piece of meat we were served.This is why I have given two stars and not one.However,whoever cut the meat up must have seen it was pretty poor and nowhere near worth the cost.My onl regret is that I did not complain at the time.The amount of bone,fat and gristle on our plates was evidence enough that value for money it was not.
899: Review: I was walking past this place (actually on my way to another steakhouse) when I stopped to peep inside. The lady asked if I wanted to try their steak and I told her where I was heading. She said "Our steaks are better" I sat down for dinner and now this is my favourite restaurant in London....It is a macelleria (a butcher shop) and a steakhouse. I tried a big beef rib steak, well over a kilo. It was delicious, simply done with just olive oil and rock salt, no sauce to kill the taste of the aged Fassone beef.They usually serve the steak on a skillet sliced up. On a later visit I asked them to serve it uncut. You can ask the macellaio to show you the cuts and select your steak.If you're not a beefeater this is not the place for you.They have a couple of dishes that I'd like to try on later visits, Ox courage (fried bull's testicles) and Cuore (heart with garlic, chilli and herbs)The macellaio and the staff are very pleasant. There's this waitress, a young lady from Genoa who is very chirpy and pleasant.I've only tried one of their desserts, the Marmalade crostata. I'll try a couple of others later.The restaurant is not very big. They have the macelleria and the dry aging cabinet at the entrance, wooden tables and chairs and a quaint decor. They use bent spoons nailed to the wall as coat hooks. Once you order your steak they jab a steak knife into the table.They have a decent selection of wines to go with the steak.I can't wait to visit London again, just for this steak.
900: Title: Posto notevole dove mangiare carne a Londra

Review: La prima volta mi ci ha portato un mio amico che è di casa li. La seconda volta ci ho portato a mia volta dei colleghi di lavoro: in entrambi i casi sono rimasto soddisfatto. Il personale è accogliente e molti di loro sono Italiani. La carne è ottima ed il vino molto buono. Il locale è abbastanza piccolo e quindi è decisamente consigliato prenotare.Pittoresco il coltello che il personale conficca sul tavolo di legno quando ordini qualche piatto di carne!
901: Review: The front window of this Italian butcher/restaurant looks into the small cold store where several pieces of Italian beef are hung to dry age, and once inside you see the butchery/retail counter with several cuts of blackened aged beef. Further inside is the small dining room.For my lunch I didn't want to go for anything too heavy, so I had steak tartare followed by calf liver. All around me I could see diners being shown amazing pre-cooked steaks they had ordered, then brought out nicely sliced after cooking. They looked fantastic, huge, and ideal for sharing.My tartare was very tender and delicious, properly mixed with shallot, capers, gerkins, and worcester sauce, mustard and a hint of tabasco. It didn't have a raw egg on top, in the French style, and it didn't come with any bread or sourdough, which I missed. I would recommend ordering a side of grilled bread with lardo to go with it.My liver was delicious, though a smallish portion which resembled a starter. I ordered a side of mashed potato with nutmeg to go with it, but unfortunately the mash was very lumpy and unpleasant to eat.I still had room for a dessert and I chose the Latte Dolce Fritto, which turned out to be a custard deep fried in small squares of donut-like batter with a dusting of sugar. They were lovely, and came with some similar deep fried rectangles containing nutella.The wine list is novel, by matching wines to how well done the meat you have ordered is, so I looked to the friendly waiter for advice on what to have with my liver. I had a very pleasant carafe of Syre for £19.After lunch I bought some fillet steak to take home, which gave me a lovely carpaccio the next day, and some lardo, which adds amazing flavour to other products including the warm bread rolls I had with the carpaccio.I will definitely return for one of their impressive looking steaks.
902: Review: Se vi piace la carne e siete a Londra e' assolutamente uno dei posti dove dovete andare! La carne e' eccezionale, le tartare deliziose. Assolutamente consigliato.
903: Review: Sono stato dal Macellaio dopo aver letto le recensioni su TA. È veramente un posto eccezionale dove mangiare carne e non solo. Iniziamo con una fantastica carne cruda tagliata al cortello e poi una bistecca da 1 kg in tre persone, frollata 6 settimane.Buonissima.Ospitali e gentili, locale accogliente ed informale. Ci ha accolti Diego, consigliandoci al meglio e con grande professionalità, garbato e gentile.Insomma se vi piace la carne (fassona piemontese) questo è il posto giusto. Anche il prezzo è onesto.
904: Review: Eccellente l'accoglienza, tipicamente italiana.Eccellente il cibo, specialmente il crudo di carne..Eccellente il servizio.Ci sono stata da sola perché per lavoro sono qui a Londra per un periodo di tempo, e tornerò certamente in questo incantevole ristorante.
905: Review: Found this place by accident.What a find.Service is very good ...and food is amazing ...Had a 1.1kg TBONE ....ufffff due recomend.Only downfall is prices...but you do get your money worth.One of my favourite steak houses in London...
906: Review: We are regulars to this restaurant and have never had a bad meal here. The steaks are amazing, the staff is friendly and attentive. Have taken the children as well and they love it too! Only downside is that because they are so popular it is difficult to get a table!
907: Review: Been twice and the return was as good as my original memories of this place. The most amazing semi butcher / restaurant and wow the cuts are cooked to perfection.
908: Review: Om man gillar kött ska man absolut äta på denna Italienska restaurang. De mörka hängmörade köttstyckena hänger i fönstret och direkt innanför entrén står styckmästarna i full färd med att bereda köttet. Från menyn väljer man önskat köttstycke och ungefärlig storlek som sedan presenteras innan den tillagas som man valt. Väldigt gott men inte billigt - ändock väl värt priset om man älskar gott kött.
909: Review: An Italian friend and I went here for a quick bite.This is a casual, Italian steakhouse. It's a little cramped (we sat on stools), but the service is delightful, and it has an energetic atmosphere.The food is fantastic--if you're into meat. My friend and I split a Florentine steak (the waiter explained that the dishes are big, but because of the size of the cuts). As someone who knows steak from Omaha, NE, this really hit the spot. Furthermore, the appetizer, which was a burratta/mozzarella and meat was fantastic as well.The service was welcoming, warm, and did an excellent job.
910: Review: The restaurant looks like a butcher from the window and serve steak like no other. Before they cook it, they will bring you the piece of meat (not for everyone I guess) and the dining experience gets more dramatic by them stabbing a knife into the wooden table. They carry a wide range of wine so there's always something new to try. The decor is nice and cozy and we found all the staff extremely friendly. Special thanks to Fulvio for your excellent service.Will come back again.
911: Review: Wandering through South Kensington we noticed this restaurant. No reservation was not a problem to Staff as they fitted us in a 60 minute time slot! We were treated to great customer service with knowledge and respect and advised what would suit us perfectly! We managed the time allowed and were perfectly satisfied with our t-bone and sides of fresh beans with lemon zest breadcrumbs. Bellissimo! Grazie!
912: Review: Siamo venuti a colpo sicuro, essendo già clienti di quelli di Genova. Riconfermiamo il nostro giudizio più che positivo per qualità e varietà del cibo. Merita un passaggio tra un museo e l'altro.
913: Review: Gick förbi restaurangen efter besök på en annan restaurang i närheten, det hängmörade köttet som hängde i fönstret så väldigt intressant ut. Vi gick dit dagen efter och vi blev inte besvikna, köttet (biff) var sagolikt perfekt tillagad. Om man tycker om kött är det hit du skall gå
914: Review: This was my 3rd visit; 2 previous on business - this one personal joined by my son.Quality of meat is outstanding as is the extensive wine list - beautifully paired to how you like your meat cooked!Great attentive service and must comment on the very knowledgeable sommelier who gave us great guidance on the wine we had selected.Only negative is that the side dishes are disappointing when sat alongside the brilliant meat available.
915: Review: Ottimo posto dove mangiare carne cruda e una tagliata alta quanto una fiorentina. Frollatura perfetta e cottura ottima. Difficile da trovarne di simili. Inoltre, un servizio curato e gentilissimi. Ottima scelta di vini.
916: Review: Siamo stati ieri sera, ottima tartare e gran tagliata. Anche nelle piccole cose molto buono (pane e focaccia)Torneremo per provare la pasta
917: Title: Great staff and proper aged steaks!

Review: This cozy steakhouse has everything to represent well the Genoese tradition.In Italy there is a saying implying that you can eat every single piece of the pork (praising the wide range of products made from a single animal). You can easily replace pork with Fassona, which is the focus of Macellaio RC's menu.My meal started with some salami, awesome homemade bread (perfect in salt and impressively not burnt, unlike 90% of the focaccia bread in the UK) and followed by some good ravioli topped with a little escalope and its tomato juice. I recommend asking for Parmesan after enjoying the meat, they generally keep salt at minimum and ravioli should have some grated cheese on top.About the steak, the Neapolitan butcher helped me to choose based on my reluctance towards rare and thick steaks: the rib cut was definitely a good spot and tremendously tender, thanks for the long ageing process (they explained to me it's alternative to marinades typical of Argentinian steaks).The tiramisu was good too but it might be better with more biscuits soaked in coffee (barely a couple at the very bottom of the pot); honest revision to the classic recipe, the cream was not too thick but it needs something to balance its sweetness.If you add that, from the room manager to waitress to butcher, the whole staff was kind and happy to help, the experience at Macellaio RC is definitely worth my praise.Pricing can be misleading: even though above average for non-meat products, the quality is definitely higher than their prices. I guess the main downside is that, with such a large menu, you will end up ordering more than a single steak, hence the perception of being too pricey on the whole (which is not true, compared to other steakhouses).If you want to experiment regional Italian cuisine, Macellaio RC is certainly an easy choice in West London. Even though still not perfect, service is definitely very good and asking for help before ordering is a must: the range of meat is so wide you can easily go straight to the cheap tagliata cut and missing the best of their food.Looking forward to trying offal course next time! Also, don't miss the third restaurant opening soon, it will feature a more practical menu with a new co-protagonist: the Genoese focaccia, one of the most renowned in the world!
918: Review: The menu looks simple but don't let that trick you. It took three goes at ordering as my first choice was a starter (although listed with mains) and my recommend second choice I was then told was only for two people (then why recommend it!). Nice g&t drinks arrived a little late but very refreshing. The meat was great quality and cooked perfectly. However £5 for a tiny side of beans (I mean literally 25 broad beans!) is ridiculous even the area. Probably best for a large group on a Friday night, but the menu needs a redesign and the prices are high.
919: Review: We discovered this fantastic place and it was immediately love. Very good Tuscan beef and wine!!!!! I recommend this restaurant!
920: Review: Went there for my birthday one Sunday night... Looks like a butcher shop..Ordered a bottle of wine which was not what we received... Politely asked for the wine list to clarify and the waiter bought the wine list and the Manager to see "what is the problem"?... Could have been handled a bit more diplomatically.. We were given the wrong wine which we did end up accepting with a smile!Husband had a steak, flavoured nice and tasty but warm, not hot. The staff were friendly and trying hard. They did make an extra special effort to bring out a cake and sing happy birthday. Pleasant evening.
921: Review: Forget Gaucho, Goodman and Hawksmoor. This place is awesome.Antipasto was fantastic. This was followed by grilled heart and 2 versions of steak tartare. One with smoked salt and olive oil, the other with blue gorgonzola. Delicious. There were 3 of us so we ordered a 2kg T-bone which was cooked to perfection and simply fantastic. The staff are great and extremely knowledgeable. An extensive wine list with some of the best from Tuscany, Piedmont and Veneto. A must return. Grazie mille guys!
922: Title: Excellent meet but definitively overpriced

Review: Macellaio is a good place to eat very good met and some other Italian food. The staff is kind and the venue is pleasant. Only issue I have is that the price of the meat is way overpriced, even for London.
923: Title: The best meat I've ever had

Review: It has a red sofa outside and looks like an abattoir so I'd walked past this place for years before popping in.They have a butcher with the meats - think Rocky work out scene...and then the restaurant area. The meats are simply flavoured and I'd recommend the T-Bone with sea salt and rosemary. It's not cheap but it's the best. The chips are the healthiest I've seen - no fat. The greens are great and the theatre of when they present your food....well you better go and see what I mean.Fantastic place - nothing else like it.Just go.
924: Title: Excelente dica pra quem curte carne e peixe e tb para vegetarianos

Review: O lugar é lindo, a rua tem varios outros restaurantes charmosérrimos e escolhemos esse restaurante por atender tanto a quem gosta de carne como a quem é vegetariano.Super recomendo. Tiramisu maravilhoso!
925: Review: Helpful and funny staff. T bone steak is cooked just right so that it's very juicy. Price is reasonable . Tiramisu is perfect ending of the lunch. Recommended !
926: Review: Nous sommes allés dans ce restaurant avec un couple d'ami italien vivant dans le quartier. Excellente cuisine Toscane, les produits sont frais, de très grande qualité et le service sympathique. À goûter absolument : la Fiorentina (un peu chère comparée à la Toscane) qui est magnifique !
927: Review: Sono stata con mio marito a cena in questo ristorante particolare con specialità carne.Tutto italiano nel centro di Londra atmosfera famigliare personale qualificato e disponibilissimo, ad ogni richiesta siamo stati esaudito. ..a volte anche senza richiesta...ottimo cibo ottima cantina vini ...in particolare un apprezzamento molto positivo ad una cameriera che ci ha seguiti e consigliati ottimamente (Cristina se non mi sbaglio) data anche la sua giovanissima età le voglio dire ...continua così sei veramente in gamba .Ottima proporzione qualità prezzo .Grazie
928: Title: Doing justice to a steak...

Review: Entering with the sight of a butcher counter and some serious meats on display sets the scene for a steak night to remember..Great concept of Italian steak house, with very friendly and knowledgeable staff, mostly Italian. No piece of the "manza" (the beef of their choice for the meat) goes to waste, with heart, liver and tongue on the menu, together with the more traditional "tagliata" (thin sliced fillet, medium-rare) and the specialty dish "Fiorentina" (thick, on the bone, huge steak, cut on the spot by the butcher) among other succulent options.The setting is rustic, great wine selection and pairing recommendations and the cooking does justice to the meat (in my opinion, when meat is involved, the less the chef does, the better the result, and here this is what you get).The prices match the place: good meat does not come cheap. If you go hard on the meat (that is, a 1-1.2kg fiorentina), expect a bill around 50-60£ pp, while if you settle for a filling and hearty tagliata and starters, 30-40£ will do..
929: Review: Our dinner at Macellaio started with some mixed appetizers. We tasted some Salame and Bresaola, Lardo with Honey and nuts, afterwards we had three different starters based on raw meat: the Battuta all'Albese, the Battuta with spicy gorgonzola and Modena Balsamico and the Steak Tartare. We ordered also Stracciatella cheese as accompaniment to the meat appetizers. AMAZING. But this is just the beginning. We took a 800g beef rib with roasted potatoes and purple sprouts as sides. The tenderness of the meat is incomparable to every steak I tasted here in London. Delicious.We have to say that the service at Macellaio is as amazing as the food. We've been served by Lello (the Butcher), Maurizio and Walter. The incredible dedication of these people to their products and to the customer will leave you speechless. You will become a part of the story of every person behind the delivering of your steak, furthermore you will have the opportunity to eat in high class restaurant who makes you feel as welcome as at your own home.So thank you to all Macellaio RC team who has given us a wonderful evening.We will come back for sure.
930: Review: The best meat restarant in London ive ever been to and the best meat ive ever had and good was gorgeous and starter was lovely and great service and we had a really jolly weighter called Fullvio and was really jolly and nice we would come here again if we cane to London and the best steak and meat ive ever had
931: Title: ottima carne ma prepara il portafoglio

Review: Atmosfera accogliente, ottima conoscenza dei vini, carne eccezionale, cruda o cotta.
W gli italiani all'estero
932: Review: This place is always packed and full of Italians (boyfriend included) so the food has to be up to par. I had the ham and Gorgonzola to start which was great - no cooking involved but presented nicely and the bread which I was trying to avoid (need to go on a diet!) was too good to put down. My boyfriend had the steak tartare with Gorgonzola which he said was one of the best he's had in london. Personally the thought of eating tartare is off putting to me but seeing him rave about it so much I tried a tiny bit which I could see why if you like that style of food you'd love it but still not enough to convince me to have a whole one!My only niggle is I'd have liked more variety in the starters but that's just a personal preference. We shared the florentine steak which was faultless. Most of the propel dining were having this dish so I think it must be their signature. 1 bottle of water, 1 bottle of wine, 2 starters, 2 mains £170 Food: 4/5Service: 5/5Atmosphere: 4/5Price: 3.5/5
933: Review: Ristorante situato in un quartiere bellissimo. Ambiente molto italiano, carne eccezionale, buona cantina dei vini. Personale molto cortese e carino. Esperienza ottima. Prezzo finale altino, comunque in linea con la media dei ristoranti londinesi. Consigliatissimo
934: Review: This is a steak restaurant where ( for most of the options) you order your meat by weight to share. We asked for help in working out how much to order for 3- at £58-70 per kilo you don't want to get it wrong - but no way was our waiter going to offer any advice and nor was any help given in the menu. As most of the cuts have a bone in them it's not so easy to gauge . After getting nowhere with the waiter we just ordered the individual steaks. These are very thin ,cut up in the kitchen and put on a piece of slate - which is chilly stuff. By the time they get to the table the steak is cold - not I think how most people want it ? It also means that the sauces e.g the gorganzola one I ordered don't melt onto the steak - it's just a lump of cheese sitting on cold meat.Overall not really enjoyable.
935: Title: Amazing experience, like being in Italia!!

Review: from the moment we stepped inside this quirky restaurant we were transported back to Italy. The welcome we received was so warm and friendly. We opted for the rib eye steak to share which was so tender and juicy, accompanied by a lovely bottle of red "La Brucciata". The restaurant was packed and had a lovely fun atmosphere. Would definitely return.
936: Review: Dopo 7 giorni in viaggio tra Irlanda, Irlanda del Nord e Inghilterra approdare in questo ristorante italianissimo è stata una vera goduria. Personale all'altezza del posto (siamo stati serviti da un ragazza giovanissima, il suo servizio è già a un livello veramento buono, purtropppo non ricordo il suo nome ma vorrei dirle BRAVA CONTINUA CON QUESTA PROFESSIONALITà), prodotti ottimi dai salumi, alla carne fino al vino. Poi si mangia (finalmente) circondato da londinesi, non casuale in una Londra gremita di turisti.
937: Review: Cena per tre, piatti curatissimi, carne ottima e grande scelta di vini. Ambiente cosmolita e staff professionale e cortesissimo. Consigliatissimo.
938: Title: One of the best steak in London
Review: We been there for dinner, and ordered the T-bone for share. The steak is perfectly aged and grilled. The staffs are friendly. Just the table was too tiny.
939: Title: Wonderful Italian - a noisy meat eater's delight

Review: We went for Sunday dinner and were hit by a cacophony of noise from diners, staff and blaring music making it difficult to think let alone talk, but we quickly got use to it. You can choose your meat from the butchers out front or from the menu and they bring you the cut to the table. They recommended 1.KG for four and it was just about right (four big blokes would disagree).The starters were very tasty and a bit different too. We chose the Bardolino from the vast wine list but they didn't have it so we had a decent Valpolicella instead. The service was friendly and pretty good. We were advised about vacating the table at 9pm but it wasn't full so we weren't rushed out at all.
940: Review: Non per vegetariani o vegani ovviamente, ma che spettacolo di cena! La carne è ottima e non si smetterebbe mai di mangiarne perché è tenera come burro e saporita anche quando servita completamente in purezza, senza salse o altri accomodamenti (in sostanza come dovrebbe essere sempre per sentirne il sapore al meglio).Vi consigliamo i dolci, in particolare il latte dolce fritto che suscita ricordi della tradizione. Il personale è molto accogliente e preparato, ilservizio rapido e professionale. Ottima la carta dei vini con "chicche" del territorio italiano che addirittura in patria talvolta è difficile trovare.Per la prima volta abbiamo trovato al tavolo dei contenitori di legno in cui erano collocate le posate perché fossero al riparo dal contatto con i menù prima dell'ordine; una volta ordinato il personale termina l'apparecchiamento in un minuto... Che attenzioni per il cliente.
941: Review: This restaurant/butcher shop was pretty good. It is a feast for your eyes to take in and see all the meat aging, the butcher hand cutting steaks as you wait, and seeing your steak before they cook it. Overall it was a good experience, the meat was good.
942: Review: Absolutely amazing meat!!The Fiorentina is perfect, the meat is seasoned only with salt and cooked to perfection. The staff is super friendly and the atmosphere is relaxed. The wine list is a bit too long, hard to make a decision. We had the house wine and it went very well with the food.
943: Review: The outside with the dry aged beef in the window and the butcher counter makes it look like a very good place for a steak. The first encounter was with the rather unfriendly receptionist reserving our table who told us that we only had until 8.30 until the next guests arrived. After a question from us the answer was "do you want the table or not?"Yet still we went and were looking forward to prime beef. What we got was a very good looking piece of meet. Sadly it turned out to be tough with a lot of tendons. The spinach was not seasoned at all. The waitress was very well friendly and nice but then comes the receptionist again and brings us the bill with the statement that the next guests are waiting. All in all, nice atmosphere but the food is not living up to it.
944: Review: Friendly and understanding staff. Meat selection and quality are very good. Wine selection is good; maybe slightly overpriced.
945: Review: Best meat you can have in London.Perfectly seasoned, tasty, tender and affordable.With a good glass of red wine (good selection available) you can make your experience unforgettable.Only remakes is small size of table which make sometime difficult to eat.Tartare and Fiorentina are really wonderful!
946: Review: Great Steak Tartare and the Rump is like fillet. Well seasoned. Lots of wine to choose from. Sides way overpriced and a little cramped but with charm. Overall a great experience.
947: Review: The most perfect beef, tartare to start, and a T bone for main. Wonderful meat, perfectly prepared, and served in a very friendly and informal manner. The Brunello di Montepulciano was delicious.
948: Review: I have been a fan of Macellaio for quite some time, and I have had my first disappointing experience: nothing to do with food, which was excellent as ever, but with service and comfort. Comfort (or discomfort) first: we were sitting in a table inside, in a corner and halfway through he meal it all became unbearably hot: yes, it was one of London's hot days, but still unacceptable for this type of restaurant to not invest on a decent air conditioning system; also, it was full and it got so loud it was nearly impossible to hear my guest speak. Service also patchy and distracted: we were asked for our orders within 3 minutes of arriving, and we legitimately asked for a little more time; 20 minutes later no one had come back to our table so we had to get the waiter's attention; that distraction carried on throughout the meal, including asking twice and still having a 15 minutes wait for the bill, in a hot room: in the end, we had to get up and pay on our way out to get any attention. Not sure if I'll be back...experience more than food is what I remember after this visit.
949: Title: Amazing Italian experience in London

Review: I am Italian and eating here is just like eating in one of the best trattorie in Roma. Meat is delicious and I strongly sugget you to try mozzarella and stracciatella together with prosciutto and bresaola. The staff is great and Elisa has been extremely nice in guiding us through the menu and giving us tips about the best dishes. Strongly advice to go there!
950: Review: truly incredibly good quality! i felt like i was back in italy, the fiorentina was sublime, and the rib eye was perfect! the oxtongue was delicious and delicate, and the service second to none! wonderful discovery, will recommend!
951: Review: From the outside it doesn't stand out and you could easily walk past without a second glance. Don't...... stop and have lunch or dinner in this amazing restaurant. The meat and offal is sitting in the counter top the left as you walk through the door and I had the best fillet steak I have ever had at any restaurant in London. Don't visit this place if you don't like meat, but if you do, then get there as soon as possible. the startaers are delicious too - try the meats and cheeses as a sharing plate - fabulous. And it's a great wine list - not inexpensive but a great choice. Another great eaterie hidden away in London that all meat lovers should head for asap.
952: Review: My friends and I ate in Macellaio last week after we read good reviews about its sister restaurant in Exmouth Market. It's very attractively designed, has a pleasantly busy atmosphere and its appearance - almost a butchers-meets-restaurant - is a set-up which works well and adds drama. The highlight here is the meat and it really is as good as almost all the reviews make clear. It's certainly towards the top of the tree when it comes to steak in London. There is also an extensive Italian wine list with some excellent options.On the flipside, and perhaps as a consequence of being considered alongside the beef, the sides seemed a little meagre, slightly mundane and overpriced. Similarly although the welcome was warm there were occasions when the service edged away from being friendly/helpful into faintly pushy 'upselling' territory.All things considered, and if you're a lover of steaks, it's worth a visit.
953: Review: Not much to say! It looks like a butchery (because of the meet exposed inside the restaurant!) but it is a real and amazing restaurant! They serve meat specialities made with beef from Piedmont (is the Italian region where the best meet comes from). We had raw meet "tartare" and T-bone steak "costata". Absolutely fantastic!I have to mention a negative aspect of the restaurant which is the wine list. I think few of them are overpriced.Expensive, but it's worth it. Good job guys!
954: Title: If you like steaks and cheese, do not miss "Macellaio"

Review: There are many places in London where you can taste a " very good" steak..then you have the Macellaio: the place is absolutely the "not-to-be-missed" restaurant by all the meat lovers.It is an Italian butchery-restaurant where you can taste the best mouth-watering Piemontese meet in all its styles, together with some of the freshest and top quality Italian cheese.As starters, do not miss the different steak tartares, the burrata and stracciatella cheese.As main...well...just choose your favourite cut and enjoy your glass a wine ( there is an extensive list for all the tastes and wallets)...what arrives on your table will blow your senses: tender, cooked at perfection, tasty.Service is very attentive and friendly. A special thanks to Fulvio, who took care of us with passion and congeniality. At the end of the dinner, as we were undecided between two desserts, he offered to the table the one we did not go for.. a little gesture, but we felt spoiled.Overall, great dinner and ambience...we will be back soon.
955: Title: Fulvio, Mario and the straniero..
Review: Thanks for a great steak...! Food was great pity about the company (my brother). Great time with friends and food to match.
956: Review: We dined here two nights, the first as a couple, the second as the host of a group. Our first night experience was incomparable. Great food, great service, wonderful variety on the menu. Because of that we came back later in the week, bringing some friends. That night was a disaster. Ordered a starter that came out with our main course. Ordered salads that came out AFTER our meal. I would definitely go back again because of the great food. Just be sure you are explicitly clear with the wait staff on what you want and in what sequence.
957: Title: the artisan italian super steak of awesomness
Review: one of my regular awesome spots , with the best italian authentic steak experiences . my only advice starve for days and not for the vegetarian crown!
958: Review: Bella location per questo ristorante italiano, nell'elegante Old Brompton a South Kensington, tra fila di ville da sogno, boutiques alimentari e concessionarie d'auto esclusive.Il Macellaio merita una citazione perché il suo fine commerciale non gli impedisce di adempiere ad una vera e propria missione di primaria importanza: diffondere all'estero la cultura del cibo italiano di qualità', di fare da piccolo volano all'oro di casa nostra. In questo caso il prodotto valorizzato al suo massimo potenziale e' una succulenta carne di fassone piemontese, scelta e selezionata direttamente dal proprietario e sottoposta a lunghe frollature, infine servita sotto forma di costate o filetti grigliate a regola d'arte, in tartare d in generale in modo da non conta minarne troppo il gusto.Completanoil menù primi piatti soprattutto della tradizione ligure, buoni vini anche al calice, dessert semplici e golosi.
959: Title: Fantastic but not for vegetarians or the faint hearthed

Review: We went as a fairly large party, and were therefore given the whole of the downstairs area.Personally, I loved the food - best prosciutto and bresaola I've ever had, steak tartare, and a fabulous bistecca alla fiorentina, cooked perfectly rare, and sundry other carnivorous delights. Not enjoyed by those who like their steak cremated into leather.Nice selection of traditional Italian desserts as well.From which sampling you might gather that those in our party who didn't eat meat, or beef were pretty hard done by, but it is basically an italian butcher with a fantastic restaurant attached.I'd certainly go back without hesitation.
960: Title: the BEST steak house in London!

Review: a steak house with an italian twist - what more do you need!4 guys out for dinner 2kg of steak ordered and the whole lot was hoovered up in double quick time! Interesting decor, friendly and efficient staff with a well laid out and an inspiring menu. The beef carpaccio is incredible - the steak some of the finest you will find. My favourite steak restaurant on 6 continents!
961: Review: Plain review. Had the huge T-Bone Piemonte, to share with best mate. Best ever. I say ever. What a treat and what a memory. Dry hung meats in window. Very nice service, and good humor behind the Mercellaria counter upstairs. This will be my new favourite dinner spot in London.
962: Title: Meat and cheese at their best

Review: Finally a restaurant where you can eat quality Italian meat and cheese!! It is not the usual burger or steak house; you can find fiorentina steaks, beef tartares and the best Italian charcuterie and local products (they have lardo and burrata....!!) The rooms are cosy but the atmosphere is lively. I dined alone but I was "entartained" by the staff who were all very welcoming and professional. Fulvio and Lello in particular were super friendly and funny.....and showed me how they master the art of knives and flames! Prices are reasonable considering the quality. Definitely recommended!
963: Title: A Veritable mouthwatering feast of tongue popping stomach pleasing flavours

Review: Visited with my partner..from entering the restaurant to leaving it was a journey of amazing experiences..flavours....&satisfyingly A class food!From the starters including Fassona tongue...Sweetbreads..then onto beef schnitzel style..plus an amazing Rib of beef with sides of heavenly vegetables..including spinach..crispy potatoes green beans..then wowed with three amazing desserts incl flourless chocolate cake...and Pannacotta washed down.with velvety red wineA,Must!!!!Everyone who loves meat and good service from.excellent staff I'm advising you to drop everything and experience this heavenly restaurant
964: Review: I went here with two friends and was not disappointed! It was lavish quantities of beef which lead to us opting for the steak tartare to start, followed by a T-bone and rib steak to share. The meat was exceptional - so good in fact that I ate it without any mustard - a move that I never thought I'd go for! The chips were golden, crisp and delicious. The vegetable sides were too small, but still well executed. The red wine was also great as were the desserts and cheeses. I much preferred this to the other steak restaurants and chains in London. It was authentic without being over the top and the meat was the best quality I've had in London! The service was also great. Go eat here!
965: Review: A friend and I had a delightful meal at this restaurant last nightAll the staff are very friendly and professional.We were recommended excellent wine by the sommellier and the t bone we shared was absolutely fantastic.Special thanks to both Elisa and Matteo whose service was exemplary
966: Title: Fulvio R it's a best one

Review: Sono stata in compagnia di amici al macellaio ed ho mangiato benissimo... il service ottimo servito da Fulvio R. il miglior cameriere che abbia mai incontrato. spero di ritornarci presto qualità' è prezzo ottimo, alla prossima raga........... Jennifer e co....
967: Review: We had great food here! The Menu is a little complicated but quality of food is great! Go here if you like meat! For 2 people we paid 110 GBP.  Service is super friendly! A different Italien experience! Worth going!
968: Review: Made an impromptu lunch visit this weekend with a group of friends and my 6 week old baby. What a unique place! The menu is varied and unusual, it was hard to choose but I'm glad I went for the delicious steak tartare. This is definitely a carnivores paradise but my vegetarian friend was happy with her meat free pasta dish too. The service was perfect, all staff members were welcoming, friendly and knowledgable and very accommodating with the baby and pram. Will definitely visit again soon and sample more of the menus delights.
969: Title: A lot of hype over this place

Review: Clearly a popular place as we weren't seated till 10:30pm - but they were accommodating neverthelessVegetarians will do well to avoid this place, as it's clearly a meat feast bonanza My boss raves about this place, so we had to go and try it outDon't get me wrong, the steak (old style Florentina T Bone) that we had was nice enough......its just that I have had better and paid far less for that pleasureHowever, it's not a bad place and I wonder how their other dishes taste, but as much as I rated it fairly highly, the likelihood of us making a repeat visit isn't high
970: Title: The entrecote is to die for

Review: Best steak I had in London. This is a combination of butcher shop and restaurant. They cut your steak on the spot and cook it to perfection. They will not ask how you want it cooked so if you want your steak well done don't bother visiting.
971: Review: I absolutely loved this restaurant. The food was incredible, the wine was fantastic and the service we received from Fulvio was impeccable. I'll be coming back for sure!
972: Title: Carne di qualità e tanta attenzione al dettaglio

Review: Ristorante carino in un quartiere grazioso! Urge la prenotazione perché è sempre pienissimo. Ci rechiamo su prenotazione e consiglio di un amico al ristorante dove ordiamo dell'ottima carne, tartare e filetto per la precisione accompagnato da un eccellente vino rosso. I prezzi non sono modici ma la qualità si paga e per il buon cibo e il buon vino sono sempre soldi ben spesi :-)
973: Review: We live locally and had heard great things about this place and it maybe that we experienced an off night at this restaurant.The positives first:The prosciutto crudo and burata were delicious. The wine list is great with a fantastic selection of Italian reds. Overall the menu is reasonably priced. The downside:Service was poor- slow and inattentive.The steak (fiorentina 800g between the two of us) was distinctly average, lacking in flavour and served luke warm. Given that this place is all about the steak this was disappointing.The back room lacks atmosphere. If we venture back we will try to get at table in the front section
974: Review: Just to be clear, this is exclusively for meat lovers so vegetarians & pescatarians should stay away. The variety of meat & the quality, flavour & tenderness was fantastic, as was the excellent wine selection (albeit a little over priced).Generally good service too.
975: Review: Amazing! Steak at its simplest and best, succulent cuts that are shown to you after selection from the menu before cooking, a very classy unusual touch. The restaurant had a very authentic feel although the entrance feels like a butchers which works somehow!Rustic decor, very friendly and helpful staff, good value and we'll be back.thank you for looking after us
976: Review: Best beef I've eaten anywhere in the world! The Florentine steak was cooked to perfection and delicious!
977: Review: 店門口櫥窗掛滿了肉，一進門也是肉櫃，可以看到廚師正在敲碎肉塊，可以聞到生肉味，我本來有點害怕，但是我點的生牛肉，吃進嘴裡確一點腥味都沒有。適合男生吃的大塊牛排也超級好吃。裝潢非常有趣的餐廳。服務態度不是太好。
978: Title: Lieu surprenant très original à tester obligatoirement si vous aimez la viande .

Review: Concept très original !Atmosphère très sympatique,un peu bobo . Grace à Maurizo et Lello le service et rapide et très attentionné avec l'humour et la gentillesse en plus .la Viande est parfaite goûteuse , tendre , juteuse. Une merveille !Tout petit bémol : attention a la température a laquelle le vin est servi .Excellent vin par ailleurs Nous nous sommes régalés et avons passé une soirée formidable !
979: Review: Если хотите отведать настоящий флорентийский стейк на кости - вам сюда. Очень интересная подача стейков. В этом ресторане есть своя изюминка. Цены на стейки высокие, но они этого стоят. Также в этом ресторане можно отведать фантастическое итальянское пиво. Нигде такого не пробовали. Вообщем рекомендуем.
980: Review: Delicious! The staff were wonderful especially the hostess, the butcher and our waiter, Fulvio who made our dining experience one of the best!
981: Review: ​We visited as a group of 7 on a Saturday night. After some beef carpaccio and steak tartare as starters we shared 1.5kg cuts of T-bone ('Fiorentina') and rib of beef as mains. The central part of each cut was very tender and of a good quality, however the pieces near the end were quite fatty/chewy. I would estimate around a quarter to a third of the meat was in the latter category, which is not an insignificant amount! We ordered a few sides and these were generally decent, with the mashed potatoes being a favourite. We also tried out a few desserts which again were decent.Service was friendly, although it could be quite slow at times. All the staff seemed to be from Italy, which gave it an authentic feel. Our bill came to £56 each, of which around £15 was spent on drinks.A comment on timings - at the time of booking as well as upon arrival we were told about a 2 hour limit on our table. They were strict about this and ended up rushing us to vacate our table at the end of the meal. Which would have been fine except: 1) although we arrived on time they were 10 min late to seat us (so we had our table for 1 hour 50 min effectively); and 2) as mentioned the service was slow at times. Given the time limit I would have expected a bit more urgency on their side. On a related note, I would suggest that they extend the time limit for larger group sizes (which is commonly done in other restaurants), as larger groups naturally tend to take a bit longer.To conclude - it was not a bad meal and prices were quite reasonable, but you could definitely get better steak in London. For similar concepts (i.e. big cuts of meat for sharing) at a comparable price point, I'd suggest trying out Zelman or Blacklock.
982: Review: Bel locale, particolare, personale gentile, carne molto buona, davvero una piacevole serata, peccato per le dosi molto ridotte sia nella carne che sopratutto sui contorni dei quali con 6 sterline potevano essere più abbondanti! Comunque da ritornarci. Prezzi alti ma credo sia normale visto il tipo di locale.
983: Review: Ho cenato qui due volte l'anno scorso quando vivevo a Londra!Mai provata una qualita' di carne cosi' alta! Davvero incredibile! Per me che amo i crudi di carne era il paradiso! L'unica pecca e' il prezzo..un po' caro, perfino per essere a Londra...pero' ne vale assolutamente la pena!
984: Review: fantastique expérience en cette boucherie. restaurant Prix élevé mais à Londres c'est un peu normale Vos papilles seront régalées par la qualité de cette viande exceptionnelle Quadre parfait
985: Review: Just wanted to give a fair score as I think other opinions here make it look way better than what it actually is. "l'Imperiale" plate (£29) has some very good bits (the two tartares), a couple of fair ones (carpaccio and bresaola), a "just because we say we're Italian" one (burrata) and a nonsense one (lardo with honey). Tagliata is definitely below average, small for £16 and tasting burnt more than anything. Four potatoes for £4.9 are just a joke. Stake lovers, go to Tuscany!
986: Review: The door girl found us a table within 5 min and it was fully booked. Fluvio our waiter was excellent! My friends are meat eaters and they loved it. However vegetarian options we limited (obviously) but I recommend the ravioli with walnut sauce!
987: Review: Depois de um tempo abusamos de comer fisk and chips e fomos atrás de um italiano. Esse italiano é ótimo e fica no bairro de South Kensington. Carnes excelentes!!! Acertaram o ponto e o sal da carne. O ambiente é diferente e aconchegante. Os garçons são excelentes. Inclusive uma garçonete portuguesa no local. Recomendo de olhos fechados. Londres sempre surpreende. Boa comida na terra da rainha.
988: Review: Ordered ribeye, was served T-bone. When we asked the waiter what meat we had been served we were told T-bone. We challenged that we'd actually ordered ribeye, we were then promptly told that, oh yes it is actually a ribeye, the end cut which is why it has a T-bone in the meat??? When we spoke to the manager when we expressed our dissatisfaction, he even tried to convince us that the steak was a ribeye! Attached photo showing the steak is indeed a T-bone, but passed off and charged as ribeye! Macellaio, you should treat your customers with more respect and accept if you have made a mistake!
989: Review: Good atmosphere, real fun night, friendly helpful staff. You might have heard that before but you have never tasted steak as good as this, outstanding. My first visit will not be my last.
990:
Review: Great place with a fantastic vibe.
You need to be a meat lover to go here.
Busy place, need to book.
Steak cooked to perfection.
Service great, not intrusive, just right.
Wine sommelier was helpful and offered to test before buying. Cool eclectic guy.
991: Title: お肉屋さんが経営するステーキハウス
Review: 入り口は肉屋のショーケースが並んでいるのですが、奥に入るとレストランになっています。肉用のナイフをテーブルにぶっさしてくれるパフォーマンスも楽しく、お肉も新鮮で色んな部位がたのしめて、大人数で色々試してみるのがお勧めです。
992: Title: Bistecca come non l'avete mai provata!

Review: Fantastico locale nel cuore di Chelsea, ma è come essere in Italia. La carne è di altissima qualità, una vasta scelta di tagli e anche gli antipasti sono molto buoni. Abbiamo provato sia la Fiorentina che la costata ed erano perfette. L'atmosfera è decisamente "friendly", i camerieri simpatici e molto preparati. Una menzione particolare per Matteo, Fulvio e Elisa che hanno reso la nostra serata speciale.Ci torneremo sicuramente! Super consigliato!!
993: Title: Great steak in South Kensington

Review: We went for lunch and except for another table, the place was deserted. Apparently it is much more lively in the evenings. Delicious aged steaks served without sauces! The slabs of meat are hanging in the window. I enjoyed my fillet steak, although the waiter recommended larger pieces of meat to share.
994: Title: Amazing steak, wines and a great atmosphere

Review: This was my second time here, originally I went when it was called Maxela. We had a really fantastic meal, service was superb and helped us make an excellent wine choice. Being a Friday night it was busy, but that only added to the atmosphere and we didn't feel rushed. The T-bone we shared was first class, the only slight criticism I would have are the starters are quite pricey and the sides were on the small side. But if I am after steak I'm not sure why I would go anywhere else.
995: Title: Good Italian meat in London

Review: At first I was a bit doubtful about this restaurant and I was tempted not to go there. However as soon as I got inside it I had to change drastically my mind! The style of the restaurant recalls to me the Italian countryside "trattorie" but at the same time the furniture makes it an elegant and refined place! The meat there is excellent (comes directly from Italy!) and the service polite and warm. Moreover the restaurant offers a butcher service just like its name would suggest!
996: Review: We go there pretty often, never had any issue, wel once was charged 12.50 for a negroni which came in a 6oz glass, told the manager that was ridiculous and took it out of the bill, which was not my aim but made it right. Meat has great quality, never had it over or under cooked and wines are great value for price.
997: Review: We were in South Kensington looking for a good steak restaurant. We found il Macellaio.This restaurant is specialized in Fassona meat, grown in Piedmont area, North West of Italy.The atmosphere is kind and relaxed.Waiters were very friendly, a little directive in the wine choice, but very collaborative when they realized we had a clear opinion about what we wanted to drink.We had a Carpaccio of Fassona with rucola and parmesan cheese, spectacular!We also chose the Fiorentina (800 grams to share in two people). Excellent as well. We closed with a Bianco dessert with basel flavor, very refreshing.The service had a few particularities when they count down before uncovering the main course or when they stab the table with the knive.So we spent a pleasant evening and enjoyed the dinner. Perfect!The price? Remember you are in South Kensington London....
998: Title: Ein unglaublicher Laden - Super Essen, bester Wein, super Atmospaehre

Review: Eigentlich wollten wir nur eine Kleinigkeit essen und uns fiel der Tartar und Carpaccio auf der Karte auf. Also traten wir ein und fanden eine Fleischtheke mit zwei "Metzgern", die staendig Steak, Tartar und andere Dinge schnitten oder vorbereiteten. Am Ende assen wir Carpaccio, Tartar, Leber auf Zwiebelpueree mit einen Super Wein aus den Abruzzen und dann aus Sardinien. Eine Bedienung, vielleicht der Besitzer beriet mit dem Wein, die Weinkarte war auf Zeitungspapier gedruckt und war drei Seiten lang. Der Abend war fantastisch und auch die Gesichter der anderen Gaeste waren von Laecheln uebersaeht.
999: Review: Party of five, looked nice and inviting from the outside. Very pricy, more wines to select from than food. We received the wrong food, then when we received our pasta dishes they were very small quantities. Plates were taken away from table while others were still eating. Felt very rushed and unwelcome, as if we weren't spending enough. Advised one waiter that we didn't want dessert but then another waiter came and ran thru the list. We couldn't wait to get out of there, definitely not worth the money, had to stop off for a burger on the way home. Just felt like we were pushed to get out of there.
1000: Review: Installé dans le south kensington, le quartier francais de Londres ce "restaurant - boucherie" est étonnant...un peu fouillis, un peu brouillon, un peu petit mais il y règne une excellent ambiance, le service est original...les jambons, les fromages, les pains, les vins et les viandes sont tout simplement exceptionnelles....à recommander pour une soirée entre amis...
1001: Review: Macellaio does have it's niches, the sofa outside, the butchery upstairs, the way knives can be left protruding out the table. It all goes to help with the ambience, experience and dinner. But let's be honest, you're here for good times with steak and good wine being a pivot point, and the steak is definitely a lure in, great sizes for the meat-lovers and perfectly prepared. The wine choice is extensive and although I haven't tried every bottle i've never been disappointed. Yes it get's busy and waiting times can vary, but always worth a visit.
1002: Review: Purtroppo , non posso dare un ottimo giudizio, ho aspettato molto tempo per avere i piatti , una tartare ed un filetto da me chiesti.., può capitare .. Però non deve capitare, un po' caro .. Carta vini così cosi .. Prezzi altini
1003:
Review: One of the best meat restaurant I have ever been in London. I especially love the steak tartare with melted gorgonzola on top!
I would recommended it to everyone!
1004: Title: The best meat in town

Review: It is honestly the best meat you can have in London. Born as in Italian butcher, refurbished as a lovely cosy Italian restaurant with typical Italian food and an amazing selection of wine.I'm in love with this place, easy, not formal, but with quality.If you love meat and red wine, this is your place. Fiorentina to share is a good recommendation! Keep space for the dessert!Ideal for any occasion!
1005: Review: This Italian restaurant's entrance looks like a butcher shop, with big pieces of meat hanging in front; but dont be fooled: it is one of the best steakhouses in London, with high quality meat served with excellent (Italian) wine and fine accompanying dishes.If you are a meat lover, try the Bistecca Fiorentina: unbeatable!Prices go with the quality: not cheap!
1006: Review: For carnivores this must be heaven.A very small atmospheric Italian meat restaurant on Brompton Rd, opposite Christies.The huge aged pieces of meat are on display immediately you enter the restaurant where a skilled butcher leverages a great meat cleaver cutting superb pieces order by order - the meat is specially bred and from some wonderful place in Italy I can't remember.There are other dishes apart from meat but the focus here is on outstanding beefStaff are very attentiveDefinitely worth a visit - gets very very busy
1007: Review: I was particularly looking forward to visiting this restaurant and was not left disappointed. The atmosphere and the service were exceptional, with the waiter offering some very good advice when it came to our choice of wine. The steak and accompaniments were delicious and among the best that we have had. We will definitely be back in future.
1008: Review: Tartare à tomber par terre. Allez y les yeux fermés. Jaimerais trouver l'équivalent a Paris...Une carte de vins top, une huile d'olive à goûter avec un pain italien d'un genre nouveau. Bravo !!!
1009: Title: Nice food but made to feel very unwelcome

Review: As a lone diner I was made to feel very uncomfortable. Despite pre booking a table for one, I was seated in the middle of the room. The waiter and waitresses paid no attention to me. They did not visit my table to enquire after my order or offer me a drink. I was given no advice regarding the extensive menu and when I tried to order, was even told by one waitress to deal with someone else. Theynever engaged in any conversation. Thankfully I managed to get the attention of the barstaff and he took my order.Thankfully the quality of the food and the wine (recommended by the bar staff) made up for the unwelcoming and uncomfortable service. The beef tartare was tasty and the portion plentiful. The main of rump steak was also very nice, if a little overlooked for blue. This however is my personal taste and no reflection on the quality of meat. I can only imagine the waiter and waitress were disappointed with having a single diner and the 12.5% top of a £50 bill. I selected this restaurant because of the menu and as a lover of red meat, I was really looking forward to dining here. Unfortunately the staff spoilt my experience and I could not wait to leave.
1010: Title: La migliore carne di Londra

Review: Ho mangiato in questo ristorante durante una breve vacanza a Londra, sono stato attratto a prenotare per merito delle recensioni di tripadvisor e nonostante abbia dovuto prenotare tre giorni prima ne è valsa la pena... Ho mangiato con la mia ragazza tartare, buttata e filetti di alta qualità di pari livello anche i contorni e i dolci ... Vasta scelta di vini Italiani, il prezzo è nella media per un livello di questa qualità a Londra ..
1011: Title: Concept simple et efficace, viande excellente, service un peu trop amateur

Review: En passant devant ce Resto on n'a pas vraiment envie d'entrer : un vieux canapé rouge et une vitrine pleine de viandes pendues dans le frigo. La salle est assez petite mais les tables sont suffisamment espacées, ce qui est assez rare à Londres. La carte se présente sous forme d'une simple feuille de papier type journal, plus ou moins tachée. La viande est vraiment excellente, cuite à la perfection. Les accompagnements sont par contre un peu light. La serveuse qui s'est occupée de notre table était serviable et agréable mais manquait d'expérience : pas vraiment à l'aise pour ouvrir une bouteille de vin, et le vin n'a pas été servi proprement. L'addition est assez salée, mais la viande est succulente. En conclusion, bonne adresse pour un bon morceau de viande.
1012: Review: Viviamo a Londra da diversi anni, abbiamo scoperto solo adesso questo ottimo ristorante, consigliati da un amico anche lui amante della buona carne italiana abbiamo optato per una fiorentina di carne di fassona, eccezionale. Ottimo anche il vino. Prezzo giustificato dalla qualita' del cibo e del servizio, considerando che siamo a Londra.
1013: Review: I already reviewed il Macellaio for the quality of the food.This time I would like to talk about the staff. I had a party of 20 people from all over the world we were of course fully satisfied by the amazing food but also by the help of the Macellaio's team during the whole night. Helpful attitude, smiles, easy environment and a lot of information about what we were eating. Thank you guys! See you soon!
1014: Review: Ristorante gestito da italiani in cui trovi molti italiani anche come clienti.Carne ottima (Fiorentina da 1,2 kg in due), 3 antipasti buoni (2 tartare è una stracciatella).Vino una bottiglia (sui 30 pounds) e due bicchieri sfusi (abbastanza cari sinceramente). Un dolce. 2 bit acqua gasata. Amaro offerto.Se volte fare una bella mangiata di carne (ho visto che ci sono anche i bolliti e le interiora...non male per essere all'estero) siete nel posto giusto. Preparatevi però a spendere un po . Noi quasi 190 sterline in due.
1015: Review: Io e mio marito siamo andati da Il Macellaio dopo molto tempo che lo puntavamo: non sapevamo bene cosa aspettarci in termini di prezzi, ma dopo aver verificato sulla lavagna esterna siamo entrati senza indugio. Ed è stata una scelta felicissima. Noi veniamo da Torino, dove abbiamo vissuto 11 anni, e trovare a South Kensington la tartare di fassone a regola d'arte e le carni di Alba e Fossano è stato davvero fantastico. La qualità del cibo è eccellente: io ho preso il crostino al lardo con miele e noci, mio marito la tartare e di seguito tutti e due la tagliata con gorgonzola dolce e noci. Una cena assolutamente squisita, perfetta sotto tutti gli aspetti. Il personale è stato gentilissimo e ci ha trovato posto nonostante non avessimo prenotato (assolutamente obbligatorio se non volete rischiare delusioni). Cantina fornitissima e dolci deliziosi. Caffé rigorosamente Lavazza e fatto come si deve. Prezzi assolutamente accettabili e la qualità del cibo offerto vale ogni singolo penny.Ci sono anche dei primi tradizionali, come gli gnocchi con il pesto alla genovese, ma consiglio di andarci per la carne: non ve ne pentirete.
1016: Title: First visit wasn't a fluke: so so so good!

Review: Took my fiancée to Macellaio in a long overdue second visit following the awesome lunch I had first time around. It did not disappoint! I was starving and wanted a massive amount of meat, which is what we had: the waiter recommended the rib which had more aging and we were able to order a whopping 1.8kg chunk which was cooked to perfection - I can't even begin to think about getting something so large cooked consistently medium rare. I'm getting meat sweats just thinking about it but at the same time can't wait for the next visit. The bar manager even remembered that I had tried a wine that wasn't on the list before and of course there was lots of delicious grappa.
1017:
Review: Amazing steaks, passionate and knowledgeable staff. 

I massively recommend this place, one of my new favourite restaurants.
1018: Title: Probably the best meat in London!

Review: I was really curious about this place, I read lots of nice reviews and heard lots of wonderful things from my friend, so... after work, and after a couple of drinks, we decided to came here without booking around 7:30pm. We got a table (actually the one with the column in the middle, waiting for a better table) and we order 2 starters, 1 kg of "fiorentina" and a good bottle of wine.I will not complain because probably a couple of regular guests arrived after us got the better table and we don't, not even because the second starter arrived 15 minutes later than the first one, I'm going to give you just a few advices, if I can, because we noticed these things.By the way, the "battuta with gorgonzola" was absolutely stunning, and the "fiorentina" was one of the best of my life. Maybe the dinner was a bit overpriced because of the service, but the food was really amazing!
1019: Title: MAI MANGIATA CARNE COSì BUONA

Review: In realtà il titolo dice tutto, decidiamo con la mia fidanzata di trascorrere qui la cena di Pasqua parto dicendo che il posto è davvero molto carino tavoli in legno stile vera "macelleria". Con la mia fidanzata decidiamo di prendere un antipasto misto di carne da dividere, con 3 parti di crudo a dir poco sublimi davvero buonissimi (due tartare e un carpaccio), salame 70% bovino, una sorta di bresaola e lardo. Il cameriere gentilissimo ci consiglia una costata, che ci viene mostrata prima di essere cotta. Ci viene servita in modo scenografico che è la giusta cornice per il piatto principale che poi è risultata essere la carne migliore che abbia mai mangiato (in Italia). Già ampiamente soddisfatti optiamo per dividere un dolce il tiramisù che non ci ha convinto pienamente, avendo già dato 5 stelle non vuole essere una critica ma uno stimolo a cercare di far meglio perchè visto il livello delle portate precedenti raggiungereste la perfezione con un dolce altrettanto perfetto. Per il resto servizio perfetto camerieri gentilissimi e disponibili Continuate così!
1020: Title: Para que digan que en Londres no e come espectacular...

Review: Fui con mi hermana y mi cuñado, que vinieron a verme, y fue una elección única. El sitio es cálido y acogedor, el servicio te hace sentir como en casa- Maurizio, amante del vino, nos enseñó la linda bodega- y la comida es realmente buena. La carne espectacular, los postres buenísimos y el vino estupendo. Es un sitio para ir y disfrutar de la comida en el centro de Londres.
1021: Review: After I have seen pictures of the foods, I decided to come and taste this italian restaurant with my partner. Simply faboulous. From the beginning, we started to talk with the chef, he advised to taste specialties. For starter, we ate two kind of steak tartara, "d'albese" without any sauce (just salt, oil and pepper) and with sauce. Fassone Meat from Italy, exactly from Piemonte. Very very good and taste. Also we ate italian cheese included in the starter, called "Burrata" from Puglia. After that, we ate "Costata" , Fassone steak , simply divine. For drink, we advise Ripasso Valpolicella, fantastic with this kind of meat. Thanks to the sommeliere, very helpful. For finish, we tried homemade cakes, cheescake and tiramisù, always special. Thanks to Lello, the chef, we tried "lardo d'Arnad" with wallnuts and honey and "Bresaola" homemade. What else? Divine!
1022: Review: Die Steaks liegen im Fleischetresen direkt im Eingangsbereich. Herzliches Personal. Das Steak war perfekt zubereitet. Auch der Nachtisch und der Espresso waren top. Sehr zu empfehlen...
1023: Title: Molto fumo e poco arrosto

Review: Sono venuto con amici presso questa steackhouse a Londra Attraente anche se rustico scomode le sedie Il rapporto qualità prezzo da rivedere anche se alcuni prodotti sono di qualità apprezzabile ...Alcuni accorgimenti potrebbero farne un gran posto
1024: Review: Has to be the best - at least the most interesting beef I have tasted. A warm welcome awaits you from charming staff. It is a must if you like beef! The staff are really interested in the meat, how it is grown and delivered to the table. Don't be put off by any negative comments - give it a try.
1025: Review: Visited recently for lunch with a colleague. The battered red couch outside the restaurant and the somewhat dark interior did not seem to bode well...but then the food came and OH MY GOODNESS! The steak was absolutely divine, and the antipasti (charcuterie) among the best on offer in London. Will be back!
1026: Title: The best steak I've had in ages...or ever!

Review: Three of us shared a 1kg Fiorentina steak. The meat was superb: tender, very tasty and perfectly cooked. It may have been the best steak I've ever eaten! The vegetables were unremarkable but OK as were the deserts. Service was excellent - friendly, helpful, attentive and knowledgeable. The prices were good value, especially for the meat. We shall certainly be going again!
1027: Review: Food is amazing. Period. I know something about steaks, and here I ate one of the best filets ever in my life. You can easily go for the rare cooking, because it is just perfect. So tender that it could melt in your mouth.Staff is awesome. They exhibit high standards of care for their customers.The place is very nice, the atmosphere is quiet, rustic and elegant at the same time.The prices are just right for what you are going to experience.Top.
1028:
Review: Very warm and familiar staff, excellent Fiorntina, matched with a delightful Sangiovese.
Very lovely experience, guess will repeat soon
1029: Review: Macellaio is the best place that I found so far in London for beef.The quality of the meat is outstanding, the waiters are very helpful in recommending wines etc.. You must try the tartar, the stracciatella cheese and off course, Fiorentina steak. Also very good wines!
1030: Title: Un vero ristorante italiano nel cuore di Londra

Review: Vivo a Londra e sono stato in moltissimi ristoranti "italiani". Questo e' autentico. Sembra di mangiare a Testaccio a Roma! Davvero ottima carne e sopratutto per Londra prezzi ragionevoli. Squisite anche la burrate mozzarelle e affettati in generale. Caldamente consigliato!
1031: Review: Fantastic place for meat lovers - but best to make a booking, as it is busy every day of the week.Rustic interior, friendly and very helpful staff. The menu is straight forward with a choice of starters and a choice of cuts of meat sold by kilo price, which allows you as a group to order cuts of three different types to taste them all.Wine is also listed to match the temperature of your meat.The meat was cooked perfectly and absolutely delicious.
1032: Review: We spent an evening with 16 friends at the restaurant in their private dining room. The food was outstanding. Authentic Italian cuisine, otherworldly steaks and great wines. In addition we were amazed by the service we received. There were always at least two staff with us in the room ensuring we had everything we needed. We truly had a blast and I will definitely come back
1033: Title: Uno dei miei ristoranti preferiti a Londra

Review: Sono stata spesso a cena dal Macellaio a South Kensigton, sia con amici che con la mia famiglia.. non delude mai! Ottimo il menu', con molta scelta. Tutti prodotti di ottima qualita' e di provenienza italiana. La carne e' sublime, dalla fiorentina alla costata, ottimi dolci e servizio. Non e' un ristorante economico, ma ne vale sicuramente la pena. Consigliatissimo.
1034: Review: Here you have best quality meats,along with good chefs,and most importantly the two guys at the front knew excatly everything about the wines were recommended and everything about the meats as he was the farmer and butcher himself .Dine at their tables it's an original experience ! Watch out for the sharp knives they stick through your table !
1035: Review: This is by far the best steakhouse ive ever been to. From the service to the quality to taste! Everything is just superb. The main highlights are: Steak Tartare, Liver and the medium rare beef ribs! Simply World Class and a MUST TRY in London!
1036:
Review: Ottimo posto mangiare favoloso e splendida accoglienza del personale
Una vera bistecca italiana mangiata a Londra.costo nella norma
1037: Title: Slow service and cold steaks
Review: We visited this restaurant with friend but I wouldn't recommend it. The service was very slow. We got the steaks two hours after we arrived. Nothing special to justify also the high prices
1038: Review: Comer no Macellaio é uma experiência muito italiana em Londres. Carne excelente, otimo serviço e simpatia! Voltei várias vezes.
1039: Review: Siamo stati con amici a cena qualche sera fa. Squisita la tartare di carne, ottima la tagliata. Buonissimi anche i dolci.Buona scelta di vini.Servizio simpatico e professionale, locale molto carino. Tornerò.
1040: Review: The restaurant is nice and original. Unfortunetly the service is slow and the "fiorentina" beef was a bit cold when arrived at our table. We missed salt on it as well!
1041: Title: Great Steaks living up to reputation

Review: A great place for steaks - no doubt about that. We had a marvellous T Bone steak to share between us and it was just superbly cooked. If you fancy a place that does what it says, this is it. Sharpen your teeth and get here for a juicy piece of beef!
1042: Title: bedste bøf i south kensington
Review: Meget lokalt og hyggeligt - prøv deres T-Bone og tag et bord ved indgang, da lokalet bagved kan være en del støjende..
1043: Review: Ristorante davvero ottimo, da non perdere se siete a Londra! Ci siamo stati su consiglio di un amico e siamo rimasti estasiati: il locale accogliente, lo staff giovane e simpatico, il responsabile del ristorante sempre presente a consigliare i cibi, gli ottimi vini, a spiegare la provenienza degli ingredienti -tutti italiani di alta qualità- e a controllare la soddisfazione del cliente! Abbiamo assaggiato di tutto, a partire dalla focaccia ottima anche per noi genovesi, le tartare delicatissime, i salumi deliziosi, il prosciutto cotto mai mangiato così buono, poi i pansoti al sugo di noci, le tagliate e la fiorentina gustosissime e l'assaggio dei dolci uno meglio dell'altro. Da ritornarci sicuramente
1044: Review: Was invited to dinner last night by Italian friends, says it all.  The atmosphere is buzzing and friendly and the food impeccable and true to its description and quality.  Beautiful quality meat and vegatables and mouth watering deserts.  A truly remarkable evening on all counts.
1045: Title: Great birthday treat for meat eaters
Review: We enjoyed a gorgeous night here....steak and wine were beautiful and they even threw in a birthday chocolate dessert to die for! Happy teenagers too so must have been good!
1046: Review: scopro il Macellaio RC graze ad un amico che come me viaggia per lavoro e che frequenta Londra di continuo, mi propone una cena in un posto "italiano" e subito rimango scettico. appena rrivati però il locale mi piace molto, e dopo cena mi convince che sia uno dei ristoranti migliori di londra per chi ama la carne. sembra di essere in una macelleria italiana, entrando sulla sinistra si trova un banco da macelleria con carne esposta, solo quello merita dei punti! scelgo un misto di carne cruda da antipasto, e una fiorentina come piatto unico. la carne cruda è da urlo, la Battuta all'albese è semplicemente divina! la fiorentina è ottima e la cottura perfetta, la carne si scioglie in bocca. il conto è corretto, se consideriamo che siamo a londra, a south Kensington, e che la qualità è molto alta. ci ritornerò certamente durante il mio prossimo viaggio, ormai è tappa fissa. buona scelta di vini, solo il caffè è stato "nella norma". complimenti ai ragazzi che gestiscono il locale ed a coloto che ci lavorano, professionali e sempre attenti alle esigenze dei client.
1047: Review: Atmosfera davvero accogliente, tipica di un ristorante casereccio toscano.I salumi e la carne sono davvero eccellenti: consiglio la Fiorentina medium-rare per gli appassionati. Per quanto riguarda i vini, la cantina è davvero ampia e fornita sia da ottimi vini che da vini minori ma eccellenti per qualità prezzo.Spesa con antipasto, carne e vino sugli 80 pound a testa
1048: Review: Numero uno in città non C è gaucho ne altro solo lui e Cecchini nel Chianti Ma direi che è molto più difficile trovare carne buona in una Londra senza sapori che nel mitico Chianti di pranzano al qualche comunque do 10 e lode.Là tartare da urlo
1049: Review: Απλό ζεστό περιβάλλον "κρεοπωλείου" με βιτρίνα επιλογής και παραγγελιας. Εξαιρετικό ψήσιμο κρέατος και συνοδευτικά με φρεσκιες ιδέες. Καλο service, ευγενικό, ζωηρό και γρήγορο. Καλη λίστα κρασιών και καλές τιμές.
1050: Review: We visited Macellaio in December, dinner for four. The place was very busy, but we were given a good table. We had the tartar, the stracciatella and we shared the rib-eye and t-bone. Steaks come medium cooked, as they should. We accompanied our dinner with red wine. It was a great time spent in a warm place with good service. I definitely would suggest it in the future!
