1051: Review: Come si fa a non dare il massimo dei voti a questo stupendo ristorante...Location stupenda molto accogliente, personale molto gentile e con un ottima preparazione, cibo divino...carne ottima trattata con il massimo della cura ...ottima frollatura e preparazione in cucina...Il sacrificio dell'animale deve essere valorizzato al massimo...e loro in questo sono il massimo...Da provare!
1052: Review: Few words needed. Food and wine exemplary. Writing this after the starter and it has been that good that we are giving the review before the main course has arrived! :) pretty sure we will be following this up post main course :)
1053: Review: Tanto di cappello! A parte il coltello piantato sul tavolo il resto è stato ottimo,buon servizio e carne davvero sopra la norma. Ci tornerò al più presto! Grazie
1054: Review: Went there today 06FEB2016, 2 courses of beef, no alcohol 23 incl service. Service was bit slow and I was the only local in there, everyone else including all the customers (it was over half full) all the staff were Italian. They only serve beef though, raw or just seared.
1055: Review: Special place with bags of character and top quality food and wine. Easily my favourite spot in South Ken.
1056: Review: It 's one of the restaurants that I use to go a lot with my friends! The meat is always tasty thats why we keep going very often!
1057: Title: A taste of home, and I'm from Piedmont ;)

Review: The dinner was pure joy, not only because of the superlative steak but also for the whole atmosphere.The meat is amazing, perfectly suggested and cooked - I am from Piedmont and felt like being in my favourite restaurants there.We were lucky enough to have a table next to the butcher's and this made the dinner special: Lello is amazing, he spoiled us and it was a pleasure talking with him during dinner.If you are a meat lover and often feel disappointed in London, then I highly recommend this restaurant. I will certainly go again, to have the special "penultima" from Lello again ;)
1058: Review: From the fantastic aged sides of meat hanging in the window, to the quirky table settings, including stabbing your knife into the table top - you know that you are going to be in for a special experience. The beef is sublime, the dry aged cure gives a tenderness that few butchers can compete with and frankly supermarkets cannot even imagine. All of this with an Italian style and extensive list of Italian wines makes it a must experience restaurant. It is not cheap, but frankly worth every penny. The starters with the selection of Carpaccio and steak tartar, followed by two huge cuts of beef between the 4 of us was fantastic. Only complaint that the side dishes were a little miserly in the portion size, but that didn't spoil the overall experience. Really worth a visit, I will be back next time that I am in London
1059: Review: Best steak I have had in London for a long time. The staff were very friendly and helpful assisting us with our choices. We were a table of 5 girls out celebrating my birthday, the atmosphere was wonderful, the food was out of this world with a selection of starters then 2 different steaks cooked to perfection, we then had a selection of desserts. We sat happily for three and a half hours and had a wonderful evening. We would all go back again.
1060: Review: The best steak I had in London so far, and I've been to a couple of steakhouses that were supposed to be top. The staff was really friendly and both the starter and the steak were amazing! Paid £55 per person, for a 700g steak, a bottle of Italian red, starter and espressos.
1061: Review: Definitely a place worth visit - meat selection is great, although the staff needs to be a bit more cheerful!
1062: Review: took my girlfriend for her birthday last night and can definitely say I've scored highly with the brownie points. I'll be cashing them in later.
1063: Review: My wife ,seven year old daughter and I attended this restaurant on Sunday 24 January for an evening meal.We loved the main window and buzz around the entrance of the shop were the meat is prepared.The lady who greeted us made us feel like old friends and we were shown to our table which was downstairs in a brilliant quirky dinning room.The male waiter then explained to us in detail about the concept of the dinning experience and also the way the meat is selected and presented,we found this fascinating and he had great patience with us as we had a lot of questions to ask and he was great ,our daughter loved the experience .We then selected our courses and I have got to say that we had the best meal we have had for a long time the starters was the air dried beef and was delicious, and then for the main meal my daughter and I had rump steak and my wife the fillet this was by far the best steak we had tasted and we have eaten steak around the world and normally the American steak restaurants are the best but they better move over because this was exceptional and is now our favourite steak restaurant,when we are back in Kensington we will be back like a shot.
1064: Review: The T bone steak was very good. We were 3 and the size recommended was perfect.The wine list is also good manly Italian based on.Excellent experience will for sure come back.
1065: Title: Fantastic meat, cooked to perfection

Review: Our attention was caught by the window display of ageing legs and sides of meat hanging in the climate-controlled window and we decided that this was going to be our dinner spot. We were early so got a table easily. You enter past the butchery counter into a cosy dining room. The menu has a wonderful explanation of how their meat is reared, hung and prepared so we knew this would going to be great. We ordered an Old Fashioned-Style T Bone steak and having discussed size with the waiting he returned with a beautifully marbled piece of steak which we would be sharing. The meat was absolutely delicious. Tender and juicy and served with some garlic spinach. Simple, delicious and enjoyable
1066: Review: This is the right place to be when wanting to eat some tasty meat. The portions are a bit small and if one wants to gorge on meat it can get really expensive quite fast.
1067: Title: La carne migliore di Londra

Review: Posto fantastico. C'ero già stato nella prima gestione, quando era Maxela. Ora è ancora meglio e non ha perso la qualità. Anzi. Consiglio vivamente di saltare gli antipasti e buttarsi subito su un bel chilo di bisteccona da dividere in due. La carne è davvero eccezionale, comunque la prendiate. Il costo non è basso. Ma per Londra, per la qualità e per il posto... Va più che bene. Tappa fissa a Londra
1068: Title: Great Experience will be back!!!

Review: Stumbled onto this Restaurant just outside the hotel... after a short wait I was sited and the very friendly staff enabled me to enjoy a very pleasant experience for my senses!! Excellent wine, excellent meat, excellent Tiramisu and a very nice coffee!! Great place for meat lovers.. after all the name in Italian means butchery...
1069: Review: Enjoyed a quiet lunch for two here. Meat is the thing - you pay by weight. We shared a T-Bone steak - the minimum weight is 700g and the price is £56 per Kg. It was cooked to perfection and served cut off the bone and sliced though we also had the meaty bones to scrape. Which we did. The roast potatoes are an excellent accompaniment - far better than chips as they are small and cooked with rosemary. A good recommendation by the waiter. The mixed vegetables were also great. Good service for us - the staff to table ratio means that they are kept busy but we did not have to wait more than was appropriate for the cooking. Most of the other diners were speaking Italian, which sort of sums up how good it was. It is not cheap, but this quality of meat deserves the price. We will return...
1070: Title: Nice aged beef that it's better in tartar...

Review: For the ones that love a good meat, a tasty beef you need to come to Macellaio.The aged meat is very tasteful and the guys know how to cook it for the best flavor.You need to try the tartar beef, namely the Battuta, a tartar beef with melt Gorgonzola on the top.It's a meat experience you'll have when visiting Macellaio...
1071: Review: Great Italian style steaks from Italian cows. Excellent wine list in a really convenient location. the service was flawless!!! WELL DONE!!!!!
1072: Review: Incuriosita dall'esterno di questo locale, dinanzi al quale passavamo ogni sera per rientrare in hotel, abbiamo deciso di "testarlo". Premetto che, io e mio marito, non consumiamo tantissima carne rossa, ma ugualmente abbiamo deciso di cenare qui. Abbiamo optato, quindi, per una tagliata con contorno, ed un calice di vino consigliatoci dal personale. Non discuto la qualità delle pietanze che ci sono state servite, ma le porzioni presentate. La tagliata era davvero misera, come il suo condimento messo in un angolino del tagliere sul quale ci è stata servita. Idem dicasi per il calice, che era pieno a metà, di conseguenza il prezzo pagato per ciò che abbiamo consumato davvero alto. Ritengo che questo locale, gestito da italiani, debba migliorare questo aspetto. Il posto è davvero carino, particolare. La preparazione del tavolo molto scenografica, plauso per questo ai gestori, ma le porzioni, ed i calici di vino, non possono essere solo un assaggio.
1073: Review: I'll make no bones about it: this is a full on beef experience. A cut above the rest. Unmissable. A theatrical performance. An intriguing visit. Walking past the counter displaying sides of well matured beef ready to be chopped up when required, you come into a cheerful, informal dining room. Everyone was welcoming and friendly and we were treated to an interesting explanation of the Italian origins of this traditionally produced meat. We had a good selection of starters, including carpaccio and a delicious trio of beef tartare. But the star of our meal was the amazingly tender and flavoursome T-Bone steak. Quite simply the best I've ever had. We had it rare, as we like it, but cooked so that it was nice and crispy on the outside. Perfect. It came with delicious roasted Rosemary potatoes. Desserts - we had a selection of Italian favourites, beautifully prepared and served – which made a delightful end to the meal.
1074: Review: We came upon this restaurant by chance only to discover later that our son and his Italian girlfriend LOVE it. And now we know why - beautifully prepared steak, carefully researched and lovingly served. Great service for both food and wine - each complementing the other. The best rib eye steak we have had. I walked away with the wrong coat- probably because I was dreaming about the food! Good job I checked the pockets when outside to realise it wasn't mine! Highly recommend.
1075: Review: I decided to try Macellaio due to the good trip advisor reviews. I have walked past a few times and to be honest I hadn't even realised it was a restaurant, from the outside a quick glance you could easily think it was just a butcher. I am thankful we tried. The staff were great, but more importantly the food was amazing. We decided to stick to meat and I am glad we did, it was seasoned and cooked fantastically.
1076: Title: An amazing place for meat & italian food lovers

Review: One of the best restaurant we have gone in London! Warm welcome, beautiful place, original and unique concept, high-end quality food and drinks for very reasonable prices, excellent service, everything was just perfect! Italian artisanal Proseco and organic wine, homemade tartare, carpaccio, tripe, deserts, and last but not least the best grappa I've ever tasted in my life... Meat and italian gastronomy lovers you cant be disapointed!
1077: Title: CHOUETTE DINER A LA BOUCHERIE

Review: A première vue, la vitrine qui exhibe les quartiers de viande n' est certes que moyennement engageante. Mais une fois cet a priori dépassé, ce qui en dit long sur l' hypocrisie des carnivores, nous nous sommes régalés de bout en bout avecde délicieux fromages ( eh oui ! ) italiens et un filet de bœuf maturé à tomber. Là dessus une bonne bouteille de Barbera et l' addition grimpe sec,pour autant nous n' avons pas regretté la dépense. Service décontracté mais très à l' écoute.A refaire...
1078: Review: Servizio da dimenticare: cameriera non fluent e completamente distratta. Di certo non merita l'esosa mancia automaticamente imposta nel conto. Per il resto carne di qualità e prodotti freschi.
1079: Title: My favorite restaurant in London!!

Review: I absolutely love this restaurant!! Every dish is absolutely amazing! The meat is perfectly cooked. All the appetizers are mouth watering! My favorites are the Battuta with or without Gorgonzola, the Stracciatella cheese and my favorite is the toasted bread, lardo, honey, walnuts. Yummy! My favorite sides are the grilled vegetables and roasted potatoes. The Cheese cake is a yummy dessert.
1080: Title: Meat craving and some £££ to spend?! Macellaio is for you!

Review: We started with the tartare which was very fresh and flavoursome. We then had the Fiorentina del Macellaio which was served on a warm plate so as not to get cold, cooked to perfection (rare) with a side of roasted potatoes (very tasty) and beans (not the perfect combination). The wine list is extensive. No much going on atmosphere wise. Overall a good dinner, although the bill was a little difficult to digest...
1081: Review: Era da due mese che manchevamo dal vostro ristorante e devo dire che tornandoci è stata come sempre una scelta azzeccata cena fantastica e servizio attento un ringraziamento a Maurizio nel consigliare vini sempre appropriati, Emanuele sempre cordiale e gentile ,di solito non pubblico recensioni ma per un paio di volte ho fatto eccezioni e leggendo chi critica questo locale devo dire che di buon cibo e qualità ci capisce gran poco ....mi sia permessa una battuta di spirito per i vostri ospiti....il Wi-Fi non è una pietanza del menù ..... Via i cellulari e godetevi compagnia e cena felici feste a voi Simone Arianna
1082: Review: Amazing meat!!!!The best place in west kensington for meat and Italian kitchen!Try the raw carpaccio,so yummy!
1083: Title: decent food but strange ambience

Review: This restaurant is unlike any other I've been to. It looks like a butcher's from outside, and in the downstairs section there is a fridge full of slabs of beef visible to the diners. You can also hear the sound of the butcher chopping meat upstairs, which is a bit off-putting Service is a bit annoying -- the waiters go through every single dish -- and the downstairs section felt overheated. That said, the food was pretty good and nicely prepared. The steaks are very substantial and tasty.
1084: Review: Il locale delle "50 SFUMATORE DI ROSSO" a partire dal divano che troneggia sulla Old brompton,alle impareggiabili carni provenienti dall Italia e selezionate con cura.Grazie della serata, della strepitosa carne, della cordialita'e soprattutto di come noi Italiani....quando indossiamo il cilindro.....esce carne di fassona e non conigli.
1085: Review: Locale stupendo, accogliente, personale simpaticissimo e davvero attento a tutte le richieste. (sono un soggetto allergico, ho fatto notare la cosa e sono subito venuti ad elencarmi tutte le lavorazioni e gli ingredienti usati per la mia ordinazione). Davvero bravi. un consiglio PRENOTATE PRIMA è sempre pieno.Conto giusto, per quello che abbiamo mangiato e bevuto. ci ritornerò sicuramente. SUPER CONSIGLIATO.
1086: Review: This is a unique restaurant with an italian butchers counter at the front and then the restaurant behind. The quality of the steak and meat was exceptional. My daughter loves her italian food and declared the meat balls were the best she'd ever tasted. Equally my special rump steak was wonderfully tender. The spectacle of seeing meat being offered to diners after the butcher had done his business was pretty amazing too. Highly recommended!
1087: Title: Exquisite Piemontese Fassone - Not to be Missed

Review: “They roasted the prime cuts, pulled them off the spitsand sharing out the portions, fell to the royal feast”Homer The OdysseyBook 3 Lines 73 – 74Tr. Robert FaglesThe restaurant ages its own meat in-house. Indeed the shopfront resembles a butchery rather than a restaurant. Unashamedly Italian, Macellaio RC is a solely a meat destination. Unlike many steak oriented eateries, this one includes some offal. Not to be missed is the Cuore – beef heart with a subtle undertone of garlic and aromatic herbs; and Fegato – liver with onion. The Fassone breed of cattle is found in Piedmont and the animals are butchered at much older ages than is generally the case – this, plus the feed regime (no feedlots here) and the ageing – gives an incredibly flavoursome meat which is set off perfectly by the very simple presentation – seared in salt and oil.Easily one of the top beef destinations on the planet.
1088: Review: Great place for a steak. Don't think that a vegetarian would enjoy the meat-aging fridge at the entrance, it sets the scene very quickly. Service was good, interior decoration makes it look more like a cabaret than a restaurant but it adds to the ambiance. The meat was excellent and properly cooked. Great dinner
1089: Review: I appreciate what the guys here are trying to do here, but the product just fails to live up to expectations. Tonight was supposed to be all about the meat, so I was willing to overlook the lack of pleasant interior and rickety chairs and tables. The service was pleasant, but amateurish. I hate it when male waiters just talk to my male companion. Hello, there is another diner here. I also hate it when one has to ask for the bill twice and yet still have to get up and go to the till to pay as there is no service. Anyway, getting back to the main point. The food. The carpaccio was good, as was the tartare. The caponata was amazing. The Fiorentina (T-bone) was just a bitter disappointment. My knife couldn't cut through a lot of it as it was so sinewy. The flavour of the meat was ok, but I have had so much better, which is why if this purports to be all about the best cuts and types of beef that I was so disappointed. My advice is if you are a meat lover, save yourself the disappointment and just head on down to Hawksmoor.
1090: Review: yes we all did a double take and hesitated outside the butcher shop - don't hesitate : go right into carnivore heaven . Servers were helpful and informative , meat is presented before they cook it, and have it medium rare for best results !
1091: Review: Wonderful meat restaurant, welcoming you with the meat in a refrigerator in the shop window. You are greeted by an Interior that looks like a butcher shop. The meat presented to you before cooking. The meat is amazing and cooked with love.Nice and very professional staff. Don't be afraid when your knife is cut down in the wooden table by the waiter.
1092: Title: Meat experience I will came back soon
Review: For meat lovers ! Nothing more to say everything was perfect and the bill high but when you have such quality and service it is a pleasure to pay! I will came back as soon as possible!
1093: Review: I've been living in Chelsea for 6 years and every time I drive down Old Brompton Road I kept remembering that I want to try this place out... but I only went for the first time (of many, I am sure!) last weekend. A simple but effective formula: Butcher in the front and a quaint, roughly hewn gem of a restaurant in the back. The menu is simple, the meat of excellent provenance and rearing, the cooking bang on and the wine list delicious and full of bottles I hadn't seen before at very good prices. Not to mention the ebullient staff and their excellent grappa recommendations (yes, way too much grappa).
1094: Title: We should have listened to the Concierge

Review: The concierge told us that he did not hear good things about this "restaurant." It is a butcher shop in the front and an "act" called a restaurant in the back. The waiter told us the whole story of the beef. Where they were born, where they grew up, what they were fed and why their place serves the best in London. Well we couldn't chew the meat. We left most it in the dinner napkin. The rest we left over and left.For a good show, go there. For a good meal, go someplace else.
1095: Title: FINALMENTE , UN AUTENTICO RISTORANTE ITALIANO ALL'ESTERO.

Review: Locale molto accogliente. L'interno è molto caldo e originale.Io sono italiano e normalmente non mangio la mia cucina all estero per non rimanerne deluso, ma non è questo il caso. Sono stato qui due volte e sicuramente ci verrò svariate volte.Ho letto dei prezzi un po elevati , ma i prodotti di qualità hanno un costo più alto ( la qualità non ha certo il prezzo di una pizzeria ).Personale gentile , carne buonissima , ma non solo. Io ho mangiato anche, dei ravioli ed una torta al cioccolato veramente buoni.Ampiamente consigliato.
1096: Title: La 'Fiorentina' (Italian T-bone steak) in London

Review: OK, it's London, it's meat (and of excellent quality) and it's posh South Kensington, so if you are looking for a cheap Italian 'Fiorentina' or 'Tagliata', skip page.Hence the bottom line with Il Macellaio is whether this is worth the price, in the range of 40 to 50 pounds (if you pay attention to your choice of wine...see later). Also, let me stress that I am a BBQ cook, and often grill Fiorentina chosen from my personal butcher at home in Italy, so I am naturally biased when it comes to grilled cow.Having said this, I'd rate this Fiorentina on an absolute scale a 8/10, so good to very good. Not excellent, because the filet part was a shy tougher than it should have been for perfection (i.e. the consistency of butter). And to be honest, this could have been due to the fact that we had Fiorentina only for two, so a small cut, hence maybe a part that was not perfectly aged. The cooking was however perfect, and also the 'Tagliata' that two other colleagues got (they serve this in different ways) tasted very good. Entrees are also top quality.The only downside I have with this restaurant is the wine list. It is extensive, and with some very good bottles, but the pricing is totally distorted from the bottom. While it is ok to pay 30 to 40 pounds a bottle worth 20 euros in Italy (ie roughly twice the price), it is not acceptable to pay 25 pounds for a bottle worth 5 or 6 euros (ie almost six times the price). So watch out.
1097: Review: Visiting London with friends and spotted this restaurant on Trip Advisor, couldn't book a table for 5 people yesterday when we arrived but booked for tonight instead.Things were a little chaotic when we arrive for our 9pm reservation as the restaurant was so busy. After a short wait we were seated and our lovely host Lorenzo arranged drinks and explained the menu.We were seated at the front of the restaurant opposite the butchery counter. Whilst perusing the menu 'Lello' the butcher approached our table and made some recommendations.On his advice we ordered 2 starters to share then a kilo of rib eye and a kilo of T-Bone to share with a few sides.The meat was perfectly cooked, tender and tasty......fabulous!Lorenzo learned that it was my partners birthday tomorrow and arranged a portion of the most delicious chocolate cake presented with a candle whilst staff and other customers sang a chorus of 'Happy Birthday'.A wonderful evening made very special by Lello & Lorenzo's attentiveness, the 'theatre' of being seated near the butchery counter and the best meat I have had for some time.Many Thanks
1098: Review: Siamo stati benissimo . Il personale è stato molto cordiale . Abbiamo mangiato carne eccellente. Il dolce buonissimo . Lo consiglio vivamente .
1099: Review: If you like meat, this is the place. Nothing but meat. From the best meat area of Italy, Piedmont.Raw material of top quality, you can even get unusual dishes like heart and tongue.A good choice of starters and pasta dishes.Their tiramisu could be better, less sugar and more coffee. Wine selection right for the place.Easygoing service, mostly Italian personnel.In the entrance it's a butchery shop, have your lunch and, if you leave in London, buy your meat, sausages here, you will not be disappointed.Prices, this being a good neighborhood of London, more than acceptable.
1100: Title: Top restaurant, will go back every time in London!

Review: Completely astonishing experience! The wine, waiters, design and foremost the food! Have never had such an experience when eating in Italy. Go there for business, family, couples whoever that would like to have a memorable experience. The price wasn't too bad either, definitaly when you think of the quality.
1101: Review: Sono stata qui con un gruppo di amici. Abbiamo prenotato con un anticipo di 8 ore. Arrivati il tavolo non era pronto e ci hanno indicato un posto vicino in cui bere qualcosa nell'attesa perché lì non c'era spazio.Pessimo.Una volta rientrati e aver aspettato ancora in fila al freddo e dove do richiamare l'attenzione del pedonale perché nessuno era al ricevimento abbiamo ordinato e dopo una lunga attesa finalmente abbiamo potuto mangiare.Il cameriere (Walter) ricordo bene il nome, ha portato gli antipasti con aria frettolosa è molto maleducata.Mi ha passato un piatto che non era mio e io in tutta tranquillità gli ho detto che non avevo preso quello. Lui con aria seccata e con una confidenza che neanche mia sorella mi da, mi ha detto "BEH PASSALO NO?!?".Non ci sono parole.Tutti zitti abbiamo aspettato che si allontanasse e sconvolti abbiamo pensato a quanto fosse maleducato .In ogni caso la carne era buona.Ma non ci tornerò
1102: Title: Ottima Carne, prezzo un po elevato

Review: Siamo andati a mangiare la carne perchè avevo letto ottime recnsioni. devo dire che sono rimasto molto colpito dalla qialità, ma sono rimasto anche colpito dal conto che abbiamo pagato. soprattutto non sono rimasto contento del fatto che non mi sia stato chiesto se avessi voluto lasciare il resto come mancia, in un posto che ha un certo tipo di pretese certe cadute di stile non andrebbero fatte.
1103: Review: En Italiensk köttrestaurang med kött hämtat från hemlandet. Stora portioner, perfekt stekt kött. Fantastiskt trevlig miljö. Åt den godaste t-bone steken jag någonsin ätit. Mkt bra och prisvärda viner. Servicen oklanderlig trots att det var mkt folk. Rekomenderas starkt.
1104: Review: If you like me love Italy and meat, this a really good place. The meat is cooked to perfection and and only the best meat is used. I was there alone for the first time but felt like a local and was immediately invited to try a couple of different wines which were chosen after I had been interviewed about my preferences. The staff was extremely friendly and to my knowledge all Italians which is a rare in London these days. I'll come back the next time I'm in London.
1105: Review: Amazing meat is what you get at Il Macellaio, Italian for butcher. Cooked to perfection and coupled with good service, Italian atmosphere and, most importantly, appropiate Italian wines to complement your meal. The soul of Macellaio, Roberto Costa, is a true genius in his field and has ensured the restaurant has stayed focused on its unique selling proposition. Which is to provide customers with what butchers do: meat meat meat!
1106: Review: My wife and I stumbled across this place on our last night in London, after we had eaten elsewhere. The display of meat in the window and inside was so spectacular, that we decided we would have to try it. The only option was for lunch the next day before we traveled home. One of the best decisions we ever made!!! Although a bit heavy for lunchtime I ordered a 700 gram T bone and my wife had a smaller rib eye. The steaks were cut from the meat on display, shown to us and taken to be cooked to our liking. The waiter Lorenzo explained to us the way the beef was reared, selected, and dry aged, matured. The maitre de discussed our wine preferences and selected 3 bottles that he thought would suit our taste.The one we selected was perfectly matched to our described taste. The steaks were served, cooked exactly as ordered, on the bone, and sliced after being cooked. The taste, texture, and flavour of the meat was absolutely outstanding. In fact we agreed that this is probably the tastiest steak we have ever had. Although high end price wise it was worth every penny, and next time we are in London, Marcellaio will be revisited. I would recommend this restaurant to anyone visiting London, for world class quality steaks, and service
1107: Review: Per me era impensabile mangiare carne di così alta qualità in un ristorante Italiano a Londra, ma mi sono ricreduto.Personale e servizio assolutamente impeccabili e simpatici, ma la qualità della carne è inimmaginabile.Avremmo voluto provare anche altri piatti, ma visto il costo della carne ci siamo concentrati solo su quella, con piena soddisfazione.Ottima scelta anche di vini, con buona competenza e assistenza da parte del personale.Ristorante caro ma ne vale davvero la pena. E poi prendere l'aperitivo seduti su un divano in strada a South Kensington è davvero figo.
1108: Review: Mi è stato detto :"ti porto a mangiare la carne più buona che tu abbia mai assaggiato" ero un po scettico e cavolo mi son dovuto ricredere Questo locale fa paura l'interno e curato e originale ogni piatto è bellissimo è troppo buono ,tagliata e Fiorentina assaggiatele tanto è inutile descriverla non mi credereste il personale eccellente!!!!Posso dire solo provare per credereGrazie e arrivederci
1109: Review: The best Fiorentina - honestly, we've had it in Florence and Lucca and this is supreme, both flavour and texture. Service and ambience, spot on. Grazie.
1110: Review: Good steak, Italian restaurant style. They have an impressive wine list and dine when you are reasonably hungry, since the steaks are considerably huge.The carpaccio I ordered lacked any taste (it is cubed than thinly sliced) and I asked them to turn it into the real deal which was a tartar and they were obliging. Like most of the overzealous Italian waiter, they could recommend and confuse you, but you should study the menu and order taking time. I should say a good meal, though not the best steak, but fairly priced and I would go there again.
1111: Title: Italiaans, maar verrassend anders. Niet voor vegetariërs!

Review: Je komt binnen via de slagerij die vol hangt met dry aged beef ribs. Als je geluk hebt, krijg je een tafel boven, waar het klein, rumourig maar oergezellig is. Wij zaten in de kelder wat toch nog OK was. Je krijgt eerst een verhaal over het vlees, en de (voor)bereiding ervan. De kwaliteit houdt tred met de mooie verhalen er over. Echt heerlijk. Ook de bijgerechten (geroosterde groente,. fagioli en veel meer) zijn heerlijk.Een echte trouvaille voor vleesliefhebbers en-voor Londen- niet echt duur.
1112: Review: We were really looking forward to go to this place for some time as we have heard good reviews. It all started very well, the place itself is beautiful, cosy and has got it's charm. It has got a good concept however it is not delivered as it should be. The staff is trained to be relaxed and friendly but they all do exactly the same so at the end it's all robotic without a true personality. And you only see them when taking order and then when giving bill. Nobody checks on you during the meal, nobody is trying to keep up with the first impression you get when you first enter. Steak tartar was great,bruscheta with lardo and honey, nuts was also lovely and surprising combination but the T-bone was a bit dry and chewy.Nutmeg mash potato didn't taste of nutmeg at all but tasted more like there was a bit too much cheese, caponata wasn't very good . I would probably go back maybe just to have a glass of wine as they have good choice of wine by the glass and plate of salami and cheese at the bar but I wouldn't go back for dinner as the service is not what it should be.
1113: Title: Dinner for work and fun
Review: We developed this Italian restaurant with owner coming from Genoa. Typical dishes, tongue with green sauce and meat really amazing. Wine tasting good, too.
1114: Review: This is probably London's most awesomely understated steak house, providing aged beef cuts of gargantuan size at (relatively) Lilliputian prices.Decor and ambiance are informal and relaxed, service likewise. The wine list - heavily skewed towards full bodied reds - contains only Italian vintages.Highly recoHighlyHighly
1115: Review: Awesome lunch! Perfect wine selection . Francesco was awesome ! We will be back !! I recommend the Battuta. Raw fresh meat that literally melt in your mouth.
1116: Title: The best stake in London! A
Review: I was at Macellaio a business dinner. We had the best stake in London! Amazing ambiance and great service! For the real meat eaters!
1117: Review: So we ended up in the restaurant next door because I thought Macellaio was a butchers!! The restaurant next door were very understanding and we left and went and retrieved our table at Macellaio. The hostess was lovely. If you want a quiet dinner ask not to be put in the back room...after another false start we were seated downstairs and Francesco kindly also turned the music lower. I may not be young but I don't enjoy eating in restaurants where you have to yell at your companion because it is so loud. The Burrata was the best we have ever had, the Panzanella salad was lovely (although came a little late) the steak was amazing, since we went for my husband who is a meatatarian I usually have a fish or chicken but I had the rump steak and it was delicious, we didn't need the chocolate cake but it was really exceptional and warm from the oven. The ambiance is great, once it was a little quieter. I would certainly visit here again.
1118: Title: Wil je eens lekker biefstuk eten

Review: Je zit letterlijk bij de slager aan tafel. Heerlijk vlees en als je samen eet wordt het meteen als een groter stuk bereid. In een tijd van groenten en kip een voorrecht om zo heerlijk rood vlees te eten.
1119: Title: Amazing food in a relaxed setting

Review: Macellaio's is a real treat in London. It has a relaxed atmosphere with amazing food (meat). The service is friendly and helpful. Think country side Tuscany. Meat (beef) is the speciality. If you want something else go somewhere else.
1120: Review: Honestly one of the best meat restaurants I have been to in a long time. Situated in South Kensington only a few minutes walk from the tube this cosy little restaurant that specialises in meat really does the job. I had the Tagliata (nude) simply dressed with extra virgin olive oil and salt and it melted in my mouth, a side of grilled vegetables was the perfect combination and a nice bottle of Barbera red wine made the dinner 100%.The venue is very quirky with very cool and original table designs (we ate on an antique wooden desk :) )
1121: Review: Marvellous meat restaurant, with a fantastic atmosphere. If you like your steak well done, you will not get a true experience. Will be coming back!
1122: Title: Locale particolare con ottima carne

Review: Sono sempre restia ad andare in un ristorante italiano all'estero ma questo mi ha convinto. L'arredamento del locale è' davvero particolare. Abbiamo mangiato nella sala al piano di sotto, molto carina e familiare. Il cameriere Francesco ci ha illustrato tutti i tipi di carne e ci ha spiegato la differenza della lavorazione Fassona piemontese, consigliandoci al meglio. La carne era buona, ben presentata e ben cotta. Le patate il perfetto contorno. È' un posto di casa, dove ci si può tornare spesso. Sembra di stare n Italia...
1123: Review: Please make sure you have a reservation. It is very popular. Great food and service. It was my husband's B-Day and they brought dessert with a candle and the whole restaurant joined us singing happy b-day. A must go when in London!
1124: Review: Magico Lello! Simpatico napoletano che tratta carne piemontese in un ristorante genovese a Londra. Cosa chiedere di più ? Ci ha fatto uscire felici sazie e divertite ! Il locale è molto bello, originale e il personale attento e cordiale! Grandi! Giuditta
1125: Review: Scoperto per caso, siamo state attratte dalla vetrina stile vecchia macelleria entrate abbiamo scoperto un locale delizioso con personale gentilissimo. Lello il macellaio che ti consiglia cosa prendere è una persona fantastica! abbiamo preso tartare freschissima con del gorgonzola stagionato Da leccarsi i baffi....ottimo anche il vino. Qualità e prezzo in linea!
1126: Title: Excellent meat in South Kensington
Review: Nice place for meat lovers. We had rump steak and it was marvelous. There are others really impressive and expensive meats available on the menu. 5 min from the underground. All family loved.
1127: Review: Spending a month in Sth Kensington from Melbourne- which we regard as a good food city. Stumbled across this gem in Old Brompton Road. It is amazing - beef perfect, staff exceptional and ambience fun & a buzz! A place with real character. Be guided by the staff first time - they did well (food and wine)!! It was a somewhat special occasion for us as we were catching up with our god-daughter after some time - perfect and memorable night. Thank you.
1128: Title: Carne sublime, ottimi vini, cortesia e professionalità

Review: Dopo qualche giorno di permanenza a Londra avevo voglia di mangiare qualcosa di grande qualita, soggiornando a South Kensington avevo letto un gran bene di questo ristorante e ho deciso di provare. Sono stato accolto da una ragazza molto simpatica e cortese che mi ha proposto carne di grandissima qualità, lavorata e cucinata con gran professionalità, consigliandomi dell'ottimo vino. Ho pagato il giusto. Stefano.... Il napoletano - siciliano
1129: Review: Great atmosphere with a vert extensive menu  Tagliatta soo smooth it slides down wonderfully  already been twice this week  reserve as always busy
1130: Title: Boot the vegetarianism and bring your steak knife

Review: I was invited to this restaurant very recently and I was told that it was Italian food. What I wasn't told was that they served nothing but meat. It was a very delightful surprise to eat here as it felt like having a butcher's right next door. The meat was superb, cooked to the perfect medium-rare and garnished with a perfect side dish.I liked the choice of the staff. Very efficient. They speak English, French and Italian. They wish everyone goodbye by shaking their hand which I find to be very polite and a nice end to the perfect meal.The restaurant has the theme of a butcher's shop as the meats are on display as you enter, they cut the meat in shop in front of customers, the tables are chopping boards where the waiter sticks the steak knife before your main course.A truly impressive restaurant.Never go there without a reservation otherwise you will be deeply disappointed.
1131: Title: A Wow Factor, We were Really Impressed

Review: Wow Factor! We Had a very warm welcome by a gorgeous & smiley member of staff who escorted us to our table straight away even though we were there half an hour early. We did say we were hungry. Nina, is her name, a true gem! Our Waiter was amazing & took a very good care of us. The whole experience is a piece of theatre. We couldn't have picked a better place. Service exceptional, buzzy, food fantastic & very relaxed.A special mention to the manager - sorry, I forgot his name - who reserved us a table in the bar. Bottom line, if you want the best steak in London, this is the place to be. Book well in advance it was rammed!
1132: Review: Ho all'attivo più di un centinaio di recensioni e i 5 pallini per me sono una rarità, ma questo posto li merita davvero.Innanzitutto l'ambiente particolare e soprattutto l'atmosfera di casa che si respira, e non solo per il fatto che siano quasi tutti italiani. Ambiente cordiale e personale gentilissimo, tutti ragazzi con la passione per ciò che fanno.passando al dettaglio 'culinario' che dire?? tutto ottimo, le tartare poi...una favola. Al momento del dolce, ho fatto una variante al tema e ne ho ordinata un'altra ;). Ad onor del vero poi anche il dolce l'ho assaggiato, cheesecake ottima e non stucchevoleper fortuna almeno una volta all'anno sono a Londra, d'ora in poi sarà tappa fissa!complimenti davvero allo staff
1133: Review: Being Italian, I'm always a little bit sceptical about Italian restaurants in London as they are usually not top quality and too expensive. This is not the case. Top quality, better than many restaurants in Italy and Tuscany. I had one of the best fiorentina of my entire life. The mixed starter is amazing with real “mozzarella di bufala” and fantastic tasty raw meat. The atmosphere is informal and the service very friendly. Great Italian wines as well. Obviously good meet doesn’t come for free but it’s worth every penny.
1134: Review: We were there for a dinner! We had as a starter the tartare, carpaccio and crostone di Lardo Absolutely amazing for main course we had a t bone steak the meat was so nice!! Service was ok. For sure I will come back
1135: Review: The place is very nice, waiters and management as well, I asked for a rare "Fiorentina" and I had a more than medium cooked smaller piece of beef. Spinach and fries not good at all, very expensive wine (very good indeed). Macellaio you should do better !!!
1136: Title: A must - best restaurant in South Kensington

Review: To tell the truth we stepped inside accidentally, looking for first evening meal. I was impressed very much with interior, creativity, staff and food. Absolutely best place to have italian meats, drinks and see how informal and cool should be staff communication. Excellent steaks, great starters and wine. Cosy and unique atmosphere. Prices are on higher side when you buy steak by weight, but nothing to regret. 100% recommended and will come back even if will not stay in S. Kensington.
1137: Review: Estivemos na casa em depois das 14h e estava vazio. Pedimos carne e salada e tudo estava excelente. O preço da carne é alto para os padrões brasileiros, mas a carne é excelente!
1138: Title: AMAZING RESTAURANT - FANTASTIC DINING EXPERIENCE

Review: Had such an amazing dining experience here - the food is IMMENSE and the service was out of this world - such friendly waiters who clearly enjoy their customers have a good time.I can't recommend this place enough - prices are medium to high - but EXTREMELY reasonable considering the excellent quality of the food and the dining experience. Don't go to Gauchos or Hawksmoor - this is 1,000,000 times better. Really can't recommend the place enough - although part of me doesn't want to share it with anyone it was soooooooooo good!!! Will definitely go back there in the near future.
1139: Review: Definitely a different style of restaurant which we loved, we never booked and managed to get a table, staff are extremely friendly with a real character of a butcher who came to explain the cuts of meat and recommended the t bone, which was lovely. Very laid back, casual with fabulous staff.I will definitely go back!
1140: Review: Visited this restaurant in South Kensington for a birthday treat with family as I am a real steak lover. Safe to say we weren't disappointed - the steak was cooked to perfection and the side dishes, which included potatoes with herbs and hand cut chips were tasty too. The restaurant also has a good wine list. The service was friendly and not overbearing and our waiter even threw in a free tiramisu for me as it was my birthday. I will return.
1141: Review: Ein perfektes Restaurant für Fleischliebhaber! Unser Fleisch war genauso zubereitet wie bestellt und von ausgezeichneter Qualität. Sehr freundlicher Service, grosse Auswahl an italienischen Weinen, Geräuschkulisse ist sehr hoch.
1142: Title: THE MOST AMAZING MEAT RESTAURANT IN LONDON!

Review: We recently had dinner at this restaurant. First impressions: The meat display at the entrance meant to us that this place takes meat and food in general seriously. The staff was charming, attentive and professional. By the time we were seated and looked at the menu we already knew that this place is something very special.We started off with a nice Italian sparkling wine from Franciacorta. This restaurant has a rustic setting which is very refreshing for a change from all the super sleek designed restaurants. The four of us ordered the misto imperiale for a starter to share, as well as the prosciutto crudo. The tartar was also amazing. Our main course was the fiorentina and yes, we were in heaven. We probably ordered too much food but we had invited a professional tennis player and his wife that evening so the apetite was well deserved. We then ordered the costata which was superb and then a sample of their dessert, torta cioccolato, latte dolce, tiramisu and cheesecake. A bliss! This was one of the best dinners we ever had. Congratulations to the whole team. You have created a piece of real and excellent Italian food culture in London. It was very much needed. Thank you for sharing this superb food culture with the rest of the world.
1143: Review: Ingredienti e prodotti di primissima scelta provenienti dall'Italia, pasta fatta in casa ( fantastici i pansotti al sugo di noci) e che dire della carne... Frollata in loco e della migliore razza bovina piemontese, sapientemente lavorata a vista dal macellaio. Atmosfera davvero particolare, personale competente e professionale che racconta l'origine e la scelta dei prodotti. La cortesia e i sorrisi rendono ancora più piacevole l'ottimo cibo che viene consigliato. Insomma sentirsi come a casa all'estero non è così facile e soprattutto mangiare così bene è raro. Davvero un'emozione per il palato, lo consiglio.
1144: Title: Go to London and have a dinner here

Review: We might say there are two types of restaurants: there are places where, looking at the menu, you can't decide what to eat because nothing is really enticing; and there are places like Macellaio where you can't decide either...because you would like to try everything! Macellaio definitely belongs to this second category.We had home made pasta (perfectly made and perfectly cooked); I had to try the offal (heart); we had the battuto di Fassona (row meat, simply served with salt and olive oil): simply amazing. Then our competent waitress recommended a "costata", usually with higher fat content then the "fiorentina" but being Fassona was a delicious cut: this was probably the best meat I had in a very long time (and I live in Denmark!). A decadent Latte fritto as a dessert. We have a critic just for the side dishes: fries were mediocre and caponata, a mix of vegetables pan fried and seasoned with vinegar and herbs, acceptable but not on par with the rest of the dinner. Very good wine list with reasonable prices.The service is conveniently added to your bill so you don't have to tip.
1145: Review: Ottima carne di qualità. Pasta realmente italiana. Una rarità per Londra. Primi e secondi di ottima manifattura. Bella la macelleria in vista. Personale ottimo.
1146: Review: Macellaio's didn't quite live up to my expectations, food was good but the service was extremely poor. Waiters were inattentive and had to be waved down if you needed service.
1147: Review: Just called in for wine and coffee but was so impressed with the menu that we decided to taste the carpaccio and salami. Without a doubt - the best I've ever had. We regretted not being hungry. I can understand why previous reviews talked of the best meat in London. The staff were very knowledgeable and charming. Don't hesitate to try this delightful place.
1148: Review: Myself and 2 fellow carnivores shared a stupendous T-Bone Old Style. Accompanied by a fine Nebbiolo. We samples two starters of which the Batista with Stilton fired at the table was the best. A lovely informal environment with the look and feel of Spain due to the presence of many of that country. When is South Kensington give this a try, you will see the quality meat hanging in the window!
1149: Title: Hearty and quality Italian meat

Review: knowledgeable staff who know their cuts of meat .Meat cut and brought to your table before cooking the way you like it .Good wine list and no one short of an opinion or two .Atmosphere makes for a great Italian style night out ...
1150: Review: First visit to Macellaio RC and certainly won't be the last. To celebrate our anniversary, my husband and I had travelled from Derbyshire and it was well worth the trip. Food was fantastic - Starters delicious, Costata del Macellaio tender, full of flavour and perfectly cooked, recommended Primitivo wine excellent choice. All the staff so very helpful, knowledgeable, kind and fun; they made our anniversary really special. Italian butchery, cooking and hospitality don't get much better than this. We will return soon to our new favourite restaurant.
1151: Title: Autêntico açougue italiano em Londres

Review: O lugar tem uma proposta interessante, e um açougue com mesinhas altas e baixas, e bonito mas talvez um pouco pesado para quem não goste de ver carne expostas, há também um cheiro forte de açougues. A carne e boa (mas talvez para nós brasileiros, não seja incrível) assim como a carta de vinhos (bem completa com vários rótulos italianos nos mais variados preços). Os garçons são quase todos italianos, ou seja, super simpáticos e atenciosos.
1152: Title: Best meat you can find in London

Review: Second time I visited this great restaurant and second time I enjoyed the BEST beef ever. From the outside, one could think entering a butcher. There is indeed a butcher cutting the steaks live from the bone. You can not find more delicious dry aged meat. While waiting for your dinner being served, your knife is being planted in your table ... nice touch , reflecting what your really came for: eating MEAT!Once served, you immediately notice the quality of the food and the fact it has been prepared on an open wood- fire grill . The result: Bistecca as you can only find it in rare places in Italy.Whenever I am in London I go to Macellaio to enjoy. Even when it takes me 1 hour by tube to get there :-)
1153: Review: I have been in this restaurant last Saturday and I wanted to come back the day after! The t-bone was the best I had so far, even in Italy! The meat has really a special taste and also starters and desserts are superb! Friendly staff and nice atmosphere, you can feel the passion of the owner and everyone working there. Complimenti! Il moo ristorante preferito a Londra!
1154: Title: Great place for itialian meat and fine wine

Review: We went here twice for or 4 night trip it was that good. They have dry aged beef that they bring to you table and you can choose your own cut. The meat is brought in from Italy- so it was really great. Also between the two nights- had carpaccio - procuitte- rib eye - t bone- all 5 star taste and presentation.
1155: Title: Ottima carne e personale gentile
Review: Atmosfera accogliente e professionale, carne ottima e buon vino. Lo consiglierò agli amici che verranno a Londra Da non perdere
1156: Review: At first sight you could be forgiven if you thought you were in a butchers but it is a first class meat restaurant.The choice of meat dishes is extensive all cooked to perfection in the Italian style,the meat is first class,I prefer to eat on the ground floor the basement can be a little noisy.
1157: Review: heerlijk - nee super eten in een leuke ambiance (binnen) beoordeel de locatie niet van buiten af - gewoon naar binnen gaan (hopelijk is er nog een plaatsje :) de wijntjes perfect afgestemd op het eten wat je voorgeschoteld krijgt, met een goede uitleg en advies
1158: Title: The way steak should be cooked

Review: I will not say much.. Excellent service, friendly atmosphere, very good wine list (the barman rocks) but above all the best meat quality you can find. Meat quality is exceptional and they know how to prepare it. If you like steaks this is the place to visit..
1159: Review: Consigliato da amici italiani che vivono a Londra, previa necessaria prenotazione siamo stati in 4 a cena in questo locale accogliente. Personale cortese ed attento. Tavolini piccoli per 4 persone. Un po' troppo rumore. Per il resto ottima carne, ben cucinata e ben servita. Da replicare
1160: Review: If you think you know what great beef dishes are, you were wrong until you visited this place. Unique and exceptionally good place!
1161: Review: My friend brought me to "Macellaio" today for the first time, I live in East London so it took me more than one hour to arrive at the restaurant but I can tell now it was worth it!!!The meat we had was truly delicious and the cooking temperature was perfect.Many thanks to Lello that suggested us what to order, everything was outstanding!!Definitely coming back (very soon).
1162: Title: Excellente viande de boeuf. Et service très sympa.

Review: Il ne faut pas se laisser impressionner par la vitrine et sa décoration de type "boucherie". La salle est cachée dans le fond et plus grande que ce que l'on peut voir de la rue. Très bonne ambiance. Service de qualité et de bon conseil. Entrecôte à partager à plusieurs, extraordinaire. A préférer à la côte de boeuf qui peut décevoir (la viande est délicieuse mais forcément plus grasse). Viandes "aged" de 25 à 30 jours. Au dessert : latte dolce fritto.
1163: Title: para quem gosta de carnes
Review: O restaurante tem atendimento muito atencioso e para quem gosta de carnes é muito bom. Tem acompanhamentos gostosos e as sobremesas são deliciosas. Tem muitos produtos italianos maravilhosos!
1164: Review: Heerlijke Italiaan in Londen! Super vlees, geweldig vriendelijk personeel, goede wijnsuggesties, fijne ambiance. Romantisch met 2en wezen eten, was erg leuk en lekker, een aanrader!!!
1165: Title: Excelentes carnes em south kensington

Review: Minhas visitas aos restaurantes de Brompton Road foram otimas. Depois de ir na pizzaria em frente resolvi experimentar o Maccelaio no dia seguinte. Nao me arrependi! Carnes piemontesas de primeira, fresquissimas, grelhadas no ponto certo. O atendimento tambem nao deixa a desejar! Obrigado Emanuelle e Roberto! Ate a proxima!
1166: Title: Steak dinner whilst on business

Review: When my colleagues said lets grab a steak later we did not realise where we were going having just googled a local steak house. When we arrived after pre booking a table we realised that we were going to struggle with our £20 evening meal budget.After looking at the menu we realised we could forget our budgets and we better just go with the flow. We were served by the assistant manager who gave us a great explanation on how the restaurant works.It's effectively a butchers shop that cooks their own meat. Not only do they cook it, but they source it from a Italy and age it in their own cellars for 50 days, which they assured us makes all the difference.We decided to move straight onto the main course. The steak is served to share, and comes pre sliced.. This caused a bit of concern as everyone liked different ways of it being cooked ranging from rare to well done. We were persuaded to try it medium rare, and that if the party was unhappy they could easily grill it some more. I was very concerned as I hate the metallic taste of blood in a steak that is too rare.....I know for some this is what they like, but I hate the taste of coins in my mouth.......The assistant manager assured me that as the steak is so ages there is no blood, and although rare it would taste like no other rare steak I have tasted. He was right.The steak came out (1.3kg) and was presented to us prior to cooking. When it came cooked it looked very rare in places, but I decided to give it a go.....and I am glad I did. It was really good. Very soft and melted like butter with a great flavour. We ordered two side dishes, a mixed leaf salad and spinach to share.The food again was wonderful, but a little costly. I only drank tap water and the steak and salad come in at £34 when the service charge was included. I would have liked to have seen some side dish included with the steak for that kind of money as if you decided to have a drink, the costs become a bit prohibitive for the business traveller who is eating out 5 nights a week.Saying this, the restaurant is in Kensington, where money is not a consideration for the locals, so with the amount of care, love and passion the owners put in, they probably have priced it right for their normal market.The one other consideration was the volume in the restaurant. We were seated downstairs and we struggled to hold a conversation which was a real shame. I think this is just the numbers of people and the low ceiling acoustics.I did thoroughly enjoy my meal, and I hope to visit again for a treat one day.
1167: Title: Anche i vegetariani dovrebbero provare le loro bonta`.
Review: Magnifico, forse un po piccolino ma la qualita` non delude MAI. Non Avevo mai provato la lingua adesso non posso piu farne a meno.Lello poi e` il numero UNO.
1168: Title: The best steak in London

Review: This is one of my favourite restaurant in London. Everything is just perfect, the food the wine the staff and the atmosphere. I had the best carpaccio I have ever had in my life, so tasty and delicate at the same time. Went crazy for stracciatella cheese and bresaola. Even better than in Italy. Not to talk about the fiorentina steak, that was out of this world. They also do homemade focaccia which was very yum. They recommend us a wine from Calabria region (sorry I can't remember the name) that was just perfect. The staff is so knowledgeable and friendly, it seems like they are really passionated about what they're doing. They really know their stuff.Would recommend this restaurant to anybody that love meat. Thanks Macellaio!
1169: Review: Dette var vårt tredje besøk til denne fantastisk usminkede restauranten. Fantastisk service og en pasjon og stolthet for maten man skal lete lenge etter. Dette er ingen posh plass, men rett og slett en matopplevelse. Vi ba restauranten bare bestemme hva vi skulle spise og fikk nok en gang en uforglemmelig kveld
1170: Review: Em Old Brompton, Kensington, comida italiana da Calábria , carnes caras 56 libras por kilo, é caro e não chega aos pés de uma carne gaúcha!Não recomendo!
1171: Review: My fourth time in London,  my first experience in Macellaio, u will never forget. ...did not know that a piemonte has cattle. The service was untouchable, I did not booked and they just give me a place to seat. Do not miss. Thanks
1172: Review: Great surprise in South Kensington, I`m looking forward to go back and try again the beautiful genovese steak and prosecco
1173: Title: One of the best steak in London

Review: AMAZING STEAK! I have ordered beef tartare and Fiorentina (T-BONE) and both were DELICIOUS. High quality food & wine. Fantastic service, Ada is very helpful and professional. 
will be definitely be back!
1174: Review: Visited on Sunday night with my OH and the place was full - loads of Italians which we took as a good omen. Melt in the mouth cured meats and mozzarella to start, then onto the main event - we shared a huge steak cooked simply but perfectly. Great wine choice too. Italian waitress was very pleasant, helpful and efficient. Loved it.
1175: Review: Sehr freundlicher Empfang, ungewöhnliches Ambiente. Tische stehen eng, es gibt einen Bereich an der Tür und im hinteren Teil des Restaurants. Sehr laut und rummelig, nichts für einen Abend, an dem man sich unterhalten möchte. Wir hatten Steak Tartare , anschl. Fassona Beef, beides war ganz hervorragend. Das machte Lust auf die Pork Ribs, die wir sehr gerne essen. Hier waren sie entsetzlich, bestanden aus sehr großen Ribs, fast fleisch- und geschmacklos. Eine Zumutung, dass die Küche so etwas überhaupt servieren lässt! Wir haben reklamiert und fanden sie auch nicht auf der Rechnung. Davon sollte man die Finger lassen. Wer Lust auf sehr gutes Rindfleisch hat, ist hier richtig. Wer es chic und nett möchte, sollte ein anderes Restaurant aufsuchen.
1176: Review: Went with my wife here, and that was a success. Top service, good wine and an excellent t bone steak. Very friendly welcome, will definetely come back next time in London. Easy to get to from South Kensington tube station. Nothing negative to Write.
1177: Review: Really enjoyed the food and atmosphere! Out waiter LeLe was excellent and very knowledgeable, he made the night extra fun!
1178: Review: Hi,I went to Macellaio twice and this has become my favourite place of meat in London until somebody may find a better place. I am a fan of Gaucho, Hawksmoor/Foxlow which have a different style and are both very good. I love more Macellaio because the meat tastes fresh and healthy and the guys do a fab job in arising the natural flavours of the meat without the need for sauces and other stuff. The tartare is amazing and so the main meat courses. The reason may be that these guys import the meat from Piedmont region every day. For those who do not know it, Macellaio means Butcher and beyond the attracting meats hanging on the ceiling that you can admire from the outside in the windowshop under a red kind of sexy light, you can find inside at the counter Lello from Naples who preapares and cuts meat preparing the most flavoursome taglieri. The place is also suitable for parties since they have a room downstairs. Cannot say anything about prices as both times I did not see the bill!
1179: Review: High standard quality meat, 1kg of florentine was just perfect cooked and tender like butter.Very attentive service with friendly and sparkling staff. Very nice dinner in an warm atmosphere. The waitress was very good during the all dinner.Special thanks to Samuele the manger for the friendly welcome and all his explanations of the food, very knowledgeable person. I highly recommend this restaurant!
1180: Review: Il Macellaio tiene fede al suo nome! Fondato e gestito con passione, la esprime fino in fondo sulla tavola. A partire dall'ambiente rustico ma curato nei dettagli, esprime una vera adorazione per la carne, rispettata e lavorata in modo maniacale. Abbiamo gustato due tagli diversi di bovino, entrambi eccellenti e gustosi come già avvenuto altre volte in passato. Carta dei vini non comune con etichette originali e meditate. Lo staff è sempre molto cortese e disponibile.Una piacevole esperienza per tutti i meat lovers!
1181: Title: Pouca comida, atendimento ruim e sujo

Review: Fomos ao restaurante para um jantar e odiamos. A comida foi servida em porções minúsculas e estava fria. Wifi nao funcionava, jarras sujas, talheres sem fio.. Serviço muito lento. Tivemos que pedir para retornar a carne para a cozinha para acertarem o ponto. Eu e minha família somos gaúchos e saímos decepcionados.
1182: Review: If you like a nice tender steak, this is the place for you. Looks more like a Butchers shop from outside with meat hanging in a refrigerated window and a guy chopping it up with a cleaver. Pass the entrance into the restaurant where you will be served by a very professional Maître who on our second visit in the same week remembered what we had on our first visit, the way we had it cooked and what wine we had. Then, the waiter comes round and Stabs the pointed end of the steak knife into the table with a very vocal twanging sound which only serves to highten expectation of a big juicy steak and your not disappointed as they hang their meat for up to fifty days and it is so tender that my Granny could eat it without her false teeth. Worth traveling a hundred miles for the experience and I certainly will be Back.
1183: Title: If you LOVE MEAT... You will ADORE MACELLAIO's !!

Review: Dinner with group of Italian colleagues during London wine fair. As soon as you enter your nostrils are filled with the scent of mouthwatering meat. Started with delicious cold cuts, tartare and a burrata cheese. Exceptional. Then we shared tagliata, T-bone steak and fillet coming from Frisona beef, carefully selected and aged at the restaurant. Unforgettable. Great attention was given even to the sides and as dessert I still remember the milky taste of the best cheese cake I ever had, though I'm not really fond of sweets, usually. Surprised by the great care on each and every detail, even the wines are suggested based on the various cooking times of the steaks!!! Il Macellaio is definitly the best restaurant I've ever been to... And my first choice for London. What a pity there is not a side branch in Verona, where I live.
1184: Review: siamo capitati qui consigliati da amici, e abbiamo trovato un bel ristorante italiano pieno di sorrisi, competenza e simpatia, col personale preciso e attento a presentare e consigliare prodotti italiani di buona e ottima qualità, e un'eccellente carne in bella mostra quasi fosse una vera macelleria.abbiamo mangiato ottime bistecche e sfiziosi stuzzichini, tutto proveniente dall'Italia, come orgogliosamente precisato dal giovane maitre.unico neo il grande successo del locale, piccolo e sempre pienissimo, che faceva innalzare i decibel a livelli un po troppo alti.buono il rapporto qualità-prezzo.
1185: Review: Cena dopo la Fiera London wine fair , una rilassante cenetta fra amici di Lavoro, mangiare la carne di vari generi e regioni (Piemonte in primis) fuori Italia è stato un'esperienza molto gradita mi sono leccato i baffii, complimenti tutto ottimo dagli antipasti al dolce.. Lista vini discreta..lo staff molto preparato e cordiale, bravi bravi
1186: Title: Bought the Meat and Wow

Review: A friend of mine bought a Fiorentina Steak to cook for a group of us. Simply the best steak ever eaten, quality of meat was mind blowing and we have just returned from Argentina and had some great steak there. This meat is of a quality better then Lidgates, Ginger Pig and Harrods butchery. its simply the best.
1187: Title: Ottima carne in un ristorante italiano

Review: Molto carino l'ingresso con congelatore con carne a vista. Ottima accoglienza da parte dei "tagliatori" con relativa offerta di stuzzichino-salame. Il personale è molto gentile e sorridente e l'atmosfera del locale tranquilla e gradevole. Ottima carne: lasciatevi consigliare dai camerieri e siate certi che la cottura sarà perfetta. Indugiate sugli antipasti accoppiando salami di fassona e mozzarelle. Conto adeguato alla vostra fame di carne...Per finire quasi tutto il personale parla italiano. Unico neo "molto pittoresco" i coltelli da taglio che vi daranno saranno piantati sul vostro tavolo....
1188: Review: The restaurant is well located and has a very cheerful Italian crowd all the time. The Fassona beef is doing the rest and allows everybody to enjoy a real Italian meat menu. Do yourself a favour and try the schiacciata and even better (feel free to be the judge) the steak tatar with melted blue cheese, to die for. Well done to th whole front of house team, you made the evening. As dessert I choose the lardo di Colonnata with honey and walnuts, you'll find it in the "starters" sections.
1189: Title: Good meat but room for improvement

Review: The meat in this place is very good but on't except it to be similar to your typical NYC steak house, it remains an italian place. Prices are reasonable and service is very relaxed in the good sense of it.Room for improvement on the sides: spinaaches were just tasteless and potatoes were just useless.would clearly come back despite the sides.
1190: Review: tutto il menu è FAVOLOSO,dagli antipasti ai primi , per non parlare della carne sia cruda che cotta ! vini italiani fantastici e posto esteticamente bellissimo ! e il proprietario è molto gentile educato e simpatico !
1191: Review: Serata da dimenticare. ..Entriamo la mia compagna ed io, veniamo accolti da una ragazza molto gentile che ci accompagna al tavolo, poco dopo arriva un ragazzo definito manager, che in maniera assolutamente non professionale ci fa capire che il tavolo dopo un ora deve essere liberato.Riguardo la cena, carne di buona qualità ma cucinata male, senza riposo, i liquidi di cottura si sono liberati nella tavolozza (sporca ). Abbiamo preso un assaggio di trippa, piu o meno 40 grammi. Il tempo di finire il "manager "ci invita a chiedere il bill.. serata da dimenticare, il classico italiano emigrato in cerca di fortuna. ...
1192: Review: Thank you so much to all the staff of Macellaio for making my friend's birthday dinner an amazing night. The food was fantastic, probably the best meat I've had in my whole life, and the staff there are extremely nice, funny and knowledgeable. I had an incredible time and will definetly come back asap :)
1193: Review: Abbiamo cenato la sera di Pasqua 2015, ovviamente come entri nel locale ti sembra di essere in Italia, carne ottima, soprattutto la bresaola .Difetti: la sala è poco areata, il personale poco esperto, per avere una bottiglia d'acqua è stata richiesta varie volte, ciò stona a noi Italiani che siamo abituati ad altro tipo di servizio.Costo eccessivo, è vero siamo a Londra con cambio sfavorevole, ma accipicchia attenzione.
1194: Review: I will try to be short: this is currently my favourite place for a stake in London!The quality of the beef is simply outstanding: try the Battuta all'Albese, a typical tartare from Piemonte, to fully appreciate it -I am confident you will not be disappointed. I had a Costata, which was mouthwateringly fantastic: the beef was both tender and very tasty. Also, you decide what size you want and the piece of raw meat is shown to you for your approval. In the menu you can even find Fiorentina steak, the Italian version of t-bone, combining the fillet and the sirloin. Remaining on food, even the starters are worth to be mentioned: besides the fantastic charcuterie (among which a special mention goes to the lard d'Arnad), the cheese available will not let you down, as for the Stracciatella -a sort of creamy mozzarella. Last, I have to pay my compliment to the waiters, which not only were discreet and precise, but they were even helping in suggesting food and drinks. I will most definitely get back here and I know my guests will be happy -as long as they are not vegetarian...
1195: Title: This Is just a Review of Mr Costa's butcher shop (if you could call the premises one)-

Review: as they sell all their meats off site as wellHaving not had a nice piece of Fassone beef for a while and not having time to eat there we decided to buy a nice ribeye and take it home for the grill - so glad we didAfter chatting a bit to the owner who appears to be a South Ken incarnation of Dario Ceccini (although he is southern Italian rather than Tuscan) about how he imports his beef - in essence from six independent farmers in Piemonte he knows for years and matures it in his own aging chamber for
1196: Review: What an absolute delight! My sister and I had such a fun and flavour-filled evening at Macellaio last night. We were expertly advised and looked after by the most lovely team; Anita, Ada and Mauritzio at the bar. We most enjoyed meeting owner Roberto and hearing his philosophy and passion for what he does.Thank you. We'll be coming back!
1197: Review: The quality of the beef here is spectacular – the best I have experienced outside Italy – and only bettered by very high end places in Italy.Service is informal and charming – although the sommelier is slightly annoying.The wine list itself is great – and reasonably priced.Our meal was £90 a head – for a party of 8 – which was pleasantly good value considering what we ate and drank.I will be back very soon – but leave your vegetarian friends and notions of anything green at home!
1198: Review: We had a celebration lunch for my fathers 82nd Birthday at this newly discovered restaurant.The staff were really knowledgeable about their meat and the whole meal was a real teat.All courses were served exquisitely and the T bone steak was the best we have ever tasted.The lovely waitress from Italy had time to make us feel special and genuinely wanted us to enjoy the whole experience, a rare quality to find these days.Would definitely recommend you try this place do not be put off by the rather dark and uninspiring entrance its all about the staff and their amazing menu !!!
1199: Title: Carne di qualità e non solo

Review: Ci sono capitato perché vicino al mio albergo, una sera che mi toccava cenare da solo.Il locale era pieno ed ho cenato al bancone, ma - a parte questo - carne, preparazione e servizio, davvero tutti apprezzabili.Il banco del macellaio all'ingresso sintetizza l'immagine (ed il nome) del posto. Carne davvero gustosa (ho preso una costata), come pure i ravioli con sapore intenso ed originale.La carta dei vini (italiani) offre un ampio spettro di scelta, certo considerando che a Londra i vini sono cari in generale ...Il conto quindi, alla fine, non è basso. Ma, se cercate qualità e ambiente, why not?!
1200: Review: We had dinner at Macellaio 2 days ago after friends recommanded it to us. It was definitely worth going. Both starters were excellent : a prosciutto with burrata and mixed grilled vegetables. We shared a very good aged t-bone for our main. The meat was very soft and tasty and didn't need anything else. The only little let down was the tiramisu we had for dessert which was just average, but except that it was a great dinner.Tip: try to book a table on the ground floor where the atmosphere is. The room downstair being a bit more quiet.
1201: Review: Went to London this week for a couple of days of culture. Used to trip advisor to find somewhere local to where we were staying, we were already looking at one place next door to this and hadn't spotted it, as it looks like a butchers as their fridge is in the window full of meat! Wonderful steak, atmosphere and service. Will definitely be going back again.Richard and Anita.
1202: Review: I am a Fellow of the world Master Chefs Society and a trained Butcher.This is simply the best Steak in London,in my opinion.We were here for an engagement party.The service was superb with Wines to match.Congratulations to you all.Will be back again!,
1203: Review: It's a really good place, nice atmoshere and the waiting staff are caring and professional. This is a fantastic Italian offering really good quality food.
1204: Title: Fantastic is all we can say.

Review: From the minute we walked in we were welcomed. The very friendly waitress advised on meats and some specialities. Of which we ate numerous. Livers heart which was suberb and first for us all and of course beef. Malbec flowed and was suberp. We were three guys big eaters and like wine. We couldnt fault the food the wine and of course impecable service. ( and for added service you kindly charged my cell phone ) huge reccomendations on a great service we will be back.
1205: Title: Suggest you leave your vegetarian friends at home :-)

Review: first time last night, a quirky spot but you have to love anyplace that puts a big red leather sofa on the street for the smokers :-) Started with prosciutto and a delicious burrata - the olive oil and balsamic they stock is top drawer - followed by a 2 kilo T-bone! which was both memorable and divine.Service was on the acceptable side of rude ( got a little shirty putting the bill down at 8.25 in the belief we had the table to 8.30 when we were told 9 but in his defense they were jamming and he did recommend a truly magnificent young Puteus wine :-)a £5 glass of grappa tasted better than a £25 glass which probably goes to show I don't know my grappas. Great buzzy spot where everyone seemed to be having a blast - definitely recommend and we will be back.
1206: Title: If you want to eat meat, this is the place
Review: Wonderfull beef, nice and helpful staff. The service is a bit slow so don't go in a hurry. Careful with the knives:-)
1207: Title: Un piccolo paradiso di carne italiana!!

Review: Sono stata in questo ristorante il 14 marzo, sabato sera.Premetto che di solito sono diffidente nel mangiare italiano a Londra, sono sempre tendenzialmente rimasta delusa quindi mi limito ad una pizza nei mie locali fidati ogni tanto, quando la voglia mi assale.Io e il mio fidanzato abbiamo trovato il posto online proprio da Tripadvisor e viste le recensioni positive ,con una gran voglia di mangiare carne come si deve, gli abbiamo dato una possibilità.Appena entri sei accolto da un'atmosfera deliziosa, posticino piccolo ma curato, i camerieri squisiti, gran parte italiani, ti trasmettono la passione è la qualità del loro cibo.Che dire del resto? Tutto fantastico! Carta dei vini buona, il vino scelto era perfetto un primitivo.Abbiamo preso un antipasto imperiale X2 con carne cruda e salumi eccezionale, molto abbondante, io mi sento di segnalare il lardo con miele e noci e la tartare.Seguono 2 tagliate da urlo con contorno, davvero ottime la carne tenerissima si scioglieva in bocca.Persino i dolci sono davvero ottimi, tiramisù incluso.Tutto questo: buona bottiglia di vino, antipasto più costoso della casa, 2 tagliate e 2 contorni, 2 dolci e caffè. 60£ a testa. Bravi tutti, noi che viviamo qui torneremo sicuramente a trovarvi.
1208: Title: Good place for meat lovers

Review: We celebrated our daughter's birthday here on a recent trip to London. It is most definitely the place to go if you love meat. We tried the beef and pork which were both amazing. The puddings were also very nice in particular the tiramisu. My only negative comment would be that the portion sizes are a little small especially the sides.
1209: Review: Husband recommended this so took my carnivorous 28 year old son. Entrance not everyone's cup of tea as cow carcasses hanging around and as you enter, there is a butcher cutting up meat with a huge cleaver. I have to say however, the meat they serve is outstanding and a real experience. Good wine list and good service. Recommend to all meat eaters
1210: Review: If your are a meat lover, this is definitely a place to go. The battutta (italian style tartare) is really to try. The Fiorentina to share is a no brainer. Not to mention other amazing products such as the stracciatella (not the ice cream, the cheese !), the burrata... And do not leave the place without having a tiramisu ! I've been there several time already, and I have yet to be disappointed by this restaurant !
1211: Title: Incredible beef dishes and very good service

Review: We came in for an impromptu lunch on Saturday. My partner had been here before and raved about it. This is most definitely a place for meat lovers - in particular, beef! If you like beef, in all its forms (and almost all parts of the cow) then this is the place for you. We shared the L'Imperiale sharing plate and a portion of the Cuore (heart). The sharing plate was incredible, with some of the most beautiful steak tartare and beef carpaccio that I have had in London. The lardo with walnuts was divine, if my heart and thighs would let me I would eat that every day!! The cuore was beautilly cooked at the table and had an impeccable flavour. We didn't have a dessert but did share a good bottle of wine and had a grappa to finish. Both were great. The service was relaxed but attentive and all staff we came into contact with were happy and helpful. We'll definitely be returning, next time to try the steak. Thanks, Macellaio!
1212: Title: Great, but I would suggest passing on dessert

Review: This is a probably a pretty unhelpful review as Macellaio is very much a MEAT restaurant, and I don't eat meat. However, I attended on Friday night with two carnivores (lapsed Hindus - i don't understand either), one of whom is a best friend. The red wine was amazing (I recall one of two bottles was from the Barolo region). The Buratta cheese (the chefs kindly prepared without sausage or polenta) was a creamy delicious delight.
